1b1(mdo): mas kyis kyang / mas ca mam ma sa ma mam sa yang tshonas
1b2(mdo): dang ye shes mnyam bu nyid pas byang chub mnyam pa nyid byang chub ma nyam pa nyid byas// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa 'di ni/ 
1b3(mdo): lags so// byang chub sems dpa' dus dpog rgyal pos gso med pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa ni sgrub pa lags te
1b4(mdo): 'dis byang chub sems dpa' gang chos thams cad chos kyi byings su yang dag par 'dra bar 'tshal nasachos ga yang 'byed par myi brgyad
1b5(mdo): yang mya bgyid pa 'di ni/ de'i bsgrub pa yang dag/ pa lags so// byang chub sems dpaladon legs sems kyis gsol pa
1b6(mdo): ldan 'das don la brtan pa lags kyitshig 'bru la ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kar don gyi rjes su zhugs pa'i zlos
1b7(mdo): kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi'i stong kun tu 'dzin pa dang stond pa la phyir rgyarnaMs dag pa'i don brjod du ma mchis pa de las kyang myi g.yo
1b8(mdo): pa 'di ni de'i bsgrub pa yang dag pa sadas so// byang chub sems dpa'ablo gros rnam padag pa so gsu padu pa
11a1(mdo): dang brjod pa sur le nad pa ma lags kyi/ nga na yang dag pa'i sgrub po chel pa ldan pa te/ ji mur 'gro ba dang 'ong ba yang dag par rjes su mya me byung ba de rje'i tshel bu 'di ni de'i
11a2(mdo): bsgrub pa yang dag pa lags so// byang chub sems dpa' shin tu dri byed sems pas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ kos dri ma can brtsa bar bgyi ba'i dri ma
11a3(mdo): mchis pa ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhidan du sems yongs su ma dag pa ni yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du so sor rtog pas yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o// bcom
11a4(mdo): sngan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang gi sems dang yodas nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad myi 'apa de dgadag pa gang la gos pa de sgrub pa yang dag
11a5(mdo): dAs gnas pa zhes bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rma pA rmosde gsol po bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dge' ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa ni
11a6(mdo): ras sgrub pa yang dag par 'phags pa thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyiram ldan 'das rlob chu pa sems napa' gdel la dag gnas shingabadud kyi lugs kyu
11a7(mdo): ka thams cad ni ldog pa'i grogs pas yongs su zin pa lpags so// dag bdud kyi sngags kyums shin tu 'dra ba de dag thams cad ni dge' blo sa gnyen kyis yongs
11b1(mdo): na zhing tu sad pa'i rang bzhin tsan du 'gyur/ de nas shi 'phos nas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de tu yod pa rgyun mnan du 'gyur zhing rmugs pa dang / gnyid che bar 'gyur ba 'di ni macom ldan 'a
11b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste lnga pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 'i chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/ rkyen shin
11b3(mdo): mthong ba'i slad du/ rgyu yongs su shes pa dang ldan par gyur// rgyu ma mchis pa dang / rgyu dang bral ba dang / mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis par gyur te/ bsod nams kyi 'du byed rnams
11b4(mdo): smod/ thabs dang bral/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la batshon par myi bgyid/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa rnams la bathon par myi
11b5(mdo): bgyid la/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa ni mchog/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ ni khyad par du 'phags pa ste/ de las gzhan pa'i pha rol
11b6(mdo): tu phyind pa rnams ni dman pa'o snyam na/ de ni dbang po yongs su ma smind pa/ btang snyoms ltung ba ste/ bskul ba'i de sa po bzhis sems can rnams myi sdud cing / smos mchis
11b7(mdo): pa/ mngon par 'du bgyi' ba ma mchis pa/ de nyid kyi ro myong bar bgyid pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste drug pa'o// bcom ldan
11b8(mdo): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa par gyu nga pa/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' zhing 'dod pa chung la cho ga shes te rab tu dben/ khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba rnams da
14a1(mdo): myi 'dre la/ de don nyung ba dang Ta/ bgyi'o 'anyur bas bde' bar gnas te/ g.yo' ma mchis kyang mr-ing tu thos pa yongs su pra tsa la pa da du shr-i/ snyoms can yongs su/ 
14a2(mdo): brgyal ba dang / chos mnyan pa la batshon par myi gnas sa kyi 'phel ba'i bka' mchid dang / don rnam par nges pa'i ba'i mched la bgyi'os la rgyan dgum par sems te/ 
14a3(mdo): su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can ma lags/ dge' ba ci zhes tshol ba mi brtson/ de dgon pa la gnas pa dang / gcig pur dga' bas nyon mongs pa rnams kun tu myi rgyu ste
14a4(mdo): nas ldang ba gnon pa tsam gyis dga' ba 'thob cing / bag ya nyam yang dag par gzhom pa'i slad du lam pa sgom par myi bgyid de/ de ni bdag gi don dang / 
14a5(mdo): kyi don gyi slad du brtson par myi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dkon pra lu ga nasapa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bdun pa'o// 
14a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mang du bos par gyur te/ chos kyi gtam can tshig mnyan tha~Mng 'os pa/ tshig gzung bar 'os pa/ snyand pa sna tshogs kyi gtam can
14a7(mdo): nga / spobs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur da kyang / de 'ang zing ki srad du chos ston te/ 'ang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis ma lags gang las de'i gos dang / zas dang / mal ca dang na bajal
14a8(mdo): sos sen dang / yo byad rnams mchi bar 'gyur ba de dag la chos ston da sems can gang dag de pa dang ldan zhing dngol mang ba legs par bshad pa'i don 'dzalang par nus shing / 
14b1(mdo): rengs su gyur duN+Di/ der rgyal bri ma rnams dang / sbyin gnam dpas d+hapa/ pa ya dang / slob dpor dang nA mkhan po dam po las gzhan pa them lta bu'i gang 'ag degs la kun pa
14b2(mdo): 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud par myi bgyid cing / de la ma gus par gyud pa dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams la mkhas pa/ khyad par thos pa/ gzungs dang / spobs
14b3(mdo): ba phun sum tshogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bgyi' ba thams cad tsha rad phyind pa de dag gi gan du mi mchi'/ myi snyen myi stend/ bsnyen pa~M kur myi byed/ yongs su myi 'dra
14b4(mdo): yongs su 'drir byi gsol cing // de ma thos thos pa'i chos nyand par myi bgyid zlos pa'i chos rnams kyang yod sa su dkar bar myi bgyid/ de las gzhan pa byang chub ses
14b5(mdo): dpa'i mes pa pa'i gang 'ag gang dag bdud kyi ljags kyis med pa/ chos ngan du la spyod pa spyings la dga' rnyed pa dang / de dag kyang de bzhin du de ni nis ma ma la
14b6(mdo): gyud pa dang / de dman pa la sten da cing / khyad par dang bA la bas 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'o 'gay-i/ blun pa 'on pa/ lkugs pa'i 'gro ba/ dman pa nyid du maN+Da' bar 'gyur ro// 
14b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig gis gram pa'i sa phyogs su shing tsam pa ka nr-i sman la/ chab gsol par myi brgyad kyi/ gang nas chab mtsho' bar ma chung ba'i
14b8(mdo): phyogs ner yang kor ma dang / gyo mo dag gis bkum nas/ bcom ldan 'das de lta na bzhugs shin tsam b+hA ka cha ba dang bral ba de la yal ka dang / lo ma dang na yal ka phre'am chog pa
17a1(mdo): rnams kyang chags par myi 'gyur/ sa dang / sbo ma dang / yas ku nA~MShAHma bu rnasus kyang skabs te/ dros sa su khyud bab 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
17a2(mdo): des de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ nga rgyal gyis glengs shing / de rgyal gyis phongs par gyur da na/ de dgel ba'i bshes gnyen dang
17a3(mdo): choste mnyam pa dang bral te/ ma thos pa'i chos rnams kyang myi nyan thos pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su dkang bar myi dgyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dpe
17a4(mdo): gcig tshe rgya mtsho chen po mchis par gyu dad pa de'igazhol ba'i phyogs/ rlo mchis pa 'gyur ro// de gzhol ba'i slad du che klung thams
17a5(mdo): byin nga / 'bab chu khams dang tshogs chung rgyas de zab bo// buts+tshab ldan 'di de bzhin nu ngachub sems dpa' nga rgyal ma mchis pa/ blam
17a6(mdo): rang sprin gnas la gus pa yang tshigs chung dram chos zab mo'i rgyu rnams na ba'i da du oM sa reg par 'gyur ro// de dran pa la yung gnas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
17a7(mdo): 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gyis khengs pa'i/ nga rgyas kyis rengs par gyur ste/ bla ma dang sbyim gnas rnams la rgyu don tu gyi 'dung+ge / 'dun bu ma gyi rgya/ 
17a8(mdo): rab tu gyi btsu na/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma'o// byang chub se shes dpa' 'don brjid kyi lcags rgyas zin par ba ba yi ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'don byang chu se mas
17b1(mdo): dpa'i nga rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi sngags kyu ste bcu gcig pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bya ban po sems dpa' gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la/ phyug cing nor dang / 
17b2(mdo): che ba dang / longs spyod che zhing nor mang la mdzod dang bang pa mang po phun sum tshogs par gyur da ti/ gzugs dang longs spyod dang / rus dang rigs dang / g.yog 'khor dang / bsod
17b3(mdo): nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan par gyur/ ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su btsal ba la mngon par 'tshon zhing / de gzums dang // longs spyod dang / g.yog 'khor dang / dbang phyug gi stobs
17b4(mdo): kyis rgyags shing bag ma mchis par gyur te/ byang chub sa mas dpa' gang dag rab tu byung bar gtogs pa khyim gyi gnas nas nges par byung/ ye shes kyi tshogs yongs
17b5(mdo): su tshol ba la batshon pa/ gdugs dang pa sems sha dang khraka skams pa/ rke ba/ nyam chung ba/ lus pas yog pa/ mgo' dang / kos la zhun
17b6(mdo): 'bar ba bzhin du gdugs mtshan du brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ dge' ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la rtag tu brtson pa dang ldan pa de dag la rke zhing nyams chud la/ myo dag ran
17b7(mdo): cing myi sdug par rig nas brnyas par bya'o// snyam du sems shing / de dag las legs par bshad pa nyan myi 'tshal te/ de de bas shas cher dman zhing ches rmugs par 'gyur 'di ni// 
17b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i rgyags pa dang / bag ma mchis pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bcu la gnyis bya'o// bcom ldan 'das bcu la gnyis po na
18a1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag pas shi nad tu ma 'das na tha na rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa yang mya rnab ni/ 
18a2(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lta smos kyang ci 'tsha yang te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na
18a3(mdo): sems dpa' bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ bdud kyi lcags kyu 'di dag las shi nad tu 'da' bar bgyi'o// 
18a4(mdo): 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa/ bam po bcul pa ste tha mu'// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyar
18a5(mdo): chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ blo gros rgya mtsho' khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi lcags kyu 'di dag logs
18a6(mdo): par bshad pa legs so legs so// blo gros rgya mtsho de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bya chub sems dpa' dag gang la gnas na/ bdud kyi lcags kyi tha
18a7(mdo): cad las shi nad tu 'dra bar 'gyur ba/ bdud kyi lugs kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo khyod la bshan s+ho// blo gros kyitshol ba rgyud kyi lugs kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo de dag gang zhe na/ 
18a8(mdo): blo gros rgya mtsho'i bcu so 'di dag ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo yin no// bcu la gang zhe na 'di ltas+yo kos rgya mtsho' chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pas
18b1(mdo): sa ldags bdan nyid byab pa byed pas/ sems can thams cadas che byamasa'adod ni tu gcod pa chas kyi zho dang po'o// thoms
18b2(mdo): mtshor chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa'i rang bzhin pas mtshan mo myed pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang / yongs su bad 'ad byed pas/ sems can thams cad la cher snying rje ba 'don paH
18b3(mdo): kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo gnyis pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho' chos thams cad na smon pa myed pa'i rang bzhin pas// smon pa myed pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang / sems can
18b4(mdo): thams cad yongs su smind par bya ba'i phyir/ bsams pa zhin du skye ba 'di ni bdun kyi lugs kyu rab tu gcod pa'is kyi sgo gsum pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho 'chos thams
18b5(mdo): cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas 'dod chag sa dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang / 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can yongs su smyind par byed pa 'don
18b6(mdo): bdud kyi lcags kyi rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bzhi pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho'i chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang bral pa'i rang bzhin pas zhe sdang dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang / 
18b7(mdo): zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can yongs su sbyind par byed pa 'don brgyad kyi lugs kyi rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sa la ba'o// blo gas rgya mthachu mo mams cad na gta' mug da
18b8(mdo): pa'i rang bzhin pas ka ti'i mug dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs pa/ gti'i mug la spyod pa'i sems can yongs su smind par byed po 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyi rab tu gnod pa'i chos kyi sgo drug
19a1(mdo): pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho'i' chos thams cad mi kus na nyon mongs pa myed pa'i rang bzhin pas/ kun na sa sbyin mongs pa myed pa'i rnam par zhugs kya// kun nas nyon mo mas can rgya
19a2(mdo): sems can yongs su sbyind par byed pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyi rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo badzin pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho'i' chos thams cad ni skye ba myed cing 'byung ba myed pa'i rang bzhin pas/ 
19a3(mdo): skye ba myed cing 'byung ba myed pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang skye ba dang / rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba spar ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos stond pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyur rab tu gcod pa'i chos
19a4(mdo): kyi sgo brgyad pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho'i chos thams cad ni rang mnyam zhing bye brag myed pa'i ra bzhin pas rang mnyam zhing bye brag myed pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang / theg pa chen
19a5(mdo): po'i bsam pa yongs su myi 'dong bar sems can rnams la the/ ga pa gsum rnam par bod pa'i chos ston pa 'di na bdud kyi ljags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo dgul ba'o// 
19a6(mdo): blo gros rgya mtsho'i gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'ang myi gnas ya/ byang chub tusems kyang myi brjed/ 'thon pa thams cad dang yang bral
19a7(mdo): la sems can rab tu tha rad par bya ba'i chom pa yang gyi 'dor/ spyod pa thams cad las kyang shind tu 'das ya byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las kyang myi ldog pa 'di ni blo gros rgya mtsho' byang chub
19a8(mdo): sems dbu'i bdud kyi lugs kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi bcural ba'o// thogs rgya mtsho'i chos shA mang po 'di das ni 'dud rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de
19b1(mdo): dag rab tu sbyor na/ bcud kyi ljags kyu thams cad las shi nad tu 'das par 'gyur ro// bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gtsi pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ bdud kyi gnas pas
19b2(mdo): cad mog mog por gyur te/ rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// 'di lta ste dbor na/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu phyung bas bdud kyi gnas
19b3(mdo): thams cad mog mog por gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por gyurd to// de nas bdud sdig can gyis ltas chen po 'di mthong nas rings shing myur bar/ 
19b4(mdo): la kor du dpung ka tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te/ bkod pa mi 'dra bas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gan du 'gro ba'i bkod pa de 'dra
19b5(mdo): dpag tshad sum bcul pha drug tshun chad bdud kyi sdes bkang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor skya khyams ka la ba der dong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus deng de'i
19b6(mdo): bsgribs par gyur da te/ 'ongs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / gang dag phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnams dang / 'khor de las sems can gang dag 'dul par 'gyur ba
19b7(mdo): rnams dang / gang dag sred par kun tu sbyor ba spangs pa'i dga' bcom pa lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag rnams ma gtogs par gang gis kyang de ba mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das
19b8(mdo): kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshol la bka' stsa la pa/ bro kos rgya mtshol khyod kyis bdud ldog can bkod+hi m+b+ha ji wA nu 'a 'ong ma stong dra / gso yad pa/ bcom ldan 'das
20a1(mdo): mtho ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtshol bdud sdig can 'don chos rgya rnam grangs 'ad la bar chud bye ba'i phyir 'ongs na/ de ci'i
20a2(mdo): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das deng 'di 'de' ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'phang por bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
20a3(mdo): rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bdel pa thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni ge lA yod/ de nas stond pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan na tse zhes
20a4(mdo): bya/ blo gros rgya mtshos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra'i bu shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas gang ga'i klu bcu la gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na
20a5(mdo): bdel ba thams cad kyis brgya nad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi/ khams yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba/ com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab
20a6(mdo): tu 'jom pa zhes bya ba chos ston to// de ci'i phyir 'jig rten rgya khams de bde' ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya zhe na btsun pa sha ri'i bu bde' ba thams cad kyis brgya nad pa'i
20a7(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ bde' ba'i rgyu dang / yon tan gyi rgyu dang / bkod pa'i rgyu bskal par brjod kyang zad par mya nus te/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde' ba thams cad kyis brgya nad
20a8(mdo): pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'jom pa des/ byang chub thob pa de'i tshe/ de byang chub kyi snying
20b1(mdo): po la 'dug ste/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma thob par lus las bdud skul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyur nas/ 'od zer nas bsku lad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de na bcud bye ba
20b2(mdo): phrag brgya'o 'khod pa bdud re re zhing g.yog 'khor bye ba brgya phrag bcu' yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi snying po ni sa pa der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad bya
20b3(mdo): bsams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad byed ma nus te/ de dag ngo mtshar du gyur da nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs so// des kyang ji ltar de dag
20b4(mdo): bsam pa thag pa nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byad chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar/ bdud de dag la chos bstand nas/ bcom ldan 'das
20b5(mdo): phyis byang chub thob ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de bcud rab tu 'jom pa zhes bya'o// de byang chub thob po'i mchog gi phrugs dang / bzang po'i phrugs kyang bdud las
20b6(mdo): btuld pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so// rim 'gro ba yang bdud las btu lad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu
20b7(mdo): 'jom pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'ab shig yang dag par rab tu stond te/ de na theg pa gzhan gyi myi yang myed do// btsun pa sha ri'i zhu ba de'i ba thams cad kyis brgya nad pa'i
20b8(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams de ni de 'dra ste/ der 'phangs na phyis bdud kyi las byed par myi 'gyur bya/ bdud las btu yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub tu
21a1(mdo): bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcud sreg cani sngangs skrag 'jigs te/ smra zang zhes byed nas ni
21a2(mdo): de nas 'gro bar 'dod na/ 'gro ma nus te/ myi sdang bar ma gyur nas/ de de bas kyang tshe ri sngangs shing skrag ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas
21a3(mdo): 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'jig rten gyi khams der 'phang bar myi 'gyur ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la bdag la bskyob tu
21a4(mdo): gsol da/ bde' bar gshegs pa bdag la bskyab tu gsol da/ bcom ldan 'das kyiseM ka' stsad pa / sdig can ma 'jigs shi/ skyes bu dam
21a5(mdo): pa 'di lta bu dag ni/ sems can la rnam para'o phyir gnas pa ma yin no// sdig rten khyod byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di la brtso
21a6(mdo): pra gsol cig dang / 'di nyid khyod la skyob par 'gyur ro// de nas bdud sdig can gyis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la byag 'tshal nas
21a7(mdo): 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa khyod bdag la bzod par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'de' ba rnams cad ma rgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang myo 'bad+ma bar
21a8(mdo): nga ltar gang na skyes bu dam pa khyod lta bu chos stond par 'gyur ba'i 'khor di ngar de bskyed pa'i srid du ngag yang mchi' bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar brgya'o// 
21b1(mdo): blo gr-i sa rgya mtshos smras pa/ sdig can kho bo lta bu dag la bzod pas gsol mya dgos te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad la shi nad tu bzod pa nyid do// 
21b2(mdo): sdig can khyod bde' ba thams cad kyis brgyand pa'i 'jig rtend kyi khams der song la/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bkrod rgya ne dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu
21b3(mdo): 'dzem pa de la ltos shig dang / khyod la 'tshe bar mya 'gyur ngo ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gas rgya mtshos laka pa kams pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ bdud sdig can
21b4(mdo): gyi spyi bor bzhag nas/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig karadagis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna dang / slob dpon chos kyi dpe' mkhyud med pA
21b5(mdo): bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des/ bdag gi rdzu 'phrul skye rkang pa ci 'dra bar bdud sdig can gyi yang de 'dra bar gyur/ cig ces de lta bu'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs byas so/ 
21b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos tshig de skad smras ma thag tu/ de nas bdud sdug can rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mchog dang ldan par gyur da te/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po
21b7(mdo): ya sa/ rkyen gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas kyi sdang ba rgya dang rte// 'di ltang byang chub sems dpa' blo klos rgya mtsho'i byon gyi rlab
21b8(mdo): kyis/ skad cig par tshig yad tsam rgya la/ bdel pa thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams do gnas par gyu te// dedas na rjen byin bcom ldan 'das de nan
22a1(mdo): gshegs kra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'jom pa ga ya ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgol pos phyag 'tshal te/ ldan
22a2(mdo): 'dun bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs cig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bcud rab tu 'dok+tas pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sus
22a3(mdo): dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdu rab tu tsha joms pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das seMs
22a4(mdo): can gang dbang chung zhing mdog ngan la myi sdug pa 'di lta bu gang / nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal/ da pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs logs su sangs
22a5(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ gang ga'i klung bcur gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mched ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
22a6(mdo): gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// 'tshon// klu zhes so// de 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgya chen
22a7(mdo): dun to// yang dag par rab tu 'chad do// deng phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med yongs myed bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa dag chos kyin pa grangs 'ad
22a8(mdo): phyir 'dus so// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dal chen mo thogs khyim tshol zhes bya ba go cha bsam gyis kyi khyab pa bgom
22b1(mdo): bcom ma m+bu 'das de la yongs su 'dri zhing yongs su 'drir 'jug par sangs dag par 'dus par gyu rang to// chos kyi dam rmongs 'di ba ma bshad pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig can myig kis myi 'a
22b2(mdo): par bya ba'i yas kyi phyir 'ongs pa dang / skyes bu dam pa des 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ bdud sdig can de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'phangs so// de nas bdud las btulan
22b3(mdo): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can la 'di med sa smras so// kho bo cag kyang khyod kyi grogs yin gyis/ sdig can khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
22b4(mdo): chub tu sems bskyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo cag padud du gyur te/ sems can rnams kyi dgel ba'i ba'i bar chad bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa las/ kho bo cag
22b5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de lta bas na khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sas
22b6(mdo): skyed cig/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na myed pa yang dga' rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ tshig 'di skad ces bdag gis blan byed pa yang dag/ 
22b7(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ phyin chad bdud kyi las myi bya'o// zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can rin po che bkod pa'i ser ge
22b8(mdo): khri la bzhag ste/ de nas 'dus pa rin po'i ye la'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gtam gyi rgyang mi 'dra ba la rigs kyi bu khyod spobs par gyis shig ces gsol la bta po 'o// de nas bya
23a1(mdo): sems dpa' bre gas rgya mtshos gang bdud sdig can seng ge'i khre la 'jug pa'i Sha'i sgo da/ be spu'i khung bu thams cad nas/ ltar bcom ldan 'das shig rgya thul bas
23a2(mdo): 'dus pa chen po'i li'u 'di bshad pa lta bu'i gtam byung ste/ yi ge de dag dang / tshig dang / yi ge'i 'bru de dag dang / mnyam zhing myi da myi mA e lhag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs
23a3(mdo): byas so// de nas byang chub sems da' la de dag gis bcud sdig can de dag bdud sdig can de las 'dus pa chen po'i le'u 'i gtam pos nas ro mtsha rang tu su red te/ bcom ldan
23a4(mdo): 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad rnas bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams myi mched de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shog kya thub pa
23a5(mdo): de dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho deng dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la blta' bar bgyi'o// de nas
23a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pas/ mdzod snga nas gzugs thams cad stonod pa shes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste/ 'od zer phyung ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing kas
23a7(mdo): 'a klung bsung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed de dag las 'das te 'jig rten gyi khams mya mched 'di sdang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// deng byang chub semam dpa' de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
23a8(mdo): de la / rigs pa shag kya thub pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na/ bskal da pa brgyang yang bsdigs pa mthar myi phyin du bya'i seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
23b1(mdo): bas nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bzlas pa chen po yi lelu 'o chos kyi nam grangs cing yang dan spor ba'i dang / byang chub sems dpa' bu gros rgya batshol yang mtho // 
23b2(mdo): 'jog rten gyi khams kyi mched chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtsho gcig pu gnas pa 'di yang mthong ngo // de na slob pa 'i yid myed par mthong/ phyogs bcul 'jig rten gyi khams nas rungs pa'i
23b3(mdo): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam gyi rin po che'i pad ma dag la 'khod cing chos nyan pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // mthor nas kyang tshim zhing mgul la yid rangs shing rab tu dka' ste/ 
23b4(mdo): dga' ba dang yid bdel ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhi na gshegs pa shag kya thub pa ga la ba de logs su me tog gtodad to// gtor ma zag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'ongs
23b5(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa'i spyo gtsug gi mtsham sa su me tog gi gdugs chen por gyuras to// der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor der me tog gi gdugs de
23b6(mdo): mamong nas ngo mtsham tu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad rjes gsolas to// bcom ldan 'das gang me tog gi gzugs 'dir gyu da pa'i me tog 'di dag gang nas mchis// ba
23b7(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa med pa/ grogs po dag 'di dag na bdel ba thams cad kyis brgya nad pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bya ba mchod pa'i yis kyi byar
23b8(mdo): gtom to// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cags bde' ba thams cad kyis brgyand pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de dang / 
24a1(mdo): tun sdig can 'jig rten gyi khams de na tso bgyid pa lta 'a ba kyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnaMs gsol ba btab pa mkhye nad nas / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
24a2(mdo): rgya mtsho lus dga' stsa med pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdel 'a thams cad kyis bachu dad pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bcud rab tu 'jos pa pa de dang / 
24a3(mdo): bcud sdig can de 'khor 'di la stond cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye bas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos sor mo bcu la las 'od zer stong sreg bcu phyung nas// 
24a4(mdo): 'od zer de dag kis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga' klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed pa de dag zhes 'das te/ bde' ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab
24a5(mdo): par gyu dad to// der rnams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / 'di la lasems cad kyis brgya nad pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
24a6(mdo): bdud rab tu 'joms pa de dang / bdud sdig can chos rgyachen po la 'dus pa chen po la yi gtam rgya cher yang dag par rab tu stond pa yang mthong ngo // mthong nas
24a7(mdo): kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas rang rang ki da ma'i stand las sangs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin bzhigs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de la phyag 'tshal nas
24a8(mdo): de dag gis mya tig dang / mu tig phreng kas gtord to// gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug gi mtshams su me tog gi khar pa bachags pa chen por
24b1(mdo): gnas par kun tu sdang ngo // de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das 'dag myi mched
24b2(mdo): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa'i gan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsa khad pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dra beb par shes na song na de// de nas bdun
24b3(mdo): sdig can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgol pos phyag 'tshal te/ san bdun bskor ba byas nas// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
24b4(mdo): rgya mtsho'i byin gyi rlabs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi skad cig thar cig/ yud tsam de la mye mched kyi khams 'dir gnas par rgyu de rad to// de bcom ldan 'das ga ya dertsa song ste phyi nad nas
24b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo' bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de nas tshe
24b6(mdo): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag khyod kyis 'jog rten gyi khams bde' ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa de mthong ngam/ smras pa btsun ban
24b7(mdo): d+ha'aM bye bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams ji tsam du yongs su dag pa de mthong ste/ de lta dag ci dri ma byed pani sems can gyi mchog byang chub sems dayul rnams kyi gnas de ngo mtshanan to/ 
24b8(mdo): bdag gis de mthong nas kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// smras pa grogs po khyod kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na
25a1(mdo): khyod yang bdud kyi las lta byed dang/ smras pa btsun pa sha na dwa ti'i bu skrag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa lnga rnams la krung gis rgya ma'i tu
25a2(mdo): sa byed myi nus so// de ci'i byor zhe na/ rnag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par zhums pazhi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji lta ji ltar bdud kyi las byed pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems
25a3(mdo): dpa' rnams ches stobs dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus thom mo// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis rnam grangs 'das kyang kar rA dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bcud kyi las byed
25a4(mdo): de nyid sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las su brjod kyi/ bdud kyi las na ma yin pa 'di ltar rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu bstand pa dang / bdud kyi cho 'phrul
25a5(mdo): bstand pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de las srog chags te khris bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu se mas bskyed do// bdud kyi 'khor de las kyang sgra'i bu
25a6(mdo): khris bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das sadag cag 'jig rten gyi khams 'del ba thams cad kyis brgya dang pa der skye bar chu dang
25a7(mdo): cig ces tshig de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to// / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu bstan pa le'u ste bcu
25a8(mdo): gcig pa'o// / de nas 'acom ldan 'das pa byang chub sems dpal dkos rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa
25b1(mdo): rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni bA na mang ba/ phyir rgol ba mang ba lags na/ gang 'di lta bu'o mdo'i sde 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs nub par myi 'gyur zhing / rgyas par 'gyur ba dang
25b2(mdo): gang dag 'dzind pa dang / klog pa dang / stond pa de dag la yang / bdud dam btud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyiste glegs rnyed par myi 'gyur pa dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring tu gnas pa dang / mdol
25b3(mdo): sde 'di lta bu 'di dag kun tu bsrung ba dang / sra ba dang / yongs su gzung ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs las la smras par byed kyis brlab tu gsol // / de skad ces
25b4(mdo): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsalar rto// blo gros rgya mtshol sems can kar dag 'do' sde 'di lta bu 'di
25b5(mdo): dag 'dzind pa dang / stond par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa/ brtson/ 'grus pa tshams pa/ dge' ba'i yab bskyed pa de da/ ka 'dul ba'i dpeng nye bar bzung ste/ chos kyi rnam grang
25b6(mdo): 'di byin gyis brlabs zi nad to// blo gros rgya mtsho la de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shi ka dang / tshig gang dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhin po 'di dag bkug nas
25b7(mdo): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kund tu bsrung ba dang / chos smra ba de dag kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir nan tan byed par 'a stsa bar rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dkrug pa'i tshig brjod par bya'o// blo gros rgya
25b8(mdo): dkug pa'i tshig de dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste// / sa me sa ma san d+hi/ sa ra ne/ sa ra ba pa ti/ d+ha ni/ d+ha na ba ti/ rU d+hu meH/ dU d+hu maM ti/ mA ba te/ ma ma le bi mya ye/ bI rAdzeH/ ka ka re/ kai ru na
26a1(mdo): nus da/ ma ma lus / / ba / ma se sa no// mtho gros
26a2(mdo): 'di dan ni dgug pa'i tshig rnams yin te/ tshig de dag kyis rgyal po chen po bkug nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ku na tu srung ba dang / chos smra ba de ma ma yongs su gci ma ba'i phyir/ non
26a3(mdo): tan byed par 'gyung ngo ro// sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams chos smra ba des legs par kha ton du byas te/ phyogs ba zhir byams pas khyab par byas// / rgyal po chen po bzhi la bsams na
26a4(mdo): sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis rgyal po ba'il bkug nas 'ong ba 'gyur ro// de nas rgya po bzhi sgo 'khor de nyid du 'anus par gyu rad te/ 'dug pa de stan las langs te
26a5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar pa btud nas/ 'acom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ka so 'ad to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po chen po bzhi
26a6(mdo): bdag cag lhan cig tu mthun par gang na yang dag 'a dang ldan pa'i rgyund kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par je gyung ba der chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang kun su srung ba dang / chos smra ba re
26a7(mdo): yang yongs su gzung ba dang / ci nas gang gis kyang bslab pa 'am/ gnod pa bgyid par phyi 'gyur bar bgyil ba'i slad du mchil bar 'gyu'o// blo gros rgya mtsho'i gzhan yang lha'i dbang
26a8(mdo): brgya masbyin dgug pa'i tshig brjod dbya ste/ tshig de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgyal byin dkug par bya'o// lha'i dbang po brgya byin dukug pa'i tshig 'di dag zhe na/ 'di lta ste// dza
26b1(mdo): dza ya ma Te/ ba Te/ ma kA re/ sid d+ha ma ti/ shu d+he/ shAn ti ka li/ da no// dA na de/ da ta ma ti/ tang ka re kr-i ye/ kA yaM mu khe/ a bad ni/ bi bad ta na/ ba ri ba r+tha ni/ ba rA
26b2(mdo): che de/ sI ti smai ti/ san d+hi/ A ga da ko'u sho ka ni dzi ta/ a su ra/ dza yan tinAM ba/ sa ma ya ste/ sa rag b+ho/ d+ha man rdzi to/ rash+tsA naM/ swa s+ya/ ya nas/ b+hu ta na ma/ mA ra ka d+hama?
26b3(mdo): tsa ra nam// blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di dag ni lha'i dbang po brgya 'a byin dgug pa'i tshig ste/ de dag gso ska'i dbang po brgya la N+Di dkug par 'gyur ro// / der chos smra sides sngags tu
26b4(mdo): tshig 'di dag legs par kha ton du byas la/ gtsang ba dang / gtsar s+pha'i cho gas brus legs par byas te/ gos pa po bkos la sher phyogs su me tog gto da te sangs
26b5(mdo): rgyas thams cad bsams pa'i dran pa dang / sems cani thams cad la snying rje chen po dang rab tu ldan pas seng ge'i khrim 'jug ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya labyin la sams
26b6(mdo): kol+la shi ka 'khor legs par yongs su gzhag pa'i phyir chu shog// sngags grub pa mngon gsum du rgyas/ de la ngas rna ma shi nad tu rngam byang dag cing yongs su dag la/ tsu
26b7(mdo): khrims yongs su dag pas bsams ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgyal byin 'ongs nas/ 'khor yongs su 'jog par 'gyung / sngags kyi grub pa yang nye bar chub par 'byung ngo // de nas lha'o/ 
26b8(mdo): dbang po brgya' byin yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur na te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gzung ba
27a1(mdo): dang yun ri du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad tu/ bdag chos smra ba de'i drung du mchi' bar bkyi2/ de'i 'khor kyang yongs su gzhag par bgyi/ sngags kyi grub pa nye ba
27a2(mdo): bslab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sum bcu la// ma gsum gyi lha rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi'o// de ci mi sras su med// gcom snyoms sa
27a3(mdo): 'das pa dang ma byon padas dad lta byung ba'i sangs rgyas byoms ldan 'dag rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di las bstanan man lda su// mo ldan 'das 'dig gis su pa da sa spyon pa dang / dus byung ba sangs rgyas 'acos sde ras kyi chos nga sus shA byis te
27a4(mdo): rdzas ma dun sa / nas bcos ldan 'das kyis kyi'i dbang po bsgyu byin la legs so zhes bya ba byed te so/ khyod kyis dpa ma mas yongs su
27a5(mdo): khyim seM gesan thogs pa legs so legs so// sa bu ni khyod kyis bya'o// dab po sa khyis kyi rnam grangs tshad bas pas da rngub pa
27a6(mdo): rgyal zhing rnam yin rnams ni 'jam par 'gyur bar shes re ra bya'o// thugs rgya rgya lagan ni yang bdud napa 'arjod do/ kyi garnams cad ga dru pa'i sngags rgya rgyam pa 'arjod
27a7(mdo): bya/ ljags rgya tshag de dag gis 'dun dang bad kyings kyi sa rnams nga gas byu 'gyur ro// smad pa kyi tshig 'di dag thang na'adas te// 
27b1(mdo): ga sa te ni/ sa natha 'a nan ni/ na kr-i rbIH/ sa rba ba pra ba 'o de nI/ 'a ya? ke ta mAn+taM pa NAM/ sI pA te/ bdaH/ nga?/ ma na sl-i ta/ sa rba mA ra/ swa tsa ta/ par pa
27b2(mdo): shud d+ha/ bi kAd tshan du/ sarba mA ra ka rman// blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di dag ni bdud tshar kaHde sre'i tshog!/ nyon mongs pa bsal lo'i tshig+h+ra ste/ de dag chos smra ba des legs par
27b3(mdo): bon du byas la/ chos kyi khri la 'dug ste/ byang chub kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pas 'khor thams cad khyab par bya la/ bdag la sman par 'du shes bskyed do// 
27b4(mdo): chos la sman gyi cu shes dang / chos nyand pa'i yan dpa'i 'du shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pasu skyes du rnam pa'i rje du shes dang / chos kyi rna rgyal yun 'ana'i gan sa
27b5(mdo): pa'i 'du shes bskyed la// sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ma don du byas te/ chos kyi gtan byed na/ de'o 'khorayug dpag tshad brgya'i tshun chad du/ bdud dang bdud kyi ras
27b6(mdo): kyi lha rnams myig gis myi tshol bar bya ba'i las kyi phyir 'ong bar myi 'gyur ro// gang dag 'ong ba de dag kyis kyang bar chad byed par myi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud
27b7(mdo): sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang bdag byang chub seMs dab blo gas rgya mtshos mjig rten kyi khams bdel bya thams cad kyis brgya nad par 'phangasnya pas
27b8(mdo): skyes bu dam pa/ de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'bral 'di bdag la mngon gsum du gyu dad to// TI com ldan 'das bdag deng slan chad bdud kyi sug las thams ca
28a1(mdo): 'dod // gong na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di stond pa dang / yang dag par rab tu stond par 'gyur ba'i grong rtse/ grong khyer rnam/ grong rdal lam gtsug lag kha der chos mnyam
28a2(mdo): ba'i slad du/ bdag nga rgyal ma mchis pa dang / gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas pas mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lang pa/ sdig can khregs
28a3(mdo): legs so// khyod chos la gus pa'i rnam par smind pa 'dis/ rim gyis bdud kyi las thams cad las shi nad tu 'dasaM te/ gaji skyes bu dam pa de dag gis thob pa'i chos de dag
28a4(mdo): rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// blo gros rgya mtsho'i gzhan ya da myi mched kyi bdag po tsha pa dgug pa'i sngags kyi tsika rnams brjod par bya dgug pa la sngags
28a5(mdo): kyi tshig de dag gis tshangs pa bkug nas chos smra ba'i gan du'o/ 'gyur// sngags kyi tshig de da kyang gang zhe na/ 'di
28a6(mdo): NA ka re/ mu kaMk+Shi ka rbe/ swe be ga yA ka re/ pUdad+ha ka re/ dA rma ka re/ sa k+Sha ka re/ su N+ra ye/ ma da ba d+ha ne/ na su ring / b+h+yo dzo bad+yA te/ ma dze ka me/ d+ha ngan da / 
28a7(mdo): pra ti thA ne/ su ba bad tI bi shud d+he/ swa tsi to ba sha mi/ bya ba lo ka ya/ pram+b+ha na byA d+hi ShA sa[à¤½]a daSh+ka sa d+harma tsa ra nan/ gu ru sa daM d+harma ba ri gra skan/ gr-i tai ma nu pa la ya
28a8(mdo): bud da ne// tri ma mA bya pa tshe pa sA/ sma ra te/ d+ha rma tsa kra pra bar rta nan/ ka r+yaM swa tA ba sho d+hata gA na d+harma/ nA ga ma la d+ha nA/ bu dA A d+hi/ ShA na ma maM bA ko be yA/ blo gros
28b1(mdo): rgya mtsho'i myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i tshig 'di dag chos smra ba des legs par khwa thon du byas pang / tshangs pa'i lam la shi nad tu kau nas te/ zhe 'gras pa skyed pa'i seMs
28b2(mdo): kyi rgyud dang / dbang po sha ni tu sbas pa dang / shinan tu 'du sbyangs pa'i dran pa dang / shind tu dkar ba'i phyag rgya dang / shi nad tu yongs su dag pa'i lus kyi las dang/ shi na tu bden
28b3(mdo): bas zhen pa li ngag gi las dang / shind tu brtan pa'i blo dang / legs par byas pa'i bzod pa'i las dang / shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang
28b4(mdo): legs par ba nyams pa'i baphon 'grus kyi stobs dang / shi nad tu bste nad pa'i mang du thos pa dang / shi nad tu yo/ nangs su bsgoms pa'i sems las su rung ba dang
28b5(mdo): shind tu rno pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang / shin tu bapon pa 'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi sems kyis sregs par 'and pa dang / shi na tu yongs su bsgom
28b6(mdo): pa'i byams pa dang / sha nad tu brtand pa'i snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad kyi bdel ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las shind tu yongs su
28b7(mdo): grol ba'i phyir seng ge'i khrel 'dug ste/ bye mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa bsams su chos kyi gtam yang dag por rab tu brjod na/ de bsams ma thag tu tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams/ 
28b8(mdo): dang lhan cig 'ong bar 'gyur ro// blo gros rgya mtsho de la tshangs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i ltas ni 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor thams cad byams pa'i sems su 'gyur ba dang
29a1(mdo): dbang po rims pa myed pa dang / gcig la gcig myi gnod par gnas pa dang / chos dang chos smra bas spyond pa dang / bla ma ltar phodus por sems pa dang / thal mo sbyor byad
29a2(mdo): sems rtse gcig pa dang / myi g.yeng bar yid la byed pa dang / rus shing ltar byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis sems pa dang rna bregs te nyan par 'gyur ba'o// chos
29a3(mdo): smra ba de la yang sngon lung ma mnos pa dang / sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams kyang mngon tu 'gyur ba ste/ 'khor der mya mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'ongs par rig par bya'o// de nas myi mched kyi
29a4(mdo): bdag po tshangs pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur da te 'jug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ga so la to// bcom ldan 'das bdag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tu ga nas
29a5(mdo): sa pa gtan dang tshad myed pa'i bde ba la gnas pa bor ya gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa'i 'khor deng mchil bar bgyi'o// chos smra ba de la yang chos brgyad bsgrub
29a6(mdo): bya'o// brgyad kang zhe na/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos myi smrabad par bgyi' ba'i slad tu de la dran pa bslab par 'argyal/ chos zab mo rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du / de la blo gros bsku
29a7(mdo): bgyil/ don gyi rnam pa rtogs par brgyal ba'i slad du/ de lta rtogs pa bsgrub par bkyil/ the tsom thams cad gcad pa'i slad rtsa de la spobs pa bsgrub par bgyi'o// skad dang nges pa'i chog
29a8(mdo): thams cad kyis yongs su tshim par 'gyu' ba'i slad du de la lung bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa bsngal 'ar bkye/ 'khor thams cad kyis zil gyis ma non par brkya po'i slad du kaude la 'dul
29b1(mdo): pa bslang ba bsgrub par bgyi'/ myi dman par lung bstan par bgyil ba'i slad du/ de la chos kyi snang ba ma slob par bgyi la/ de bkyed cing chos bsgrub pa'i slad du de la nges par 'byung ba rno bsgrub
29b2(mdo): par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de la chos brgyad po de dag bslab par bgyi'o// chos smra ba de bsrung zhing spa ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring tu gnas par bgyi' ba'i slad dadu 'di
29b3(mdo): lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par 'gyur ba ltar/ bdud thams cad dang pas kyi rgol ba thams cad shi nad tu tshar gcad par bgyil/ 
29b4(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin dkris pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ tha ma'i dus kyi
29b5(mdo): tsa nas dge' ba'i phra ba bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi sug par mchi' ba dang / mchod du 'jug pa dang / glegs pam du 'byung zhing nub par myi 'gyur bar/ bcom ldan 'das nyid
29b6(mdo): kye chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis sras tu gsol // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas mdzod spu nas 'di lta bu'i 'od phyung
29b7(mdo): ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sngar ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ dang shing gel ba dang
29b8(mdo): sman dang / nags tshal dang / rdo dang / gyo mo dang / gzugs su snang ba gang dag ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su snang ngo // rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor khyams na
30a1(mdo): mchod pa'i las byin kyis brlabs pa'i gzugs kyi rnam pa gang dag yod pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs nyid du gnas par kun tu snang ngo // de bzhin gshes su
30a2(mdo): pa'i gzugs de dag gis gsung gcig tu kye ma'o chol gyi rnam grangs 'ad na/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pas byin kyis brlabs so// sang bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de/ 
30a3(mdo): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis khyon gyis brlabs pa de bdud thams cad kyis
30a4(mdo): bar chad bya bar myi nus so// bcom ldan 'das gal te gang ga'i klung bye ma snyed kyi bdud dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'a khor dang bcas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya bar
30a5(mdo): btsun kyang de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ba dbyi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa ni 'das kyang / srid/ rgyam tshol thams cad ni smra ba yang srid/ rings
30a6(mdo): mas cad ni rnam par 'thor yang srad/ rlung ni zhags pas bcing du rung yang srid nyi ma zla ba ni sa'i steng du su namaHmkha' ni gzugs kyi rnam par bstan du rung yang srid
30a7(mdo): me ni chur 'gyur yang srid/ chu ni mer 'gyur yang srid/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi ldan gzhan du 'gyur yang srid sems can thams cad kyi sems ni gcig tu byar rub pang srid/ nam mkha' dang sa
30a8(mdo): byar kyang skad kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni sus kyang bskyod pa 'am/ g.yo'i ba ma d+ha/ 'khrug par byed myi nus so// zhes gangs so// de nas the nam rjen 'das
30b1(mdo): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i spyo ba kyi bzhag ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos sun ring du gnas par bya bar nye
30b2(mdo): bar bzung ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thung shig/ chongs shig/ sgrogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shigagazhan dag la yang rgya chems bdag par stond cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
30b3(mdo): la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis don gyi dbang gang gzigs na/ de lta ma lags pa/ rgya mtsho dang mtshol chen po ltar gtang
30b4(mdo): dpag dka' ba'i dran pa dang / blo rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag mchis bzhin tu/ dge la slong kun dka' bo nyi tse ba'i 'tshal pa dang / ldan pa la chos
30b5(mdo): kyi yin 'di sangs su gtad/ ba ldan 'as ma tho gros rgyal po dka'ang dgal ba can nal stobs bskyedamadal
30b6(mdo): lta bu 'dzin pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa byin kyi rlabs kyis 'dzin to// blo gros rgya mtshol sems can gang dag dgel slong kun dga' bo las chos kyi rngam grangs 'ang
30b7(mdo): thos na dga' ba dang dad pa dang / mchog tu dka' ba thob par 'gyur ba yod de/ de dag 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'di ltar nyan thos kyi 'di lta bu'i
30b8(mdo): mdo sde 'dzind cing stond pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ji tsam tu bsam gyis myi khyab pa ngo mtshard to snyam du sems par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor de las lho dang mya
31a1(mdo): cig 'di snyam du sems te/ ci byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di dran pa dang ldan pa yin gyi gang bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa'i mchog tu bas nad pa
31a2(mdo): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo na de lta bu ni ma yin no snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'khor de'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ 'khor gyi sems rnamasu
31a3(mdo): la rnam par bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshol 'di rab tu dran pa lags kyi/ gang bcom ldan 'dra
31a4(mdo): kyis mang du thos pa rnams kyis mchog tu bstand pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'dzaras kyis bka' su khad pa'od srung kang ka'i klung gi bye ma
31a5(mdo): snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ sems can ji tsam// sems can du bskul bar bsdus pa'i sems can bya khams ni rab tu mang gi/ sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin
31a6(mdo): no// zhes gang de skad du bya ba de la ji snyam du sems 'od srung sems can gyi khams de mang ngam// 'od srung gas gsolan Sh+Ta/ bcom ldan 'das med lags so// 
31a7(mdo): bcom ldan gshegs pa tshad ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srur yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung ste/ sems can de dag sA phyi myed par myi'i
31a8(mdo): lus thob par gyur na la/ de bzhin du ji ltar dge' slong kun dga' bo ltar dran pa dang / gzungs kyi stobs dang yang ldan par gyur kyang / kun dga' po lta bu'i sems can de dag gi
31b1(mdo): dran pa dang / gzungs kyi stobs de ni byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i dren pa dang / gzungs kyi stobs bskyed pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro ba nas dpe'i bde du yang mya bzod
31b2(mdo): do// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'dzin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis chos
31b3(mdo): bstand nas// de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis kyi chos bstand pa la slob pa 'am/ kun nas ldang ba'i bya ba myi byed do// 'od srum 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen por shing rta'i
31b4(mdo): srog shing tsam gyi char pa'i rgyan 'bab pa'i rdzun #/ kun nas ldang ba'i bya ba myi byedade/ chu'i rgyan thams cad kyang rgya mtsho chen pos blangs
31b5(mdo): nas/ de la 'grel pa 'am/ gang ba yang byed do// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya chol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos
31b6(mdo): bstan pa kun pa 'dzind kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis chos bstand pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis kyi chos bstan da pA la/ sgrub pa 'am/ kun nas ldang ba'i bye ba rgya
31b7(mdo): spyad ni/ de 'dran spobs pa skyed pa sa/ bri la 'am ga pa byed do// bstan dpa 'di ban na/ srog chags brgyal po zhem tha byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byed chub tu
31b8(mdo): sems bskyed de/ ge 'di skad ces bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa ci 'dra bde 'dra'ar gyur de cig ces smras so/ thams cad do sngon du
32a1(mdo): 'khos lnga dang myo'i mi tog gis bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshol la gtor de mngon par gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub
32a2(mdo): sems dpa' bar ma 'dod pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi sgo'i le'u ni thos nas mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzind pa
32a3(mdo): dpe/ 'chang ba rlag pa dang / 'don pa dang / rtog pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan bskyod pa de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub seMs
32a4(mdo): dpa' pad ma bkod pa de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsa lad pa// stong chen po'i 'jig rten khams 'di ni// gser kyis bkang ste bder gshegs phul ba bso// gang gis
32a5(mdo): chos kyi mdzod 'dothos nas ni// mos pa'i bsod nams/ 'di ni khyad par 'phags// gang kos 'jig rten pams 'a na chen bkang // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
32a6(mdo): la phul ba pas// gang gis mdol sde 'di la 'jug byas pa// bsod nams de la snga mas bskyed du myed/ hU~Mg gis 'jig rten khams 'di srong phrag bcul// rin chen
32a7(mdo): bkang ste ldan pa byin 99/ gang gis mdo' 'di bton nas ston pa yi// bsod nams de rgya padi snga ma min// zha na gyi ba khrag khrig sbyong gi rnams// rin chen bkang ste 'jig rten
32a8(mdo): slob dpon spyob/ sangs rgyas rnam saM lha dbul bar phul ba bas// gang gis tshul 'di rab tu sbyor ba dang / phyogs bcu rnams su dzor ga'i kye snyed zhing // rin chen bkang po
32b1(mdo): rgyal la phul bas// ji ltar bas nad pa bzhin du gang gnas pa'o// bsod nams de lu ma ma kha yod ma yin// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dang chos me da dang / 
32b2(mdo): sgrub pa dang srog chags snying rje ba// chos bzhi'i 'di dag bsod nams mtha' yas te// de dag mtha' ni bdel gshegs myi gsung ngo // nam mkha' khams dang de bzhin sems
32b3(mdo): can khams// sangs rgyas ye shes ni byang chub sems// chos bzhil 'di dag dpag tu myed pa ste// mkhas pa rnams kyis de thogs dogs myi bya// dkon mchog chos 'di rab tu
32b4(mdo): bshad pa na// phyogs bcu'i zhing ni bye ba g.yos par gyur da// snang ba byung zhing me tog char kyang phab// saM del snyan brgya' dag mya bkrol smra lnga byung // byang chub sems
32b5(mdo): dpa' mkhas pa de dag kun// mgu nas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod// chos bstan 'di 'dra 'di thos bdag cag rnams// 'tsho ba don yod rnyed pa legs par
32b6(mdo): rnyed// gang dag 'di 'dre 'di ni thos 'gyur ba// sems can de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed// gang dag byang chub sems ni myi brjed pa// de dag de bzhin gshegs pas shi nad
32b7(mdo): du bzung // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba rnams// phyag ni g.yas pa rab tu brkyang mdzad de// yon tan rgya mtsho spyi bong bzhag nas ni// shag kyi sed gle'i bskul
32b8(mdo): ba legs shes gsungs// lha dang klu dang lha min mya 'am ci// dri na gnod sbyin mkha' lding lto 'bye che// brgya' byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyod pa rnams// namya ma gnas
33a1(mdo): te ched du brjod pa brjod/ shag kyi se kau 'di dang dge' 'dun dang // mdo'i sde 'di 'dra ba ni 'dzin byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' po rang gran sa su r+yad
33a2(mdo): legs gsungs chos ni gzhar yang nub ma gyur// gang dag chos kyi tshul ni 'di 'dzin pa// de dag la ni bdag cag bsnyen bkur brgyal// bdag cag thams cad gus dang ye sa
33a3(mdo): par ni// kun Na srung de sba bar spro bar gyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bak+Sha' su lad pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho 'a chos kyi tshul/ chos kyi phyag
33a4(mdo): rgya/ chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa/ chos rab tu dbye pa 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
33a5(mdo): bshad pa 'chad pa dpa'achad par 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros rgya/ mchol khyod kyis de la gus pa dang / bcas pa dang / zhe sa dang bsam pa dang / sgrub pa snying por
33a6(mdo): bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa la nos/ byang chub sems dga' sems dpa'achi na po ni gros rgya mtsho la dang / thams ca nas dang ldan pa
33a7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' tshigs de dang / dge' slong gi dge' 'dun dang / lha dang / s+yai dang / ga ma yin dang / dI babru bcas pa'i 'jig rten yad rangs ste/ bco pa ldangan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mdzod
33a8(mdo): 'arabastod do// / byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste bcung gnyis pa la// // 'dus pa chen po'i lelce'i chos// rnam grangs las/ 'phags pa bro gros rgya mtshos zhus pa
33b1(mdo): zhes bya ba'i se'u ste lnga pa// rdzogs s+ho// rgya kar gyi mkhan po 'dzin myo tra rang dun sha yAM dang / 'bu ta pra ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban 'i ye shes sdes bsgyur
33b2(mdo): nadwe zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas ka tan la phab pa// / @// rgya kar skad du A r+ya sA na ba tab taM na ga rA dza pa ra br-id tsa na ma ma ha ya
33b3(mdo): na su tra/ bod skad du 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 
33b4(mdo): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la/ dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ d+ya rgod kyi phung po'i ro la/ dge slong zhing gnyis brgyal lnga bcu'i dge' slong ka/ dga'
33b5(mdo): 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgyal stong brag tu mas bskor
33b6(mdo): nas mdun gyis byas mchos ston to// de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros bkru'i rgyal po 'bum phrag drag bcu la pa brgyad dang / hUM'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi la stong gis bskor te/ bdun du 'dar nas
33b7(mdo): sa me snyan dang / klu dbyangs lend cing / klu'i mtha' chen po dang / klu'i rdzu 'phral chen pos/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / kos dang / gtu kos
33b8(mdo): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams thogs te bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song nas byind pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mako'abyos phyag 'tshas te/ bcom ldan 'ad
34a1(mdo): gsum bskor byas nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye me dang / gos dang / gtugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 
34a2(mdo): sam snyan dang / pheg rngo pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ gus pa dang bcasaMzhes dang bcas shi po/ na sa dang bcas shing / rang sa skye bo la 'khror dang phyogs gcin
34a3(mdo): tu'urtag go// 'dug nas kyang thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ka so la da to// / gal te zhus nas zhu pa nga bstand pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag ya skab
34a4(mdo): dubye bar gan ngan/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ag zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom
34a5(mdo): ldan 'das kyis mkhyend bzhin du/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros/ pa la 'di skad ces bka' su lan to// klu'i bdag po khyod sems can rnams kyi ched du de bzhin gshegs la la
34a6(mdo): 'dra ba zhig yongs su 'dri bar 'dod/ gsol pa/ com ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpal sems can gyi mchog/ sems can chen po skyes bu dam pa seng ge ltar rnam
34a7(mdo): ra bzhen pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren/ 'jig rten gyi chos kyis myi kro
34a8(mdo): spyod pa dang bsam yA rnam par dag pa/ phan pa'i dngos po// la yang dag par zhugs pa/ ga sol yang bta a sa mas+t+rai can thams cad la dgel ba'i bshes gnyen brgyad pa// stobs bcu'i spong
34b1(mdo): kyi shugs la yang dag par zhugs pa/ ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs kyi smra ba yang dag par rab tu 'joms la/ bdud dang phyir rgolnga pa bcom pa sems ma zhum pa/ brtson 'grus brtan
34b2(mdo): pa'i go tsa shi nad tu bgos pa/ yongs su mya skyob/ dge' ba'i che ba'i tshogs dpag tu ma mchis pa bstsags pa/ tshul khrims dang thos pas mi ngoms pa/ sems can thams cad yu sems
34b3(mdo): mnyam pa/ tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba/ mthar lta ba gnyis ka dang bral ba/ rtend cing 'brel r+g+haM ba ma 'byung ba 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul zab mo
34b4(mdo): rab tu zhugs pa rab cing gting dpag dka' ba/ nyan po sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bgyid pa dang bral ba 'dzas/ cad mkhye dad pa'i sems ma bskyed pa/ bsam pa rdo rje
34b5(mdo): stang b+hartan to/ phyi byed pa/ blo zla ba ltar dri ma ma mchis shi sha nad tu dkar ba/ sems nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs pa/ bskalang pa grangs ma mchis par yongs su mya
34b6(mdo): skyo ba 'dzind pa/ sems sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang mnyam pa/ gnod sems dang / za ba dang / zhe sdang dngang / nga rgya la dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa thams cad yang dag bar chad pan
34b7(mdo): sto pa nyid dang / mtshan ma byed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la smon lam sha nad tu btab pa/ sgyu ma dang / rgyal ma dang / myig yod da // brags dang / smyig rgya dang / chu thA yA bu'i chos kyi tshul la shin
34b8(mdo): mas pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge la 'dun gyi gtung rigs 'dzind pa/ chos kyi 'dod lo rab tu bskor ba/ dka' ba dang / mchog tu dga' hA dang / dang ba rab tu thol pa/ Ar+g+has
35a1(mdo): ba ra'i me tog ltar/ 'byung bar shind tu dka' ba/ tshe gcig tu brgyad pa/ yid la bgyid pa ma 'dres pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams
35a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su shu bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bas kyang / khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos la rab tu zhu gas pa rnams
35a3(mdo): dngosems can rnams kyi che cu/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos kyis rnam
35a4(mdo): bar rtsend bya/ rdo rje lta bu'i yon tan la 'jug pa spyad pa zab mo dang / gzungs kyi sgo'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa bshad rtsa ba sha du ga sol// nyan thos gdul ba'i slad du/ bden
35a5(mdo): bzhi'i rnam par gdon mya 'tshal ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa'i sgo la/ 'jug pa/ rang sangs rgyas gdul ba'i slad du/ brnye/ nad pa'i chos la 'jug pa shes pa'i sgo la 'jig pa
35a6(mdo): gleg sa chen mopa gdul ba'i slad mchos thams cad 'jug shes pa'i sgo la 'jug pa/ bdu tu byags kyi tshad kyi lta bar gyur da pa thams cad dam par yag pa/ nyon mongs
35a7(mdo): thams cad dang bral ba/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu shes pa so sor yang dag pa skyed dge pa yi 'jug pa/ chos thams da rab tu ston pa ji ltar mom pa bzhin
35a8(mdo): chos las rnam par grol bar bgyid pa de byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags pa'i skad na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgral bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o sar ce rgyas
35b1(mdo): rgyas bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dreg so pa bcom pas ye shes kyi stobs can rnams lags/ desna ldan las kyi
35b2(mdo): par sbyind pa la rtond pas chos kyi stobs can rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'jig rten kyi 'anga'i dang chos kyi sbyin byas sed skam mchis pasasbyin ba'i stobs can rnam ji ltar
35b3(mdo): skar na rnam par smyind pa la myi re bar bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na smon lam gyis yang dag par song zhing ngan song thams cad kun tu chad pas
35b4(mdo): tshul khrims kyi stoms can rnams lags/ ji ltar na semadas can sdang ba thams cad dang du lend pa'i rang bzhin can pa sa bzod pa'i stobs can rnams lags ji ltar na lus
35b5(mdo): daMd srog l+yA myaM b+haHsa brtson 'grus kyi stobs can rnams la gas/ ji ltar na rab tu zhi ba la gnas shing bsam gtan la ldog pa la yar mkhas pas bu sam gtan gyi stobs can
35b6(mdo): rnams lags/ ji ltar na sdig pa'i lta ba rnams dang bral zhing / ma rig pa dang / gti'i mug gi kun pa dang yang bral bas shes rab kyi stobs can rnams legs// ji ltar na sems can yongs
35b7(mdo): su sbyin par bgyi ba la yongs su spyon pa'i go cha 'tshal pas zabs kyi stobs can rnams lags// ji ltar na lha'i myig dang / lha'i rnal dang / pha rol gyi sems nga tsha khad pa dang / sngon kyi skye
35b8(mdo): dad // rdzu 'phrul gyi bgyi bas rnam par bce nad pas mngon par shes pa thob pa rnams lags// ji ltar na spobs pa rgyun mye 'chad cing / tshig dang yi ge mya zad pas spobs pa'i stobs can rnams
36a1(mdo): legasaji ltar na thos pa thams cad kunan tu 'dzind pas gzungs thob pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na chos dkon mchog gcog la yang dag par gzhol bas bskyed pa ma ma
36a2(mdo): adrA / rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ti de ni 'dzind rab tu thob pa rnams lags ji ltar na sangs rgyas la lta ba rnam par dag pa la yang dag par gzhol bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran bi bats+tsha pa
36a3(mdo): ma mchis pa rnams lags// chos la lta ba rnam par dag pa la yang dag par gzhol bas/ chos rjes su dran pas rab tu thob pa rnams lags// phyir myi ldog pa'i dge' 'dun la ye
36a4(mdo): dag par 'a bas/ dge la 'dun rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa rnams lags// byang chub kyi sems ma bsku dod pas tshul khrims rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa rnams lag/ 
36a5(mdo): 'jig rten sbyi zad rti dang / chos kyi sbyin pa la ser sAm mchis pas gtong ba rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa rnam sa lags// dgo' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba gcig gis
36a6(mdo): thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjes su dran pas/ lha rjes su dran pa bskyed pa ma mchis pa rnams lags// lhag pa'i bsam pa dang bsam pa 'dra dang // / 'jug pa
36a7(mdo): de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'di dag byas nas/ de'i 'og tu tshigs su bcad de zhus pa/ 'jig rten don rnams mdzad pa rang byung ba/ ga mo lu
36a8(mdo): dang bsam paci'an+da dang // 'jug pa'i spyod dang spyod pa ci 'dra ba// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ba de tu gsol// byams par sbyor dang snying rjer 'jus pa dang // dag la
36b1(mdo): 'dug cod btang snyoms bsgom pa dang // bsam gtan rnam thar da rnams la spyod dag la// de ni mA rmad ba dag l-i ba shad du ga sol // yang dag slong dmya dran pa nye gzhag dang
36b2(mdo): rdzu 'phrul stobs dang dbang po la skom dang // byang chub yan sreg 'der dang yang dag byang chub rig// yon tand dbyar gnas rnams la bshad du gsol// sbyin rgyal sdom dam tshu
36b3(mdo): khams phun sum tshogs// bzod dang des dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang / shes ra thob pas rab tu gtogs pa rnams// ji ltar 'gyur ba de dag bshad du gsol// mngon
36b4(mdo): shes rig dang so so yang dag rig/ dran dang shes bzhin de bzhin bag yod dang // thabs dang ldan dang tshul ni to/ gas pa rnams// byang chub sems pa' rnams la de
36b5(mdo): bshad gsol// dga' dang mchog tu dga' dang yon// tan dga'// 'phags pa'i dbyangs dang rigs dang nor bdun dang // dgon par gnas ts+tsho nyon mongs ma
36b6(mdo): mchis gnas// ji ltar 'gyur ba de dag bshad du gsol// ji ltar stobras yan sum tshogs pa dang // gzugs la 'di shi nad tu na tshug phras dang // rgyun myo 'chad par chos ni ston da
36b7(mdo): bskyed pa ma mchis zos pa 'dzind par gyur// zhi gnas rjes su mthun dang lhag mthong dang // shes rab zab dang shind tu blo yangs dang // ye shes mtha' rdzas rtogs 'i mnyam
36b8(mdo): phyir chu// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ji ltar 'gyur// bdud kyi stobs bcom shind tu thu lad par dka'// dran pa'i tshogs can pha rol smra ba 'jom
37a1(mdo): myi g.yon minang tu 'phags// dag pa'i sems can rdzab la kur spyod// spong pa mtshan myed smon pa myed na pa blos dang / sgyu maM spyog rgyal chos rjes
37a2(mdo): den sa yang 'dag pa bgang dgasan pa na sa kyi sa / 'di na
37a3(mdo): bdag po legs so legs so// klu'i bdag po khyod ji ltar sngon gyi dge' bzhi ba'i rgya mthun pa dang / dag la 'dun gyi rigs rgyan mya gca pas sI rje chen po ma btang ba dang
37a4(mdo): gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la dge' ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa dang / 'khor ba na yongs sumyaM skyo ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / sa dang / dge'
37a5(mdo): 'dun gyi rigs rgyun mya gcod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ladon 'di 'dra bar sems pa ni yang legs so// klu'i bdag po de'i phyir le sh+tsAm par shind tu
37a6(mdo): la yid la zung shig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di rnaka dang yon tan gyi khyad par ma'an dag kyang sgrib par 'chid da ngas khyod la bshad do// d+hAkwa'i rgyal po ma
37a7(mdo): dros pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyind pa dngabacom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// klu'i bdag
37a8(mdo): po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dpe ldan pa'i ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su 'dzind to/ chos
37b1(mdo): gcig po gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad myi gtong ba'i thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems so// de'i thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems de yang rnam pa sum bcu la pa gnyis
37b2(mdo): kyis shind tu bsdus pa yin te/ sum bcu las gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bsam pas bsdus pa yin/ lhag pa mi bsam pas bsdus pa yin/ byams pa chen pos bsdus
37b3(mdo): pa yin/ snying rje chen pos bsdus pa yin/ yongs su myi skyo bas bsdus pa yin/ stobs kyis bsdus ma yin/ rnam par gnon pas bsdus pa yan/ mthus bsdus pa yin
37b4(mdo): so sor brtags pas bsdus pa yin/ dgel ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bsdus pa yin/ chos spyod pas bsdus pa yin/ dge' ba spyod pas bsdus pa yin/ bskul ba'i
37b5(mdo): dngos pos bsdus pa yin/ sdom pas bsdus pa yin// thabs kyis bsus pa yin/ bcos pa ma yin pasabasus pa yin/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed phra bsum
37b6(mdo): pa yin/ phyir bya ba'i re ba byed pas bsdus pa yin/ cha shes pas bsdus pa yin/ zhel yod pas bsdus pa yin/ mchog tu dga' bas bsdus pa yin/ dad
37b7(mdo): bsdus pa yin/ btson 'grus kyis bsdus pa yin/ dran pas bsdus pa yin/ ting nge 'dzind kyis bsdus pa yino/ shes rab kyis bsdus pa yin/ dge' ba'i ya nga sama' kyis bsnyam / 
37b8(mdo): theg pa dman pa la 'dod pa myed pas bsdus pas bsdus pa yin/ rgya chen po la mos pas bsdus pa yin/ sems can la lta bas bsdus pa yin// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / 
38a1(mdo): dge la 'dun gyi rigs myi gcod pas bsdus pa yin te/ klu'i bdag po thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems de rnam pa sum bcu la pha gnyis po de dag gis bsdus na
38a2(mdo): rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su 'dzind to// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen de pa'i sems te/ cho ga bsngags ldan pa
38a3(mdo): pa bcu drug gis thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bcu drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi tshogs bstsags pa yin/ thos pa'i tshogs
38a4(mdo): bsreg pa ji yini/ shes rab kyi tshogs bstsags pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / ri// ma gro bya ba'i tshogs bstsags pa yin/ dgon pa la
38a5(mdo): k+She nus pa'i tshogs bsngags pa yin/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos ston pa ma tshogs bsngags pa yin tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'o rtogs bstsags pa yin/ dag
38a6(mdo): zi 'gyung ba'i chos rgya tshogs bsngags pa yin/ dgelas bcu'i las kyi lam gyi tshogs bsngags pa yin ma lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rgyan gyi tshogs bstsags pa yin/ spangs
38a7(mdo): yon tan da yo byad srungs pa'i'achogasunas sa sa/ chog shes pa dang / rab tu dben pan tshogs bsngags pa yin/ phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi yongs su bsngo ba
38a8(mdo): tshogs bsngags pa yin/ ni gnas kyi tshogs 'asngags yin/ wAg ma bong ga tshogs bstsags pa yin/ dgel ba'i la ba thams cad kyis tshogs bsngags pa yin/ klu'i bdag / 
38b1(mdo): thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems de/ tshogs bsngags pa rnam pa bcu 'a drug po de dag gis thams cad mkhyend pa'i yegs kyi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang
38b2(mdo): thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems de las log pa dang / lam ngan pa nyi shu pa gnyis dang bral te rnam par spangs na thams cad mkhyenan par phye zhes thob par 'gyur te/ nyi shu pa gnyis gang zhe
38b3(mdo): na 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sems dang bral ba yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang bral ba yin/ nga rgyal dang bral ba yin/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang bral ba yin/ gak+kol dang bral ba yin
38b4(mdo): 'jig rten kyi gsapa cig kun tu 'dzind pa dang bral ba yin/ log par zhugs pa dang bral ba yin/ yongs su skyo ba dang / la bu yin/ skrag pa dang bral pa yin/ khengs pa dang yod
38b5(mdo): pa dang bral ba yin/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gtil su/ ga dang bral ba yin/ las kyi sgrib pa dang bral ba yin/ chos kyi sgrub pa dang bral ba yin/ bdag la stod pa dang
38b6(mdo): gzhan la smod pa dang bral ba yin/ slob dpon gyi chos 'chab pa dang bral ba yin/ brjed ngas pa'i 'du shes dang bral ze yin/ sdig pa'i grogs po dang bral ba ya na/ dge' ba
38b7(mdo): bshes gnyen la 'khu ba dang bral ba yin/ pha rol tu phyin/ drug ki myi mthun pa'i phyogs dang bral ba yin te/ 'di ltar ser sna dang / ngan pa'i ngang tshul dang / gnod sems dang / e
38b8(mdo): dang / g.yeng ba dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab dang bral ba yin/ chad pa dang / rtag pa nga bral ba yin/ thabs kyi mkhas pa'i bskul ba dang bral ba yin/ sdig pa thams kyad dang bral pa yin te/ 
39a1(mdo): klu'i bdag po thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems de ma sog pa dang / lam ngan pa nyi shu ma gnyis po 'di dag dang bral te rnam par spangs na/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes la
39a2(mdo): pa 'gyur ro// sbal ba dag pog zhan yang sems cad pa byed da pa 'i sems 'bred pa de rgyal yang ni 'asu gnyis kyis mngon par 'phags na/ bdud thams cad dang 'dud kyis rim sems ca
39a3(mdo): pha rol da rgol ba thams cad kyis thub par dka' ba yin te/ bcul gnyis kang zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mngon par 'phags pa yin/ ting nge 'dzi nad kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mngon pa
39a4(mdo): 'phags pa yin/ shes rab kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mngon bar 'phags pa yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan kyis mngon par 'phags pa yi ne/ snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan
39a5(mdo): kyis mngon par 'phags pa yin/ thabs kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mngon par 'phags pa yin/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma byed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i rgyal mtshal gyis mngon par 'phagra
39a6(mdo): pa nyin+de/ srog chags rnams la sems can myed pa dang / srog myed pa dang / gang zag myed pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis mngon papa'i bikres pa yin/ rtend cing 'breld par 'byung ba khong du chun pas ma
39a7(mdo): lha ba dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis mngon par 'phags pa yin/ rang gi sems yongs su dag pas sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis bdabs pa'i rgyal gyi rgyan gyis mngon par mngon par 'phags pa yin/ thams
39a8(mdo): cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes rlom sems dang / rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis mngon par 'phags pa yin/ byang chub kyi sems myi brjed pa'i rgyal mtsham
39b1(mdo): mngon par 'phags pa yin te/ klu'i bdag po thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems bskyed pa de rgyal mtshan bcu'i gnyis po de dag gso bdon par 'phags na/ bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi ris thams
39b2(mdo): cad dang / pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis thub par dka' ba yin no// klun bdag po gzhan yang thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems de'i gnas sunyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras
39b3(mdo): pa de bzhin byed pa'i gnasadage 'a ma thams cad yang dag pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngol ba'i gnas te/ gnas ni gnyis po de dag go// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa
39b4(mdo): sems de'i rgyud myil ba gnyis ye/ gnyis gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la zhe sdang ba myed pa'i sems dang / log par zhugs pa rnams cher snying rje ba ste/ gnyis po de dag ko// 
39b5(mdo): klu'i bdag po gzhan yang thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems/ de'i zung du 'brel pa'i chos gnyis te/ log par zhu shes la rnam de gnyis dang 'brel ra na/ thams cad mkhyen
39b6(mdo): pa'i sems des nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas tham sa cad 'i lad kyis non par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ thabs dang shes rab ste gnyis po de dag go// klu'i bdag
39b7(mdo): gzhan yang thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems de'i rton pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ bsgrub pa rnams la 'gyod pa myed pa dang / 'gyur ba la yid myi ches pa ste/ gnyis po de dag go/ 
39b8(mdo): klu'i bdag po gzhan yang thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems de'i yi ge gnyis te/ gnyis kang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'dod pa myed pa dang theg pa chen po la ldan
40a1(mdo): yon tu mthong ba gnyis po de dag go// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems de'i rgyud chad pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ sgyu dang g.yo'i rgyun chud bya dang / 
40a2(mdo): myi drang ba'i rgyun chad pa ste/ rgyun chad pa gnyis po de dag go// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems de'i sgrib pa gsum-i ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyi nyes pa
40a3(mdo): spyod pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang / yid kyis nyes par spyad pa ste/ gsum po de dag go// 'i bdag po gzhan yang thams cad mkhyenang po'i sems de'i slob pa myed po gas
40a4(mdo): ste/ rnas sum gang zhe na/ sras kyis legs par spyod pa dang / ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa ste/ skam pa myed pa gsum po de dag go// ku'i bdag dzin
40a5(mdo): gzhan ye thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems de'i skal pa bzhi la ste/ bzhi lag zhe na/ 'di sa ste/ dam pa'i chos slob pa dang / bram rnams la phyi gum pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs
40a6(mdo): sa zhe sdam pa dang / bdud kyi las khong du phyi chung ba ste/ sgrib pa bzhil po de dag ke// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang thams cad mkhyer ma pa'i sems de'i spros pa byed pa bzhi' ste/ ba'i
40a7(mdo): gang zhen/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind pa dang / tha ma rnams la gus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston pa swar+b+ba ltungs byung sems la dang bdud kyi las khong du
40a8(mdo): chud pa ste/ sgrib pa myed pa bzhi po de dag go// klu'i bdage po gzhan yang thams cad mkhye nad pa'i sems de'i rin pa byed pa'i chos thob pa wA ste/ lnga gang zhe no// rnam par
40b1(mdo): sbyin pa kyi re bang btang ba dang / skye ba rnams pa myi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can thams cad myi gtong ba'i snying rje chen po dang / byams pa dang / myi byams pa
40b2(mdo): rnams la myi lta bar lus dang / srog yongs su gtong ba dang / 'thob pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa myi tshol mchos stond pa ste/ klu'i bdag po thams cad
40b3(mdo): mkhyend pa'i sems de'i rin thar myed pa'i chos thob pa lnga po de dag go// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang thams can mkhyend pa'i sems de'i rtul dpa lnga ste/ snga gang zhe na/ 
40b4(mdo): dge' ba'i bshes gnyen la stend pa dang / 'khorabs yongs su myi skyo ba dang / ye shes la mngon 'di nga rgyal myed pa dang / rus ma yin par rnyed pa rnam par
40b5(mdo): spong pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha la yas pa shul ba myed pa ste/ skul bdag po thams cad mkhyed/ dpa'i rtul ba lnga po de dag go// bu'i bdag po gzha
40b6(mdo): yang thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems de'i khyad par du 'phags pa gang dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams pa myed pa lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ nyan thos pas rnam par gro
40b7(mdo): ba'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa dang / rang sangs rgyas las rnam par grol ba'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa dang / chos thams cad bdag myed par shes pas khyad par du 'phags
40b8(mdo): pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pas khyad par du 'phags pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag por 'jom pa shes byas khyad par du 'phagra
41a1(mdo): pa ste/ khyad par du 'phags pa lnga po de dag go// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang thams cad mkhyenang pa'i sems de'i mchog tu dkal la yA ste/ A gang zhe na/ ran 'gro
41a2(mdo): shind tu 'ad bas mchog tu dka' ba dang / thams cad mkhyend pa dang nye bar gyurd pas mchog tu dga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par mthod pa yongs su rdzogs pas mchoka tu
41a3(mdo): dka' ba dang / tshul khrims la nan tan byed pa la 'gyod pa myed pas mchog tu dga' ba dang / sems can gyi don bya ba myong bas mchog tu dga' ba ste/ mchog tu dga' ba lnga po de dag ga/ 
41a4(mdo): rgyu'i bdas po gzhan yang thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems de'i stobs lnga ste/ lnga kang zhe na/ nga rgyal bcom pas ye sa kyi stobs dang / thos pa dang ma bral bas shes rab tu
41a5(mdo): stobs dang khong khro ba myed pas byams pa'i stobs dang / mtshan yongs su rdzogs pas bzod pa'i stobs dang / 'khor du bag tsha ba dang / 'jigs pa dang bral bas
41a6(mdo): myi 'jigs pa'i stobs te/ stobs lnga po de dag go// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems de'i rigs pa gang gse rigs pa ma yin par myi ltung ba'i rigs pa
41a7(mdo): ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ las kyi rnam par smyi dad pa la yid ches pa'i rigs pa dang / rtend cing 'ashesad par 'byung ba dang phyi 'gal tu ste rigs pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin pa sa so
41a8(mdo): sor rtog pa'i rigs pa dang / yang dag par sbyor pa'i rigs pa dang / dgel ba'i chos masas smral pa'i rigs pa ste/ rig lnga po de dag ko// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang thams
41b1(mdo): tshad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi zhing ljon pa de'i snang ba lda sa'in lda dang / wab lnga dang / sdong po lnga dang / yas ka lnga dang / jom lnga dang / me tog lnga dang / 'bras bu swa'o// 
41b2(mdo): pa de'i sA ra lnga gang zhes/ nyon mongs pa dang rnam pa'i sna ba dang/ rang sa sems ris ldan sems pa'i mal pa dang / zhes na rgya snang ba dang / byig lnga mi sdang ba dang / thams
41b3(mdo): mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba ste/ snang ba lnga po de dag go// de la sa bon lnga gang zhe na/ bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / sems can gyi lta ba dang / mos pa dang / rgya chen po
41b4(mdo): la mos pa ste/ sa bo lnga po de dag ka/ de la ra lalnga gar zhe na/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen mo rnang dge' ba'i tsha bas myi ngoms shing dge' pa'i Tha ba thams cad
41b5(mdo): yongs su sdom dang / nyes pa byung ba 'chags pa dang / theg pa gzhan myi 'dod pa ste/ Tha ba lnga po de dag go/ de la sdong po lnga gang zhe na/ thabs mdzes pa dang / shes
41b6(mdo): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sems cadan yongs su sbyind par byed pa dang / ngas pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind pa dang / rjes sa chags pa dang / 'ang khro ba dang bral bas btang tsam
