148a6(mdo): gzi'i brjid des tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrubs pa 'di smras pa 'di smras pa na/ srog chags khris bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag gis tshig 'di skad du/ 
148a7(mdo): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod des byang chub brnyes pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das de dang phrad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag cing brtan pa der skye bar
148a8(mdo): gyurd cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind cing mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur yang bgyid par gyurd cig/ bcom ldan 'das de'i 'og tu bdag cag kyang / byang chub tu mngon par
148b1(mdo): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur da cig ces kyang smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa mthong pa don yod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung
148b2(mdo): bstand to// / lung bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs
148b3(mdo): brtse ba dang skye bo mang po la smand pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde' ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs pa ce' ba'i slad du/ rgya mtsho chen por sa gdug do gsol bar gnang bar mdzad tu gsol// de ci'i sman
148b4(mdo): cu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho' chen po'i nang na lga klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri ma dang / lha ma yin dang / de ma dgas pa yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can tshad
148b5(mdo): ma mchis pa dag mchis te/ de dag gis de bzhin gshe/ gas pa mthong na/ dge' ba'i tsha ba dag skyed par 'gyural/ dam pa'i chos thos pas kyang 'khor ba thog ma mchis
148b6(mdo): pa'i mtha' rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis klu'i rgya 'i gnas kyang yongasasu longs spyad par 'gyur te/ swa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi brnyas par myi 'gyur la/ 
148b7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid bstan par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi byang chub kyi phyogs dang ldan pa'i chos nye bar brtan pa bgyis par 'gyur ba'i slad du ma/ 
148b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang klu'i rgyal to rgya mtsho la la grags paphel ba dang / sems cad cad byed pa dag gi dge' ba'i mas 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir gnang ngo // de nas klu'i rgyal
149a1(mdo): rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das rgyam kaM nang bar rig nas tshim zhing mgu' la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bdel bu skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
149a2(mdo): mgo la bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan bdun skor ba byas te/ dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi zad nas myi snang bar gyur da te// rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du phyir song ngo // 
149a3(mdo): de nas der skye bo'i tshogs 'dus pa thams cad la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa sang gdugs chod gsol bar spyan drangs te/ des kyang bdag la thugs pa che' ba'i phyir
149a4(mdo): gnang gis der khyed cag kun gyis lhan cig tu mthun pa dang / bdag par dka' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur la batshon par gyis shig/ de nas
149a5(mdo): klu'i klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / ska ma yin gyi dbang po bde'i mchog dang / sim byed dang / thar bzangs ris la smras pa/ grogs po dag shes par
149a6(mdo): gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho la chen po 'dir gshegs kyis/ der khyed 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ bdag gis skabs
149a7(mdo): bye ba lags kyis bdag gi gnas su spyon cig/ de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / kha dog mtha' yas dang / dri ma myed pa dang / 'od can dang / rnam par che dang / 
149a8(mdo): bkod pa dang / lag na rdo rje dang / brjod bya dang / kha dog thams cad stond pa dang / tsan dan gyi rnam pa dang / do la stsogs pa klu'i rgyal po 'bum phrag tu ma la s+pha sa pa/ grogs po dag khyed cag
149b1(mdo): thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas bskal ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ bdag gi gnas su spyon cig/ de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mchos/ gzhon rtsang pas
149b2(mdo): gnal brji la bskol ba/ bzhin bzangs khyod song 5/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i rkang pa la mgo' bos phyag 'tshal la// nga'i 'phrin 'di skad ces gyis shig/ bdag gi pa'i mchodan
149b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bshos gsol gyis rgya mtsho 'a chen por spyon cig ces gyis shika// legs so zhes byas te mnyan nas/ ji skad bskol ba bzhin
149b4(mdo): tuklu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu dpal gyi gzi' brjid kyis byas so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos/ klu'i rgyal po shugs drag la spras pa/ shugs drag khyod song la ri rab kyi steng
149b5(mdo): du sor ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyang pos shig/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya'i byin la yang de ba zhan gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis
149b6(mdo): rgya mtsho la chen por bdag gi gnas su spyon cig gyis shig/ de nas klu'i rgyal po rgyal ba rgya mtshos ji skad bskol ba bzhin du/ klu shugs drag klu'i rgyal po dka' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / lha rnams
149b7(mdo): kyi dbang po brgyal byin gyi zad du song nas/ ji skad bskol ba bzhin du spyan drangs so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos rang gi gnas su 'khor kyi khyams bkod pa/ bye dur+ya sngon po dag dang / 'dzam
149b8(mdo): bu'i chu'i gser las byas pa bshams te/ rin po che rtsams ni spras/ rin po che'i dra bas ni khebs par byas/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba ni sbyangs/ dang gyi snga ldi mang po na btags/ bla ren
150a1(mdo): bres rgyal mtshan rang ba dan ni bsgreng / rgya mtsho'i spos kyi ni brdugs/ be tog sna tshogs ni bkram ste/ 'khor gyi khyams yangs shing rgya che ba de'i nang du/ bcom ldan 'dra
150a2(mdo): kyi seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bcul gnyis pa/ rin po sems cad kyis spras pa lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu rnam pa sna tshogs su ma mang po bting ba bla re bres pa / rin po che sna bdun gyi steg
150a3(mdo): bus bskor ba/ rin po che'i dra bas khyebs pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba sbyangs pa/ dar gyi snga ldi btags pas brgyan pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan zhig pagams so// dge
150a4(mdo): slong gi dgel 'dun thams cad kyi ba dan yang ji ltar 'tsham pa ba zhin tu bshams so// ro brgyas bsgos pa'i zhal zas dadag rkyang bshams so// thams cad legs par zin
150a5(mdo): par rig nas bu dang gnyen 'dab dang / 'khor dang bcas te te'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bar rims 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gzugs chod bab pa'i tshigs su bcad la 'di
150a6(mdo): dag gsol to// chos kyi dbang phyug ye shes rgya chen khyad par brnyes// ye shes 'byung gnas mkha' 'dra ye shes mtha' yas pa// 'jig rten 'das pa spyan yangs dag pa'i spyan dang ldan
150a7(mdo): phan pa mdzad pa gzugs tshod pab kyis gshegs su gsol// tshangs pa'i gsung dang rnam dag gsung ldan dbyangs snyan pa// ka la byir ka rdza sna bdud po'i don ston pa/ sman pa'i mchog ste nyon
150a8(mdo): mongs sna tshogs mun sel ba// sems can rin chen gdugs tshod bab kyis gshegs su gsol// zhi zhing rab zhi thugs mnga' rtag tu zhi bar spyod// rgyal ba grol ba lha dang myi rnams
150b1(mdo): rab grol mdzad// chu bo bzhi'i las rnal ba 'gro ba sgrol pa po// pha rol gshegs pa bde'i sbyin gtugs tshod tus la pa ba// sbyin ru la yang dag sdom dges tshul khri mas yongs su dag/ 
150b2(mdo): bzor ba'i stobs dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus chen po brnyes// bsam gtan rnam za rang dges pa shes rab yongs su rdzogs// zhal ras zla 'dra gzugs tshod bab kyis gshegs su
150b3(mdo): gso la// lam mkhyen lam la mkhas shing ngan pa'i lam srang ngan pa spangs// byang chub yan laka dbang stobs bden pa bzhi'i stond pa// yang dag spong dang rdzu 'phrul bzha' dang dran ny+dza/ 
150b4(mdo): thams cad zil gnon yon tan mara' ba gdugs chod pab/ sum bcu'i cha gnyis mtshan mnga' bsod nams brgya tog/ bsod nams 'tshal rnams bsod nams wI
150b5(mdo): chen bcom ldan 'das// mchod sbyin dam pa bzhes pa'a'os lags yon gyi gnas// byams la dgyesagatugs tshod bab kyis gshegs su gsol// mU
150b6(mdo): po 'dra zhings dang mtshungs la sbyor po snyoms// byams sdang myi sanga' nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs// ma'i dbang po khengs pa gyi mngal dman myi mnga'// sto dang rnam pa ba
150b7(mdo): dgyes pa gzugs chod pa sa// kun pa zhes kun la mkhas pa rgyas dang cho ga mkhyend// chos rnams 'byed la mkhas pa rtag tu nus bzhin spyod// sems can bsamaparab mkhyen
150b8(mdo): don rig mkhyen par ldan// chos rgya bo'i nyid mkhyen gzugs chod nas la kha// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal rgya mtsham gtsun mchor rnam pa de zugasu chud rma/ 
151a1(mdo): dgel gro rnam pa la ma sadage' slong ngas su'i rgyas po rgya bcos gzugs tshod la bab kyis su bamed dang chos gos la / sems can
151a2(mdo): su sbyin par bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su yongs su 'ongs spyod pa'i phyir rgya mtshol chen 'o 'ding ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis
151a3(mdo): ni yongs su skor kyi/ nyan thob kyi shi' 'dun gyis ni matsun tu ba dang // skye'o tshogs kyis ni phyag byas/ ma yin gyi tshogs kyis ni 'astod de/ rang ba'i rgyal po bzhin du ste
151a4(mdo): bar snang la 'phags te/ gshegs nas 'od che da ni 'byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa ni sdang bar mdzad// pad ma'i char ni 'bebs sam snyan 'bu ba ni sgrogs/ 
151a5(mdo): dbyangs 'bum ni grags par badzad de/ rgya mtshom 'gram gal ba der gshegs te/ byod nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram na dga' ba'i tshul ltar nyams dga' ba zhes bya ba'i
151a6(mdo): tsam pa ka'i cha la gas pa der gshegs so// de nas rma'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bcom ldan 'das gas pa der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs pa mgo' bos phyag 'tshal te/ 
151a7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas so// mchod pa byas nas gtugs tshod bab bo// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshol 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis/ bdag
151a8(mdo): ga gnas su gshegs pa de ni/ bdag gi rigs pa ma yin ma ma yin gyis/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ them sbas ji lta bu dag gis bcom ldan
151b1(mdo): 'das sum bcu'i cha gsum gyi gnas nas// 'dzem bu'i slad du gshegs pa de kho na lta bu'i them sras dag byin gyis brlabs la/ them skas de dag las bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho' chen
151b2(mdo): bor gshegs par bya ba gor ma chag snyam mo/ de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos rgya mtsho' chen po'i 'gram nas rang gi gnas kyi bar tu them sras kyi rim pa gsum bshams te/ gcig ni gser las
151b3(mdo): byasagacig mi bye du r+ya lasag cig ni mu tig dmar po las te / rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa bkra ba blta' na sdug pa dag bshams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci
151b4(mdo): nas rgya mtsho' chen po'i chu'i phung po sus kyang myig gis myi mthong pa dang / sus kyang sems can dag la gnodad par myi 'gyur pa de lta bu'i byin gyis rlabs kyis brlabs so// 
151b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las kyang 'od gang gis rgyamatsho' chen po sdang bar gyur nas stong gsum gyi stong chen bo'i 'jig rten gyi khams sdang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od 'byed/ 
151b6(mdo): par mdzad do// rgya mtsho 'a chen po na sems can gnas pa gang yin pa de dag kyang 'od des reg pa tsam gyis byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / gnyen pa'i sems dang / 'del ba'i sem
151b7(mdo): su gyur te// phyin chad su yang phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba myed cing gnod pa byed pa myed de/ de dag thams cad gcig la gcig pa mar 'du shes par gyu rad to// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / ka nug
151b8(mdo): na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / chos mnyan pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas kyi bkod pa lta 'ang 'dod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das bya
152a1(mdo): chub sems dpal rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / brgyal byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten myong la spogs pa lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri la dang / ma yin dang / 
152a2(mdo): nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / myi dang phyi ma yin pa rnams dka' ba'i tshal ltar nyams dga' ba'i tsam pa ka'i tshal nas langs te/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'them
152a3(mdo): skas kyi rim pa bshams pa gal ba der dong ste/ lhags nA them skas dbus ma la ni bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so// g.yas rol na ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khod do// g.yon rol na ni
152a4(mdo): nyan thos chen po rnams 'khod do// mdun logs na ni ba rgyal byin bye ba phrag drug bcu'i lag pa g.yas pas lam ma tshon par byed do// tshangs pa bye ba phrag drug bcu'i ni nam mkha
152a5(mdo): dkyil na 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das la rin po che'i ga dugs rnams 'dzind to// lha bye ba phrag drug bcu'i ni ba com ldan 'das kyi snam logs na 'khod de me tog gi char 'bebs
152a6(mdo): so// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams ni/ bcom ldan 'das pa mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ sil snyan bye ba phrag drug bcul dkrol bar byed do// lha'i bu bye ba phrag drug bcu la ni/ bcom
152a7(mdo): ldan 'das kyi shul spos chus chags 'debs so// klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag bcu'i ni nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod de/ ro stod khebs pa'i mu tig gi 'phreng ba dag 'byang bar byed do// myi 'am ci bye ba
152a8(mdo): drug 'acul ni bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad la 'dod pas bsod par byed do// de bye ba phrag drus btsuni bcom ldan 'das kyi yum san me tog gi phreb ba rnam sa 'byung bar byed do// 
152b1(mdo): yin bye ba phrag drug bcu la ni ras bcos su kha dog sna tshogs stong gis 'o// bcom ldan 'das la 'gebs par byed do// klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa yang 'khor bye ba phrag brgyal dang nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod de/ 
152b2(mdo): me tog dang spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ga dan thams cad dpasil snyan dang klu dbyangs dang / pheg rdob pa dang / lga'i bkod pa thams cad kyis
152b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byed do// de las stsogs pa klu'i rgyal po drug khri bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed pa la zhugs so// de bzhin gshegs 'tshe dpag tu myed pa'i sangs
152b4(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams bde' ba can nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dpang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu' chen po thob dang / 
152b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ya 'o bye ba zhag zhag zag 'bum klu'i rgyal po phyam tshol dga' bar bya ba dang / nas ldan 'das su mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyim lpags so// 
152b6(mdo): de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i bkod pa sde ma gang yin pa de mog mog por byed cing / mi mngon par byed pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byas so// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de ba'i
152b7(mdo): gshegs pa 'azod pa dga' sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi tog dang / 'og gi dpal gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
152b8(mdo): gshegs pa myi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mngon dga' nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po dang / glang po chen spos kyi glang po gnyis 'ongs so// bcom
153a1(mdo): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnamapa ldas byed nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge dang / seng ge'i blo gros gnyis 'ong so// 
153a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshesas sun nga sna sa rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams khyin gyi 'dzums pa nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur ba dang / chos thams cad la dbang byed
153a3(mdo): gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba can nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dkyil 'khor
153a4(mdo): can dang / rin chen ta la la gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khamA dgal ba'i skyes so na nas kyang
153a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod dang / rnam par gnon pa don yor gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam par gzigs kyi
153a6(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu lta ba nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi rgyal po dang / chos kyi rgyal po gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
153a7(mdo): 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mabor na dka' ba nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' btud rab tu 'joms pa dang / brag 'joms rgyal
153a8(mdo): gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros ra
153b1(mdo): gnas dang / sgrub pa thams cad rnam par sel ba gnyis 'ongs so// de ltar phyogs bcu'i nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bye ba mar po/ klu'i rgyal po rgya
153b2(mdo): mtshol dga' bar bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lhags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu' chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul
153b3(mdo): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rold pa chen po dang / 
153b4(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i sgra chen pos/ phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed pa dag 'od kyis khyab par mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi
153b5(mdo): gsu pags go bar mdzad nas// lha 'bum gyis sim snyan dang klu'i dbyangs yend cing me tog gi tshar 'bebs2/ ngan sor thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba rab tu
153b6(mdo): zhi bar byas te/ sems can thams cad kyi bdel ba dang / yid bde' ba bsgrubs nas/ snying rje chen po brtan pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 
153b7(mdo): bkod pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa de lta bus rin po che'i them skas de dag las/ rgya mtsho' chen por gshegs te/ de lta bu'i klu dbyangs lend pa na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
153b8(mdo): dpag tu myed par gsung gis go bar mdzad nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag na gnas pa'i
154a1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rgyal byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri la dang lha ma yin dang / nam ma/ 
154a2(mdo): lding pa dang / myi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa rgya mtsho'i chen por gshegs par mthong ngo // 
154a3(mdo): de na lha'i bu mo dang klu'i bu mo dang // gnod sude l+h+wa du po dang / ma n+de kyo bu yo / lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo dang / nam mkha' lding gi bu mo dang / dra za'i bu mo dang / myi 'am ci'i bu mo dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo
154a4(mdo): bye ba zag 'bum dag gis/ sim snyan dang / rlul dbyangs lend cing bcom ldan 'das bdun nas bsus nas/ de'i tshe rgyad kyi sgra skad las byung ba'i tshigs su bcan
154a5(mdo): pa khyad par du 'phags pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'angs la mngon par bstod pa// sbyin pa las byung tshul khrims mdzes dang ldan// bzod pa'i stobs las byung ba
154a6(mdo): byams par snyoms// bzhon 'grus las byung don gyi mtshon chen legs// bsam gtan rnam thard dgyes pa khyod phyag 'tshal// shes rab 'od ldan dgongs pa rnam par dag/ 'o// 
154a7(mdo): dngaga'i la brjid dpal gyis mngon par brgyan// rnam par grol ba mngon gsum ston mdzad pa// thub pa nyon mongs pasal la phyag 'tshal lo// brtul zhugs shi na tu rdzogs pa brgyas
154a8(mdo): shugs mchog/ dka' thub mthar byin rtogs par thugs su chud// byig ni sbyin par mdzad cing myig sbyor ba// 'gro ba kun tu skyab 'gro ba'i mchog/ don dam zab mo shi na tu ston// 
154b1(mdo): ba po// gzhan yang phan pa zla myed thugs su chud// chags pa myed par tshig gi don stond pa// gzhan la phan pa dpe' myed 'od mdzad pa// nus skabs mkhyend pa kun tu ston pa po/ 
154b2(mdo): rgos la ngan pa'i tshogs kun rab 'joms pa// btul zhugs yongs su rdzogs pa brtul zhugs mchog/ bdud ci'i bde'i sgyid 'del ba sbyin mdzad pa// nam mkha' 'dra zhing dgongs pa dag
154b3(mdo): pa ste// dri ma kun sel rnam par 'dren pa po// yon tan rgya mtshol bsod nams mya zad pa// rgya mtshor 'jug pa ye shes rgya mtshor ldan// chos kyi dbang phyug nyon mongs sel mdzad pa// 
154b4(mdo): chos kyi sbyin bdag ser sA myi mnga' ba// chos kyi rin chen nor mchog sbyin mdzad pa// chos mchog ye shes de nyid stond pa po// dga' ba stond pa bden pa stonang mdzad pa/ 
154b5(mdo): bag la nyal kyi nyes pa spong ba stond// ri'i dbang po bzhin tu myi g.yo' ba// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal// myi dang lha dang mkha' lding gsang ba ba// 
154b6(mdo): lha min srin po myi 'am ci'i bdag/ klu rnams dang ni grul bum gnod sbyin rnams// khyod kyi zhabs la mgo 'bos phyag kyang 'tshal// mtshan mchog sum bcu la rtsa gnyis ldan pa ste/ 
154b7(mdo): rab mdzes dpe' myed shi na tu stond mdzad pa// gser gyi mdog can dpal ldan mdog suka pa// sen mo 'das 'dra mdog sug phyag mthil mnyam// ka la bing ka'i gdangs can ya mtshan
154b8(mdo): gsung // tshangs pa yA dbang gdangs can gdangs kyi mchog/ gsung gis stong gsum so sor 'gyengs par mdzad// 'jam gnyen gsung ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang po rtul zhing
155a1(mdo): rgyamam mi dang / ram mkha' sde dang / byedang / dri lal bu po de dag gisabacom ldan 'das tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams kyis mngon par bstod
155a2(mdo): thams cad gcig tu mthun par gyuran pas/ bla na myed pa dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas rang rang gi rkyen rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol
155a3(mdo): to// de nas bcom ldan 'das mab gyis ma chimachen par gshegs te/ rgyamatsho latshed pa'i gdu can 'argyam kyi gnas/ spel rgyal ba rgyamatsho ma mam bya khyam pa bkod pa gas ba de
155a4(mdo): gshegs nas/ seng ge lani de la bzhugs so// ni dges 'dun rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang stan ji ltar bshams pa de dag la 'khod do// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya
155a5(mdo): mchis bcom ldan 'das dang / dgel slong ka dge la 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams bzhugs par rig nas/ shu dang bcas/ chung ma dang 'acas// gnyen mda' dang / 'khor
155b1(mdo): dang bcas pas rang gi lag gis zhal zas ro brgya' dang ldan pa bsod pa mang pos tshim par byed cing ci bzhed pa stobs par byed do// tshim par byas shing ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/ 
155b2(mdo): bshos gsol lags te / kas pa sder gyu ba dang / phyag bcabs par rig nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
155b3(mdo): dang nam mkhal lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / brgya' byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang / phyogs bcu'i nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems
155b4(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / ldan ci chu bcom ldan 'das kyi 'an snga ma la da do// de nA bcom ldan las kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de tshogs te/ 'khod par thugs su chud nas 'del ba dang / 
155b5(mdo): dga' ba dang / mchog tu dka' ba'i chos mnyan pa zhes bya ba/ 'i 'od zer sku las 'gyed par mdzad de// 'od zer de dag gis rgya mtsho' chen po'i nang na/ srog chags rab
155b6(mdo): dang / 'bring dang / tha ma ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das mdun na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur te/ bde' ba dang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas/ chos
155b7(mdo): mnyan pa la brod cing gus pa dang bcas pas/ thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'dud cing 'khod par gyu rad to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshol la bka' su lod pa/ 
155b8(mdo): klu'i bdag po 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni/ las sna tshogs kyis bskyod nas sems kyi dmyigs pa sna tshogs kyis/ las rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed de
156a1(mdo): dmi 'gro la yang rnam pa rdzogs su cas to// nam bdan la rgyal pomachen pa 'din gzugs rnas pa sa tshogs ji snyed pa dang / mas pa med lnga pa la ya smos// zla'i
156a2(mdo): bdag po 'di dag thams cad ni rang rang ka sems dang dge' ba dang myi dge ya sa sus dang ngag dang yid kyi sas sna tshogs su byas pa dag go// sems ni gzugs myed pa bstand du myed pa ste// 
156a3(mdo): klu'i bdag po de ltar na chos thams cad ni/ bcos ma rnam par bsgrubs pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid de bdag po myed pa/ bdag gi myed pa yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa'o// de dag ni las ji/ 
156a4(mdo): ltar bstsags pa bzhin du bsgrubs pa sna tshogs su byas pa dag ste/ 'di la byed pa yo gang yang myed do// de ltar chos 'di dag ni bsam kyis myi khyab pa/ sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid
156a5(mdo): kyi ngo bo nyid do// klu'i bdag po de la mkhas pas chos // mas cad rnam par bsgrubs pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes nas/ dgel ba mngon par 'du bya ba dag kho na mngon par 'as
156a6(mdo): dkyil ma shes pa 'a bye ba dka/ mngon par 'du byed pa de'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnam par bsgrubs nas/ nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de dag mdzes shing
156a7(mdo): gzugs bzang blta' na sug par mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po de bzhin gsheg pa'i sku bsod nams bye ba phrag 'bum gyis ji ltar brgyan pa dang / ji ltar rnam par bsgrubs
156a8(mdo): pa dang / gang gis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'i yid kyis man nad cing gnon par 'jug pa dang / gang gis 'bum phrag bcu' la dbang sgyur ba'i tshangs pa 'di dag kyang mog log por byed pa dang / 
156b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la lta ba na yang / myig khral khrul du gyur pa la ltos// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi sus kyi rgya nad dang gzugs kyi mtshan rnams ltos/ 'di
156b2(mdo): ngag thams cad ni dge' ba mngon par 'du byed pas mngon par 'u byas pas brgyan pa rnam par bsgrubs pa dag go// klu'i bdag po khyod kyi bkod pa 'di yang bsod nams las byung ba yin no// 
156b3(mdo): brgyal byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ma dang / rnam yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'di rnams kyi bkod pa
156b4(mdo): 'di dag thams cad kyang bsod namapa las byung ba dag go/ klu'i bdag po rgya mtsho' chen po 'di na kar dag lus sna tshog sa gzugs myi stug cing dbyibs myi legs pa dang / lus
156b5(mdo): rags shing che ba rnams dang / gang dag lus phra zhing chung ba de dag thams cad kyang / rang rang gi sems dang dga' ba dag dang / myi dge' ba'i ma pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las
156b6(mdo): sna tshogs kyis sna tshogs su byas pa dag ste/ klu'i bdag po de lta bas na/ khyod kyis las bdag ker bya ba dang / las kyi dam par spyon pa la rton par 'gyur bar de ltar slobs shi ka dang
156b7(mdo): las bdag kar bya ba dang las kyi rnam par sbyin bral rton pa khyed/ dge' ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba dag la bro 'du pas gyu po/ ba chud gson par byed par gyi 'gyur ro// chad pa dang / rtag par
156b8(mdo): lta ba la gnas par yang phyi 'gyur ro// khyed kyi sbyin pa'i gnas rnams mnyes par gyis shig/ mnyes par byas nas kyang thugs byung bar ma byed cig/ bkur sti'i rgyasas byung ba'i dge' ban
157a1(mdo): mngon par 'du byed pas kyang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bkur sti'i gnas su 'gyur bar gyis shika// klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos gcig
157a2(mdo): gis ngan song ngan 'gro log par sung bar skye bar yang bdag par gcod do// chos gcig po gang zhe na 'di sa ste/ bdag ci ltar gyuran cing nyin mtshan rnams 'ang ni ma 'jug snyam cu dge' 'a
157a3(mdo): chos rnams la so sor rtog pa ste/ de dge' ba'i chos la so sor rtog pa mang 'as/ gyi dge' ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi ko skabs myi byed do// de myi dgel ba'i
157a4(mdo): chos spangs te/ dge' ba'i chos dang ldan pas bsam pa dgepa'i sems can 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'grogs pa rnyed par
157a5(mdo): 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po de la dge' ba'i chos de dag gang zhe na dge' ba'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni/ lha dang mya'i skyed ku'i phun sum tshogs pa'i tsha ba'i rtend to// nyan thos
157a6(mdo): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi za ba'i rtend to// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi za ba'i rtend to// phra ba'i rten kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge' ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam
157a7(mdo): rnams te/ bcu'i gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spong ba dang / ma byin par len pa spong ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba dang / brdzun du smra ba spong ba phra ma smra ba spong ba dang
157a8(mdo): ngag tshul ma mang sa dang / tshig rgyal 'thong pa dang / brlab sems spong ba dang / gnod sems spong ba dang / log sangs la spo ba ste// de na la la'i nyin ces bya'o// klu'i bdag pong
157b1(mdo): srog gcod pa spong ba'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos bcu la 'thob ste/ bcu'i gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste des sems can thams cad la mya 'jigs pa byin pa yin/ 
157b2(mdo): de'i sems byams par dmyigs pa la nye bar gnas pa yin/ de'i zhe sdang gi bag chags yang dag par chad pa yin/ des nad nyung bapa 'gyur ba'i lam yongs su gzung ba yin/ des
157b3(mdo): tshe ring bar 'gyur ba'i sa bon btab pa yin/ de sa kyi ma yin pa rnams kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par byed pa yin/ bde' bar nyal zhing 'del bar sad pa dang / sdug
157b4(mdo): ba'i rmyi lam mya skye ba yin/ gnyid log pa na yang de la rnams bsrung ba yin/ de la shar gnyer ba myed pa yin te/ da de la shar gnyer ba'i bag la nyal myed pa yin/ ngan
157b5(mdo): 'gro thams cad kyis myi 'jigs pa dang / shi 'phos nas kyang bde la 'gro mtho' ris skye 'jig rten du skye bayin te/ rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos bcul po de dag
157b6(mdo): 'thob po// srog gcod pa spangs pa'i dge' ba'i rtsa ba de/ gto bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon des de/ byang chub thob pa na tshe'i tshad sems kyi dbang
157b7(mdo): tu 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ yid brtan pa'i chos lnga 'thob ste/ snga gang zhe na/ yongs spyod che bar yang 'gyur yang / de'i longs
157b8(mdo): spyod de dag kyang rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / chu dang / me dang / bko' skal sa spyod pa'i myi mdza' ba rnams kyis myi 'phrogs pa yin/ skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing dka' ba yon
158a1(mdo): dogs pa myed pa yin/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su de'i bsngags pa brjod cing de la pha rol gyi gnod pas 'jigs pa myed pa yin/ de'i sems sbyin pa'i 'go ba
158a2(mdo): sa 'jug pa'aban te/ lnga po de dag go// ma byin par lend pa spangs pa'i dgel ba'i ab de gal te/ bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ des de
158a3(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i ye shes can tu rang gis mngon par rtogs nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang
158a4(mdo): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// klu'i bdag po 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang dag ni/ mkhas pas bsngags pa'i chos bzhi'u 'thob ste/ 
158a5(mdo): bzhi'agang zhe na/ dbang po bsdams pa dang / rgod palas yang dag par 'das pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis pa sngags pa dang/ chung ma myi 'phrog sa pa ste/ 
158a6(mdo): bzhil po de dag go// 'dod pas sog par g.yem pa spangs pa'i dge' ba'i a ba de gal te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon des de skyes bu chen po
158a7(mdo): mtshan/ 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa thob po// klu'i bdag po brdzun tu smra ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ sgra dang mis bsngags pa'i chos brgyad 'thob ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 
158a8(mdo): ud pa'i sa'i dri 'byung bas kha yongs su dag pa 'thob pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi tshad mar 'gyur ba dang / lha dang myi dgal bas dgra gci/ pur 'gyur ba dang / yang dag pa'i bsam
158b1(mdo): pa dang ldan pas dogs pa myed par 'gyur ba dang / lhag pa'i bas me pa phun sum tshogs pas lus dang ngag dang / sems yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dpa/ tshig 'khrul pa myed pas mchog tu
158b2(mdo): dga' ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang / tshig gzung bar 'os pas rag nyan par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab thob pas lha dang myir skyes na dbang gcig pur 'gyur ba yin te/ brgyad po de dag go// 
158b3(mdo): brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i dge' ba'i kha ba de gal te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon des de bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag
158b4(mdo): bo bra ma spangs pa'i skyes bu gang 'ag ni/ myi byed pa lnga datho ste/ lnga dang zhe na/ gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba dang / dbral bas lus myi byed pa 'bob pa dang / gzhan dag gi
158b5(mdo): chags pa myed pas g.yog 'khor myi phyed pa 'thob pa dang / las kyi rnam par smind pa mthong pas dad pa myi phyed pa'athob pa dang / bsgrub pa snying por byed byas chos las myi
158b6(mdo): phyed pa 'thob pa dang / myi slu bas mdza' bshes myi byed pa 'thob pa ste/ lnga po de dag go// dge' ba'i rtsa ba de gal te/ byang chubla ne myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon
158b7(mdo): des do g.yog 'khor myi byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgral bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ de'i 'khor bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis dbye' bar
158b8(mdo): nus so// klu'i bdag po dag chub po spangs pa'i skyes bu gang dag ni/ ngag yongs su dag pa brgyad 'thob la/ shi 'phos na yang lha dang myi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 
159a1(mdo): 'dis bye/ ngan la ma cig dang / parda pa'i tshig 'a/ rigs pa'i chog dang / 'jam pa'i tshig dang / gzung ba'i tshig dang / mnyan pa'i tshig dang / skye bo mang po dga' ba'i tshig dang / 
159a2(mdo): mi u pa'i tshig ste/ brgyad po de dag go// dgel ba'i cha pa de gal te/ bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ des de tshangs pa'i sgra skad kyi gdangs can gyi de bzhin
159a3(mdo): gshegs par 'gyung ngo // klu'i bdag po tshig khyal pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang 'ag ni/ gcig tu nges pa gsum 'thob ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mkhas pa rnams gcig tu nges par dka'
159a4(mdo): ba dang / lan legs par dga' za ljon pas gcig tu re sa par de'i blo bden pa la 'gro ba dang / bcos ma ma yi/ na pas gcig tu nges par lga dang / myi'i bdag nyid chen
159a5(mdo): po 'thob ste/ gsum po de dag go// dgel ba'i a ba den la te bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sa su sngon/ des de byed par lung ston cing / gzhan
159a6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs par myi 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po brnab sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni bdag po'i chos lnga 'thob ste/ snga gang zhe na/ dbang po ma tshang ba myed pas lus dang ngag dang / 
159a7(mdo): sems kyi bdag po bab pa dang / dgra' thams cad kyis kyi rdzobs longs spyod dang dbang phyug rgya mtshol chen po'i thadag po 'thob pa dang / bsod nams la dbang byed pas de'i sems nyin
159a8(mdo): spyad pa dang / longs spyod rgya chen po rnams la 'jug pa dang / phyis bkrab pa thob pas bdag pos mchod pa dang / sngon phrag dog byed pas longs spyod ji ltar smon pa rnams 'bum gyur
159b1(mdo): khyad par mu 'gyur ba 'thob pa ste/ lnga po de dag go/ dgel ba'i pha 'a de dag gal te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ des de
159b2(mdo): 'jig rten gsum kyis mchod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa stond pa gcig pur 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po gnod sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag no// yid bdel bar byed pa'i
159b3(mdo): chos brgyad 'thob pa ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ de'i sems rnam par myi 'tshe ba la 'jug pa dang / de'i sems gnod sems rab tu zhi pa la 'jug pa dang / de'i sems cod pa
159b4(mdo): myed cing 'thab pa myed la 'jug pa dang / de'i sems mnyam pa dang / gnyen pa dang nges pa la 'jug pa dang / byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i skye blo
159b5(mdo): bkur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde' ba la/ te mngon par dga' ba'i phyir/ phan pa'i dngos po la/ pal dang / skye bo mang pos bkur sti bya ba'i phyir brje
159b6(mdo): pa dang / sems 'jam zhing las su rung ba'i phyir de tsha sa po'i 'jig rten du skye bar dga' ba myed pa ste/ brgyad po de dag go/ dga' ba'i cha' de gal te/ spen byed pa
159b7(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ des de sems thogs pa myed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lta bas cho ga myi shes par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po log par
159b8(mdo): lta ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ yon tan gyi chos bcul 'thob ste/ bcu la ga zhe na/ bsam pa dge' bar 'byung zhing / grogs po dgel ba rnyed pa dang / las kyi rnam par
160a1(mdo): ga par sbyin dpas mid ches te/ srog gi phyi sa sdig pa'i mas kyi byed pa dang / pa sangs rgyas 'dzin te/ gzhan skar gyi 'dzin da la dang / dge la mtshan dang bka'/ 
160a2(mdo): shes su 'dzind pa myed pas lta ba drang ba dang / grogs lha dang myi yin te/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / ka sha ni rje'i 'jig rten grogs ma yin pa dang / bsod nams 'bar bas khyad par du 'gro
160a3(mdo): ba dang / logapa thams cad myed pas 'phags pa'i lam du zhugs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba las bskyod de sdig pa'i lta ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / sgrib pa myed par mthong pa
160a4(mdo): yin te/ yang dag par song zhing yang dag par zhugs pa dang / ska dang myi rnams kyi nang na myi khom pa dang bral ba dang bral ba yin te/ bcul po de dag go// log par lta ba spangs
160a5(mdo): pa'i dgel ba'i phra ba de dag gal te/ bla na myed pa yang / ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon// des de byang chub thob na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon ga@
160a6(mdo): 'gyur zhing mngon par shes pa byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po de la/ srog gcod pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byid na/ longs spyod chen por 'gyung zhe
160a7(mdo): ring ba yang 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba thams cad las yang dag par 'dul bar 'gyur ro// ma byin par le nad pa spangs pa'i byang chub
160a8(mdo): rabs dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing longs spyod phyi 'phrogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ dgel ba'i kha ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa
160b1(mdo): zla na byed pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spongs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing chung ma myi g.yem par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
160b2(mdo): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan ya pa dang bu dang / chung ma la su yang chags pa'i sems kyis lta bar myi 'gyur ro// brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyuro// 
160b3(mdo): longs spyod kyi 'phrogs pa dang / skurd pa 'debs yang byed par 'gyur ba'i lam yang yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed de
160b4(mdo): des bcas pa brtan par 'gyur ro// phra ma spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bdar 'gyur zhing g.yog 'khor myi byed par yang 'gyur ro// byang chub
160b5(mdo): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang bsam pa bathun pasabyang chub sems dpa'i g.yog 'khor 'thob bo// ngag tu po spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ yongs
160b6(mdo): spyod che bar 'gyur zhing tshig btsun par 'gyur la/ tshig sun dbyang du byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang 'khor ma mgul bar su yang myi 'gro'o// tshig kyal la spangs
160b7(mdo): pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byed na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing / tshig mnyam par yang 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang the tsom thams cad gcod pa la mkhas
160b8(mdo): par 'gyur ro// brnab sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyid pa byin na/ songs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing longs spyod dang / yongs su spyad pa rgya chen po dag pa de'i sems 'jug par 'gyur ro// 
161a1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan yang rgya chen po la mos shing / dbang rtse par grags par 'gyur ro// gnod sems spangs pa'i me da sbyin pa byin na/ longs
161a2(mdo): tu/ spyod che bar 'gyur zhing mdzes pa dang / skye bo mang po dka' zhing yid du 'ong bar yang 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa yang blo thogs pa myed pa la/ dbang po ma tshang ba
161a3(mdo): myed par 'gyur ro// log par lta ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod pa che bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas la dad pa dang / yang dag par lta ba'i khyim du skye'o// 
161a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang sangs rgyas la dalta' ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge' 'dun la bsnyen pa kur byed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang
161a5(mdo): 'bral bar myi 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po dgel ba bcu'i la sa kyi lam 'di dag sbyin pas brgyan pa na/ de ltar mthus che zhing pa na yon che la/ byin che zhing rgya che bar 'gyur ro// 
161a6(mdo): dge' ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag nyid/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad smon pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'bod pas brgyan na mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang
161a7(mdo): lo dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'tshon 'grus kyis brgyan na/ bdud phyir rgol ba 'joms pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mthar phyind par
161a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyis brgyan na/ dran pa dang no gros dang / rtog su bye dang/ rdo rje shes pa dang / 'atan da yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyis brgyad na/ sa ba thams can
161b1(mdo): yang dag par 'joms khar 'gyur ro// byabs pas brgyan do/ sems can thasam tshang dang zhe 'gras pa byed par 'gyur ro// snying rjes brgyan na/ sems can thams cad yongs su myi
161b2(mdo): gtong bar 'gyur ro// dag la bas brgyan na/ sems zhum pa byed par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad btang snyoms kyis brgyan na/ rjes su chags pa dang / 'ong khro ba spong bar
161b3(mdo): 'gyur ro// bskul ba'i dngos pos brgyan na sems can thams cad yongs su smon par byed par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pas brgyan na/ lus dang tshor ba dang / sems dang chos la
161b4(mdo): mkhas par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spor bas brgyan na/ dge' ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dgel ba'i chosathams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
161b5(mdo): 'phrul gyi rkang pas brgyan na/ lus dang sems yang bar 'gyu ra ro// dbang po lngas brgyan na/ dad pa brtan pa dang / bcon 'grus brtan pa dang / rmongs pa byed pa dang / 
161b6(mdo): sems las su rung ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyis brgyan na/ rdzi ba myed pa dang / dgra' dang 'khrul ba thams cad nges par 'joms par 'gyur ro// 
161b7(mdo): byang chub kyi yan lag gis brgyan na/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong dutu chud par 'gyur ro// lam gyis brgyan na/ yang dag pa'i ye ges 'dren par 'gyur ro// zhi gan
161b8(mdo): rgyas brgyan na/ nyon mongs pa khams cad mam gcod par 'gyur ro// lhag ma thong gis brgyan na/ chol thams can yang dag pa ji sa ma bzhin kyi yongs su zhes papa 'gyur ro// thams kyi
162a1(mdo): brgyan na/ 'dus byas dang 'dus pa byas kyi bdel ba yongs su rdzogs khar 'byung ngo // klu'i bdag po de ltan na/ dgel ba bcu'i las kyis ma 'di dag kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ 
162a2(mdo): stobs bcu' yongs su rdzogs pa dang / phyi 'jigs pa bzhi' yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rtogs par 'gyur te/ klu'i 'dag po de lta bas na/ dgen
162a3(mdo): pa bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag rgya na la dbye' ba dang / brgyan par 'thon par bya'o// klu'i bdag po dper na grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang
162a4(mdo): thams cad dang / wA dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang shing thamadas cad dang / las kyi mtha' thams cad dang / sa bonakyi tshogs thams cad dang / lo thog thams cad skye zhing thob
162a5(mdo): shal pas bshal ba dang / 'byung ba rnams ni sa la gnas te de dag gi kanas ni sa yin no// klu'i bdag po de bzhin du dge' ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni lha dang phyir skye ba
162a6(mdo): slob pa dang / byi g.yol ba'i dge' sbyong ka 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos pasam chod kyi nas
162a7(mdo): yin no// / dgel ba bcu'i las kyi sems gnas zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ drug pa la// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di gad ces gsol to// 
162a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das chos sgor 'jug pa gang dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa'i nongs pa rnams spong zhing / yas kyi sgrib pa thams cad spangs nas kyang / khyad par
162b1(mdo): byi gnas su 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi sgor 'jug pa ka lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kU'i bdag po chos gcig gis yas kyi sgrib pa thams cad rgyan chad par
162b2(mdo): 'gyur te/ chos gcig po gang zhe na 'di lta ste// sdom pa la gnas pa nyes pa byung ba 'chags pa ste/ gcig ni de yin no// klu'i bdag po chos gnyis kyis las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par
162b3(mdo): 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ tshul bzhin du chos la so sor rtog pa dang / da ltar byung ba mngon par 'du myi byed pa ste/ de gnyis so// klu'i bdag po chos gsum gyis las kyi
162b4(mdo): sgrib pa rgyan chad par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rkyen gyis chos la 'jug pa'i shes rab la so sor rtog pa dadang / myigasar myi rnying pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa dang / 
162b5(mdo): rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa'i chos rnams sa so sor rtog pa ste/ gsum po de dag go// klu'i dag po chos bzhis las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te/ 
162b6(mdo): bzhil gang zhe na/ 'dis ste/ stong pa nyid la nges par sems pa dang / mtshan ma byed pas gnas pa dang / smod pa dang bral ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa shes pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ko/ 
162b7(mdo): klu'i bdag po chos sngas las kyi sgrib pa rgyan chad par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag myed pa nyid dang / sems can myed pa nyid dang / srog myed pa nyid dang / gang zag byed pa nyid dang // 
162b8(mdo): gso' ba myed pa nyid de lnga po de dag go// klu'i bdag po chos drag gis las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste mos pa dang / yid ches pa dang / gcig tu nges pa du
163a1(mdo): the tsom byed pa dang / yang dag pas so sor rton pa dang / skrag pa'i khasam zas sas rgya lal 'jug pa ste/ chos drug po de dag gis las kyi sA la pa rgyan chad par 'gyur ro// 
163a2(mdo): de skad ces bka' sa sad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal khya par du mchil la lags
163a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ klu'i bdag po chos bcu la dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bcu la ga zhe na 'di lta ste/ de la ma chags pa/ 
163a4(mdo): dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / thabs sa mkhas pas brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / sems/ can la lta zhing snying rje chen po dang / bsod nams
163a5(mdo): chog kyi shes pa dang / zos pa btsal pa sa chog mi shes pa dang bag yod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po rjes su dran pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon gsum du 'thob pa dang / 
163a6(mdo): byang chub kyi sems myi gtong ba dang / chos brgyal po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan
163a7(mdo): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad kyis mngon par 'gyur bar lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ 
163a8(mdo): snga ma yin gyi dbang po chos brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/ brgya dag bzhin 'dis ste/ sgra gcan chen po 'di sa/ 
163b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' ni nga rgyal myed pa yin te/ sems can thams cad 'dud cing mngon par 'dud ya dang / dka' rno bdel ba yin te/ mthun par 'dzind pa dang / ji skad smras pa bzhin byed pa
163b2(mdo): dang / bla ma rnams la gus pa bskyed pa dang / dge la ba spyod pa thams cad sngon du 'gro ba dang / dge' ba'i chos rnams la dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / rgya chen po sa mos phra man te/ sbyin pa rnam pa
163b3(mdo): sna tshogs sbyin pa dang / srog gi phyir yang gzhan 'khrug par myi byed pa dang / kong tu yang sems can 'jigs pa rnams la gyi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing / skyabs su 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams yon/ 
163b4(mdo): su myi gtong ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes thams cad yod das su tshol ban/ chog myi shes pa ste/ chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams
163b5(mdo): kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha ma yin gyi dbang po s+tha ka can gyis yang 'di ska da ces gso sad to// bcom ldan 'das chos du dang
163b6(mdo): sngan na/ byang chub sems dpa' yus che ba nyid dang / gzugs che ba nyid dang / 'khor che ba nyid dang / sems che ba nyid thos par 'gyur lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ sA gcan
163b7(mdo): chos bzhil dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpas sus che ba nyid thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi la gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ gzhan dag gi spyod pa la myi 'phyal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gru ma samams
163b8(mdo): cad yongs su rdzogs par byed du 'jug pa dang / sems can bye ba dang / 'bal pa rnams bsums gong/ mthun par bkod nas bla da byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa 'jug pa dang / sem
164a1(mdo): can thams cad la dbang po zhe 'gras pa myed pa ste/ chos bzhi la po de dag dpa ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus che ba nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// chos bzhi la dang ldan na/ byang
164a2(mdo): chub sems dpas gzugs che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi'i gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs sbyin pa dang / phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
164a3(mdo): la byams pa'i myig gis lta ba dang / gzhan byang bzhin bzhin bzang po dag la phrag dog dang ser sna byi byed pa ste/ chos bzhi'i po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs che ba nyid thob
164a4(mdo): par 'gyur ro// chos bzhi la dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpas 'khor che ba nyid thol bar 'gyur te/ bzhi la gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bra ma'i tshig spong zhing / gzhan gyi 'khor myi 'byed pa dang / 
164a5(mdo): gzhan gyi 'khor la dga' ba dang / byang chub kyi sems shin tu brtan pa dang / gzhan dag byang chub sa 'jud pa ste/ lham yin gyi dbang po chos bzhil po de dag dang ldan na
164a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpas 'khor che ba nyid thos par 'gyur ro// chos bzhil dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpas sems che ba nyid thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi la gang zhen 'di lta ste/ bsam la dka sa
164a7(mdo): g.yo' myed pa dang / sgyu can ma yin pa dang / 'dun la dag po dang ldan pa dang / bar la dor skyo ba byed pa dang / rgya chen po la mos shi theg pa dman pa mya 'dod pa dang / chos khams cad rang bzhin gyis
164a8(mdo): stong pa nyid la 'jug pa ste/ chos rab mo'i tshul la 'jug pa ste/ chosgra gcan chos bzhil po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpas sems che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha ma yin
164b1(mdo): h+ya khar gyi dbang po sgra kacan 'khor sum khri nyes stong dang bcas pa tshim zhing mgu la sa yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dka' ba dang / yid bde' ba skyes nas rin po che'i me tog rin po che thams/ 
164b2(mdo): cad kyis smras pa/ khal bcu 'tshad brgyas bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// bra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
164b3(mdo): bcad pas mngon par bstod do// phyogs bcu' dag na sems can khams rnams mtha' yas kang su dag/ skad cig zab cig yud tsam gcig ya rgyal la mchod byed la// phyogs bcul dag na
164b4(mdo): sems can gang dag bskal dpa 'bum cu yang // mchod pa bakhon pa'i sems can dag ni phan pa byed pa dang / byaHsa dang bsod nams 'phags pa'i rang bzhin las khyung
164b5(mdo): mchod pa' rnams// ci 'dra ba dang mtshungs shing mnyam pa ma lags khyod la 'os// mtshungs myed sems kyis yang ka gnas nas bskyed pa kang legs pa// de ni stobs bcu la
164b6(mdo): ldan pa rnams la brjed dang mchod pa lags// bdag ni byang chub reg 'gyur snyam ste del slob gnas nas// bdag ni g.yo'i myed byang chub mtshungs ma mchis la zhugs la lags// myi da
164b7(mdo): las gzhan srid gsum cu yang bdag gi dbang ma mchis// bdag gis bsam pa ji 'dra ba'i dab na stobs bcul ldan pa lags// bdag ni kun la shin tu sug cing nga rgyal bsal ba dang / 
164b8(mdo): sbyin dang tshus dang ldan zhing tshul khrims ldan la bzod ldan dang // 'tshon 'grus dran pa ting 'dzin shes rab dam dag gnas pa dang // byams dang snying rje ldan zhing bden pa' chos la spyod kyar dacig
165a1(mdo): par bzhed rgyal ba gal te bdag la sung ston myi 'dzad kyang // mye'i dbang po bdag ni rang gos rang la lung yang bstan// bdag ni rang byur myi 'gyur snyam du dogs ma mchis// 
165a2(mdo): tu/ de ltar bdag ni bsam pa thag pas byang chub nyid sems des// myi dbang 'dzum pa mdzad nas zla ba'i tog gis zhus pa ni// rang byung 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di ni ci lags lung bstan gsol da// 
165a3(mdo): gapag phyir da ngas ni dag pa'i 'od rnams bstand mdzad pa// zla ba'i tog khyod mnyan par gyis shes ston pas de la gsungs// lha myi sgra gcan bdag nyid chen po byang chub mchog la zhugs
165a4(mdo): g.yog 'khor sum khri nyis stong gang lags rnams kyang de bzhin te// bskald pa stong phrag brgyar ni byang chub spyod pa spyad nas kyang // thams cad rjes su mthun par byang chub
165a5(mdo): gtsol po thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba gang ga'i bye ma snyed na/ mas la ni mchod bgyis te// de nas sems can shin dang tum pa yo byang chub bkod nas kyang // de'i 'og du bskal pa
165a6(mdo): dgel ba bkod pa mdzes pa la// byang chub rdul bral zhi ba mya ngan byed par 'tshang yang rgya// swa gcan bdag nyid chen po 'di ni chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur// brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan te/ dbang // 
165a7(mdo): rgyal mtshan zhes kyang bgyil// 'jig rten khams kyang dge' ba skyed pa'i bkod pa zhes bkyil ste// dga' ldan kanas nas 'dra bar 'byor da tsang rgyas la lo yang legs// stobs bcu'i ldan
165a8(mdo): tshe na yo grangs bye ba bdun bcu' ste// dge' slong 'phags pa'i dge' 'dun khrag khrig drug bcul tham par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' dge' 'dun khrag khrig phrag bcu la brgyad bcu' ste/ thos
165b1(mdo): pa dang ni 'dul ba 'dzind pa gzungs la sha nad tu gnas// bskal pa dge bo bkod pa zhes bgyi'i mdzes pa de dag tu// sems can brgya'i stong dag ni byang chub bkod pa bgyis nas kyang / 
165b2(mdo): 'di dag thams cad rim gyis byang chub mchog tu 'tshang yang rgya// byang chub sems mchog gi ni yon tan khyad par dag la ltos// der ni sgra gcan bzang po'i lung bstan thos par gyur da nas kyang // 
165b3(mdo): srog chags 'bum phrag bzhi'i dag byang chub mchog la zhugs par gyur da// legs pa'i yon tan 'chang ba rnams kyi bsam pa'i khyad par gyis// stong gsum rab g.yos smras kyang me to// 
165b4(mdo): char yangab tu phab// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas 'di skad ces gsol to// com ldan 'das chos thams cad ni bdag ma mchis pa
165b5(mdo): byed pa po ma mchis pa lags na/ lu bstand pa ni ka pa la kas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang la kas// bya chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni kang la kas// bcom
165b6(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la da pa/ klu'i bdag po de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni bdag myed pa byed pa po myed pa yin te/ de ni chos rnams rgya chos/ nyid yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang byis pa so
165b7(mdo): so la skye bo phyin ci log dang ldan pa/ ngang 'dzin pa dang 'i 'dzin pa gnas pa rnams// sems can myed pa rnams la sems can du 'du shes skyed par byed de/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
165b8(mdo): rnams kyis snying rje chen po bskyed nas/ phyin ci log gi 'du shes song du gzhug pa dang / ngas 'dzind pa dang / pa'i nga 'dzin da pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir byang chub tu go mgyon par 'ad kyi
166a1(mdo): skyes su dam pa de dag gis sems can myed pa dang / kang zag myed pa myigs pa ni ma yin te/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / gsol 'a dang / skyes su dang / kang zag tu sta bI sems
166a2(mdo): can de dag yongs su grol bar byed do// klu'i bdag po khyod 'di skad du 'di la lung bstand pa gang lags shes zer ba gang yin pa de la mngon gsum du chos khong du chud pa ni lung bstand pa'o// 
166a3(mdo): sems can myed pa dang / srog myed pa dang / gsol ba myed pa dang / gang zag myed pa la nges par sems pa'i sems dang ldan pa lung bstan pa'o// ma byung ba dang ma skyes pa dang / ya ba myed pa dang
166a4(mdo): gnas pa myed pa la gnas pa' ni sung bstand pa'o// sem das can thams cad mtshungs par bdag myed pa la mos pa da ni lung bstand pa'o// chos thams cad mtshungs par chos
166a5(mdo): dben par mngon pa ni lung bstand pa'o// zhi ba 'ams da ning du mtshungs par nam ma'a' bzhin du dag cing myed pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni lung bstand pa'o// chos thams
166a6(mdo): cad sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / dbyer myed pa'i ye shes mthong ba ni lung bstand pa'o// bdud thams cad dang mtshungs par bcud kyi nyon mongs pa can du myi 'gyur te/ rang
166a7(mdo): bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni lung bstand pa'o// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa la myi rtog rnam par myi rtog la myi yind myi 'dor ba 'di ni lung bstan pa'o// klu'i bdag
166a8(mdo): po de ltar na sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa myi gnas pa lung bstand pa ji lta ba bzhin tu chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ dmyigs su myed do// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ji lta ba
166b1(mdo): bzhin du khrong du chud pa ni byang chub yin te/ de la na don dam par na gang gis lung bstand pa 'am/ gang gi byang chub bam/ kang lung bstand par bya ba 'am/ gang gis sung bstan pa 'am
166b2(mdo): cis su bstan pa chi yang gyi dmyigs so// klu'i bdag po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa ste/ mas nas yongs su chad pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni bdag po myed pa
166b3(mdo): ste/ chu dang rkyen rnams las byung ba'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni gzung du myed pa ste/ ngo bo nyid byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni po po nyid myed pa ste/ bral ba byed
166b4(mdo): pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni ma 'ongs pa ste/ sngon gyi mtha' nas ma 'ongs pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni byed par gyur da pa ste/ phyi ma'i mthar myi
166b5(mdo): 'byung ba'i phyir ro// chos thabs cad ni myi gnas pa ste ga/ nas myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni sbyidamyigs pa ste byed pa po myed pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad
166b6(mdo): ni byed pa myed pa ste// sus myed pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni lus myed pa ste/ ka nas myed pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni gnas myed pa ste/ rten myed pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad na
166b7(mdo): rten myed pa ste/ myi gsol ba'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni myi g.yol ba ste/ myi gnas pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni myi gnas pa ste/ bems po yin pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad na
166b8(mdo): bems po yin te/ ngo bo nyid byed pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid myed pa ste/ rnam par rig par myi byed pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni rnam par rig par myi byed pa ste// spro btas
167a1(mdo): babyed pa'i phyir ro// chom mapa da rlo tan pa byed/ la byed pa byed pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad na yid la byed pa byed dmyig
167a2(mdo): byed pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni dmyigs su byed pa ste// 'gyur ba byed pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni 'gyur ba byed pa ste/ rtog pa myed cing dpyod pa myed pa'i phyir ro// chos
167a3(mdo): thams cad ni rtog pa myed cing dpyod pa myed pa'i ste/ zhi ba'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni zhi zhing rab tu zhi la nye bar zhi ba ste/ rgyu las byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni
167a4(mdo): rgya las byung ba ma yin pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis rnam paradakrol ba'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba ste/ rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid yin
167a5(mdo): ba'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni rnam par grol ba lin nyid de/ gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni gnyis dang bral ba ste/ bgrod pa gcig pa'i phyir ro// 
167a6(mdo): chos zas cad ni bgrod pa gcig pa ste/ so so tha dad pa' dang bral ba'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni so so ba dad pa dang bral ba ste/ bye brag byed pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni bye brag byed pa ste
167a7(mdo): mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir ro// klu'i bdag po de ltar na chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de la ni lung bstand par bya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ci yang
167a8(mdo): byed do// bra'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mi chen po dang / byang chub sems dpal nams rgya mos pa'i stobs sa sos// ga chos 'dis su dag mi dang 'das rnam par phyinas
167b1(mdo): sems can de dag la go bar byed la/ sems can la ma gtogs pa'i chos rnams kyang ma mthong chos ma gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyang ma mthong ngo // sems can rnams ji lta
167b2(mdo): bzhin du chos rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o// byang chub kyang de dang 'dra'o// sangs rgyas kyang de dang 'dra'o// lung bstan pa yang de dang 'dra'o// chos thams cad kyi dbyings kyang de dang 'dra ste/ des na
167b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin nyid rtogs pa'i don dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas pa'i don gyis na de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid ma bsgribs pa'i don dang / de bzhin nyid dbyed myed/ 
167b4(mdo): pa'i don dang / de bzhin nyid kho du chud pa'i don des na de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// ji ltar de bzhon ka she dgas pa dang / de bzhin nyid mtshungs par rab tu phye ba de bzhin
167b5(mdo): nyid du chos thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid dang mtshungs par rab tu phye ba yin te// klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam pa'i nyid kyis yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
167b6(mdo): de la gnas na/ gyi skrag myi dngas dngang bar myi 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'is mnyam pa nyid 'di yang / sems can rnams la ko bar byed do// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems
167b7(mdo): dpa' sum stong nyis brgyas/ myi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par gyu dad to// ku'i rgyal po ma dros la yang tshim zhing mgul la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing mgul ba dang yid bdel ba skyes
167b8(mdo): nas 'dzam bu kring ri ba'i mu tig gi phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gsol to// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bu mo/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po zag pa 'das rim kyi tsha mo rin chen sna tshogs can zhes
168a1(mdo): byal des// kwa'i bumo zhi dang ldan cig tu man rnams ma cu nyin gi tham 'ablangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byig gyi 'dzums pangs so/ phyag 'tshal zhing 'jug par gyu to// 
168a2(mdo): de nas u mo rin chen sna tshogs can dang / klu'i bu mo khwa bo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mu tika ki phre la de dag gis gsol nas// tshig 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
168a3(mdo): tsaka rnams lhan cig tu mthun zhing / yang dag par dka' bzhin du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
168a4(mdo): dgral bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyurd cig/ da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin tu 'di 'dra bar chos kyang stond par gyur da cig// dgel 'dun yang srung bar
168a5(mdo): rgya rad cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos klu'i bu mo// de la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo bla na myed pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bu dan bud myed kyi lus kyi
168a6(mdo): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus te// 'grub par dka 'o// de nas bu mo ran chen sna tshogs can gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa 'od srung chen
168a7(mdo): po bud med kyi sus kyis kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'char bar myi 'gyur la/ skrag pa'i bsam la la zhugs pa la yang byang chub 'grub par dka' ba ma mchis
168a8(mdo): so// byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub ni/ sems bskyed pa la rag las te/ byang chub tu sems bskyed ma bag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gzung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pas kar 'di skad du/ 
168b1(mdo): bud myed kyi lus kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so// zhes gsungs pa de ni skyes pa'i lus kyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de
168b2(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa 'di skad du myig ni skyes g.ya ma yin/ bud myed kyang ma yin no// de bzhin tu rna ba dang / sA dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bud myed kyang ma yin la skyes pa yang ma yin no zhes
168b3(mdo): gsungs pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa 'od srung chen po de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byig ni stong pa ste/ stong pa gang lags pa de sa ni/ bud myed kyang ma mchis/ skyes pa yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// btsun
168b4(mdo): pa 'od srung chen po de bzhin du/ rna ba dang / sA dang / lce dang / lu/ sa dang / yid ni stong pa ste/ stong pa gang lags pa de la/ ni bud med kyang ma mchis skyes pa yang ma mchis pa'i
168b5(mdo): srad rtsa'o// btsun pa de la byig gi khong du chud pa gang lags pa de ni byang chub lags so// rna ba dang / sA dang / sde dang / sus dang / ya khong cu chud pa ga lags pa de ni byang chub la ga so/ 
168b6(mdo): byang chub gang lags pa de la ni bud myed kyi chos rnams sam/ skyes pa'i chos rnams ma mchis so// btsun pa 'od srung chen po de lta bas na byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags pa de ni/ bdag gi
168b7(mdo): po bo nyid kyang de lags so// smras pa bu mo ci khyod byang chub yin nam// smras pa gnas brtan dang bdag cag gnyis yang byang chub lags so// smras pa bu mo kho bon byang chub ma yin gyi
168b8(mdo): kho bo na nyan thos yin no// smras pa btsun pa 'od srung chen po khyod sus btul// smras pa bu mo kho bo na de bzhin gshegs pas btul lo// smras pa gnas brtan gal te de bzhin gshegs pa
169a1(mdo): btul na/ galan te de bzhin gshegs bya mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas su zin na/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnas brtan 'dul bar spyod dam// bu mo de ni ma yin no// 
169a2(mdo): smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de lta bas na/ khyod nyid byang chub lags te/ byang chub ma lags pa'i chos ci yang ma mchis so// smras pa bu mo ci mtshams myed pa rnams kyang byang chub yin
169a3(mdo): nam smras pa/ btsun pa de de bzhin te/ mtshams myed pa rnams kyang byang chub lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni mtshams myed pa'i rang bzhin can lags te/ mtshams myed pa'i
169a4(mdo): chos kyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de ni byang chub la gas la/ stong pa nyid kyi chos kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de ni// byang chub sags pa'i slad du'o// btsun pa de ltar na mtsham/ 
169a5(mdo): myed 'a khong du chud pa sas byang chub 'byung ngo // btsun pa/ byang chub ma lags pa gang lags pa de ni ma mchis te/ gsad te chos 'ag zhig dang myi ldan pa ni ma lags kyi/ chos
169a6(mdo): thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa de ni byang chub lags so// smras pa/ bu mo khyod spobs pa 'di sus byin smras pa gnas brtan gyis sA lad to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ka yad te gnas
169a7(mdo): brtan gyis ma smral na/ bdag gi spobs pa 'di skye bar myi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// btsun pa dper na galar te ma smas na brag ca'i sgra 'byung bar myi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub
169a8(mdo): sems dpa' rnams ni ma dris kyi bar tu spobs pa skye bar myi 'gyur ro// smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed la bsnyen bkur byas/ smras pa/ gnas brtan gyis nyon mongs pa ji snyed
169b1(mdo): spangs pa snyed la'o// smras pa/ bu mo kho bo 'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni spangs pa myed do// smras pa/ btsun pa nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa lags sam// smras pa/ kho bo nyon mongs pa dang bcas// 
169b2(mdo): pa yang ma yin/ nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa yang ma yin no// smras pa/ mi btsun pa khyod kyis nyon mongs pa rnams bzhag gam/ smras pa/ skyed pa yang myed/ 'gag par byas pa yang myed// 
169b3(mdo): bzhag pa yang myed de/ de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin tu shes so// smras pa/ ci de bzhin nyid shes par brgya'i ba zhig lags sam// smras pa/ de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ 'on ci'i slad du/ 
169b4(mdo): de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du nyon mongs pa shes so zhe// sa gsung / g.yar te mkhyen na ni de bzhin nyid ma lagasaso// ji ste myi mkhyen na ni de ltar na btsun pa byis pa so so'i
169b5(mdo): skye bo thams cad dang / myi shes pa can du mtshungs so// smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyi tshig thams cad ni gzhan gyi gcod par byed pa'o// smras pa/ bdag ni su'i tshig kyang gcod par
169b6(mdo): yang myi bgyid/ sgrub par yang myi bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings ni gcad du ma mchis pa lags la/ tshig thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba'i slad du'o// 
169b7(mdo): smras pa/ gang khyod kyis bdag byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang bsnyams te/ bzhag pa de khyod 'gyod par myi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po ga lad te bdag gis karma
169b8(mdo): brtan yang tha dad la byis pa so'i so'i skye bo thams cad kyang tha dad par gzhag na ni de ltar na pa dag 'gyod par 'gyur pa zhig na/ gang gi slad du bdag gis gnas brtan byis pa so so'i skye
170a1(mdo): po thams cad dngam kyi dang bang gnag pa des na/ dag na pyod par myi 'gyur ro// btsun pa mtshungs shes bkyil ba den chos thams cad dang ba dang lam mchim pa dang/ 
170a2(mdo): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid kyi tshig tha dgas so// smras pa/ bu mo ci khyod so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs sam/ 'on te 'phags pa rnams dang mtshungs// smras pa/ btsun la bdag
170a3(mdo): ni so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs pa yam ma lags/ 'phags pa rnams dang mtshungs pa yang ma lags// ci'i slad cu zhe na/ gal te bdag so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs
170a4(mdo): ni/ bdag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don ma ma chis par 'gyur ro// ji ste 'phags pa rnams dang / mtshungs na ni nyan thos rnams dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/ 
170a5(mdo): de lta na ni bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ bu mo gal te khyod so so'i skye bo rnams dang yang myi mtshungs// 'phags pa rnams
170a6(mdo): dang yang myi mtshungs na/ ci khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mtshungs sam/ smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag ni da bzod sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mtshungs pa lags so// 
170a7(mdo): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag ni thog ma nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mtshungs so// smras pa/ bu mo gal te khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mtshungs na/ ci sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag
170a8(mdo): khyod la yod dam// smras pa/ gnas brtan ci sangs rgyas kyi chos su gdags pa 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am ke/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ yul na gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas pa 'am/ 
170b1(mdo): sngon po'am ser po'am dmar po 'am kar po 'am/ btsod ka'am/ shel gyi kha dog kam/ dngul gyi lta bu lags sam// smras pa// bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gdakas pa ni kha dog
170b2(mdo): kam dbyibs kyi sngo nas bstand par gyi nus so// smras pa/ btsun pa gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gdags su ma mchis pa dang / kadags su myi rung la lags na// ci'i slad du bdag
170b3(mdo): la tshol ba mdzadasmras pa/ bu mo 'o na sangs rgyas kyi chos kang las btsal bar bya// smras pa/ lta ba'i rnam pa drug bcu la a gnyis las btsal bar bgyi'o// smras pa/ lta ba'i rnam
170b4(mdo): gadrug bcu la Na gnyis kyang kang nas btsal bar bya/ sma das pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i las pa la bar bgyi'o// smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
170b5(mdo): grol yang gapa las btsal bar bya/ smras pa/ mtshams byed pa lnga las btsal bar bgyi'o// smras pa/ mtsham/ sa myed pa snga yang kar nas btsal bar bya/ smras pa/ gnas
170b6(mdo): brtan 'od srung chen po'i rnam par grol pa'i ye shes mthong ba las btsal bar bgyi'o// smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyi gtam 'di 'dra ba de ji lta ba zhig/ smras pa/ btsun pa gtam 'di ni ma bcings ma
170b7(mdo): grol ba'i gtam lags so// blang du ma mchis shing dor du ma mchis te/ rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i gtam lags so// chos thams cad tha dad pa ma mchis pa'i gtam lags so// smras pa
170b8(mdo): bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub dang mthun pa ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de ni med de/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub dang mthun pa ma lags so/ 
171a1(mdo): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni brjod du ma mchis pa ku sta mamasas su lags pa'i sa btsun pa 'od srung chen pos bshad pa'i dngos po gang lag
171a2(mdo): pade dag thams cad ni sgras rnam pad dbye' pa lags la byang chub gang lags pa de ni don dam par smras brda' sprad par mya nus lags so// btsun pa byang chub ces bgyi yadi ni nye bar zhi ba'i
171a3(mdo): gzhil lags so// 'don yi ge pa mchis pa'i gzhi la lags so// 'don lta ba bzhin gyi gzhil lags so// 'di ni gzhi lam mchis pa'i gzhil lags so// smras pa/ bu mo gas te
171a4(mdo): byang chub kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu yin na de ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po lus dang sems kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
171a5(mdo): myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni lus dang se/ mas kyi ngo bo nyid kho na lags te// ngo bo nyid kyis po dro/ nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur ro// 
171a6(mdo): smras pa/ bu mo ci khyod byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ bdag nyid byang chub lags te/ byang chub kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
171a7(mdo): myi 'gyur ba lags so// smras pa/ bu mo gal te khyod nyid byang chub yin na/ ci chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ram/ smras pa/ bdag ni chos kyi 'khor lo bsngor lags so// spras pa/ khyod kyis
171a8(mdo): chom kyi 'khor lo 'grod pa de dzas bu zhig/ smras pa/ 'khor lo don nyin thams cad dang bral ba'i slad du myi g.yol 'a lags so// 'khor lo deni chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i tshul gyis
171b1(mdo): gnas pa ma mchis pa lags so// 'khor 'o de ni bral pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid lags so// 'khor lo de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas myi gnas pa lags so// 
171b2(mdo): 'khor lo da na gnas thams cad las byung ba ma lags pas gnas pa ma mchis pa lags so// 'khor lo de ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song bas gnyis su ma mchis pa
171b3(mdo): lags so// 'khor lo de ni gcig dang tha dad par myi dmyigs pas tha dad pa ma lags so// 'khor lo de ni sgra dang skad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad ro gcig pas brjod du ma mchis pa la gso
171b4(mdo): 'khor lo de ni shi nad tu kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma lagasapas rnam par dag pa lags so// 'khor lo de ni chad pa/ dang rtag pa myi dmyigs pas yod pa yongs su chad pa lag
171b5(mdo): so/ 'khor lo de ni rgya dang rkyen du brtags pas 'gal ba ma mchis pa lags so// 'khor lo de ni bden pa lagasaso// 'khor lo de ni myi skye myi 'gag pa lags so// 
171b6(mdo): 'khor lo de ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa byed pa lags so// btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'khor lo de 'dra ba gang lags pa de'i bskor ba ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ smras pa/ 
171b7(mdo): bu mo khyod kyi bstand pa 'di 'dra ba las na khyod ni ring po myi thogs par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// smras pa/ gang gi tshe gnas
171b8(mdo): brtan byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe bdag kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags so// smras pa/ kho bo byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
172a1(mdo): bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas myed skabs myed do// smras pa de de lta lags te/ byang chub ni gnas ma mchis pa la gnas pa ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi
172a2(mdo): nus lags so// bu mo des bstand pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bu mo de la legs so zhes
172a3(mdo): bya ba byin te/ bu mo legs so legs so// khyod kyi chos bstand pa 'di legs par smras so// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas swa dang chu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri la kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ 
172a4(mdo): bu mo 'di yun ji snyed cig na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa thugs
172a5(mdo): su chud nas/ dge' slong dag la bka' stsal da pa/ dge' slong dag bu mo rin chen sna tshogs can 'di ni bska ya ba kra ngas myed la sum brgyal na bskal pa rnam par spyo pa
172a6(mdo): zhes bya ba sa/ 'jig rten gyi khams snang 'a can du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu rnam par gzigs shes bya bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten
172a7(mdo): gyi khams sdang ba can de yang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'od kyis rtag tu snang bar 'gyur ro// zhab 'bri ba byang nga chub sems dpa' ni bye ba phrag dku' bcu'i \u0f7f gnyis su 'gyur ro// de'i tshe
172a8(mdo): meched ni par gyi bas yad pa bstsal bar 'gyur ro// de nas klu'i bu mo khri yod dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das sa 'di skad ces 'asol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis de bzhin gshegs
172b1(mdo): phacan can pa pang gzigs des byang chub bces pa de'i bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams de skye bar gyur da cig ches gso lang nam/ de nas kyang macom ldan 'das kyis 'dzig
172b2(mdo): rten gyi khams der skye bar lung bstand to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'a de skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sum bcu la cha gsum pa'i
172b3(mdo): lha 'di dag ni lha ma yin gyis 'jigs pas rtag tu skrag bzhin du gnas la lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'byed pa na yang / phan tshun 'byed cing thod par bgyid de/ de bas na bcom
172b4(mdo): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas mi nas sems can thams cad sems mthun par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos bstan na legs so legs so// 'khor 'dir lha pa yin 'dus pa 'di
172b5(mdo): dag thams cad kyang ci nas gcig pa gcig mthun par bgyid pa dang / byams par sems pa dang / phan par sems pa dang / gnod par sems par myi 'gyur ba de lta bur/ sems
172b6(mdo): dad par bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po bdel mchog dang / thag bzang ris dang / lag
172b7(mdo): bzangs dang / sem byed rnamal bka' mtsha khad pa/ grogs po dag byams pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags so// byams pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i skyes bu gang zag kis ni
172b8(mdo): 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don thob par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag tshe ni yun zung ngo // tshe phyi mar ni 'gro dgos so// 'byor da pa thams cad kyi mtha' ni rgud pa'o// ma kho'i longs spyod dang / dbang phyug rnams
173a1(mdo): ni myi rtag gis/ khyed snyan cig mthun pas/ gnod moms myed pa dang // 'jig rten pha rol dal sa pa dang / las kyi rnam par sbyin pa la rton pas gnas par gyis shig/ bcom ldan
173a2(mdo): 'das kyis de ltaraci nas sum bcul Thagasum pa'i lha rnams dang / lha ma yin de dag mthun par gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i skyo ba'i gtam mdzad do// de nas de dag gis tshig 'di skad
173a3(mdo): ces gsol da to// bcom ldanas / deng slan chad gnyen pa'i tshul du bgyid cing / gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems dang / gnod pa'i sems ma mchis pas gnas par 'tshul lo// bcom
173a4(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag legs so/ dalegs so// byams pa'i rnam pa'i sems gang yin pal de ni/ de bzhin gshegs ya rnams kyi mchod pa'i mchog
173a5(mdo): yin no// rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos pon bas pas ni/ 'di sa ste/ byams pa'i sems kyi te bange 'dzin de mchog yin te/ ras de las dgongs nas de
173a6(mdo): skad bstand to// grogs po dag gzhan yang bzhi po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa khyad par du 'phags pa yin te/ bzhi la gang zhe na/ bslab pa las 'gal bar myi byed pa dang
173a7(mdo): byams pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi chad par bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa'i chos kyi nan tan te/ bzhi' bo de
173a8(mdo): dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa' la mchod pa khyad par tu 'phags pa'o// bstan pa 'di zos nas snga'i 'khor dang lha ma yin kyi 'khor de dag gi nang nas/ bzhil khris byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 
173b1(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das pa/ klu'i rgyal po dbugs can dang / klu'i rgyal po dbugs can chen po dang / 'jog po dang / kha dog mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgya ma
173b2(mdo): chen po 'di'i nang na kru'i rigs tshad ma mchis pa las kyi rnam par smind pa snga tshogs las skyes pa dag mchis te/ de la kha cig ni dbang che bar grags pa lags// kha cig ni lus nyams chung zhi pa
173b3(mdo): chung bar grags la/ lus chung ba dag kyang mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bya'i rgyal po nam mkhal lding bzhi' der babs nas/ klu gzhon nu dang klu'i bu mo lus nyams pa rnams btod te/ 'tshal bar
173b4(mdo): bgyid la/ rgya mtsho'i nang gi klu'i rigs thams cad kyang skrag pa bgyid lags na// ci nas rgya mtshon chen po'i klu de dgadams cad kyang 'jigs pa ma mchis pa dang / skag lam
173b5(mdo): par gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis brla/ ra ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sra ba mdzad du gsol// deH/ da ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ras drag
173b6(mdo): yang zag yams pa banas/ chu'i rgyal po rgya mtshoms bzhal bu ma pa/ kye rgu'i bdag po ras phrag gas 'di yong la/ sku la rigs thams cad dang / rtswa'i gnas thams cad dum bu tshum bur gshes
173b7(mdo): te byin tshig dang ji srid du ras 'di phrag thar las pa na/ nyag ma gcig tsam gnas pa de srid du yang / rgya mtsho'i chen por nam mkha' lding thams cad rgya bar myi 'gyur ngo ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ klu'i bdag po/ 
174a1(mdo): ltar thob par 'gyur snyam ste zhus par gyur da to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyend nas/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'
174a2(mdo): bka' stsal la/ klu'i bdag yogs te/ stong gsus kyi stob chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis ras phrag par 'di las dum yu dum bur khyem du yin kyang / 
174a3(mdo): ras phrag gzang 'di yongs su zad par myi 'gyur te/ de dag gis gos ji tsam gyi tshad tu 'gyur ba 'dod na yang de las de dag gi gos de tsam du 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis
174a4(mdo): brlabs ni de ltar bsam gyis myi khyab bo// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos ras phrag gzar te blangs te dum bu 'bum phrag du mar byas nas/ klu thams cad dang klu'i gzhon nu thams cad la byin no// der
174a5(mdo): su ji tsam tu 'dod pa de tsam gyi gos su mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te// yangs shing rgya che bar 'gyur la ras phrag zar de yang yongs su zad par myi 'gyur ro// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos klu'i
