201b8(mdo): 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te myi rnams kyi nang tu skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste chog myi shes pa ste/ 'dod pa chen por 'gyur ba'o// gnod sems
202a1(mdo): kyis ni dmyal bar zhid do// hud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// ka shin rje'i 'jig rten ma khrid do// de nas gal te phyi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis man
202a2(mdo): cabar sgrub ste/ kyi phan pa 'dod pa dang / gzhan gyis gnod par bya bar 'gyur ngo // son pa stabs ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten
202a3(mdo): du khrid do// de nas gal te myi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/ lta ba ngan par ltung ba dang / g.yo'i sgyu can tu 'gyur ba'o// klu'i bdag po de ltar na
202a4(mdo): myi dge' ba bcu' po 'di dag gis sdug bsngal gyi phung po rtend dmya pa tshad myed pa yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro// daklu'i bdag po de la srog gcod pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems
202a5(mdo): dpas sbyin pa byin da/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs rgyad myi 'phrogs pa dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// byang chubasems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / sangs rgyas kyi
202a6(mdo): chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pas/ bla na myed pa'i chos rnyed par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byid ma/ yongs
202a7(mdo): spyod che bar 'gyur// longs spyod kyi 'phrogs pa dang / chung sa myi g.yes par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na yang / ma dang bu dang / chung ma la yang su yang sdang ba'i sems kyis
202a8(mdo): bar myi 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po 'ardzun du smra ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod kyi 'phrogs pa dang / su 'debs pa byed par 'gyur ba'i na
202b1(mdo): tan kazung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang ji smras pa de bzhin byed de/ yid dam pa brtan par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po tha ma'i tshig spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas
202b2(mdo): sbyin pa byed na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur ro// longs spyod kyi 'phrogs pa dang / g.yog 'khor gyi byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang bsam pa mthun pas byang chub
202b3(mdo): sems da'a'a'i g.yog 'khor 'thob bo// klu'i bdag po tshig phub mo spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'as sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod myi 'phrogs pa dang / bzung ba'i tshig
202b4(mdo): tu 'gyur/ btsun pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / 'khor ma maku' bar su yang myi kro'o// klu'i bdag po tshig byas pa spangs pa'i byang chub
202b5(mdo): sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs/ spyod myi 'phrogs pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa'i chog tu 'gyu // yid ches pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
202b6(mdo): dba'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa la yang mdzes par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po brnab sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpyas sbyin pa byin na/ yongs spyod che bar 'gyur/ 
202b7(mdo): longs spyod myi 'phrogs pa dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa rgya chen po la de'i sems 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rgya chen po la yang mos shing dbang che bar
202b8(mdo): grags par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po gnod sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byed na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod la zar mya 'phrogs pa dang / mdzes pa dang / skye bo ma po
203a1(mdo): danaman pa 'idi ma 'ong bar 'gying / mam pa de byadadasanas sa byed 'dzin dang / sa 'byed pa sems dang / dab mam tshabs byed pa 'a 'gyug
203a2(mdo): sku'i 'dan na padapa pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpapa spyon 'byer da/ sa spyod mas pa 'gyu/ sangs spyod kyi 'gogs pa dang / sangs rgyas la dang ci ya dag pa lta pa khyim su skyer/ 
203a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na yang / sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge' 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang myi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag
203a4(mdo): po de ltar dgel ba bcu'i las kyi sam 'di dag sbyin pas brgyad na/ 'byor da pa chen por 'gyur ro// dgel ba bcu'i las kyis sa 'di dag nyid tshul khrims kyis brgyan na/ sangs rgyas
203a5(mdo): rgya chom thams cad kyi don du smon pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuro// dge' dra bcu'i las kyilam 'di dag nyid 'a'od pas brgyan na/ mtshan dang dpe' byad 'bang po dang / sangs
203a6(mdo): rgyas kyi dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par 'byung // de bzhin su phram to// 'acod 'grus kyis brgyan na/ bcad phyis rnam pa bcom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bas
203a7(mdo): gtan gyis brgyan na// dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / dka' ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyis brgyan na/ lta ba ngan pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms
203a8(mdo): par 'gyur ro// byams pas brgyan na/ sems can thams cad la 'ong khro ba myed pa'i sems su 'gyur ro// sto pa rjes brgyan na/ sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtong bar 'gyur ro// dka'
203b1(mdo): bas brgyan na/ zhum pa myed pa'i sems su 'gyur ro// btang snyoms kyis brgyan na/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spangs par 'gyur ro// bskul ba'i dngos thos brgyan na/ sems can thams
203b2(mdo): nga yongs su sbyin par byed par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pas brgyan na/ lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang chos la mkhas par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong bas brgyan na/ myi dge' ba'i
203b3(mdo): chos thams cad spobs dang/ dgel ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas brgyad na/ lus dang / sems yang 'ar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas brgyan na/ dad pa
203b4(mdo): pa brtan pa dang / bcon 'grus kyis 'bar ba dang / rmongs pa skyedad pa dang / sems yas su rung la la mkhas pa dang / nyon no/ ngas pa thams cad spong ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// stobs
203b5(mdo): kyis brgyan da/ rdzib myed cing dbul ba dang / nyes pa thams cad 'jom par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan laka kis brgyan na/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par
203b6(mdo): 'gyur ro// lam gyis brgyan na/ yang dag pa'i ye shes 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhi gnas kyis brgyad na/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro// lhag mthong kis brgyan na/ chos thams
203b7(mdo): cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin nu khong chu chud pa'i shes rab dang ye shes su 'gyur ro// babs kyis brgyad na/ 'dus byas dang 'dus pa byas kyi bde' ba thob par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po mdor
203b8(mdo): na dge la'i bcu'i la mang rtsa 'di dag gis bcul yongs su rdzonas par 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa bzhi la 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas rgya chos ma 'dres pa bcol brgyad 'bo'i pa nas/ sangs rgyas
204a1(mdo): chos thams cad kyi bar dag 'thob pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po de bas na dgel ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag rgya cher rnam par dbye'abs brgyan pa'i phyir brtson par/ 
204a2(mdo): gyis shika/ klu'i bdag po 'di lta ste dper na/ sa la gnas pa'i grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad dang / hA dang / shing gel ba dang
204a3(mdo): sman dang nags tshal thams cad dang / las kyi mtha' thams cad dang / sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad dang / 'byung ba'i tshogs thams cad dang / yo thog thams cad bskyed pa dang / rmo brgol bya ba'i 'byung
204a4(mdo): ba de dag ka gnas ni sa yin no// klu'i bdag po de bzhin tu dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang lha dang myir skye ba'i rten to// slob pa dang myi slob pa'i 'bras bu rnyed pa dang / nyan
204a5(mdo): zos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rten yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar gyi rten yin no// 
204a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa yad nas/ klu ni bdag po rgya mtsho la dang / dge la slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / 
204a7(mdo): mya dang / lham yin dang / dri 'ang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba
204a8(mdo): theg pa chen pa'i mdo'o// / rdzogs s+ho// @/ rgya kar skad du/ ma r+ya man 'dzu nI ri la ri br-id can pa ma ha yan su tra/ bod skad tu/ 'phags
204b1(mdo): 'jam dpal gyis gus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdol// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
204b2(mdo): mnyan yod na/ kun nas mdzes pa'i khang bzangs na/ dge' slong nyis pa rgyal lnga bcu'i dge' 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang / gtul bya 'bum phrag
204b3(mdo): rtsam dag dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rin po chen tha che'i seng ge'i khrel du myi g.yol bar bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jas dpas
204b4(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las sangs te/ bla kos phragapra kacig tu gzar nas/ pus po g.yas pa'i skangs tsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su thal mo
204b5(mdo): sbyar ba btud nasabacom ldan 'das la 'di skad cesagaso lad to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po ga ragis gtul ba bye ba khrag khri ka 'bum phrag tu ma'i bsam pa
204b6(mdo): yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mung 'gram tu 'gyur ba'i bsod nams chen po'i ni ji lta bu/ tshad ni ji lta tsam zhig lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
204b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// 'jam dpal bsod nams chen po gang gis/ gdul bya bye ba khra ko khrika phrag
204b8(mdo): 'bum gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mur 'gram du 'gyur ba'i bsod nams chen po de ni/ shes rab yas byung ba/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa/ 
205a1(mdo): thabs la mkhas pa chen po smon lam kyis bskyed pa/ tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin shinan tu rnam par dag pa/ bsgoms pa'i khyad par gyis yang dag par 'grub pa ste
205a2(mdo): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis myi khyab pa yin no// 'jam dpal 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad dge' ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / 
205a3(mdo): ldan par gyur da la sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid brgyar bsgyur bas gling bzhi la la dbang ba rin po che snga bdun dang ldan
205a4(mdo): ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'kho po rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / to rin po che dang
205a5(mdo): nor bu rin po che dang / bud myed rin po che dang / khyim pad ka rin po che dang / blon po rin po che dang 'di bdun no// de la bu dpa' brtul phod pa yan lag mchog ki gzugs dang / 
205a6(mdo): ldan pa pha rol kyi lder la tu mdzes par byed pa 'a/ yod de/ 'jam dpal nges pa labam mos phyung ba'i rgyal po ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu latsham yin no// yangs dpas gang bzhim ma
205a7(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'khor zhes sbyar ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur dal sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams
205a8(mdo): phul po gang yin pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid stong du bcu dad pas/ same dbang po brgyar byin du 'gyur te/ de skar lha'i dbang po brgya' byin ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu'ache ba yin do// 'jam
205b1(mdo): dpal gling bzhil ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad brgya' byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur da la// sems can de dag thams cad
205b2(mdo): bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid 'bum phrag du mar bsgyur pas gang 'dod pa'i khams su bstand pas go bar byed pa 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug
205b3(mdo): bdud du gyurd te/ de ska pa 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug bcun ni/ rdzu 'phrul che zhi mthu' che ba ste dgel ba'i a' chung dus kyi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gang bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 
205b4(mdo): sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdud kyi bso/ da nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur da la/ sems can dedag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa/ bsod
205b5(mdo): nams kyi phung po de nyid 'bum phrag tu mar bsgyur da pa'am gang 'jig rten gyi khams stong byams pas khyab par byed pa/ stong gi bdag po tshangs par 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal
205b6(mdo): spong ka 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad stong gi bdag po tshangs pa la bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par kyar da la/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nam
205b7(mdo): kyi phung po gang yin pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid 'bum phrag ru mar bsgyur dpas/ kang stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten kyi khams byams pas khyab par byed pa/ stong gnyis kyi bdag 'tsha
205b8(mdo): par 'gyur ro// 'das dpal stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur dal/ 
206a1(mdo): sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung pog pa yin pa bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid 'bum phrag tu mar bsgyu dad pas/ gang stor gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
206a2(mdo): gyi khams byams pas khyab par byed pa/ tshangs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi bdag yod bang phyug chen po che bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gang gi tshe sreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung ba/ 
206a3(mdo): de'i tshe bar gyi bskal pa la nges par char 'bab cing / chu'i thigs pa rnams 'bab cing / chu'i thigs pa rnams 'bab ste/ de dag gis stong kasum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
206a4(mdo): chus kang bar byed de/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar chusagang bar 'gyur ba'i chu'i thigs pa de dag thams cad kyangadabang phyuka chen po che ba tshangs pa des mye shes pa myed de/ 
206a5(mdo): dbang phyug chen po che ba tshangs pa'i mabu la la ltos/ des ye shes chen po dang ldan ni rdzu 'phrul che la mthul che yin te/ dgel ba'i yang chung dral ni stong gsum rgya nga ches
206a6(mdo): po'i bdag po dbang phyug chen po tshangs par gyi 'gyur ro// 'jab dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad stong gsum kyi stor chen
206a7(mdo): 'i bdag pa tshangs pa chen po'i bsod rnams kyi phupa po dang ldan par gyur ngas/ sems cad de dag thams cad kyibasod nams kyi phu po dang ldan par byangs ya/ sems can do ngag thams
206a8(mdo): bsod nams kyi phu la gang yin pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid bye ba khrag zhig 'bum pag tu mad brgyang dupas/ nyan thos chen po rdzu 'phrum chen po dang ldan pa gcig su 'gyur ro// 'jas dang / 
206b1(mdo): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nyan thos chen ma 'a chen po'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyu rud la/ sems can de dag
206b2(mdo): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phu po gang yin pa/ bsod nabs kyi phung po de nyid bye ba 'bum phrag tu mar bsgyur pas/ rang sangs rgyas mthu' chen po thob pa gcig tu 'gyur to// 'jam dpal
206b3(mdo): bya bar 'jig rten gyi khams la re shig nog go// 'jas dpal sangs rgyas rgyan pag sapas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na/ sems can dza nyid yod pa de
206b4(mdo): dgathams cad rang sangs rgyas mthu' chen po thob pa'i bso da nams dang ldan par gyur nga la/ sems can de dag sa cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ga yin pa bsod nams
206b5(mdo): kyi bung de nyid bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar bslad nga/ pas// byang chub sems dpa' srid pa pa ma pa gcig tu 'a gyur ro// 'jas dpal nam mkha' khams kyi mthas gsus
206b6(mdo): pa phyo nas bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na/ sems can 'arlom pa las skyes pa dang / yangs nas skyes pa dang / drod gshe las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang / 
206b7(mdo): gzugs can ma yin pa dang / 'a shes can dang / 'du shes can ma yin pa dang / 'dra shes myed 'du shes myed kyid kyi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' srid pa
206b8(mdo): ma pa'i bsod nams kyi phur po dang ldan par gyur da la sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag tu mar bsgyur
207a1(mdo): pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la spu'i khung bu gcig tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la spu'i khung bu 'bum phrag dgu phran/ dku' bcu la ma kul re re swa
207a2(mdo): 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal sru'i khung du thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag tu mar bsgyuras pas/ 
207a3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgral dpel byed gcig tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnas dpa' byin pa'ang po brgyad 'argya me de nas 'grel bar 'gyur te/ yangs dpa
207a4(mdo): dpe' byang ba zang po brgyad bcur gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar bsgyur bas de bzhin
207a5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi 'jil pa ri mos mtshon pa gcig tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ri mos man pa brgyad bcu la re re nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag
207a6(mdo): dang zhabs kyi 'thil la 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di ste ste/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dpal be'u dang / phreng ba dang / sngags kyu dang / cod pan dang / dbyig to dang / bum pa dang / rmang
207a7(mdo): po che dang / rta dang / stag dang / chu srin ma ka ra dang / nya dang ru sAl dang / rma bya dang / ka la byir ka dang / gang shang de'u dang / tsa ga dang / dUr pa dang / ne tso dang / ngang pa dang / za ba dang / nas dang / 
207a8(mdo): sman chen po dang / 'dod zho dang / ba men dang / kru dang ra dang / khyu mchog dang / ri dang / shing bil ba dang / ri dgas nag po dang / nor bu rin po che dang / ral kyi mchog dang / rdo rje dang / bzhul dang / 
207b1(mdo): mda' dang / mthang thung dang / 'byung che gsum pa dang / gshol dang / dgral sta dang / katun shing dang / zhags pa dang / gru bo che dang / mu ti ke kaM 'bre la dang / sprin dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / 
207b2(mdo): yul 'khor srung dang / chu sta dang / 'phags skyes po dang / rkyeg myi bzang dang / nor sbyin dang / drang chen po dang / dpal dang / nyi ma dang / rna ba dang / me dang / rlung dang / pad ma dang / kayung drung 'a khyi khad pa
207b3(mdo): bkra shis dang / khri stan bzang po dang / me yong dang / rnga yab dang / ha tung ba dang / bu ro DA ka dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dza dang / tung dang / rdza dza dang / ka pur bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna ma ga tub 'khor
207b4(mdo): sor rngub dang / rna cha phyang phrul can dang / me tog bzang po dang / dpag bsam gang dang / 'khor lo'i dbus kyi seng ge ste/ ri mos mtshon pa brgya bcu'i po de dag de bzhin gshegs
207b5(mdo): phyag dang zhabs kyi 'khrims 'byung ngo // 'jam dpa ya ri mos/ mtshon pa brgyad bcur gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phur/ po gang yin pa bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid bye ba khra ka wi/ 
207b6(mdo): 'bum phrag tu mar bsgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcul 6 gnyis re re nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
207b7(mdo): sku la mngon par 'grub ste/ 'di lta ste dbu' gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang / dbu ska mthon ting g.yas su 'khyimed cing ldang lo can dang / phral ba'i dbyes mnyam pa dang / sbyin mtshams kyi mdzod spus
207b8(mdo): legs par brgyan pa dang / ba lta bu'i rdzi ma mthon zing phra ba dang ldan pa'i spyan dang / tshems bzhil bcu'i mnga' ba dang / tshems mnyam pa dang / tshems zags bzang ba dang / tshems dkar ba dang / 
208a1(mdo): 'gram la ser ge'i 'dra ba dang / sngags shin mya nga zhingaskal pa dang / ro stod se ge 'dra ba dang / shib rgya grod ltar rgya zhe gas pa dang / swa re re nas skye ba dang / swa'i rkye rgyagam pa 'ang/ 
208a2(mdo): mdoms kyi rna la sbubs su nub pa dang / brlal legs par rnam la dang / byin pa me dgas kyi rgyal po yini la la byin pa la bu dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs la dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'jam ning gnon
208a3(mdo): sha chags pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'breld pa dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo rang ba dang / zhabs long mo'i tshigs myi mngon pa dang / ro pra ba'i mchog dang ldan pa dang / dbu pa 'go shin tu zhum pa
208a4(mdo): dang / bdun mthol ba dang / thal kong rgyas pa dang / pags dpa sbal cing mdog kaser 'dra ba dang / ma btud par phyag pus/ mo'i lha slebs pa dang / zhabs shi nad tu gnas pa dang / d+ya
208a5(mdo): dang zhabs kyi 'phel 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / tshangs pa'i sgra skad de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu la pha gnyis 'o de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal skyes
208a6(mdo): bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu la cha gnyis su gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid grangs myed par bskyu da pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab par bsgyur ba dang / dpag tu
208a7(mdo): byed par bsgyur la dang / brjod du myed par bsgyung ba dang / brjod du myed pa'i yang 'arjod du myed pa'i bar du bsgyur da pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mu 'dra ba gdul bya'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs
208a8(mdo): par 'gyur te// des gtul bya'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa gsung skas go bar mdzad do// gsung sgras ji lta ba bzhin tu/ 'od kyis kyang de bzhin no// skus
208b1(mdo): kyang de bzhin no// 'jam dpal de ltar bsod nams chen po de ni shes rab chen po las byung ba/ brting rje chen pos yongs su bskos pa/ thabs la mkhas pa chen po dang / smon lab kyis bskyer
208b2(mdo): tshul khrims dang / ti nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa/ bsgoms pa'i khyad par gyis yang dag par gus pa ste/ nyan thos dparang sangs rgyas thams cad khyim bsas kyis myi khyam pa yin no// bsangan sras chen po
208b3(mdo): des de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi u pa 'gram gyis gdul bya'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'jam dpal rgyu gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par du 'phags/ pa yin no// 
208b4(mdo): rgyu gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo na lam gyi dbang dang / gdul bya'i sems can rnams kyi dgel ba yongs su smyin pa'i dbang gis te/ 'jam dpal rgya de gnyis kyis de bzhi
208b5(mdo): gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par tu 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par/ 'phags pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ gsung smra yang khyad par tu
208b6(mdo): 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra khyad par du 'phags pa ji lta ba de bzhin du mtshan yang khyad the ra du 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i
208b7(mdo): mtshan khyad par su 'phags pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos bstand pa yang khyad par tu 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstand pa khyad par du 'phags pa de bzhin du 'od kyang
208b8(mdo): bar du 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od khyad par du 'phags pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ spyod pa yang khyad par du 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
209a1(mdo): mtshan thams cad kyis rgyas pa yin te/ 'jam dpal kha dog dang dbyibs dang / spyod pa'i bye brag rkang dang gang gis sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang / spyod pa/ 
209a2(mdo): pa'i bye brag de dang de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pra sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo // 'jam dpal mtshan kyi bye brag gang dang gang gis sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan gyi bye brag de dang de lta bur
209a3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams ya gzugs kyi sku stond to// 'jam dpal chos bstan pa ka pa dang gang kis sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par 'gyur ba'i chos bstand pa de dang des
209a4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa chos stond par sems can rnamasakyis shes so// 'jam dpal spyod pa kang kaso sems na can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'jug pa
209a5(mdo): 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de dang de la de bzhin gshegs pa gnas par sems can rnams kyis shes so// 'jam da pal de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag
209a6(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na/ skye bo mang 'o la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po bdel ba dang / 'jig rten la snying pa chel ba dang / lha dang myi rnams kyi skye bo lal po che'i don dang / phan la
209a7(mdo): bdel ba'i phyir 'byung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jas dpal gzhon nu gyur dal stan las yangs te/ zla gos phrag pa gcig tu gcig tu kaTha nas/ pus po g.yas
209a8(mdo): pa'i lha pa ya btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su 'al mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gi ston pa myi mnyam pa mnyam 2/ ka
209b1(mdo): zla ma mchis pa/ khams gsum na 'gon po'i mchog/ sems can thams cad la phan par mdzad pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis myi bskyod pa nam mkha' ltar mi gos pa
209b2(mdo): bsam gyis myi khyam / bsam par 'os pa/ lha 'tshal ba ba la na sdug pa 'di 'dra ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed po lags so// 'del bar ka shegs pa
209b3(mdo): rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa la nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / 
209b4(mdo): dgel spor de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / sta dang myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri thar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsum
209b5(mdo): ba la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa 'ja ma dpal gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / rdzogs so// / rgya ka kyi mkhan
209b6(mdo): thang nya bams dang / shu chen rgya po tshal ban de le shes rjes 'gyur dacing zhus te gtan la / rgya gar skad du/ bya das
209b7(mdo): pa ri br-id chen ma mA hA yA na su dzA// bod skad su// 'phags pa rin chen dra ba can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
209b8(mdo): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pi dus ka tsig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul yangs pa can/ spre'u rdzing ka 'gram na/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na dge' slong gi dgel 'dun chen
210a1(mdo): po dang thabs tshig tu bzhugs te/ byams pa la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams dang / skye ba gnyis kyis thogs pa rnams dang / skye ba gsu
210a2(mdo): rgyas thogs pa rnams dang / skye ba bzhis thogs pa rnams dang / skye ba lngas thogs pa rnams dang / skye ba bcus thogs pa rnams dang / sum bcu la/ bzhi la bcul dang / skye ba stong ga bar rnams kyis
210a3(mdo): thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi la bcu la Na gnyis dang / dka' bcom pa bye 'a drag bcu dang / swa bye ba phraka dgul bcu 6dku' la/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs
210a4(mdo): na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi' dang / lha'i dbang po brgya'i byin dang / myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu shi nad tu dpal bzhang ldan dang / lha'i bu zlo
210a5(mdo): 'od dang / lha'i bu nyi ma'i 'od dang / lha'i bu grags pa'i/ tog dang / lha'i bu mngon par dga' ba dang / de dag dang gzhan yang lha bye ba phrag dku' bcu' pa dkul dang / klu'i rgyal po
210a6(mdo): ma gros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la dang / klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / gzil can dang / klu'i rgyal po dka' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bzung
210a7(mdo): chen po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / lham na gyi dbang po spa ka can dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thams cad kyi 'aShor dang yang thabs gcig go// de'i tshe grong khyer chen po
210a8(mdo): yangs pa can na/ sde dpon seng ge'i shu/ tshe gyi stobs mtha' yas zhes bya ba zhig gnas so// de'i tshe seng ge'i zhu stobs mtha' yas de'i gnon nu yi bya rin chen dra ba can zhes bya ba
210b1(mdo): sangs rgyas mang po 'bum pa bsnyen bkur byas pa/ chos kyi tshul sdang ba mtha' yas pa'i smon ma dang ldan pa yang dag par 'dzind pa na tshod lo brgyad lon pa 'dra ba zhig kanyid yog ste// 
210b2(mdo): de'i rmyi lam du myos pa/ lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dga' ldan gyi gnas nas babs nas/ tshogs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bsku lad te/ mngon par smras pa/ sems can snyeng
210b3(mdo): bo rgyas pa sangs rgyas kyis// stong gsum 'jig rten snang bar mdzad nas bzhugs// bsod nams brgyal bstsags gser gyi mdog 'drab// bdag nyid chen po gzugs kyis ma lus
210b4(mdo): mdzes// dkyil 'khor bye bar 'a tshang kar yin pa/ zla ba stong ngam yanabye ba yi// 'od zer gang gisal 'khor de snang byed// ji lta pa ka pa pa'i spang ga kyi la byen// 
210b5(mdo): de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor bye bar tshang bar ni// shang phyogs dkyil 'khor mchog ni sdang byed cing // de bzhin sgo khyo/ sa de bzhin nub phyogs dang // de bzhin byang phyogs dkyil la
210b6(mdo): mchog snang byed// 'jig rten makon po 'od mdzad spu'i khung // re re nas ni 'od zer gang dag 'byung // re re nas ni 'od byung de dag gis// rna ba'i dkyil 'khor 'khor thams cad mog rdzog mdzad// 
210b7(mdo): kun gzigs rnams kyi su khu re re nas// 'od zer 'byung zhing spu khung re re nas// 'od zer byung ba rnams kyis kang ka'i klung // drug bcu la a drug bya byed rab gsal mdzad// de nas kyim che'i gnon
210b8(mdo): mya rin chen dra ba can// de'i mtshan mo 'das nas// la stobs mapa' yas la smras pa// yas ma dang gsum lha'i bu dka' ldan// dga' ldan gnas nas zhabs nas// bdag sa tshogs su la cad
211a1(mdo): dbyangs kyis bstsal ba bgyis par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyil ba'i srad rtsa/ yab la bdag gsol pa bgyid do// de nas la tshe 'i gzhon nu rin chen
211a2(mdo): drag can gyis pa stobs mtha' yas la tshogs su bcad de smras pa// sems can kun gyi ded dpon rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'jig rten mkhas pa bsam yas bdag nyid che// skyob pa de la khyod kyis
211a3(mdo): mchod don mdzod// 'dren pa de ni 'jig rten 'byung bar dka'// ji ltar mu tu ba ra'i me tog skye ba ni// bdog ldan mdzes shing shi nad tu dri zhim la// dri dad ldang zhing rdul bcom nyon mongs myed// de la
211a4(mdo): 'i me tog mchog ni rnyed par dka'// de phyir yab la bdag gi des gsol 'debs pa// de ni dges pa'i thugs kyis pa/ dka la gnod// gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa// 
211a5(mdo): don dam gzigs pa la ni mchod pa bgyid// yi che ba stobabaza' yas sems dka' bas// mi cha'i seng ge zhes bya pa la smras pa// sde dpon rgyal ba ni mchod badzod de// bdag gi/ 
211a6(mdo): gzhon nu bstan la gnas par mdzod// 'dren pa shag kya seng ge mchod pa dang // zhon nu mchog gi spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir// khyim pa bye ba drug bcu' ba con par gyur // brkya byin sa myig stong dang ldan pa
211a7(mdo): tshangs pa dang ni dbang phyug dbang sgyur lha// bdud kyi bu po ded dpon pa'ang po dang // bye ba sa ya'i lha dang lhan cig tu// yangs pa can gyi dga' bar thams cad zhugs// gser las byas/ de bzhin dngul
211a8(mdo): kyi zhe// bye ba phrag na stong chu tshang ba dka/ rin chen bdun gyis de dag mdzes byas pas// re re yang ni bye la stong tu tshang // khri'i g.yas dang g.yon du rin po che// rin chen sna bdun rgyal mtshan pa
211b1(mdo): po btsugs// khri re'i tshad ni dpag tshad rangs par yod// rgyal mtshan dag kyang dpag tshad dbye bar mtho'// rgyal mtshan rnams kyi g.yas dang g.yon tu ni// de drang dpag tshad pas mtho' stegs
211b2(mdo): bu dang // rang bzhin gcig ste nor bu rin po che// bye ba las byas dpag tshad mtho' bar 'phags// khro'i bar bar lha'i ba dan yang // dpag chad pas kyang rib ba sha stag sbyangs// ga dan lnga ldi
211b3(mdo): gser gyi dra ba dag/ dris bu g.yer ka dag gis mdzes par byas// khri rnams kyi ni 'og tu ka ba yang // bye ba phrag stong bye ba legs par sbyadad// gang gis 'di che khri mchog de dag ni// brtan par bya
211b4(mdo): pa sgo gtan bcug pa bzhin// khwa'o steng rtsaka ser las byapa dang // gser las byas dang dngul dang bye cu r+ya// de ba bzhin shel dang spug dang rdo snying dang // de bzhin rtsa ba dang ni / 
211b5(mdo): pa nas / byung ba byin pa'i mu tika gzugs dag byas// tsan dan shi nad tu dmar pos dmar bar bskus// re re dag na/ bye ba stong tu chang // khri rnams dang ni wi ya chu sa bu'i// ma
211b6(mdo): rten dag kyang byas nas de la ni// gsob gyi sras dang na gsems bu// dmus dang byes bya dang de bzhin shes// spug dang de bzhin rnam sung ba yi// mkha' rten mo yo byas nas de'i yan// rin cad ngos na
211b7(mdo): nad tu snyan pa btags// rnam 'dren sma na rnam par grags pa yi// mchod pa don tu bdun pa rab tu bzha ka/ yangs pa can gyi steng ko bar sdang la// kaser gyi skud pa las byas zla re bres/ 
211b8(mdo): gser gyi skun pa re re mchog tu bzang // rin chen rgyan 'phyang stong phrag bye ba sbyangs// mu tig rgyan 'dreng stong phrag bye ba yang // re re gser las byas pa'i skud pas brgyas// yangs pa'i grong khyer
212a1(mdo): gnas pa'o/ bya// kang dang nang du 'dong ba der nyams dka'// de tshe sa ni skyes bu brnyan srid g.yogs// krong khyer yangs pa kun tu ras yug bkram// dra ba can gyis
212a2(mdo): tsan dan dpar btags nas// ras rnams la ni legs par bskul ba byas// bye ba stong phrag bdun bcu'i sem snyan dka/ rnam pa stong rnams g.yas kyi phyogs nas 'khrol/ 
212a3(mdo): g.yon gyi phyogs su'ang bye ba bdun bcu stong // shAg kyi ser ge'i mchod pa'i don du 'tshon// de 'dra'i bkod chen byas nas yi tsha // gzhon nu dra pa can gyis de'i tshe// dag
212a4(mdo): ba'i sems kyis pa ma la smras pa// sangs rgya/ sa spyan drang slad du 'dan ma no// grong khyer mchog nas ma// sa pa de byung ste// rgyal bdag chen po gal gA song nas// 
212a5(mdo): yon tan phyam tsho'i zhabs ya mgo yongasas// phyag 'chas de ni gnon du phyogs cig 'jug/ de nas la rim chen drag can yangs kha'i gro khyer chen po la nas bya
212a6(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der song ste phyind nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs ka mgo' thos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs cig tu 'jug ko// phyogs cig tu 'dun
212a7(mdo): nas/ li tshe'i gzhon mu rin chen dra ba can de la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis/ snang dag par dga' bar mdzang/ yang dag par 'dzin rtsa 'jug
212a8(mdo): dag par g.yeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dka' bar mdzado// de nas na gyi gzhon nu rin chen dal can gyis pra gos phrag pa gcig tu ga' nas pus mo g.yas pa 'i ska ma
212b1(mdo): na pa te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de sogs su mal po sbyar la btud nas/ ma ldan 'das la 'di na tsam nam la / com ldan 'das ma dan/ 
212b2(mdo): rnamani dges 'dun dpa sasas gcig tu bdag gi deng gcugs tshad gsol pa mi gnang // bcom ldan 'das kyis mi zhon nu rin chen phral can la thugs 'tshal ba nye ba 'am
212b3(mdo): byi na mung bar gyi dad pas ka nang ngo // de nas ma cha'i gnon nu rin chen dra ba can bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mya gsung bar gyur pas kanang bar rig nas// bcom ldan 'das la yan
212b4(mdo): gsum bsko ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi pha nas song ngo // de nas la ba gzhon nu rin chen dra pa can 'i dbang po brgyal byin dang / skye mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang
212b5(mdo): lha'i bu dpal bzang ldan dang lhan cig tu yangs pa/ 'igrong khyer chen por zhugs so// spro ba dang dga' ba'i gang+gA gas rnams kyis/ zhal nas ro brgyal dang ldan pa'i rnam pa
212b6(mdo): sbyor du bcug go// sbyar nas mtshan mo 'das pa dang / bdan bshams shing yangs pa can legs par brgyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyind pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
212b7(mdo): kye zhabs la mgo' bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs cig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ le tsha bi gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
212b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das gdugs cho dbab ste/ de'i dus la bab par mkhyen de na gdugs tshod lags te/ dus la bag pa sngags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe smad dayogs dang
213a1(mdo): chom nas gso yang/ sum sa 'ad bsdam pa te/ don na ma na don la man dpag su byams dang sapas cig tu phre ga par sngangs kyi 'dun rgya ni tsam su mngon par 'phags te/ yangs pa/ 
213a2(mdo): kyi grong khyim chen pong gshegs so// bskyod ma lag tu de bzhin gshenas pa do'i yus sponganasul kyi sto chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu 'as/ rab tu 'phrul/ kum tu
213a3(mdo): tu 'gulang/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu sde ka/ 'u 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu / 
213a4(mdo): chem ste ltas bco' brgyad dang ldan pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// gzhan yang cho 'phrul bye ga sa ya brgya'i phrag stond cing yang sa pa can du gshegs so// de'i tshe lha bye ba sa ya brgyal praka
213a5(mdo): slo su ma lha'i me tog mud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta da 8/ pad ma dkar po rnams dang / lha'i rin po che las byas pa li me tog rnams dang / lha'i sa ka ru'i phye ma dang / rin zong ci'i bye
213a6(mdo): dang / lang labu rgya gser dang / na 'dzin pa me'i kye ma rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtong/ mngon 'am rab du gtor to// zhalamam can bye ba zhag khrig 'bum mngon pabarab tu
213a7(mdo): 'a che dag kya// pa na dang sa ga pa ma zag te/ na da ba
213b1(mdo): thabs gcig ko// de nas yi tshe 'i gzhon nu rin chen dral can/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par rig nas// rang gi la ga nas 'tshal ba dang / 'jal la dang / myangs panam 'o rab tu la 'bo ma sa
213b2(mdo): byed cing/ pa bzhed la spobs par byed do// de nas mis pa gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rnamams na som lags par rig nas// sul pa da blangs te ma yus nas
213b3(mdo): bcabs so// bye ba khra ka khrig phrag 'bum ri ba'i chos gos gsum gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gso lad to// dge' slong gi dgel 'dun dang / dge' skong ma'i dge' 'dun dang / dge' ba ste/ 
213b4(mdo): dang / dge' bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams la yang / chos gos gsum gyis mngon par g.yogs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 2de ltar de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus so// de nas la tsha
213b5(mdo): gzhon nu rin chen dral can gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di nye skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba su pa bsta na po'i srad su/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyen/ 
213b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'al 'dag phyog ma na zhig u'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyimam mi gzhon nu rin chen bral can la 'di skad ces bkal su lad to// gzhon du
213b7(mdo): khyod de bzhin gshegs pa sa kapa ngakabasom te yo pa zhum nas dang / ras de dang de'i ul sung bstan pas sems rangs par bya'o// de nas ma pa gzhon nu rin chen das can gyis/ bcom ldan
213b8(mdo): 'das la 'di skad ces ga so yo to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig te rad kyi khams gzhan dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi smon lam dang ldan pa bzhugs shing 'tsho ba gang dag gis mtshan
214a1(mdo): thos bcas kyis byang chul segs dpa'i theg pa sa ya ngag par gnas pa ma rigs kyi lam danas kyi thum ma pa nyim sa mnangs com ma mchis par 'gyur/ khyis kyi rjon cing su byed
214a2(mdo): ya bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang 'gyur// tshe rabs dran pa ngas maldan par 'gyur// nas lus pa se lnga'i sems dngasan can gyi gnas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'kho khyim yongs su / 
214a3(mdo): bar 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi 'khor dang yang bral bar 'gyur/ yon tan grangs byed 'bye ba khrag zhig zhan 'dub kyis kyang yongs su ma du pa'ang 'gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par dgyes par brgya
214a4(mdo): pas sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par bgyid/ bdud thams cad shin tu rnan pa bgyid/ sangs rgyab kyi zhi thams cad myong / sems can thams cad kyi mas
214a5(mdo): bamam kha'i drim mes da/ sems can thams cad chos dag yang dag par smras pa/ nas kyang yongs su 'anang ba 'irgya nga/ byang chul sems dpas kyang bsams par 'gyur/ de bzhin
214a6(mdo): gshegs pas kyang byin rgyas dzub par mdzad/ rnams kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang rnam par gyi 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyon
214a7(mdo): dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ sgra dbyangs kyi dam pa stong phrag 'phya bcu la ma bzhi la yongs su rdzogs par zaza par 'gyur/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs su yang 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams khams cad
214a8(mdo): dpam thun pa'i swA dbyangs dang ldan pa sa bzhugs lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyimam mtsha / non ma rin chen dam can ya/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu la
214b1(mdo): do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dral can/ sems che gcig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi star nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la
214b2(mdo): 'di skad ces bka' stsal da to// gzhon nu 'di nas shang phyogs thogs na 'jig rten gyi khams mu tika can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ sred pa'i che mo kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed
214b3(mdo): gyu nga la/ de dag thams cad kyang rdul phra mo'i rdul snyed kyis yongs su rkang bar gyurd cing / de nas skyes bu 'ag zhi ka byung bas de dag las rdul phra mo'i rdul cig byer te/ ji tsam su 'jig te/ 
214b4(mdo): kyi khams srid pa'i che po'i mams gtugs pa de dag/ rdulamo'i tshus kyis yongs su gang ba'i rdul gyis kang 'di ste/ da pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum
214b5(mdo): dab/ rul phra po la rul gcig 'jog na bshi na gzhon nu nam grangs de dang grangs de'i gzhes 'akun rim po 'das pas/ rdul phra mo'i nus kyi phung po chen po ma pa' de dag zad pa gcugs lnga 'gyur sa
214b6(mdo): gzhon nu de ji ltab tu sems 'jig rten gyi khams kang du skyes bu des rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag bzhag pa 'am ma bzhag pa de dag la ngas pa 'am 'akram sa 'as gnal la 'am// nye bar btartag par sa 'am/ gso ya pa/ 
214b7(mdo): chom ldan 'das don ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du gang zhig dpe' 'di 'ashad pa sa yang dag pa'i 'jushes skyen par 'gyur ba'i sem can na shes daphung po mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ba
215a1(mdo): mams so// gzhon nu 'dzin rten gi kham pa gang du skyes nu ngas rgyas phra mo'i rdul de dag bzhag pa 'am 'on tem bzhag pa'i 'jig rten gi khams de dag thams cad kyi 'og gi chu'i phung po nas bzungs nas srid pa'i tshe
215a2(mdo): mo la thug gi bar gi rdul phra mo'i dul rnams kyis yongs su ga par gyur da la/ skyes bu gnyis pa zhig byung bas de dag las dus phra mo'i rdul cig khyer dete/ ci tsam du 'jig rten gi khams de dag gi rdul phra mo'i rdul de snyed kyi
215a3(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum 'das nas/ rdul phra mo'i rdul cig 'jog na/ gzhon su rnams grangs des na yun ring po 'das nas/ rdul phra mo'i rdul bsasags pa'i phung po chen po de 'dor bar 'gyur
215a4(mdo): ro// gzhon nu rnam grangs des na skyes bu phyi ma des/ grangs myed pa brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa dgur bsgyur pa 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum snyed 'das pa na// 
215a5(mdo): de na 'jig rten gi khams mu tig can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa rmi/ sangs rgyas rin chen 'od gzer zla bas brkyend pa'i mkhas pa'i
215a6(mdo): ni brjid kyangs kyi dbang bya gargyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes ma tshas kyang nyon to// gzhon su byang chub sems dpa'i theg pas ya dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bla sa sas ni/ 
215a7(mdo): de'i pa sa dulaya ma gyung ba'i rgya med pa par // de kyis thaMngs sas su na / zhi gshenas pa yongasam cad pa da
215b1(mdo): pa byed par 'gyur/ tshangs par spyod par yang 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga yang rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma thag tu gzungs brgyal 'khyild pa zhes bya 'thob par 'gyur/ 
215b2(mdo): gang 'ga'i gung kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas dag la bsnyed bkur byed par 'gyur/ de snyed kyi bska lad pa bye ba nyid du 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par byed par 'gyur/ de'i sems shin tu mongs pa myed cing bla na myed pa yang dag
215b3(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur/ sred med kyi bu'i sus ltar mkhregs pa'i lus su 'gyur/ rus dbyibs gcig la sI dza bzhi par 'gyur// de'i lus kyi mdog gser gi kha dog 'dra bar 'gyur/ skyes bu
215b4(mdo): chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis lus brgya nad cing tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs su yang 'gyur/ myi khom pa thams/ cad kyang spong zhing / dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par
215b5(mdo): 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid ma rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pas bkal mya lad pa// gang zhig 'jig rten 'gon po'i mtshan// zos nas som nyi myi za zhing // 
215b6(mdo): ngas mthong ba la'ang yid ches pa// del ni yon gnas 'os pa yin// rtag tu 'khor los rgyur ba'i// rgyal srid 'thob cing sangs rgyas mthong // mthong nas dpag du khyed tu myed pa dang / 
215b7(mdo): bsam gyis myi khyab mchod pa byed// rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa dang // mngon par shes pa rtogs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong nas brgya 'khyild pa'i// gzungs kyang de'i sa 'thob par 'gyur// 
215b8(mdo): ltar gang ga'i bye ma snyed// de snyed sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// de snyed bskald pa bye bar ru// 'khor ba dag ni spangs par 'gyur// gang zhig 'jig rten 'gon po'i mtshan// tshogs dang dgel
216a1(mdo): 'dun dgas 'dad+mo// de'i sems ni gyi mongs shing / sangs rgyas byang chub tu byed do// rtag tu sred byed du 'dra zhing // nus dbyibs gtsigs zhing bzhi// lus ni gse gi mngon
216a2(mdo): 'dra zhing // sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'char 'gyur// gang zhig mtshan de thos nas su// yan lag lnga mas phyag byas na// rtag tu tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan zhing // myi khom pa yang spong bar 'gyur/ 
216a3(mdo): gang zhig 'jig rten 'gon po'i mtshan/ thom rnam po pa nyims pa// de ni bya btub sa kyi 'god// de ni rnams kyang som ni byed// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan bdun du// tshang bar rgyal ba'i mtshan 'dzin
216a4(mdo): pa// sangs rgyas la sngags pa mtha' yas pa'i// myig ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// mya de'i miga'i phyig/ lha'i phyag tu nas skyong ste// gang ga'i klung gi bye med kyi// sangs rgyas
216a5(mdo): mang po mthong bar 'gyur// thams cad la ni mchod byed cing // thams cad la ni thos pa 'dzidad// myig gis thams cadamathong nas su// myi rnams thams cad dbugs 'byind to// 
216a6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa// sngan chad bsam gyis myi khyab pa li// bsnyed bkur sangs rgyas dag la byas// de dag thams cad rjes dran 'gyur// srog chags gang rnams bdun dag tu// 
216a7(mdo): mtshan ni bstand pa byas 'gyur na// sems can gzhan gis de mthong zhing // nges par byang chub 'gyur ba yin// sangs rgyas la ni dad bskyed nas// skye khom thams cad rnam par sbas// brtsod
216a8(mdo): dang 'gyed pa byas pas ni// myi khom rnams su skye bar 'gyur// thub pa chen po de'i mtshan// sems can gcig gis thos byas na// rtsod pa dang ni 'gyed pa // yid la byed par myi 'gyur ro// 
216b1(mdo): gal te man byed pa'i las// skas par gnas par 'gyur ba dag/ klad na tsam zhig skyes nas su// las kun rnam par sbyin myi 'gyur// de la mes ni myi tshig cing // chu'i nang du 'dzi myi 'gyur/ 
216b2(mdo): de la rgyal po rab 'khros kyang // myur ba nyid du zhi bar 'gyur// gang zhig thub pa'i mtshan 'dzin pa// nams kyang long ba zhar ba dang // zeng dang skur dang lus nyes dang // nad ni mar por myi 'gyur ro// gnod
216b3(mdo): sbyin dri za yi dgas dang // grul khrum srin po myi rnams ni// sdig can ma rungs pa rnams dag/ myi de la ni gnod myi byed// gang zhig thub pa'i mtshan 'dzind pa// 'byung po dri za gnod sbyin rnams// 
216b4(mdo): klu dang lharnams thams cad kyi// yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur// 'dir ni skyob pa'i mtshan thos pa// ginang tu bsngags/ pa'i pad pa'i dbyangs// ting nge 'dzin mya rang du 'thob par 'gyung
216b5(mdo): yon tan bye ba rab tu sgrogs// gang zhig 'jig rten 'akon po'i mtshan// zos nas som nyi myi za ba// phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe dag du// de'i sa byang chub 'dzi nad to// thub pa chen po'i mtshan thos pa// sangs/ 
216b6(mdo): rgyas mya ngan 'das rnams kyi// legs par gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshul// 'dzin cing yang dag rab tu stond// sangs rgyas kun gyis legs gsungs pa 'i// chos de rnams ni des 'dzind to// bkod
216b7(mdo): pa mchog ni des byed cing // sangs rgyas kun la bsnyen bkur byed// de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas// sangs rgyas bye ba des myur mthong // sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'i// / chos rnams de dag 'dzind
216b8(mdo): par byed// skyob pa de'i mtshan thos pa// srog chags bye ba nan tan kis// 'dul bar byed cing rab tu 'god// thams cad byang chub phyir 'jog go// nga yis mthong la yid ches pa// skyob
217a1(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rab tu bstand pa 'dzin du 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa sa gang dad pa// ngas mthong ba yang de yin
217a2(mdo): sa// 'ching ba rnam sa las den pa grol// gangs sa dus mye 'jig pa pagyid// gang zhes rnam pa mings slong ba// de di rgyud kyi rje yin no// rdob lnga'i 'gro ba yi// sems
217a3(mdo): kun gyi ba spuka pa// de ni stond pa'i pus mo'o// wang gcig gi ba spyar srung // skyob pa 'jig rten mgon po yi// ba spu gcig gi khung bu nas// ji lta pa gang ga'i bye ma snyed// de snyed 'od
217a4(mdo): gze 'byind par mdzad// gang zhig 'jig rten 'gon 'di dayo// 'od zer mtha' yas la yid ches// tshe gcig/ gris ni sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas bye ba mthong bar 'gyur
217a5(mdo): chos kyi lo mdo sde 'di// bshad pa gang zhig thos gyur nas/ rnams kyang yid gnyis kyi zab// de ni dang 'dra ba 'gyur// yangs pa can du mdo sde 'di// bshad pa'i tshe
217a6(mdo): na sras po ba hA// deni kyisa'i dus su des// gzhan pa yang dgan tu stonang // ji ga ga druga'i D+h+we ma dug/ myi gang gis ni ka d+hA brjod pa// de snyed 'jig rten khams rnams su/ 
217a7(mdo): 'od zer gcig gis khyab par byed// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad dag/ bgrang ba'i tshul gis kyi chod pa// gser rnams kyis ni bkang nas su// 'jig rtend 'gon la phul
217a8(mdo): babs// 'di'i mtshan ni thos nas ni// dga' ba bzang po skyes 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas phyag 'angs zhes brjod pa// de na bsod nams bsam gyi khal// 'jig rten 'gon ni thams cad sa// 
217b1(mdo): yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal la// de'i bsod nams phung po na// tshad ni bshad par myi nus so// gang zhig 'jig rten 'gon po'i mtshan// thos nas som myi za ba// de'i lus ni 'od zer gyis// khyab cing ran
217b2(mdo): po che ltar 'gyur// gang zhig thub pa'i mtshan 'dzind pa// de ni rnam par 'das 'gyur nas// lha'i tsan dan dmar po'i// dri zhim kha nas rab tu 'byung // skyo pa sems can snying po'i// sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshan
217b3(mdo): thos pa// ba spu'i lung nas 'od zer dag/ bkye bas lus khyab mdzes par byed// tshe rabs dag ni thams cad la// thos pa mang po ngor 'gyur ba sre// kun dga' sangs rgyas kyi 'dra ba'i// dpag tu myed pa'i tho
217b4(mdo): ba'ang 'dzin // 'jig rten snang byed des mthong nas// gzham dgis myi lang dga' ba thob// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na// tshe rabs dag ni dran par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i thugs sras
217b5(mdo): mthong nas kyang // gzhal gyis myi lang dga' bar 'thob// byang chub/ spos dang me tog byug rnams kyis// mchod pa dag ni skye chen byed// 'jig rten mgon po de'i mtshan// brjod pa 'dzin
217b6(mdo): bar myi byed de// bdud kyi phyogs dang sngon chad ni// mu segs gyu ra pa ma rtogs so// nga yis tshul 'di bshad pa na// sngon ni gang gis 'di thos pa// phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe dag tu// de'i lag dus
217b7(mdo): sde 'di 'thob// nga'i sa mdo sde dam pa 'di// bshad pa dag ni sus thos pa// sngon ni mchod cing bkur bsti byas// de'i lag du 'di thob po// gang gis smon lam btab pa ni// phyi ma'i dus kyi
217b8(mdo): dag du// chos kyi rgyal pos gang gsungs pa'i// mdo 'di lag tu 'thob par 'gyur// gang zhig sems ni rtse gcig gis// sangs rgyas grangs myed bkur bsti byas// mdo 'di la ni gang dad pa// 
218a1(mdo): de bas bsod nams 'dimapa 'gyur// rtag tu bzugs bzang bsod nams ldan// shi nad tu 'jigs myed longs khyod ldan// dran dang ldan zhing mtshan rnams kyis// mngon par brgya nad pa/ 
218a2(mdo): dag tu 'gyur// de lta bas na mdo sde 'di// thos nas phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe// bzung zhing yang dag bstand pa dang // gzhan dag la yang bshad par gyis// gang gis sangs rgyas 'khol los sgyur// 
218a3(mdo): 'bum 'phrag dag la bkur byas pas// phyi ma'i ni dus dag tu// ngas mthong pa la som nyi myed// gang gis sngon ni 'jig rten 'gon// grangs myed pa la bsnyen bkur bas// de yis 'jig rten 'gon// 
218a4(mdo): 'di yi// thos nas mthong la yid ches so// gang zhig mtshan ni thos nas su// sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs byed pa// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstand pa dang ni dam chos srung / 
218a5(mdo): gapa zhig byang chub gtam spangs na// bskald pa bye ba dag dA ni// lug ltar lkug cing myi nyams ya// myig myed// pa dag tu yang 'gyur// gar zhig lag pa gcig gis na// 
218a6(mdo): mchod rten grangs myed pa zhig byas pas// gang gis mdo sde 'di spangs na// khyad chos ldog par 'di 'gyung ro// de lta bas na smras pa// phyi ma'i dus tshe 'di snyed nas// sangs rgyas ye
218a7(mdo): zla myed pa// som nyi za bar ma byed cig/ mdo sde 'di 'dra 'di thob na// me tog spos dang 'phan rnams dang // gtug sa dang phye ma gos rnams kyis// gus par byas te mchod pa gyis// 
218a8(mdo): des mi de bzhin gshegs pa yi// phyag yi shin tu 'dzad pa yis// li wa bi'i mgo bos// sang dang yang du byug pa mdzad// de'i rjes pa la lharnams kyis// sra skad chen po byang gyur na cing / 
218b1(mdo): lha'i me tog ku su ma// yid 'ong gtor cing zhi 'di bkang // lha rnams mkhal la 'dug nas su// klu dbyangs dpag tu myed pa len// tshangs pa'i dag ni bye ba yis// tsa ngan dmar po'ichang pa ba
218b2(mdo): po// de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde 'di// gsungs tshe dra ba can thos te// sems ni rangs shing yid dgal nas// de bzhin gshegs la tshig gsol pa// phyi ma'i dus su bdag gis ni// dge slong
218b3(mdo): bkyil la gyi 'jigs par// grong dang grong khyer rnams dag su// mdo sde 'di ni bshad par bgyi// sangs rgyas bka' bzhin mgyi bdag bgyid de// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa dpal gyis gzung / 
218b4(mdo): kyi sbyin pas tshim par bkyi// dpa' tshad bye bar mchis nas su/ 'di'i tshul ni bshad par bgyi// swa kun dang ni klu rnams// dang // yang na myi 'am ci dang myi// myi 'a la 'gron gnyer te/ 
218b5(mdo): tshim kyi sbyin pas tshim par bgyi// tha na myed pa'i mdo 'di/ sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pan// lham yin tshogs dka' gyur smranas// me tog dpag tu myed pa rjor// ras tus
218b6(mdo): kyi ni zhi po 'di dka/ myi chog zhag kya seng ge yi// chos kyi rgyal po khru gcig gis// zhing rnams thams cad spang bar mdzad// sems can snying po bdag nyid can// stond pa'i ni ljags bya
218b7(mdo): nas// ga ga sa khyim ldad dag gis// gling rnams kyi ba khyib par mdzad// de bzhin sngogs bcu'i 'jig rten kI// zhing rnams bye ba khyebs mdad de// gzhan du rin chen dra ba can// dmatshan
218b8(mdo): dngan ma ma / khye ba rgyag bcutsa ma dag ni// lhan cig logs la bga' med cing // de na med pani ston ma mas// de dag chol la bdud par mdzad// 'di tha thams cad sbyim mdzad ci/ 
219a1(mdo): sangs rgyas kyad ni thogs pa myed// de bzhin gshegs rnams dpag myed de// sangs rgyas chos la the tsom spongs// sangs rgyas ye shes thogs myed de// dus gsum rnams la 'ang
219a2(mdo): 'jug pa mdzad// chos rnams kun la mngal brnyes pas// sangs rgyas la ni mi mkhyen na myed// phung po rnams ni myed pa'o zhes// myi'i 'drend pa stond par mdzad// khyams bzhi dag ni gsog
219a3(mdo): dang 'dra// gang du'ang sgra la chags ma byed// gzugs dang tsho dang 'du shes dang // sems pa dang ni 'du byed dang // nam shes phung po'i snying po ni// myed pa dag du shes par gyis// sangs rgyas
219a4(mdo): kyis ni gsungs pa bzhin// de ltar phung po nas phye ma/ myur tu gzungs rnams 'thob 'gyur zhing // shin tu/ rmongs pa myed par 'gyur// chos rnams dag ni gsob dang
219a5(mdo): 'dra// thams cad stong zhing bdag myed do// rtsod pa myed cing rmongs myed pa// de skad de bzhin gshegs pa gsung/ gzhonu lho phyogs logs na/ gzhonu dpel snga ma la bu las
219a6(mdo): nyis byar gi rdul phra mo 'i rdul bgrangs pa'i tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis 'das pa ma/ de na zla ba brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'i 'jig rten gi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
219a7(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog gi 'od kyis rnam par ro ldan pa mngon par mkhyend pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stond to// gzhon
219a8(mdo): nu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi 'od kyis rnam par
219b1(mdo): rolong pa mngon par mkhyend pa de'i mtshan thos nas som nyi myi zha la ngas mthong ba la/ yang yid ches na/ de tshe 'das pa'i 'og tu/ 'od zer rab tu gtong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ 
219b2(mdo): ting nge 'dzin gi sgo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs myed pa khrir 'jug pa 'thob par 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs myed pa drug cu po rgya mtsho lta bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs las
219b3(mdo): stsogs pa nas/ rin po che'i mdzod kyi gzungs la thug pa'i bar la 'jug pa 'thob cing / byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du de dag la rmongs par yang myi 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ shar phyogs
219b4(mdo): nas sangs rgyas bye ba gshegs nas zhal stond par mdzad de/ phyogs thams cad nas kyang de dpa' dra'o// gang sangs rgyas pa com ldan 'das de dag gis chos gsum 'ar 'gyur ba de dag thams
219b5(mdo): cad kyang 'dzind par 'gyur// byang chub yob kyi khar du de'i chos kyi tshul de 'jig par myi 'gyur/ las dang po pa'i byang chu/ ba sems dpal nas bzung nas/ ska lang pa lnga brgya 'khor ba las
219b6(mdo): phyir phyogs par byas nas/ bla na myed pa li yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka lusaHla to// 
219b7(mdo): myi'i dbang po 'jig rten 'gon// skyob pa'i ni mtshan thos pa// bskal pa lnga brgya tham pa'i// 'khor ba dag ni zlog par 'gyur// 'chi ba dag gnyis tshe yang // sangs rgyas bye ba stond par
219b8(mdo): mdzad// mthong nas dpa' bos phyag 'tshal te// chos kya mnyan ta cing 'dzin par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa// kyang pa dam la spyod pa na// de'is
220a1(mdo): bstanas pa'i chos gang dag/ bas 'ad pa bye ba mchud kyi gson// sangs rgyas kyi nimatshan bsgrags pas// rin chen zhes bya ba'i 'ating nge 'dzin // stong phrag bdun bcud tshe 'thob// yon tam bye ba smon
220a2(mdo): bar 'gyur// gang zhig thub pa'i mtshan mdzin pa// ting 'dzin grangs myed bye ba dang // de bzhin sa yang drug bcu dag/ de la nye bar gnas par 'gyur// de bas mnyam bzhag dpa' bo yis// byang chung nga
220a3(mdo): pa myod pa'i tshe// sems can mang po stong nams dag/ byang chub mchog sa 'jog par byed// byang chub pa rdzogs par du ni// nam yang 'dod la myi sten te// sems can gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi/ mtshan
220a4(mdo): bstan nas ni zlog par byed// gang zhig sangs rgyas mtshan thos nas// srog chags kun la 'di stond pa// nams kyang myi// khom myi 'gyur zhing // de'i ngas parnyed myi dka'// shin tu
220a5(mdo): bzang ba sangs rgyas dag/ 'byung ba mnyes par byas pas ni/ nga'i myi khom gang bstand pa// de dag thams cad spong bar 'gyur// ji ltara'adran pa mkhyend pa bzhin// gzhon nu ga lad te
220a6(mdo): khyod shes na// ston pa'i mtshan ni bzung nas su// phyogs kun tu ni rab tu sgrogs// de bas gzhon nu gzhan dgas// mtshan 'di rab tu bstan byas na// yang dag byang chub 'di bzung zhing // 'jig rten
220a7(mdo): ki ni mgon du 'gyur// gang zhig sangs rgyas mtshan thos nas// g.yel ba myed pam 'di bzung ste// song nas gzhan dag la ston na// de ni byang chub mngon du srung // gang zhig mdo ste 'di thos nas/ 
220a8(mdo): gzhan dag la ni rab ston da ya// legs par gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshul// bstand pa 'di dag srung bar byed// gzhon nu nub phyogs logs na// gzhon nu dpe la snga ma lta bu de las sum 'gyur// 
220b1(mdo): gyis rdul phra mo'i rdul bgrangs pa'i tshul gyis// de snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khams dag 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams rim chen bkra pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
220b2(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog rgyas pa sa la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// gzhon nu theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs
220b3(mdo): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa me rtog rgyas pa sa la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de'i mtshan thos nas som nyi myi za la// rab mthong ba la yid ches na// de'i tshe 'das pa'i 'og tu chos
220b4(mdo): lnga 'dzind par 'gyur te/ ldag pa zhe na/ lus zhig nas sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzungs te/ 
220b5(mdo): de yang slob 'khyilang pa'i gzungs dang / byang chub thob kyi bar du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag 'a ba pa ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs/ chos lnga po de dag 'thob par
220b6(mdo): 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid tshigs su bcad pas bka' maHyad pa// gang zhig myi yi khyung mchog skyob pa'i mtshan// zos nas som nyi myed cing dang skyed na// de yis chos lnga de dag
220b7(mdo): 'dzind 'gyur zhing // byang chub thob kyi bar du 'jig myi 'gyur// gser gyi mdog 'dra gzugs dang ldan 'gyur zhing // 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dam mchog mkhas// bsod nams ldan pa sred
220b8(mdo): myed bu 'dra zhing // dam chos 'khor lo bar chad myed par skor// bsod nams ldan pa bu stong yod 'gyur te// dpa' zhing rtul phod pha rol tshogs 'joms la// yan lag mchog gi gzugs ldan
221a1(mdo): mtshan gyis brgyan// mnu stobs che ba rgyal ga ma nyid 'dra// rgyal po'i chung mas bzang gzugs mdzes pa// gser gi mdog 'dra mang zo sdang yod 'gyur// phyi nas nyal zhing sngar ni lang byed
221a2(mdo): de/ rgyal po gsol rnams kyang skyod myi byed// rgyal phran gang dag de'i yul gnas shing // gang dag blon po khyim bdag gtso bo kun// rgyal po de mthong rnams kyang skyo myi byed// de las de ni bsod nams
221a3(mdo): dam mchog ldan// mkhas mchog rnams kyis kyang grub par dkal// mye'i 'jig rten dag na gnod sbyin kru// de'i yul na sems can gang gnas pa// de'i sa thams cad byang chub snying por 'jog/ 
221a4(mdo): rgyal srid rgyas shing shin du lo legs dang // de'i rgyal srid// bde zhing sangs rgyas 'byung // de dag la ni mchod pa 'am/ dpa byed// rgyal po bdag yul rnams kyang snga ma sems byed/ 
221a5(mdo): sangs rgyas mtshan mchog thos nas mkhas pa gang // som nyi za zhing myi dka' su zhig yod// mdo sde dam pa de ring ngas bshad pa'i// chos mchog 'di yis de la phan 'dogs 'gyur// 
221a6(mdo): gzhan du gang gis sngon gyi rgyas rnams kyi// chos spangs gyu dad pas bdud kyis zin pa'am// sems can zhi po rgyal ba mchog dag ni// sngon kyang pyod tshe khyad chubasad ma rtogs// gzhon nu gang zhig rgya
221a7(mdo): po'i pho brang dang // li mra'i bkod pa dga' ba 'di dag dang // shag kyi seng ge nga mi bar mthong ba// de dag sangs rgyas mtshan thos som nyi za// gzhon nu byang phyogs logs na// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
221a8(mdo): gzho nu dpel snga ma la bu de las sum 'gyur gis/ sangs rgyas kyi shing drug bcu 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams yin cen dra bas g.yogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 'acom
221b1(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nam dag zhe bya 'a sa mi bres po byung med to// gnan byeg chen yo dag pa pa'i ga kyi bu'i 'i so da pa shin shes pan sa sa da da nam da na tu sa
221b2(mdo): na 'is canan la yi pa pa / sa kyis snyed kyi sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyum// de skad kyi bzhal pa bye bar 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par 'gyur// las dang po pa'i byang chu
221b3(mdo): sems dpa' de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par dbyangs stan ldan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi nad kyang thob par 'gyur// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
221b4(mdo): phyim gyi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// bud myed gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nam du/ de'i mtshan thos nas som nyi khyim zhing / the tsom gyi skyed la/ 
221b5(mdo): ngas mthong ba la yang yid ches na/ de tshe 'das pa'i 'og/ tu bud myed kyi dbang po rnam par spangs par 'gyur zhi skyes pa'i dbang po 'thob par 'gyur// sems can mang po
221b6(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang 'jog par 'gyur// dbyangs snyan ldan zhes bya ba'i ting po 'dzind kyang thob par 'gyur/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
221b7(mdo): rgyas las phyir myi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsa la to// gang zhig rkang gnyis dam pa de'i mtsham// thos nas rnams
221b8(mdo): kyang som nyi myi za ba// bskald pa bye ba gang ga'i bye ma snyed// des spangs mya ngan myed pa'i skyes par 'gyur// gang ga'i bye snyed/ sangs rgyas du ma dag/ mthong nas de dag la ni mchod pa byed// 
222a1(mdo): de snyed sangs rgyas de'i tshe gcig gis// sangs rgyas mchod pa rgyal ba mya ngan 'da'// byang chub dam pa spyad mchog spyopyod pa na// gang gis skyes bu khrug mchog mtshan thos na// nams kyang
222a2(mdo): som nyi byed cing 'dzin byed na// de 'dra'i khyad par de'i sa 'thob par 'gyur// gang gis mtshan mchog gtso po 'di// thos nas som kyi khyi la la// rang 'byung ye shes sangs rgyas nyid myur zhing / 
222a3(mdo): mkhas pas dbyangs snyan ting 'dzind 'thob par 'gyur// byang chub dam pa spyad mchog spyod pa ma// dag pa'i bdag nyid skyes pa'i dbang po 'thob// yon tan kun dang ldan zhing mdzes pa ste// de 'dral
222a4(mdo): khyad par de yis 'thob par 'gyur// phyogs rnams kun ni rab tu snang byed cing // sa ya mtha' yas zhing du song nas wi su/ 'jig rten spyod pa thub pa che mthong nas// mya ngan bral te byang chub
222a5(mdo): phyis reg 'gyur// thub dbang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni// de'i mtshan 'di thos nas rdzu 'phrus mchog/ de 'dra'i khyad/ par dag ni thob par 'gyur/ byang chub 'dod pa gzhan yang
222a6(mdo): thob pa ni// dri bral byang chub 'dun pa skyed nas su// rgyal ba'i mngan 'di gzhan la'ang sgrogs par byed// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu gsal ba ltam// de'i yon tan dag kyang de 'drar 'gyur/ 
222a7(mdo): sems can mang po sul bsas kyi khyab// byang chub mchog la ma 'as pa 'is 'jog/ zla ma mkha' la gnas pa'i gzhas gyi kha// 'od zemam po ba zhugs pas mdzel pa lam// kas
222a8(mdo): zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'dzind pa// de'i lus kyang de 'dras rnam par mdzes// mkhas pa gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan thos nas// som nyi za zhing myi dga' su zhig yod// byang chub spyan
222b1(mdo): mchog dam pa spyod pa na// chos 'di dag gis de la phan 'dogs 'gyur// thub pa chen po 'jig rten mchod spyod pas// mkhas pa des ni phongs pa myong myi 'gyur// gzho nu 'og gi phyogs// 
222b2(mdo): na// gzho nu dpe' snga ma lta bu'i rnam pa de bzhin du// dgul bcu rtsa dgur bskur bar 'das nas// 'jig rten gi khams rgyal mtshan mchog gi bdag po zhes bya ba yon de/ de na de bzhin
222b3(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi ba mkhas pa'i gzi brjid dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'gro zhing gzhes la chos kya
222b4(mdo): stond to// gzho nu theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ga la la zhig/ de bzhin/ gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba mkhas pa'i gzi brjid dbyangs kyi
222b5(mdo): dbang phyug gi rgyas po de'i mtshan thos nas/ seMs rnyil la/ ngas nal yang yi masan/ des 'das pa'i 'og du thun nas nin ma bcos bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur// 'chi ba'i tshul
222b6(mdo): kyi tshe yang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du tshang ba dag mthong bar 'gyur// shar phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du/ phyogs thams cad du yang de bzhin du sangs rgyas grangs myang bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum
222b7(mdo): du tshang ba dag mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstand pa de dag thams cad kun tu 'dzind par 'gyur/ byang chub thug gi bar du sangs rgyas grangs myed pa bye ba
222b8(mdo): khrag khrig phrag 'bum rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpal de bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu pa 'khor ba las phyir phyogs nas/ bla ma byed
223a1(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid tshigs su bcad pas bkalasaHkhad pa/ gapa zhig 'jig rten rnam 'dren sangs rgyas kyi// yon tan rgya
223a2(mdo): mtsho'i mtshan mchog thos gyur pa// des ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba khri rnams la// myur da du mchod pa bla ya myed rab tu byed// mtha' yas dri myed khyab par mchod byas shing // srid pa kun tu sangs rgyas che rnams kyi
223a3(mdo): nyi ma mdzad pa'i spyad pa spyad nas su// phyis ni byang chub dran dbang des reg 'gyur// ji ltar gang ga'i bye snyed rnam par 'dren// mang po dag ni tshe gcig gis mchod de// kun nas 'od zer ting nge 'dzin
223a4(mdo): thob nas// phyis ni byang chub mya ngan myed reg/ 'gyur// byang chub dri myed bdag nyid ma thob nas// chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa rab tu bsgom// sems can sangs rgyas byang chub mchog bzhag
223a5(mdo): nas// char chus me bsad ltar ni mya ngan 'dal// rkang gnyi// sa 'dren pa myi 'dul kha lo sgyum// bsod nams zhing ste/ bsod nams phung po gcig/ de la myi yis dad pa tsam bskyed
223a6(mdo): nA// skad cig gis ni myi kho ma thams cad spong // gang zhig bde bar gshegs kyi mtshan 'don pa// myi lus rnyed pa dal ba gcig thob nas// mtha' yas / rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs bzhugs la
223a7(mdo): myi'i mkhas pa bsod nams rab tu byed// sangs rgyas mtshan ni stong phrag brgya tsam du// goms byed de ni rjes mthun bzod pa thob// lha'i myig thob ji ltar nga yis ni// sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong
223a8(mdo): me tog gis gtong ba byas nas bzod pa po ba gyur de pas// de 'dra'i 'azod pa dag mi 'thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'gon po 'od mdzad thub pa'i// mtshan 'di thos nas su zhig lung gyi nod// gzhan
223b1(mdo): du gang zhig mu stegs can gyur pa 'am// phrag dog dag gis nyams pa'i myi ma gtogs// 'dren pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ni mngon sum du// 'di 'dra'i mdo sde bshad pa sus thob pa// de ni phyi dus dag du
223b2(mdo): 'di 'dzind cing // gzhan dag la yang rab tu stond par byed// gzho nu steng gi phyogs na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas gzho nu dpel snga ma/ lta bu de las gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das nas 'jig/ 
223b3(mdo): rten gi khams shi nad tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus grangs myed pas yang dag par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya/ 
223b4(mdo): ba zhig bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// / gzho nu theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa
223b5(mdo): brtson 'grus grangs pas yang dag par rab tu gnas pa la rags mya zhes bya ba de'i mtshan thos nas/ som nyi myi za la/ ngas mthong ba la'ang yid ches na/ de tshe 'das pa'i'og du
223b6(mdo): nams kyang brtson 'grus dman par myi 'gyur// nams kyang 'dod pa la ste nad par myi 'gyur// nams kyang ma'i sdug sngal gis gos par myi 'gyur/ pha'i sdug sngal dang / gnyen gi sdug sngal dang / 
223b7(mdo): spun gyi sdug sngal gyis gos par myi 'gyur/ sring mo'i sdug sngal gis gos par myi 'gyur/ nams kyang mdza' ba dang / bshes gnyen dang / blon po dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams kyi sdug
223b8(mdo): bsngal gyis mye gos par myi 'gyur/ nams kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu'i rtsa gnyis kyis lus ma brgya nad par myi 'gyur/ nams kyang 'dod chags zhe sdang gti muka med par myi 'gyur/ 
224a1(mdo): nams kyang nad mang bar myi 'gyur/ nams kyang mya ngan ma bar myi 'gyur/ bde ba mtha' yas pas yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ byang chub la thug gi bar tu yon tan mtha' yas pa bye ba
224a2(mdo): khrag khrag 'bum phrag grangs myed pas yongs su bzung par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid tshags su bcad pas bka' stsa khad pa// gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan// thos nas
224a3(mdo): som nyin kyil pa// nams kyang pha ma gnyen 'dun kye// tshogs kyi sdug bsngal khyi yong ngo // steng gi phyogs na rkang gnyis mchog/ 'jig rted snang bar mdzad pa bzhugs// srid gsum galal ba
224a4(mdo): mdzad nas su// srog chags rnams la chos gnon to// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan thos nas// de ni gzhan rnams da ba bstan dan// rtag tu su bcu rtsa gnyis kyi// mtshan dag
224a5(mdo): sa ni brgyan par 'gyur// gang zhig thub pa'i mtshan 'dzin/ na// de ni shes rab kyi nyams shi // byang chub zun pa rgya/ pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpal sa yang mchod// sangs rgyas
224a6(mdo): ni mtshan pa'an pas// phyis ni byang chub spyod pan// sangs rgyas bye ba bsam yi khyab// shes rab can gyis rtag mchod 'gyur// sangs rgyas mtshan 'di ga dathos nas// gzhan nams
224a7(mdo): la yang rab ldanan na// de 'dra'i bsod nams phung po lo// tshad ni bshad par gyi nus so// de ltam mtshan ka 'di thos pa ni// phyi dus dag ni mang por yang // blas myed sangs rgyas ye shes
224a8(mdo): la// de ni mam nyim gyi byed// gang gis rdzogs sangs rgyas mthong nas// bkur sti ril 'gror byas pa ni// phyi ma'i dus su mdo sde 'di// de'i lag du 'thob par 'gyur// ngani
224b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' yis// bskor dang dra ba can sus mthong // phyis ni mdo sde 'di thos nas// de la som nyi za myi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa dpag myed de// sangs rgyas chos la
224b2(mdo): the tsom spongs// 'di ltar sngon gi spyod pa ni// bskal pa bye ba mang brgyar spyad// laka pa rkang pa gtong ba dang // na ba sna dang mgo bo dang // bu pho bu mo yul 'khor dag/ byin la yid
224b3(mdo): ni myi dga' myed// gang zhig mdo sde 'di thos pa// phyi ma'i dus na rnyed nas ni// gzhan dag la yang ston byed na// de ni mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gi spyod yul pa// 
224b4(mdo): mngon pa rdzogs byang chub 'dod gang gis// nam yang 'dzi ga rten mgon po yi// bstan la som nyi ma za shika/ de ltar mdo sde 'di thos nas// g.yo sgyu myed pa'i myis zung
224b5(mdo): la// 'chag pa dag tu'ang yang dang yang // mdo sde 'di ni brjod par gyis// brjod byas zla ba gsum dag tu// tshang bar shi nad tu yang brjod na// chos rnams thams cad
224b6(mdo): 'dzin byed pa'i// gzungs kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur/ de nas li tsha byi gzhonu rin chen dra ba can bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa rig nas/ rin thang myed pa'i ras
224b7(mdo): bcos khu gser gyis brgyan pa zung cig/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa ji lta bus/ bcom
224b8(mdo): ldan 'das kyi sku thams cad kyi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer dag byung ste/ shar phyogasakyi 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu myed grangs myed pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sdang bar 'gyur/ 
225a1(mdo): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ni sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
225a2(mdo): du sems can gang dag 'dus pa de dag gis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de mthong pa dang / de'i tshe gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'khor bzhi po la/ 
225a3(mdo): snang bar gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis la tshe bi gzho mu rin cen dra ba can la bka' stsa khad pa// gzho nu khyod gis steng gi phyog
225a4(mdo): logs na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bsam gyis/ myi khyab pa// 'di ltar gzhal gyis myi lang ba/ 'di ltar thugs pa myed pa/ 'di ltar tshad myed pa/ 'di ltar brjod
225a5(mdo): gyis myi lang ba de dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// / bka' stsald pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste stong gsum
225a6(mdo): gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams na/ lha dang myi rnams kyi mying gi tshogs pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan ches mang ste/ re re la yang mtshan kyi tshogs grangs myed/ bsam gis skye
225a7(mdo): khyab pa yod de// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa legs par rab tu zhi ba'i dpa la dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rnams dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag
225a8(mdo): ces bya ba dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi 'od kyis rnam par rold pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rnams dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyas pas la
225b1(mdo): rgyal po zhes bya rnams dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rin ches 'od zer zla bas brgyand pa mkhas pa'i gzi brjid dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba rnams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig
225b2(mdo): gi mtshan ji lta bar de bzhin gshegs pa ma ma ma so'i mtsham yang de dang 'dra bar mthong ngam/ gsol pa'i/ com ldan 'das mayod lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// de bzhin du
225b3(mdo): lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng ki phyogs te/ de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re re na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig pa yang
225b4(mdo): grangs ma mchis la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan tha dad pa yang / bzhugs so// bkalasaHlad pa// gzhon nu khyod kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la gnas pa de las kyang chos/ lhag
225b5(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mtho ngam// de nas li tshwa/ bi gzho nu rin chen dra bA can mgu zhing dag la la yid rangs/ rab tu dgal zhi pa dgal ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas de'i tshe
225b6(mdo): sa chen po g.yos par gyur to// sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rab tu dgal ba dang / dge ba'i ma bskyed pa'i skang 'a cher po byeng pa rgyas
225b7(mdo): to// lA bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag yum dag nam mkha' la 'khod nas/ lha'i 'dzam bu chu bo gser ge phye ma rnams kyis gtor to// tshangs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang / lha'i tsan
225b8(mdo): dan dmar po'i bye ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon pa rab tu gtor sa to// tshangs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang / lha'i me tog ud bas da
226a1(mdo): pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po drang / man d+ha ma dang / man b+ha ra pa chen pos gtor / mngon par gtorar/ mngon par rab tu gtor da tong // lA ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang / 
226a2(mdo): ring po che'i gdugs stong phul lo// lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ ngus te sngon gyi gnas phye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma
226a3(mdo): dag rjes su dran no// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi kharlabs kyis kyis kyang chos 'phrul dbye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu bstan te/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bye ba brgya phrag du ma dang yi
226a4(mdo): lha rnams kho la khom sug nas// tsan dan dmar po zhib mo yim// rdzogs sangs rgyas la 'thor par byed// brgya byin bye ba arba/ ka/ stong dag/ mkhal la gnas nas 'dzam bu li// chu lo'i
226a5(mdo): ser phye mang po yis// de bzhin gshegs la 'thor bar byed// tshangs pa bye gnyer lhags nas// tsan dan dmar po'i phye ma yis// brdzogs sangs rgyas la 'thor byed cing // sma dbyangs snyan pa kun
226a6(mdo): tu sgrogs// dri ma myed pa'i 'od rig nas// nam mkha' la ni lha 'khod de// klu dbyangs dpag tu myed pa len// mkhal la ras kyis g.yob par byed// nam mkhal la ni lha 'khod de// pad ma r+g+ha
226a7(mdo): brag stong blangs nas// 'jig rten gsal la gon byed cing // rgyal mtshan la grogs mchod pa byed// zla byed rgyal mchog grub dbang la// rab tu yid dgas phyag 'tshal zhing // rgod byed nong bu 'i
226a8(mdo): chen dang // bu tig rgyan 'greng 'thor par byed// gyi mo bye ba 'bum tham pa// rgyal mchog tu byed pa la mchod// sngon gi gnas brgya rjes rnan zhing // grub mchog bla khyed gus phyag 'tshal// denas
226b1(mdo): 'jig rten snang mdzad pas// chos kyi dani rab 'dungs te// de'i sgras mi zhing rab mang // bye ba dag tu go la byas// de'i tshen sems can ni// bye ba grangs kyid kun nas lpags// de dag rdzogs pan
226b2(mdo): sangs rgyas kyis// sangs rgyas la shes pa myed bkod// de gzhon nu dga' gyur nas// tsan das rgyas kyi snying po'i// gdab 'phrul na chen gyi ma yis// gzhon sang+yas rgyas gsos mchod/ 
226b3(mdo): nor bu ri can 'dag ci ni// 'jig chen grong du gtong bar byed// rin rjen gcig las 'od ze ni// stong zag bye ba gtong bar byed// de bzhin rin rjen pa smram sa// 'od ze dag ni zung
226b4(mdo): kyas// de dag gis mi de'i me// yangs pa can yang skang bar byas// / rin chen rnam pa de med kyis// sangs rgyas gsol mad byed cing // rin po ches phung po yapa// thub pa che la ma
226b5(mdo): 'bul bar byed// gdugs ni gar dag mu khyad byas// mu tiga'aphreng kis yongs brgyan pa// re re la yang mu khyud can// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// 'di 'dra'i legs pa de'i sa ni/ 
226b6(mdo): thub pa che la mchod pa byas// byang chub sems dpal thams cad la// gser thags kyi ni gos phul lo// byang chub shing dag sprul ngan su// de dung seng ge'i khri ba shams la// stong phrag bye banyi
226b7(mdo): 2// de rnams sa ni ladzad gyu pa// sos sa grangs myed pag// bzung ba da du myo 'om pa'o// byab rgya sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ khye ba 'argya mug sngags par gyur// shas gyi phyogs nas
226b8(mdo): bzung nas su// sgo/ phyogs/ nub phyogs byang phyogs dang // 'og dang ste pa dang de bzhin du// phyogs dag gi yang mtshams nas lhags// ci tsam myog gis mthong ba 'i bar// de sring 'jog rten
227a1(mdo): khams rnams su// skyob pa 'jig rten 'gon po'i// gser gyi mdog 'dra'i 'od gis gang // stond pa gdan bzhugs pa dang // chos ni gang ngan 'bar ba de// 'jig rten khams/ 
227a2(mdo): ni thams cad nas// byang chub sems dpa' nye bar lhags// de ltar mtha' yas dpag du myed// bsam gyis myi khyab mchod pa ni// rin chen dra ba li tsha gi// gzho nu de'i tshe na byas// de nas
227a3(mdo): bdag nyid chen po pa// lha dang klu dang myi rnams kyi// mdun tu myi mchog shag kya li// seng ges dbugs ni 'byind pa mdzad// nga yi mdun du 'dug nas su// khyod kyis
227a4(mdo): 'di 'dra'i mchod pa byas// gang ga'i bye ma ji snyed pa// de snyed mchod pa dag gis mchod// rin chen dra ba can/ gyi phyir// mdo 'di bshad pa sus rig pa// byang
227a5(mdo): chugs pa ni myi ldog s+ho// sangs rgyas sba ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sde 'dzind pa'i// bsod nams phung po'i tshad dag ni// 'di snyed rdzogs par 'gyur
227a6(mdo): zhes// ma ltam bshad par gyi nus mo// thugs cu'i 'jig rten sa dang rtsa// me dang rlung gi tshad dag ni// 'di tsam zhes ni bgad la nus// bsod nams phung po ban
