227a7(mdo): myi nus// dge slong 'am ni dge slongs// dge snyen 'am ni dge bsnyen ma// gang gis mdo sde 'di thos pa// lha dang klu dang lto 'phye che// sems can thams cad nyer lags pas/ 
227a8(mdo): sa ga'i 'dzid kyi shod de// ma mi bsis par 'gyung mid kyi// de ni gni 'dzidi nyams bgyid// mdo rje 'dzin gang 'dzin da pa// byang chub kyang la spyod pa'i che// sems can sun
227b1(mdo): gyis bsnyen da bya zhing // byang chub sems la'ang mchod pa byed// gang zhig stobs dang ldan pa'i myis// bye ba stong du bshags pa'i// sA rtses sdong gi 'jig rten khams// bskal pa khye/ 
227b2(mdo): bar bzung ba bas// gang zhig phyi ma'i dus dag tu// sangs rgyas byang chub gleng zhi ni// 'di 'dra'i rnam pas thos nas su// gzhan dag la yang ston byed na// gang zhig sngar ni rab spag+sa
227b3(mdo): 'di'i ngo mtshar chen po li// brgya dang grangs dang 'grang ba dang // dper yang 'gyur ba ma yin no// phyi ma'i ni dus dag du// 'di 'dra'i rnam pa seng ge'i smra// bstan pa ma
227b4(mdo): myed thos gyur kyang // 'gal byed don myed 'gyur bar 'o// / 'jig rten mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od mdzas glang gis 'dir mthob pa// phyi ma'i dus su nges mthong
227b5(mdo): nas// zhes gus par byed par 'gyur// gal te zhing rnaMm bye ba na// sems can ga pa dag 'khod de dag/ sA sa?// rgyas ye shes ldan gyur pa la// gang ga'i ni bye ma snyed
227b6(mdo): yad pa bye ba brgya dag du// rim 'gro dag ni byed pa dang // ji ltar stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten khams// de snyed dag gi gtsug lag khang mchog ni// dbul bya lA'i tsun dam
227b7(mdo): dag las byas// lA'i gtsug lag khang mchog re re la 'ang // bye ba phrag stong dag gi khang bzangs byas// bye ba phrag song dag gi khang bzangs kyang // dbul bya lha'i rin chen dag/ 
227b8(mdo): las byas// re re'i khri dag bshams nas rim gro pa// bye ba phrag brgya shind tu tshang bar bkod// mkhas pas de tshe rin chen dra ba dag// blangs nas de tshe khri re brgyan pa rnams// 
228a1(mdo): gang ga'i bye snyed bska sad pa bye ba brgyar// thub chen 'jig rten pyod pa bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas gcigs dbul bya dbul ba dang // ji ltar gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
228a2(mdo): yongs su mya ngan 'das kyi mchod rten byas// ji ltar stod chen 'jig rten khams rnams su// sangs rgyas gcig gi mchod rten byas pa ni// rin chen rang bzhin lha'i sgo stong/ 
228a3(mdo): ldan// sha nin tu legs pa srid pa'i rtse srid mtho// ji ltar gang ga'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// gdugs ni mchod rten gcig la 'bul bar byed// de tshe re la'i gdugs la mu tig gi// brgyan 'phreng
228a4(mdo): bye ba rnams kyang shind tu bkram// ji ltar gang ga'i klung gi bye snyed// bye ba'i 'phan dang rin chen sna tshogs kyi// rgyal mtshan bye ba phrag brgya gang ga li// bye snyed mchod rten dag la
228a5(mdo): 'bul bar byed// snang ba mdzad pa thams cad mkhyend gcig/ gi// mchod rten gcig la sil snyan bya ba stob// dkrol cing gus pa'i myi ni sa ya dag/ bye ba phrag stong tshang ba dbul
228a6(mdo): bAr byed// me tog gdugs brgyan du ma mchod rten la 'bul ba// thub pa che la de 'dra'i mchod pa nyid cig bzhin// gang ga'i bye snyed pas lad pa stong du bye ba bas// gang zhig mdo sde 'di las
228a7(mdo): tshigs bcad gcig thos nas// som nyi myed cing 'dun pa skyed byed la// rgyal ba'i mtshan 'di dag kyang brjod byed// de bas bsod nams 'di ni bla myed mchog/ mkhas pa ting nge 'dzin gi mying thos
228a8(mdo): shing // tshul khrims skyon myed mtshan 'di 'dzind pa dang // de bzhin sangs rgyas la ni mchod byed pa// des ni kang ga'i bye snyed sangs rgyas mthong // thub chen rkang gnyis mchog gyurd de dag la/ 
228b1(mdo): mchod pa 'ang yid kyis byas nas ni// rtag tu myos myed chos kyang stond byed cing // bskald pa bye bar de ni rmongs myed 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon pos mdo mchog rgyal po 'di stond pa'i tshe na gang gis sngon mthong la/ 
228b2(mdo): rgyal ba mchog las 'di ni zos gyur nas// phyi ma'i dus su de ni dga' bas 'dzind// dri phyi sa 'i bum pa gyis 'dor ltar// 'dod pa skyon du 'grang pa spong byed cing // mkhas pa nges 'byung zhi la mngon dkal ste// 
228b3(mdo): rtag du myos myed dgon pa sten par byed// yangs pa'i grong khyer mchog du gnas nas su// der ni bshad tshe gang gis mthong zhing// 'dra ba 'bad la mchod byed mthong ba ni// phyi ma li dus su mdo mchog 'di 'dzind/ 
228b4(mdo): to// ral bu gang zhig rtag tu rjes 'brang zhing // byang chub zhispyad mchog spyod pa ni// sems can rnams ni rtag tu 'dul// byed pa// phyi ma'i dus su mdo mchog 'di 'dzind to// sangs rgyas
228b5(mdo): 'dres pa gzhal byed dpag myed kyi// spyad pa spyod tshe gang gis rim 'gro dang // de bzhin mchod pa mchod dag byas pa ni// de ni phyi dus rgyal mchog chos 'dzind to// gang zhig pas khad pa khye
228b6(mdo): bang tshangs spyad cing // 'jig rten mtha' yas/ don ni sngar gyung pa// gang zhig phyi ma'i dus su mdo sde 'di// thos pa'i bsod nams grangs su 'gyur ma yin// sangs rgyas 'khrug myed yang na tshe dpag myed
228b7(mdo): sangs rgyas gzhal myed dpag byed de dag 'dir // sems can snying po gang gis mtho 'dod pa// mdo sde mdzes pa dpag byed gzung bar gis// tshe dpag myed dang myi 'khrugs dri myed 'od// seng ge
228b8(mdo): dang ni tog dang de bzhin du gang zhig sangs rgyas de kun mthong 'dod pa// phyi ma'i dus su rgyal mchod chos zung shig// sangs rgyas byams pa dang ni dri myed 'od// bdag nyid chen po dang ni seng ge tog/ 
229a1(mdo): rab snar gtso bo de bzhin mthong 'dod pa// de ni phyi dus rgyal mchog chos zung shig/ 'di 'dra'i mdo sde khyad par 'phags mchog dag/ rin chen dra ba can la ra yis bshad// phyi ma'i
229a2(mdo): dus su de tshe khyod kyis ni// bag myed gnas la 'dug par ma byed cig/ phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe mu gyurd pas// tshul khrims spyod byed rtag u bag phyis dang // de nas khyod i 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ 
229a3(mdo): rgyas pa 'od zer mtha' yas can gi zhing // rin chen ldan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten khams// steng gi 'jig rten khams su 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas khyod ni 'chi ba'i dus byas nas// myur ba nyid du
229a4(mdo): sangs rgyas byams pa mthong // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHlad pa dang // li tsha bi gzhon mu rin chen dra ba can dang // byams pa las stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag
229a5(mdo): bzhi bcu dang // dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag drug bcu dang // lha h+ye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu rnams yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
229a6(mdo): 'phags pa rin chen dra ba can gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / rdzogs s+ho// / rgya kar gi mkhan po gnya' da kar ba dang / lo tsa ba khan
229a7(mdo): ste ye shes sdes bsgyur // / zhu chen gi lo che ba khan de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ rgya kar skad du// A s+ya pra mA ba ri bring
229a8(mdo): tshan ma ma hA yAs su // bod skad du// 'phags pa tshangs pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
229b1(mdo): bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer yangs pa na tshal chen po'i khab pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na/ dge slong khri ny+dzi stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
229b2(mdo): sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig du bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mya nyal tsam gyi nam gyi gung thun la/ skyis mo grum bcas nas dran pa mngon du bzhag ste/ rtog pa dang bcas pa
229b3(mdo): dpyod pa dang bcas pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de las bzhengs nas rtog pa myed pa// 
229b4(mdo): dpyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzin da las skyes pa'i dga' ba// dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de las kyang bzhengs nas/ 
229b5(mdo): dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral ba/ btang snyoms pa/ dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde bar gnas pa/ bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de las bzhengs
229b6(mdo): nas bde ba yang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba yang nub pas phyir sdug bsngal yang myed bde yang myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/ 
229b7(mdo): gtan gnyis pa la zhugs so// bsam gtan gnyis pa las bzhengs nas/ bsam gtan dang po la zhugs so// bsam gtan dang po las bzhengs nas gdul bya ji ltar pa bzhin du sems can la
230a1(mdo): gzugs kyi sus kun tu stond pa zhes bya ba li'i nge 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das gdus bya ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la gzugs kyi lus kun tu stond pa'i ting nge
230a2(mdo): 'dzind/ de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de la// bcom ldan 'das shi nad tu lham me lhan na lha der bzhugs te/ mi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs pa'i gnas na 'dug bzhin
230a3(mdo): du bcom ldan 'das shi nad tu lham me lhan ne lhang nge ba dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgya nad pa mthong ngo // mthong nas tsakyang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas myi sngang
230a4(mdo): par gyur nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshal chen po 'od kyis sdang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ha cang / yang myi ring ba zhig du 'dug go// de nas myi mjed kyi bdag po
230a5(mdo): tshangs pas 'di snyam du bsams te// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad sa nams ni bsnyen par bka' ba/ rnam par shes par bka' ba yin na// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyom/ 
230a6(mdo): par zhugs pa la bdag gis gre ba bsal ba'i sgra'am/ sgra ba tsam gyis bzhengs par gsol ba ni/ bdag gi ma ma yin gyis tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das bzhengs par gsol/ 
230a7(mdo): kor ma chag snyam ste/ de nas kyi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tha gos zaka pa ka cig tu gzar nas 'dug bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbya rang la bdud te// mgu btud nas bcom
230a8(mdo): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad me ba dag gis bzhengs par gsol to// mgos dri ma la mchis rnam par dag/ lga dang mchog rnams dang dri za dang // sru dpa la sbyin rnams kyis legs mchod pa/ 
230b1(mdo): sems can sram slad mgon po khyod la mchod// dper na ri ni rab tu myi g.yos dang // ji ltar rgya mtsho ga ting ni mying pogs ltar// bdud rnams thams cad kyis kyang myi g.yos la// thub pa skyes bu
230b2(mdo): mchog ni bsam gtan mdzad// zang zing myi mngal mtshan ma myi maral zhi // tha dad myi mnga' rtend pa myi mngal la// gnas myi mngal zhing snang ba myi mngal ba// thub pa skyes bu dam pa bas
230b3(mdo): gtan mdzod// rtog ge rnams kyi yul ni ma lags shing // byis pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma/ lags la// sems dang sems las byang las rab 'das pa// bsam gtan pha rol gshegs pa
230b4(mdo): bsam gtan mdzad// mgon po seng ge bzhin du gsungs yang \u0f88\u0f90 gas// thub pa 'brug bzhin ldog pa rab du mdzad// dpa'o// dpra ba bzhin du rab tu mdzes// sems can dkon mchog khyod la
230b5(mdo): phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bskul pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu/ 'ad dag gis bskul bar thugs su chud nas// ji ltar skyil grum bcas
230b6(mdo): pa de nyid kyis ting pe 'dzind de las bzhengs to// bzhengs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la bstan pa'i phyir// mgur stsalang pa'i sgra mdzad pa dang // myi mjed gi bdag po tshangs
230b7(mdo): pas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzind de las bzhengs te// ji ltar skyil mo krum bcas de nyid kyis bzhugs par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyi nad nas// bcom ldan
230b8(mdo): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas
231a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstand pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
231a2(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bkal rtsa lad to// 
231a3(mdo): tshangs pa zhu ba lung bstand pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs phyes tshangs pa// khyod ci dang mi 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus shig/ dang zhus pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstand pas ras
231a4(mdo): khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye bas// myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das
231a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos du dang ldan ni mya rang tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya lags// de skad ces gso/ 
231a6(mdo): pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis kyi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal dang ngo // tshangs pa khyang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po dag chos gcig dang ldam na sbyarab tu
231a7(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya'o// chos gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa'o// tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi rjes su
231a8(mdo): song ba'i dran pa ji lta bu yin zhe na// tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpal mi 'grolo snyam pa'i dram pa dang ldan pa yin zhing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ldog go snyam du dran pa dang ldan pa
231b1(mdo): yin zhing ya dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyal lo snyam pa dang ldang ngo snyam pa dpa' chag go snyam pa dang / 'dug go snyam du dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab du shes
231b2(mdo): so// de gcig pu dben par 'dug ste// nang du yang dag bzhag nas 'khrug pa myed pa'i yid kyis lus 'di nyid la 'di lta ste// kye ma lus 'di ni myi rtag brtan pa myi rtag pa/ rang bzhin gyis
231b3(mdo): nyam chung ba snying po myed pa// ther zug ma yin pa/ rnam par 'thor ba'i chos can/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can/ rtend cing 'brelang bar 'byung ba sgyu ma dang 'dra ba/ zil pa'i thigs pa dang
231b4(mdo): 'dra ba/ g.yo ba myi gnas pa/ myi gtsang ba rnag gi dring ba can/ rlung dang nyi mas mthar gtug pa mthar 'drul pa/ mthar rdul du 'gyur ba/ ngan skyugs kyi mthar thug pa nad
231b5(mdo): mang ba/ gnod pa can 'go ba'i nad ma ba/ na ba 'jig pa dang can rus pa bstsogs pa dri nga ba/ 'dzag pa can bsgrims/ te/ rim 'gro bya dgos pa yin par yang dag pa'i dran pas
231b6(mdo): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog go// de de ltam yang dag pa'i dran pas/ lus kyi skyon rnams yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du rab tu shes pas lus la chags pa dang / lus la kun tu 'dod chags
231b7(mdo): pa dang / lus la gdag gi nyid yin pa myi skyed do// de lus la myi lta bas srog chags pa dang / srog la kun tu 'dod chags dang / srog la bdag gi nyid yin pa myi skyed do// de lus dang srog la myi
231b8(mdo): stabs chos gos ngan ngon dang kha zas ngan ngon dang / daM lus la mya stabs srag la chags pa dang / mal chad pa ste na dang mngon dang / na b.lig so sman dang / yo byad/ ngamangon tsam dag gis chog par 'dzind pa
232a1(mdo): yin no// de tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi bya ba gang dag yin pa/ don dang ldan pa rnams sam/ dge ba dang ldan pa rnams kyang de dag la stond par byed de// yongs su myi skyo
232a2(mdo): zhing yongs su yi 'chad pa myen la yongs su skyo ba'i sems myi skyed de de mkhan po dang / slob dpon gi kan du 'gro na// dran pa dang ldan zhing 'di snyam sems te/ mkhan po dag ni bsnyen par dka' ba/ slob
232a3(mdo): dpon dag ni bsnyen par dka' ba ste/ bdag der song ba na sdig pa myi dge ba kun tu spyod pa 'ag zhig gis pa dag la glengs shing / dran par byas na/ myi rung ngo snyam nas de rgyu de dang / rkyend de dang gzhi des bslab pa
232a4(mdo): rnams la gum par byed par 'gyur te/ rku nad par byed pa dang / legs par bya ba byed pa dang / zhi rnal du byed pa dang / shin/ tu yongs su mthar thug par byed pa can du 'gyur ro// de u
232a5(mdo): pa rnams la gus par byed pa nyid dang / rtuld par byed pa nyid dang / legs par bya ba byed pa nyid dang / zhi nal du byed pa nyid dang / shin tu yongs su mthar thug par byed pa nyid kyis mkhan po dang slob
232a6(mdo): dpon gi kan du 'gro ba na/ bag tsha ba myed pa dang bag 'khyams pa myed par 'gro zhing kyi 'jigs pa dang / stan gcig byung ba'i rgod pa yang myi stend te/ ci'i phyir zhe na gus pa dang bcas shing zhesas dang bcas
232a7(mdo): pa yin la blo rigs kyi bag ma bzhin du mdzes pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// de mdzes pa dang ldan pas lus kyi skyon dang lus kyi nyes pa spyod pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong ngo // tshangs pa
232a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi skyon dang lus kyi nyes par spyod pa de dag gang zhe na/ tshangs pa srog gcod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi skyon dang lus kyi nyes par spyod pa yin no// tshangs pa ma byin par lend pa dang / 
232b1(mdo): 'am na na sa kyikyis bgyod pa yin no// na da 'dus duna'adis
232b2(mdo): dpa' ni 'dod chags kyi dpang gis srog chags kyi srog gcod par byed/ she sadu kyi dbang dang / tI mun kyi dbang kyis srog chags smyig gcod par gyi byed do// ma can gzhan dag dang gang lagagan
232b3(mdo): nams la bdag tsam du 'du shes par byed cing / sdug pa'i bu tsam du 'du shes par byed de/ bdag nyid kyis sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi srog gcod par myi byed do// gzhan dag kyang
232b4(mdo): srog gcod du myi 'jug ko// gzhan dag srog pa la yang rjes su yi rab bar gyi byed do// gzhon dag/ bdag gis kyang rtsig // gzhas dag kyang gcod su kyi 'jug go// gzhan dag
232b5(mdo): dacod pa la yang rjes su yi rang bar myi byed do// bdag kyang myi rdeg go// gzhan dag kyang rdeg du myi 'jug go// gzhan dag / rdeg par byed pa la yang rjes su yi rang bar myi byed do// 
232b6(mdo): ji ltar ma byin par lend pa spong ba yin zhe na/ tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpal ni sems can rnams kyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad ka padag yin pa 'di lta ste/ gser dang nor bu dang mu tig dang bye du r+ya dang
232b7(mdo): dung dang man shes dang bye ru dang sa le sA ma dang / dngul las stsogs pa dang / gos dang rgyan gi rnam pa dag dang / nor dang 'bru dang mdzod dang bang ba'i rnam pa de dag la chags pa myi skyed de dag la rnam par
232b8(mdo): rtog par myi byed cing // su 'phrog myi byed do// su 'phrog byed du kyi 'jug go// su 'brog byed pa rnams la rjes su yi 'ang bar myi byed do// de kro na yod pa 'am dkon pa ni yod pa ma khyen zhing ma
233a1(mdo): gan ba rtsa'i 'das ma tsam yang len par myi byed do// ji ltar na gyi tshangs par pyod pa spong ba yin zhe na/ tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpal dbang po rnams kyi sgo legs par bsrungs shing gnas
233a2(mdo): pa yin/ legs par bsdams pa yin/ mthun pa'i gnas su rgyu ba yin/ shind tu bsrungs pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ rtag tu bsrungs pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin// de dran pas yin kun du bsrungs pa
233a3(mdo): yin/ lus dang ngag shi na tu bsdams pa yin no// 'thun pa'i gnas su rgya la dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing 'di snyam du yang sems skyed de/ myi zhig gis bye ba zhib mo shi nad du bsregs pa lag pa gnyis
233a4(mdo): kyi snyim pas blangs te// myig gnyis bkang ba ni pra li/ chags pa'i sems kyis yul gyi bzang mo la lba ba ni de lta yin no// de ci'i phyi ro zhe na/ bdag yul gyi bzang mo la bltos
233a5(mdo): pas yun ring po ma sung zhing bcom la ma rung par 'gyur ba'i phyi mo snyam mo// de de ltar lus kyi rjes sus zhing bzal ba/ dang / btung ba dang / gnas dang mal cha dang / sman rnams
233a6(mdo): dran pa legs par gnas pas yin te// de dag la spyod pa lan ro myang bar myi byed cing chags pa'i sems myed pa yin no// gal te de yongs su spyod pa na bde ba skye ba lta na des de la 'di ltar nye bar rtag
233a7(mdo): par bya ste/ bde bar snang ba 'di ni bzlog pa'i sgo nas sdug bsngal yin te khams gsum pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi dngos po bde ba gang yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus byas myi rtag gi/ 
233a8(mdo): phyir ro// mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can dag dngos po myi rtag pa rnams la bde ba'i 'du shes ji ltar skyed snyam du brtag par bya'o// tshangs pa lagal te byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spyod pa
233b1(mdo): na sdug bsngal kho na skye'i bde ba ni ma yin te/ sdug bsngal des kyang yongs su gnod cing nyon mongs na des de la sems 'di ltar nye bar gzhag par bya ste/ lus 'di ni bsgrims te yongs su bskyang
233b2(mdo): dgos pa gsum gyis bsgrub dgos pa ste// 'di ni sdug bsngal rtsom par gzung bar myi nus kyi// bde ba rtsom pas bzung bar bya ba yin te/ bdag gis lus brtan zhing 'tsho ba 'dis dge ba
233b3(mdo): chos rnams bsgrub par bya'o// dper na rnyed pa 'dod pa'i tshong pa khal khur rnams stong bran byed bcos legs byed pa ni khur khal rnamapa brgyand pa'i phyir ma yin// bde bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin gyi// 
233b4(mdo): gzhan du na ci tsam du khal bka sad pa bsku ba'i phyir ro// dede bzhin du byang chub sems dpal kha zas za ba yang/ lus brgyand pa 'i phyir zas zab I/ lus bde bar bya ba'i phyir
233b5(mdo): ma yin gyi/ gzhan du na ci tsam du khal bka lad/ lus dpa' ng+ge/ lad pa'i dge ba'i phyogs bsgral ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems nye bar gzhag par bya'o// tshangs pa gal te/ byang
233b6(mdo): chub sems dpal de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gnyen pos sems shes par byed myi nus na de 'di snyam du bsams par bya ste// sems shes bya ba 'di ni yar phyind lnga dkal ba/ 
233b7(mdo): myi mthun pa 'dzind pa/ 'khor pa la mngon du phyogs pa/ dge ba'i phyogs la gyi phyogs pa/ yul mngon du phyogs pa/ dben pa la myi phyogs pa// bde ba la mngon du phyogs pa
233b8(mdo): sdug bsngal la gyi phyogs pa/ wA ga la dgal sa la mngon tu phyogs pa/ spros pa la mngon du phyogs pa/ de kho na la rnam par lta bal gyi phyogs pa/ myi gtsang ba la mngon du phyogs pa/ 
234a1(mdo): gtsang ba la myi phyogs pa/ gdul dkal la gzung dkal ba/ gnas myed pa/ rten myed pa/ gsog gsos/ skad cig pra/ rgyu dang rkye nad tshogs pa las khyang ba yin na/ mkhas pa'i/ 
234a2(mdo): rang bzhin nan su zhig 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can sems kyi dbang du 'gro zhing rjes su 'jug snyam yu bsam mo// de de ltar sems la dran pa nye bar gnas pas/ sems gdus pa'i phyir nan tan byed do// 
234a3(mdo): de ser lnga'i sems gdul ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ tha na kham cig tsam 'am/ rgya shug tsam 'am/ mon sran grelu tsam 'am/ tis 'bru tsam yang rung / de yang thams cad la sbyi
234a4(mdo): par byed kyi/ sdug pa rnams lA ma yin/ 'dris pa rnam/ sa mA yin no// de lam mang pa'i tshul khrims kyi semasagadul ba'i phyir tshul khrims srung ste// lus dpangag
234a5(mdo): yid kyis skyon byed par byed pa yin// 'dren mar myi byed pa yin/ nag nog can du myi byed pa yin te/ tshul khrims des bdag la spyod par myi byed gzhan la smod par myi byed do// de no// 
234a6(mdo): sems kyi sems gdul ba'i phyir/ bzod pa bsgom ste de grong ngam gro brdal du zhugs pa na gshe yang ci myi snyam par byed do// brgyad kyang rung rdeg kyang rung / bsdigs kyang rung / rnam par 'jog yang ruH
234a7(mdo): khyod kyang rung ste ci gyi snyim par byed do// kye ma dge slong 'di mgo reg ngan pa'o// kye sa dge sbyong 'di ni go reg myi sug pa ngan pa'o// zhes 'jig rtem gyis dpyas kyang ci myi snyam par byed do// 
234a8(mdo): yang dag pa ma yin pas bsku rad kyang bzod par byed cing dang du lend la/ las bdag gir bya ba nyid la rton te/ bzod pa des kyang bdag la spyod par myi khyed gzhan la smod par myi byed do// de le lo la
234b1(mdo): sems gdul ba'i phyir dang / byang chub kyi phyogs pa'i chos ma thob pa rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / thob pa rnams 'phel par bya ba'i phyir dang / 'brel ba rnams yongs su phyind par bya ba 'i phyir dang / yongs
234b2(mdo): su smin pa rnams yang dag par gzung bar bya ba'i phyir dang / yang dag par bzung ba rnams rnam par dbye ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo// de sems can gi ched rnams dang sems can gyi bya ba rnams la yongs/ 
234b3(mdo): su myi sbyong zhing // yongs su yid myi 'chad de yongs su skyo ba'i sems myi skyed do// de gdol pa la phan gdags kyang rung / rgyal po la phan gdags kyang rung / shi na tu lam ring por yang 'gro ste/ tha dad khar
234b4(mdo): myi dmyigs shing rgyun myi dacod pa yin no// gal te byang chub sems/ dpa' sdug bsngal zhing bkres pa'i sems can gyis dngos po wa/ chad ngan pa zhig gis bstabs/ sam/ 'byord cing nor che ba gang yang
234b5(mdo): rung ba zhig gis dngos po bzang po mchog gya nom pa zhig bstabs kyang / de la byang chub sems dpal snying brtse ba'i sems bzhag la gusabar bstod cing yang dag par gzeng bstod la/ yang dag par 'dzin da
234b6(mdo): du gzhug cing dngos po ngan pa de blang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhes/ 'di lta ste/ mug bsngal ba'i sbyin la 'di ni sbyin pa bya dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro// de rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems gdul ba'i phyir/ bsam
234b7(mdo): gtan bsam gtan byed de/ ji ltar bsam gtan byed de ce na/ tshangs pa 'di la byang chub dpa' mi thog ma kho nar lus legs par bsdams pa yin no// lus dben par gnas pa yin no// lus kyi 'du 'dzi
234b8(mdo): rnams kyang yongs su spong ngo // lus la lhag par chags par yang 'dor ro// sus/ lI ba 'am yang la yang shes so// lus dang 'thun pa dang lus 'tsho ba dang lus kyi stobs kyang rab du shes so// dka ehA/ 
235a1(mdo): par bsdams pa yin te/ spa ba nyung zhing brjod pa nyung ngo // don smra ba yin zhing rigs par smra ba yin te/ bre mo gtam la dga' ba yongs su sangs pa yin no// de yid legs par bsdams pa yin
235a2(mdo): te// myi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs so// de de ltar gnas gsum yongs su dag pas sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po la gzugs rnams ca myi sdang pa 'a bya ba'i phyir
235a3(mdo): nan tan byed de// de dag la mtshan mor myi 'dzind mngon rtags su myi 'dzind do// rgyan dang gos kyi rnam pa sna tshogs dag la yang mtshan mar myi 'dzind cing mdon rtags su myi 'dzind pa yin no// gzugs dang sgra
235a4(mdo): dang dri dang ro dang reg pa sna tshogs dag la yang mtshan mar myi 'dzin da ci mngon rtags su myi 'dzind pa yin no// skyes pa dang bud myed dang khye'u dang bu mo rnams la yang mtshan mar myi 'dzind cing
235a5(mdo): mngon rtag su myi 'dzind pa yin no// de gcig pu dben par 'dug nas nang tu yang dag 'jog cing sems gnas par bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed de// myi stug pa la dmyigs pa'am/ byams pa
235a6(mdo): la dmyigs pa 'am/ snying te la dmyigs pa 'am/ yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yang rung bas ji ltar lus khyengs par myi 'gyur de ltar dmyigs par byed de// rgyud rnams/ dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba myi 'gag go// 
235a7(mdo): na rnams kyang myi 'chad do// rlub 'khrug par myi 'gyur ro// sems logs par rnam par g.yeng bar myi 'gyur ro// de 'chag gam nyal lam/ 'gre bangam 'dug kyang dmyigs pa de nyid kyis 'dug go// de nyid
235a8(mdo): la sems gtod do// tshangs pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpal dmyigs pa la sems brtan par gyud pa de'i tshe sems la sems mnyam par 'jog ste// sems kyis sems kyang myi dmyigs so// gang gis
235b1(mdo): mnyam par gzhag pa de yang gyi dmyigs so// gang gi phyir mnyam par 'jog pa de yang kyi dmigs so// de 'di sa sa phyi sems te gyes byis pas mapam skye ba 'di dag sa gsog gi chos rnams dang / gas
235b2(mdo): chos rnams la mngon par zhend to snyam du sems te// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lhag mthong zhes bya'o// de ltar rnam par mthong pas nyon mongs pa rnams pa rnam kun tu myi 'byung zhing myi 'jug pa de ni byang chub
235b3(mdo): sems dpa'i zhi gnas shes bya'o// tshangs pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpal gcig pu dben par 'dug ste nang du yang dag bzhag nas mying dang yi ge ji ltar thos pa rnams nges pa'i tshig gi gdags pas yang dag par
235b4(mdo): 'jog cing yi ge de dag la nye bar rtog ste// de de ltar nye sa pa na yi/ dge rnams gsog dang gsol du mthong ngo po// de yi ge rnams gsog dang gsob tu mthong nas/ mying rnams kyang gsog dang gsob
235b5(mdo): du mthong ngo // ga pa la mying de 'dogs pa de yang gsog dang gsob tu mthong ngo // de la gzugs gang dang gang snang ba de dang de yang gas ga dang gsob tu mthong ngo // des gsog dpag sob tu mtho pas/ 
235b6(mdo): yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa mi lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pas de la 'dus byas rmyis dang 'dra bar snang ngo // de la byang chub sems dpal so sor brtags nas// sems can
235b7(mdo): la stabs snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar bzhag nas gnas so// de 'chal pa'i shes rabs kyi sems gdul ba'i phyir shes rab sgom par byed do// ji ltar sgom par byed ce na/ de kun rdzob kyi tshul du bshad
235b8(mdo): pa 'am/ don dam pa'i tshul du bshad pa'i mdo lnga gang dag yin pa de dag brjod pa gsal zhing zung phyind pa dag gis ma noras papa 'dzind to// ma nor da par chos stond pa las bzung nas kyang ma nodad pa'i
236a1(mdo): bsam pas sems par byed do// sgom pa'i rnal 'byor da la brtson par byed do// de ye shes kyi stobs dang shes rab kyi bye brag gis sems can myi dmyigs/ srog myi dmyigs gso ba myi dmyig
236a2(mdo): skyes bu myi dmyigs/ gang zag myi dmyigs/ shed las skyes myi dmyigs/ shed bu myi dmyigs te/ thams cad kyi thams cad du chad par lta ba yang myi ltung ngo // btags pa'i tha snyan rnams yang legs par
236a3(mdo): bslabs pa yin no// de zind pa'i sa'i khams dang / mazind pa'i sa'i khams la yang yang dag kyi sa rab kyis tshul gcig tu so sor rtog go// zind pa'i chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams
236a4(mdo): dang / mchi nad pa la yang yang pa'i shes rab kyis tshul gcig tu daso sor rtog ste// de gnyi ga yang gsog dang bsob nyid tu mtsho dpazhing // sems po nyid dang / snying po myed pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
236a5(mdo): du mthong ngo // des de ltar mthong bas ji ltar phyi rol gi khams rnam sa la mngon par chags pa myed pa de ltar// nang gi rnams la yang ngo // myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / gzugs rnams la ya
236a6(mdo): yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis tshul gcig tu so so rtog go// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / skra rnams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / dri rnams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / ro nams dang / 
236a7(mdo): sus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / reg bya rnams la yang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis tshul gcig pu so sor rtog go// de sa'i khams la ni sra ba nyid du yang rab tu shes la// gshe pa nyid dang / tsha ba nyid dang / 
236a8(mdo): khong stong nyid du yang rab tu shes so// chu'i khams la gsher pa nyid yang rab tu shes la/ sra ba nyid dang / tsha ba nyid dang / khong sto nyid du yang rab tu shes so// me'i khams la tshab nyid du yang rab tu
236b1(mdo): shes la ma ba nyid sa dang / gshem ba nyid dang / khong stong nyid du yang rab tu shes so// rlung gi khams la g.yom nyid tu ya pa rab tu shes la/ yang zhing g.yo ba nyid yang rab tu shes so// de nam mkha'i khams
236b2(mdo): ma'od srong du lang rab tu shes la// thams cad du song ba nyid du yang rab tu shes so// rnams par shes pa'i khams la snga ma las bu nyid du yang rab tu shes la/ byin mi log nyid sus pa rab tu shes so/ 
236b3(mdo): phyin ci ma logs pa nyid du yang rab tu shes so// de myig gi rnam par shes pa la stong pa nyid dang / gzugs la myi rtag pa nyid du yang rab tu shes so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la stong pa nyid dang / 
236b4(mdo): la myi rtag pa nyid dang / sA'i rnam par shes pa la stong pa nyi/ dang / dril myi rtag pa nyid dang / gre'i rnam par shes pa/ la stong pa nyid dang / rol gyi rtag pa nyid dang / lus kyi rnam
236b5(mdo): shes pa la stong pa nyid dang / reg bya la myi rtag pa nyid du/ yang rab tu shes so// de de ltar shes rab la mkhas pas shind tu rtogs pa'i shes rab dang ldan zhing shes rab rdo ba dang ldan te/ 
236b6(mdo): dge ba'i chos rnams kyang rab tu shes dge ba'i chos rnams kyang rab tu shes so// nyan thos yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyang rab tu sheso// rang sangs rgyas yang dag par 'grub par byed/ 
236b7(mdo): pa'i chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpal yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyang rab tu shes so// de myi dge ba/ 
236b8(mdo): chos rnams kyi rnam par sbyind pa chu ngu dang / 'bring dang chen po sems can dmyal ba dang rnams dang / dud 'gro rnams dang yi dgas rnams su skye ba yang rab tu shes so// de skyes pa rnams kyi tshor ba
237a1(mdo): chu ngu dang / 'bring dang chen po yang rab tu shes so// dge ba'i chos 'an rnams kyi rnam par shes srid pa chung ngu dnga' bring dang chen po/ lha rnams kyi nang du 'ang/ myi rnams kyi rang du smind pa
237a2(mdo): cad yang rab tu shes so// der skyes pa rnams kyi 'bras bu chu pu dang 'bring dang chen po yang rab tu shes so// nyan thos yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyi rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon tu bya
237a3(mdo): pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dad kyi 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rnam pa yang rab tu shes so// shes rab kyi/ 
237a4(mdo): rnam par grol ba nyid dang / gnyi ka'i cha las rnam par grol ba yang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas yang dag par 'grub par byed ba'i chos rnams kyi yang dag par 'grub pa yang rab tu shes so// 
237a5(mdo): 'bras bu dang zhi pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sem/ sa dpa' yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyi tshogs kyi lam yang rab tu shes so// ye shes kyi lam yang rab
237a6(mdo): tu shes so// shes nas kyang tshogs kyi lam dang ye shes kyi lam la brtson par byed do// sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul ma pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so// mthu che/ 
237a7(mdo): ba nyid dang / dam pa'i nyid dang / rab mchog nyid dang / phul tu byung ba nyid dang / che ba nyid dang / nyan thos dang / ra sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang thun mong ba yang ma yin nag gzhan
237a8(mdo): sems can thams cad dpa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'i thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so// de de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa legs par nye bar gnas la// sdig pa'i chos thams// 
237b1(mdo): cad dang ni bral/ dge ba'i chos ni yang dag par thob/ lus kyis gnod pa ni myed/ rnam par shes pas 'phangs pa ni myed/ sems kyis 'phangs pa ni myed la/ chos rnams kyi rgyu'i tshogs dang 'bras bu yang
237b2(mdo): dag po ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas/ dper na rgya mtsho'i rlabs bzhin du dge ba'i chos rnams kyis 'phel te// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i rlabs 'bri zhing yang 'byung ba ltar/ byang chub sems dpal ni chos rnams/ 
237b3(mdo): las de lta ma yin no// de dper na zla ba yar kyi ro la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar dge' chos rnams kyis mngon par 'phe yad te/ ji ltar mar gyi ngo la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bri ba'i chos can yin pa ltar/ byang chub
237b4(mdo): sems dpa' ni chos rnams las de lta ma yin no// de dper na/ dbyar kyi dus kyi phu chu 'brug pa ltar dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mngon par 'phel te/ ji ltar phu chu 'brug pa dbyar gyi dus zad na
237b5(mdo): 'bri ba'i chos can yin pa ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnams las de lta ma yin no// tshangs pa de ltar bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni myu rab tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
237b6(mdo): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de 'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bkal saHyad to// lus kyi skyon rnams rab shes na// lus yod skyon rnams myi sten to// lus la dran
237b7(mdo): pa legs gnas na// skyon myed zhi ba'i gnas 'thob po// lus kyi skyon rnams myi shes na// lus la yod pa'i skyon myi rtogs// sus la dran pa kyi gnas na// sdug bsngal bzod dka'i gnas
237b8(mdo): 'thob po// sems kyi skyon rnams rab shes na// sems yod skyon rnams kyi the sten to// sems la dran pa legs gnas na// skyon myed zhi ba'i gnas 'thob bo// sems kyi skyon rnams myi shes
238a1(mdo): na// sems la yod pa'i skyon myi rtogs// sems la dran pa myi gnas na sdug bsngal bzod dka'i gnas 'thob bo// dge ba'i chos rnams sten byed cing // myi dge ba'i chos rnams

238a7(mdo): cad dang ldan pa'i tshal chen po 'od kyis sdang bar byas nas nga der 'ongs te phyi nad nas/ pal mngon par bstod de lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig pu 'dug go// phyogs gcig du
238a8(mdo): 'dug nas// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas pal 'di skad ces gsoyod to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstand pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ bcom ldan
238b1(mdo): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa' dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'gal zhig u lags so// dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang / ngas kyi mjed kyi bangag yo rngas
238b2(mdo): pa la 'odi skad ces bkalas \u0f7f lang to// tshangs pa zhu ba lung bstand pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs byes tshangs pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa zhus shig dang / zhus pa de dang de
238b3(mdo): nyid kyi lung bstan pas/ ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas ngas skabs phye bas myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
238b4(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos du dang ldan na/ myurang du p+la nu myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs dbar 'tshang rgya lags/ dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang
238b5(mdo): ngas myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' saHyad to// tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpA/ chen po dag chos gcig dang ldan na/ myu na tu bla na myed pa yang
238b6(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa rdzogs 'o// chos gcig gang zhe na 'di ste// lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa'o// dge slong dag ras kyi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa de la lus kyi rjes su song po'i
238b7(mdo): dran pa'i rgyu dpa las dang / 'bras bu yang bstand to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dgal bos 'di skad ces gas lod to// legs so legaso// bcom ldan 'das gyis myi
238b8(mdo): kyi bdag po tshangs pa la gang bstan pa de skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang myi rnams kyi don dang / smand pa dang bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsolapa// dge
239a1(mdo): slong sar pa sar pa rnams dang / chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung ba nas ring po ma lags shing mchis nas ring po ma lags pa da / rnams dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes
239a2(mdo): bu dam pa 'di dag gis thos na/ dga' ba dang dad pa rang 'thob par 'gyur// bslab pa de la yang sbyor bar brtson par gnas par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis myi mched kyi bdag
239a3(mdo): po tshangs pa la gang bshad pa de/ dge slong de dag la yang bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsosad do// bcom ldan 'das legs par bka las ma na
239a4(mdo): bde bar gshegs pa legs par bkalal yad do// dmyi mched kyi bdag po'i rnas pa mdo sde 'di sa udag yod/ suzhu ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis nas zhun
239a5(mdo): pa yang legs par smras pa lags so// kyi bcom ldan 'das myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pas gal te dge ba'i rtsa pa gzhan ma mchis na yang zhu ba zhus pa'i mdo las/ skyes pa'i
239a6(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kho nas myu rab tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya lags so// de mi'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i thal dang su
239a7(mdo): ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par do myi thog pa'i srad du'o// de ci la skad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad kyi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pas zhu ba 'di sems can thams cad
239a8(mdo): kyi lce'i don tu zhus pa'i srad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka las ad pa/ kun dkas po den bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// dems bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan la kun dga'
239b1(mdo): bos 'di skad ces gso lang ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnams grangs 'di'i mying rtsi lags// 'di mi ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas \u0f7fla pa// kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod
239b2(mdo): kyis 'di tshangs pas zhus pa zhes bya bar zur shig/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshul bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bag yod pa'i tshul bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das
239b3(mdo): kyis de skad ces bkal sa \u0f7f lang nas// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpal dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang myi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas
239b4(mdo): pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pas tshad nges pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// 
239b5(mdo): rgya kar gi mkhan po 'dzin myi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ma ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa// @#/ rgya kar skad du

244b8(mdo): mo glang chen pa lang ma se ge dang / wa dang sprul dang phag dang khyi la stsogs par gyur da rnams su// rtsa za ba dang sha dang bdud rtsi lo ma'i zas za zhing // de dag rtag tu gzhan gi zhur khyer khyod cang
245a1(mdo): dub par 'gyur// bkres pas zhi lad kyis nond pas gcig la gcig za lhur byed pa// bskal pa khrag khrig rnams su 'ang nam yang tha rapa par myi 'gyur zhipa/ ji lta ba rgya mtsho gcig na ru sbal

245a5(mdo): pa lhur byed pa'i phyir/ bdag nyid kyang longs spyod par myi byed pa dang // / chos ma yin pa dang ldan pali phyir phrag dog dang / ser sna lUr byed pas/ spun dang / sring mo dang / bu dang chung ma dang / 
245a6(mdo): bram dpalas byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / 'dre lad pa dang / sbyin gnas dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa thams cad la rab tu sbyin
245a7(mdo): bar myi byed cing / pha ma dgal yang rab du sbyin par myi byed pa dang / nges par baspang bar 'os pa dag myi spyod la/ bsnyen bkur myi byed cing / bla ma la mi gus la/ gces par myi byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i
245a8(mdo): blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni yi dgas rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka lasaHlad to// bkren pa'i nyes pas
245b1(mdo): bcom pa nor gtong myi phod pa// de dag gzhan dag las mi blang bar 'dod par byed// mdzod rnams kyi ni sgo 'phar dam du bsdams pa rnams// 'dir ni bskya ba 'os rtsa lag mchog rnams gso myi byed/ 
245b2(mdo): gzhan nor bu chud gsos pa yis rtag tu lpags pa rnams// tha ma la yang de dgar ba rtsu ba byams can gyis// de dag bdag gi chung ma la grogs g.yog tshogs la// 'byig sbyin myi byed shi na du snying brtse shes
245b3(mdo): myed cing // dkar po dag las log pa de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas// yun ring mchog tu lus 'bar sdug bsngal yi dgas 'gyur// de dag lo brgya rnams su rmil lam rmis par ya // gos dang zas
245b4(mdo): dang btung ga' nga nam yang rmi myi 'gyur// khab 'dra'i kha dang rid chen lta bu'i sgo can rnams// nyam thag shard dang nub kyi rgya mtshom rgyug par byed// kha nas me 'bar lus ngan/ phyogs dang lho phyogs/ 
245b5(mdo): gzhan// skams par mthong nas re chen myed rnams lhung bar 'gyur// gshin rte'i pho nya dpung mgo las gru bar ba stug cing // sra lA na rnams kyis mnand nas zangs bzhun bzod dka la ra ba// me barba
245b6(mdo): bo bro myed pa de dag rnamasas la srung / rmongs rnams yan lag brgya ldan chu bzhin 'thung bar byed// nang grol lus kyi khog pa bsregs pa bsil ba'i chub kyis su// skyes pa'i bdag nyid rnams la spong
245b7(mdo): ces yang ltung byed// de nas shi 'phos myi'i 'jig rten 'dir skyes rnams// rigs dpa longs spyod lus g.yog rnams kyis dman par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros
245b8(mdo): la bka' saHlad pa// spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni// rigs mthon po rnams su 'gyur te/ lngag zhe na/ 'di lta ste zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin pa dag gos 'jig
246a1(mdo): rten thams cad la gnod sems byed par gyurd la nang // dkon mchog gsum dpa la ma la gus pa dang // lhan cig skyes pa 'i bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / shind tu gya nom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
246a2(mdo): gsung rnam pa sna tshogs klog pa dang / kha don du bya ba la brtson pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni rigs mthon po rnams su 'gyur ro// de nas bcom
246a3(mdo): ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bkalasaHla da to// bsam byas gang dag bsod nams tshogs pa bsngal bzang sbyin pa'i cho ga bzhin// kun tu sems can ma pa la kun 'gyed/ 
246a4(mdo): de dag rtag nad myed 'gyur// tshe dang kha dog stobs ldan lus can da'ajig rten mchog du 'gyur// mtshungs dang rgya chen khyad/ par can gyis mdzes brjod rim chen mi dbang bzhin/ 'dul la/ 
246a5(mdo): nyams dga'i dkon mchog mtshungs myed pa ma rnams la bsnyen bkru/ ra pas// shi nad du / rgya chen gtso mchog khyim du skyes/ pa grangs myed skye bos mchod// shin tu nus kyang yid
246a6(mdo): 'khrug rnam spangs kun tu gzigs kyis 'phags pa rnams// 'jig rten rnams kyi myig du sdug pa zhal bzang rigs ni mthongan kho ma 'gyur// gang dag brtan zhing kun bzod shi nang tu yid bzang dkar dang
246a7(mdo): mthun rnams dang // myi rnams gang dag shes rab dag mchog/ sangs rgyas gsum la kha don/ brtson// de dag 'byor da pa thob nas rigs mchog skyes pa kun tu kun mchog mdzes// de dag dge bas rgyas pas lus
246a8(mdo): chen rgya mtsho la chen po bzhin du pas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang // spobs pa'i blo gros la bkalas \u0f7flad pa// spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams mi// bran
246b1(mdo): dang bran mo nyid thob par 'gyur te// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha ma rnams la myi gus pa dang / gya nom pa'i sems ma yin pa dang / zlog pa myed cing ci dgar sdig pa spyod pa dang // gzhan gi nor 'phrog pa dang / bu lon
246b2(mdo): phrogs nas bdag sbed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni bran dang bran mo nyid thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bkalas yang to// 
246b3(mdo): bsod nams rgya chen 'byord pa gangs 'od lta bu'i khyim du skye thob nas// blun po gang dag rgyags khyengs dregs pas/ dkrugs shing gus par myi khyed la// pha ma rnams la ma byung sbyind nas 'dra ba pa 'du shes myi byed pa
246b4(mdo): de dag nyes pas gzhan du 'jig rten dbang gyur sa dman zhing g.yon can gyur du// dkon mchog mtshungs myed rnams la ma gus lhur byed ma rungs brlang tshig gyur // gang dag khyams dang de
246b5(mdo): bzhin snying rje ma lus dge ba chud bzon pa/ grangs myed skye bar 'dzind myed gzhan 'joms do mtsha myed shes shing // myi'i yul du bran nyid spangs nas skad cig gis ni dman par 'gyur
246b6(mdo): gzugs dang dbang phyug rigs mchog blo bral dman la mos pa'i glen par 'gyur// dkon mchog rnams ma mchod pas nga rgyal myed cing zhanadadal mdangs ram 'gyur// dpal kun myed cing ting 'dzin bral ba las
246b7(mdo): nams kyis ni bsdigs par 'gyur// de dag 'jig rten kun dga' dag la ston da ches tshogs myed cing tshegs kyis 'tsho// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' saHlad pa/ spobs pa'i
246b8(mdo): blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni skal pa bzang por 'gyur zhing // khyim khol dang kha dri zhim pa dang / gnod pa myed pa dang / lus dang sems shind tu sbyangs pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / skye bo mang
247a1(mdo): pos bsngags pa rnams su 'gyur te// lnga gang zhen 'du shes ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa dang / ma tshang ba myed pa dang / sgo bdags pa myed pa'i tshig dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas/ theg pa chen
247a2(mdo): po dang / theg pa rnam gsum po thams cad kyi tshig gi rang bzhin la myi bzod pa myed cing myi smod la/ myi spo ba zhi pa de thams cad gzung ba dang / bshad pa dang / klag pa dang / kha ton las pa sotshogs pa byed pa dang / 8/ 
247a3(mdo): gi skyon bzhil po tshad myed pa rnam par spong zhi ba/ 'phags pa'i lam la skur pa myi 'debs pa dang / sems can log par sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams la snying brtse zhing yongs su bskyar ba dang / skyon de las bzlog cing
247a4(mdo): dge ba la dgod pa dang / gzhan gi skyon mthong pa'i brjod pa yal bar 'jog ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po// de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ myi rnams kyi napa du skyes nas
247a5(mdo): skal pa bzang por 'gyur zhing / khyim khol dang ldan pa dang / kha dri zhim pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / mthun pa dang / skye bo mang po dga' ba dang / mye ngan myed pa dang / sems tha mal du
247a6(mdo): gnas pa dang / khro ba myed pa dang / gnod pa myed pa dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang / grags pa dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bkal
247a7(mdo): mang yang ngo to// sangs rgyas sosogs la shind tu shas cher gus 'bad pa ma rnams mchod pas// rtag tu dag skyon/ kun bral 'jig rten dag du rmad du byung bar 'gyur// tshig gi yon tan gzung 'os pa/ 
247a8(mdo): smang banas shing tshe rabs kun tu phan// ud dpal dri dang mdzes pa'i rlung ldan la'i sa phyogs su snyand pa grags// gang dag bdag byams gzhan mtshungs myi lan skyon brjod sdig pa ngan pa las// phral nas
247b1(mdo): dge ba kun la sems can rnams ni sbyor du 'jug byed pa// de dag myi li 'jig rten thob nas skal bzang kun tu thams cad dkal// gang dag bdag khyams// shi nad tu yid 'obo rin chen yul can bde gnas
247b2(mdo): sdig las ldog par 'gyur// dam pa'i chos ni gzung dang bstan brtson de sems byed cing nges par 'gyur// 'dir ni sems can kun la pha ma 'dra ba'i byams pa'i sems ldan 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus
247b3(mdo): su lus can kun ni rid kyi rtse lag tshogs gyur ba ces// de ltar zla ba lta bu'i sems sbyangs de dag la ni phan par byed// 'gran dregs khyang gsod las matogs rnam pa sna tshogs phan tshun sum 'byind pa'i// 
247b4(mdo): sdig pa yongs su spangs nas dag pa 'i yid can skyon rnams kun spangs nas// sems can/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dge bas/ snyam tshogs phan tshun brjod par byed// myur du lha'i dbang phyug
247b5(mdo): mtshungs myed thos nas sangs rgyas dge ba / 'gyur// de nas bcu ma ldan 'das kyis spobs pa'i blo gros la bkal sa rbald pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ 
247b6(mdo): myi dam pa thob nas rtag tu sgru pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing / skye bo mang po mya dgal ba dang / kha dri mya zhim pa dang / sems myi dgal ba dang // gnod pa mang ba dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa
247b7(mdo): ma yin par 'gyur te/ ldag pa zhe na/ btsun pu smra ba dang / brdzun tu skabs rtag tu gzhan slu ba'i sems lhur byed pa dang / chos kyi 'brel pa'i gdam chen po la 'dus pa na/ chos kyi gtam de
247b8(mdo): rnam par smod pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams mthong na de dag la brnyas shing khyad du gsod pa dang / dma' ba'i sems su byed pa ste// spobs pa li blo gros sems can las/ snga po
248a1(mdo): dag dang ldan pa rnams na gyi li dam pa thos nas// rtag tu skur pa/ 'debs pa/ 'thob par 'gyur zhing / skye bo mang po myi dgal ba dang / medog myi sdug pa dang / kha dI myi zhim pa dang / sems kyi/ 
248a2(mdo): dgal ba dang / gnod pa mang kha dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bkalas \u0f7flad to// sems yid rnams kyis
248a3(mdo): gzhan/ sems drag tu 'khrug dang sdig pa rnams byas pas// log pa'i ngag dang gzhan la gnod par dga' ba tha ma rnab sems dang // lus kyi sdug bsngal da zhal myed rdzogs pa par myed nyam su
248a4(mdo): myong bar 'gyur// lcags kyi lcags kyu chen po rnon po rnams kyis nyams thag lce 'byind 'gyur// gshin na rje'i dbangaphyag gnas su 'amyi rnams shind tu zangs bskos ldud par 'gyur
248a5(mdo): dmyal bar myi bden tshig can skyes pa de dag dga' bar yod myi 'gyur// gang tshe 'dir ni tshig bzang bral ba ro ltar kha dri myi zhim zhi ba// 'jig rten myig du sdug pa yin 'ong blta sdug ma yin
248a6(mdo): nams su 'gyur// rgyal po'i pho bra ba 'khor du myi snyan skur 'debs bzod pa'i skyon yang zhi pa// de dag du ni skyon gnas myi nis ya mang pos gleng par 'gyur// sems can brdzun snga rnams kyis tha mal
248a7(mdo): sems dang lus bde ma yin gyis// sngar bshad nyes 'gro de'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal mang po spyod par 'gyur/ myi nyid spangs nas dbang byed kyi rnams bde ba kun la su byed pa'i// sems cam dmyal ba'i 'dzin
248a8(mdo): rten 'gro 'gyur de nas shi 'phos gyur da nas ni// 'gro ba lnga po li 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rtsub par dud 'gro rnams su skye/ de ltar lus can 'byam pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba myed// de nas bcom ldan
248b1(mdo): 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka la satshal pa// spobs pa'i blo gros dge sbyong dang rigs kyi gu dpa / rigs kyi bu mo nyes par zhi ba sa gtso bo ma 'dzind pa'i sems can ches lnga dang ldan pa rnams/ 
248b2(mdo): ni/ kang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba de dang de thams cad du/ rtag par sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun dang phrad pa thob par 'gyur zhipa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas
248b3(mdo): kyang de dag las chos kyang thos nas yid dag la zhing ji bsams pa bzhin du byang chub rnams thob par 'gyur la/ mi 'dod pa bzhin du phun su tshogs pa rnas kyang thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe ma 'di lta
248b4(mdo): ste/ bdag nyid dkon mchog la skyabs su song nas/ gzhan dag/ kyang gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba sgrub pa la rnam par 'jog/ par byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kun tu rdzogs shing
248b5(mdo): rgyas la rgya chen po legs par byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i kr-i sku/ gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon du shes shing gus pa dang bcas pa dang / bkal blo / bde ba
248b6(mdo): dang 'thun par 'dzind par sgrub pa dang / kun tu thogs pa myed pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis/ sems can thams cad bdag dang 'dra zhing / bu gcig pa'i byis pa dang 'dra bar mthong ba dang / ji ltar brtsas
248b7(mdo): pa'i mdo sgrub pa dang / klag pa dang / kha don dang / lung mnod pa dang / bshad pa rnams yid la byed pa yangs shi pa rnam sna tshogs pa dag gis bar chad myed par bsgom pa la mngon par zhend cing / srug
248b8(mdo): par byed pa ste// spobs pa'i blo gros dge sbyong dang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi pa gtso bo ma 'dzind pa sems can chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba
249a1(mdo): de dngade thams cad du/ bar chad myed par sangs rgyas dang cho pa dge 'dun dkon chog rnams dang myi 'bral bar 'gyum zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang / 
249a2(mdo): de dag las chos kyang thos nas yid dag la zho ni bsas pa bzhin du byang chub rnams thob par 'gyur la/ mi 'dod pa bzhin du phun gsum tshogs pa rnams kyang thob pam 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
249a3(mdo): kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bag las sa yang do// kapa dag sangs rgyas yon tan mchog kyi chos la gnas// de dag nyid kyis sems can thams cad 'dus par byed// sangs rgyas su gzugs
249a4(mdo): gzugs legs rnams ni byed par gyur pa// mkhas pa rnams ni/ slob dpon tshig la mchod par byed// gang dag phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jig rten ma lus la// bdag dang bu
249a5(mdo): cig byis pa rnams dpa' drar mthong su// de dag srid pa kun tu mya dang / myed nges 'gyur// shin tu rnam dag thugs ma la sangs rgya sa rnams kyang mthong // de dag shes rab rin chen chen po
249a6(mdo): 'byor nga mdzod rnams// nyin dang mtshan su dgel ba kun tu spyod par byed// 'dir mched du byung ba'i 'od dpa ldan pa rnams// / 'jig rten mun pa che la sngab ba mchog byed 'gyur// kun tu chos
249a7(mdo): nas thams cad rab tu rnam khye nas// sangs rgyas lum lus mchog ni gzhal myed par// nges par byas nas lha dang bcas pa 'i 'jig rten gyi// mthar thug 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni shes pa/ 
249a8(mdo): 'gyur// de nas tshong dpon spobs pa 'i blo gros chos kyi rje grangs// 'ad mos nas/ tshim zhing mgu ste/ yid rang nas rab tu dgal ste dgal ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ mye skye ba'i chos la
249b1(mdo): bzod pa thob bo// tshong dpon gyi u lnga parga tsam khro dang / so so li ga yog 'khor lnga brgya po de dag mi/ chos la chos kyi khyig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba thob bo// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du
249b2(mdo): lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkhal ldi pa dang / myi 'am mi dang / lto 'phye chen po dang myi dang myi ma yin pa ci snyed 'dus par gyur da pa de thams cad kyis ni rtsi bsams pa bzhin du
249b3(mdo): ci theg pa rnams sa sems bskyed do// shami 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa yang thob cing / me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / gos dang / rgyas las latshogs pa dpag tu myed pa rnams kyis bcom ldan
249b4(mdo): nam sa gtonan to// de nas tshob dpon spobs pa'i blo gros stan/ rnams langs te/ tha gos phrag pa gcig tu gzu rang nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
249b5(mdo): 'das gas pa de sogasu thal mo spa dad pa btud nas 'di med ces phyog so yod to// bcom ldan 'das khams gsum pa'i du chos lnga po 'di dag legs par gsungs pa legs po
249b6(mdo): legs so// chos lta po de dag thos nas 'khob 'di yod bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par don grub par 'gyur lags so// ma 'ongs pa'i rjemal can rnams kyang 'di nyid thos nas/ nag po'i phyogs spangs te/ dkar po
249b7(mdo): phyogs la zhugs shing bdul zhugs ub pa pan gyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das dge slong kyi dge 'dus dang thabs gcig lus pa bdag gi sum par phyan 'dren na/ bdag cag la zhugs 'artse ba'i lud du/ khyod kyi
249b8(mdo): de skar gnas par mdzad su gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo grog la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnad par mdzad do// de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros/ bcom ldam
250a1(mdo): 'dis kyis gan par rig nas/ tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs nas/ rab tu dgal ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal da te/ bcom ldan 'das
250a2(mdo): a lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas ta bcom ldan 'das kyi thad tu nas song ngo // de rang gi khyim du song nas/ pha ma gnyis kyi rkang pa la phyags byas ste/ thal mo sbyar pa pug yug por sbyar
250a3(mdo): nas pa/ 'di skad ces ldas so// yab yum 'di ltar gapa 'jig rten na shin tu dkon pa de 'i bzhis gshegs pa bla na myed pa chos kyi rgyal po khams gsum pa thams cad las 'das pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong
250a4(mdo): gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig sus pa bdag gis gtugs tshod la spyan mangs ma/ des kyang bdag cag la/ thugs brtse ba'i skad du/ gnang lags kyis mkhyen par mdzod cig/ de nas
250a5(mdo): spobs pa'i blo gros kyi pha ma dag yid dag la ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// bu legs so khyod kyis legs so par byas so zhes mngon papa stong de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las la s+ho/ 
250a6(mdo): par gyur to// de nas spobs pa 'i the gros kyis rang kyi chung ma dam pa g.yog 'khor bcas pa la bsko la/ bzang mo khyod gos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
250a7(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa'i don tu bza' ba dang btung ba ro brgya dang ldan pa/ mang ba dang bsod par sbyor da cig/ sbyar nas kya pa/ khyim thams cad chag chag gdab pa dang / phyag dang / 
250a8(mdo): bya ba dang / bla re bre ba dang / dar gyi lnga ldi gdags pa dang / me tog cha lad par dgram dang / gdugs spos dri zhim pos gdug par byed du chug la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi
250b1(mdo): dge 'atsun dang thabs cig pa'i gdan ci 'os zing zhe mchod yon dang / zhabs la dbul ba spyas sngar gzhag pas/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa de la sdod cig ces 'gro / spobs pa'i blo gros mngan
250b2(mdo): bshes dang / blon po dang / nye shu dang / rgan rabs las pasotshogs pa dang lhan cig 'grogs shing jisad spras pa thams cad byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan mo 'das nas dge slong
250b3(mdo): kyi dge 'dun dpa' bas gcig du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal bskyed mos tshal chen po nas byung nas/ sems can rnams la krugs brtse ba'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dpal rnam par/ 
250b4(mdo): 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i rol pas cho 'phrul dpa'/ sa par mnyan du yod pa li grong khyer/ chen por gshegs so// gshegs nas kyang rim gyis/ spobs pa'i blo gos
250b5(mdo): kye khyim ka la yid logs su bzhud do// de nas spobs pa'i blo gros g.yog 'khor bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'asu nas/ mchod yon dang / zhabs/ la dbul khas/ bcom ldan
250b6(mdo): 'das kyi zhabs la mag las phyag 'tshal du nas/ bcom ldan 'das zham 'bring pa dang bcas par khyim gyi nang du gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das ni ci 'os pa'i stan mchog la bzhugs so/ 
250b7(mdo): dge slong gyi dge 'dun na ci 'os pa la 'khod do// de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyi pha ma dang / sras dang / mdza' shes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs rnams ni yid dag la zhing 'dud la/ 
250b8(mdo): bla ma la gus pa dang / gces par byed pa chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig pa la/ 'drim par rtsom mo// spobs pa'i blo gros ni/ me tog dang / spos chur
251a1(mdo): bcas pas bkang ba'i ril ba thogs nas/ stond pa'i spyar/ sngar 'dug par gyur to// yang de'i tshe sdug bsngal ba'i grogs po gnyis shig spobs pa'i blo gros kyi khyim chung phyi nas par
251a2(mdo): 6/ gyur nas/ de gnyis las gcig ni dge 'dun gi nang du zhug so// de'i tshe dge slong thams cad la bzal ba dang btung ba 'byor da pa tshogs zhes ma smras la// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rjes su thugs
251a3(mdo): rab ba ma gsungs pas/ de la gang gis kyang ci yang ma byin nas/ dri khros te phyir byung nas/ 'di snyam du kye ma sdug bsngal ba bdag la gang gis ci yang ma byin pa ni dge sbyong bdag nyid ngan pa rnaMs ste/ 
251a4(mdo): sems nye bar zhi pa ma yin zhing snying rje myed la/ byams pa'i// sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dag go// kang de dag la phyi na yang 'bras bu myed pa de lta bu dag la byin par byed pa ni/ 
251a5(mdo): sbyin bdag blun po ste/ ga lede bdag rgyal por gyur da na/ thams cad kyi mgo lcags kyi 'khor los gcod do// snyam du sems bar gyur to// de nas de'i 'og pu dge slong thams cad la
251a6(mdo): bza' ba dang bcal ba dag 'byor da tshogs shes byas shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rjes su thugs rang bar mdzad pa dang / gcig shos 'ongs par gyur to// des ni bzal ba dang phan btung ba
251a7(mdo): mapa pa dang / bsod pa thob nas de yi rangs te/ phyir byung nas/ 'di snyam du kye ma sdug bsngal ba bdag la gang dag gis/ bzal ba dang btung ba mang ba dang / bsod pa'i byim pa mi dge sbyong bdag nyid chen po
251a8(mdo): rnams ste/ stang brtse bar byed la/ sems nye ba bzhi pa yin zhi ba/ byams pa'i bdag nyid can dag go// 'dis ni bdag zhag bdun du tshim par bya'o// gang 'di dag la byin na 'bras bu che ba
251b1(mdo): spyan gnas chen po 'di lca bu dag la sbyin par byed pa ni// sbyin bdag chen po mkhas pa ste/ legs so gal te bdag rgyal por gyur da na/ sangs rgyas las kha sotshogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhag bdun/ 
251b2(mdo): du bsnyen bkur thams cad kyis rami 'gro byed par 'gyurd cig snyam du sems par gyur to// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsolang nas/ sacad sder bu gyu ste/ phyag bcas nas// tshe dang ldan
251b3(mdo): pa kun dga' bo la bka las da pa// kun dga' bo deng phyir chad bza' ba dang btung ba ma blangs pa nyid du/ rjes su yi rab ba brjod cing // de nas spobs pa'i blo gros g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ 
251b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis brel yang dag par dgal ba dang / yang dag par gzer bya stod pa/ dang / yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa sngon du mdzad pa'i chos/ 
251b5(mdo): kyi gtam sems can mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa la nas pa tshogs s+ho/ bang mdzad do// gdas las bzhengs nas 'thud de/ rgyal bu rgya pyid kyi tshil tu gshegs nas/ dem bzhugs so// de na sa sug
251b6(mdo): bsngal ba de gnyis 'khom 'khor 'khyam 'byam ste yul gzhan zhig tu song nas/ pa zad tshu bad tsas kyi phyogs su zhal bar gyur to// de sa bsod nams kyi las can de la steng gi nam ma'al la grib ma 'i don du/ 
251b7(mdo): sprin gi bla re klog dang chu ba 'byung ba dang bcas pa rab tu gnas par gyurd to// de'i tshen yul de na rgyal po ga pa yin pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas so// de na gang rgyal srid la dbang bskur bar bya ba'i rgyas po
251b8(mdo): 'i mtshan dang ldan pa yang gzhan myed do// de na tshong dpon dang / grob myi dang / yul myi dang / blon po dang chen po dang / blon po dang / bsgo ba dang / 'khor ma 'khod pa rnams ni/ mtshan mkhan dang / lhas mkhas
252a1(mdo): dang / skar ma dang / gzal spyod pa la mkhas pa la rgyal por 'gyur ba su yod ces bcom par gyur da cing 'dri'o// des smras pa/ skyes bu dbul la/ mtshan dang ldan pa shig yod de/ de ni rgyal po
252a2(mdo): 'gyur ro// de nas de dag brgyan thams cad kyis brgya nad pa/ rgyal po la/ 'os pa rimathar che ba'i khyi stan ma bza ba po/ gser ka rkeng rten dang bcas pa dang / yu kha nor bu las byas pa'i gdugs dkar po dang / 
252a3(mdo): yul kaser las byas shing nor bu dang ldan pa'i rnga a'i kha sa la yab da / spos chus bkor pa'i bum pa yu ma dang / rgyal po'i me tog dang / rgyan 'phreng dang / gos dang dbu brgyand/ dang thod dang bcas pa la

252a6(mdo): dkyil 'khor gyis khebs pa dgal zhipa gsal ba'i phyogs de mthong ngam/ de dag gis smras pa/ grogs po mthong ngo // des smras pa de na rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldas pa'i skyes bu de 'dug we/ 
252a7(mdo): de'i bsod nams kyi las kyis grib ma'i don du sprin de dag 'dus so// de nas de dag de dong ste/ sas snyan dang klu dbyangs kyi sgras sman pa te// btud nas de la 'di skad ces smras so// dbang bskur
252a8(mdo): pa bzhengs la rgyal por gyur cig/ des smras pa/ kho bo lta bu rgyal po'i 'os ka la yin// de dag gis smras pa/ bsod nams kyi las can khyod de skad ma zer bar/ khyod gdon myi za bar

256b7(mdo): b+hu myed mgyogs pa'i mchog/ bsam gtan chos mchog zas mchog ni// 'bras can pas ni mi mchog ldan// dge 'dum tshogs kyi gzhal la se 'am// zhi gnas smam la rab tu
256b8(mdo): spyod// de dag ldan zhing phyir myi ldog/ de ni yang dag dge slong yin// gtso bo gsum dpa'akhor lnga ldan// dra ba srong snod bcas par sel ldan// lus ngag yid gsum na pa
257a1(mdo): bsdams// rangab kyi spyom pa du la zhugs btas// de yang ya dag dge slong yin// de gnyis tha rang pa 'i grong khyer la// bsnyenas pas tha dad pa bde ba'i mchog/ yang dag ma yin/ 
257a2(mdo): gcag shos ni// ldum bzer la stsogs rab 'bar ba'i// dmyal ba'i khro chu lta puR+Ya ni// bskal pa stong phrag bzhi ru 'tshed// la la'i tshul khrims bde ba ste// Na la'i tshul khrims sdug bsngal rgyu// 
257a3(mdo): tshul khrims ldan pa/ bde ba'i cho ga/ tshul khrims 'chal pa sdug bsngal yin// shind su legs par tshul khrims gang // bsdams pas myi de mdzes pa yin// 'dul ba la ni nyo bar gnas// tshul khris
257a4(mdo): bslab pa rang yid ches// myi de nyi ma cig la yang // bsod nams phung po dpal myed pa// sog cing sangs rgyas 'bras bu spun// rab gi ste ra~M pa la skus 'debs cing // bslab pa dag
257a5(mdo): la gyi gnas shi // bde bar gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa/ gzugs tsam rtul ni rtend nas su// nga ni dge slong yin zer // slar bsnyen sna lar la btags pa 'am
257a6(mdo): sbrum ma sbyar rtsi 'thungs pa ltar// rgya de nyi ma cig la yang // sdig pa'i sa 'on dpag myed dang // rapa la gnod pa sna tshogs pa// bskam// byed par 'gyur ba kho na yin// kar zhig/ bsrob la myi gnas/ 
257a7(mdo): shing // bde bar gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin// bskal pa kyi gnas skad cig la// gzugs bor khyim par gnas pa bzang // bslab kyi tsha gnas la rtags 'dzin pa// 'jig rten pa mi thams cad kyi
257a8(mdo): sbyi su sdug par myi 'gyur zhing // kun gyi tshig gi ngan sdo la// dper na sdom po babang po la// yun ring yal ga/ 'khrungs pa'i bzhin/ kyi ng+ge rtags tsam 'dzin da pa/ na/ kham mtho'i gtam 'brel da
257b1(mdo): bu bzhin du srungs// srog la khab kyang tshul khrims mi// gtong ba myi mkhas blun po yin// srog chad phyi ma skye ba ste// tshul khri ma su phyi ma de lta phyin// de bas nye 'ama' khor stsogs kyis/ 
257b2(mdo): de nyid la mi brtan par zung // de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas lad nas// nye lnga la khom las stsogs pa dge slongapa de dag 'dri rungs te// bcom ldan 'das kyi sde gsungs pa lnga
257b3(mdo): mngon par 'azod do// 'phags pa nye 'a la kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i 'o// rdzogs
257b4(mdo): dge 'ong gi da tsun yin pa sa pas gcig ste/ byang chu sems dpa'i dge btsun chen po dang thabs gcin no// denas byung rgyabya sems dpa' thams dpa'i rnam pa byams pa smyan las sangs
258a1(mdo): gang lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bkalas \u0f7fsad pa// byams pa us slong gsum gi stong chen po 'jig rten ki Sham/ 
258a2(mdo): gang ga'i klur gyi bye ma snyed rin po che sA brgyan gyis yongs su bkang ste// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dbul bar phul ba pas/ gang gis snying rje pas tshigs
258a3(mdo): su bcad pa gcig gzhan gyi rgyud la bzhag na// bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des/ brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro/ stong gi cha dang / 'bum gi chad pa/ bye ba'i cha dang / 
258a4(mdo): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gi cha dang / grangs dang chad pa/ dkra ba dung / dpe dang / rgyur yang myi bzod do// bcom ldan la/ das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa la te// bde bar gshegs pas
258a5(mdo): de skad ces gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yA pa 'di skad ces bkal sa rba lad to// gas te gang ga'i byed snyed 'jig rten khams// / de dag rin chen khur bur bkang byas te// dgal rab
258a6(mdo): sems kyis rgyal la phul ba bas// gang kas tshigs bcad cig cog sems can byin// rin chen byin pa shin tu rgya chen te// snyi rje myong nas tshigs pa cad byin pa la// gang gis kham pa dang ma dang grangs/

258a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / sA dang/ kyi dang / rnam yin dang / dri zam bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi nangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mdzes par stod do//

258b3(mdo): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa tus cig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul rin che bkod pa'i 'khor gi khyams ka de

258b6(mdo): tu skyed pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa la 'jug pa// kun nas ma smad pa/ ye shes kyis rnam par spyod pa/ de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa la 'jug pa/ phyi ma li mtha' bskal par mngon du bstod pa/ yon tan kyi

258b8(mdo): tshogs ni mngal/ chos thams cad la ni mngal brnyes/ sems can thams kyi bsam pa'i bya ba ni shin tu mkhyen/ dbang po'i dam pa'i pha rold tu ni byon/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi

259a2(mdo): thams cad kyang cang shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol la/ nyon moms pa thams cad kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcom pa la brtson pa/ de bzhin gshegs
259a3(mdo): pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ chos zab mo la gnas par mkhas pa/ dmyigs su med pa'i chos las nges par byar ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa phus sum tshogs pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs
259a4(mdo): pa'i bkal la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa?/ tshogs nasa'adus pa'i byang chub sems dpal sems// dpa' chen po dpag tu myed/ grangs myed/ bsam gyis myi

259a8(mdo): cad mkhyedad pa 'i ye shes la nye bar gyu da pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpal klog gi lha zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpal g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems

259b3(mdo): dpa' chen po dpag tu myed/ tshad myed/ grangs myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab/ mtshungs pa byed/ gzhal du myed/ dpag gis myi lang brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa dag dang yang thabs gcig go//

259b5(mdo): 'di bshad pa na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de nam mkha li kyi na 'khod cing / bkod pa chen po kha pa khertsegs pa'i nang na bdag/ 'dug pa snyam du shes so// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi bkod

259b7(mdo): gnod sbyin dang dri za'i 'khor de dag thams cad ma gtogs par stong gsum gi stong chen po li 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gzugs su snang ba lhag ma gzhan thams cad myed par gyurd te/ thams cad kyang nam mkha'
259b8(mdo): lta bur gyur da pa snyam tu shes so// 'di lta ste/ dper na bskal pas shind tu bsregs te/ nam mkhal bzhin du gyur pa ma stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams na/ gzugs su sdang ba ga pa yang myig
260a1(mdo): sngar sna bar gyi 'gyur ba de bzhin du de'i tshe ma gang pa gzugs su lda ba rnams sems can dag gi phyig sngar gyi sngam par gyur to// 'dis ste/ dperan/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin poche
260a2(mdo): bkod pa gcig pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dkod pa chen po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi kha pa brtsegs pa yongs su longs spyod pa de 'dra ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de na snang ngo // 
260a3(mdo): nam mkha' la khab pa brtsegs pa 'dug pa de dag ma rtogs par/ stong ka su gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di sa li ste pa dang / gzhi'i khar du thams cad kyang myi lnga pa ba snyam du rab tu shes te/ ri'i

262a7(mdo): cad gnas la myed pa dang / kun gzhi myed las chos thams cad dmyigs pa byed pa dang / kun bzhi dang bral gas chos thams cad kun nas gzhi myed pa ste/ sha mi'i bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rin po

262b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' chad byed pa dag mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnams par shes pa la 'azod pa/ chos thams cad la dbang byed pa rjes su 'thob bo// yang ga 'i bu bkod pa che po'i 'jig rte gyi

262b5(mdo): cad dang bral ba/ byams pa chen pos brgyan cing sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par gnas pa/ snying rje chen pos brgyan cing sems can thams cad ma mtha' yongs su myi gtong bar
262b6(mdo): gnas pa dga' ba chen pos brgyan cing sems cam thams cad dgal ba dang / bde ba dang / rab tu dga' ba la so sor 'god pa'i rgyun myi gcod pa/ gtang snyoms chen pos brgyan cing sems can thas cad
262b7(mdo): myi mtho myi dma' ba la 'god pa rgyun gyi gcod par sbyor ba sha stag go// yang sha ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ byang chub seMs/ 
262b8(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba 'dug ste/ bsod nams kyi bzi brjid kyis shin tu brjed pa/ ye shes mthong ba thogs pa myed pa/ mtshan rnams kyis lus brgyan pa/ dpel
263a1(mdo): byad bza po rnams kyis khyams pa brgyan pa/ spobs pas ngag brgyan pa/ gzugs kyis sems brgyan pa/ thos pas dran pa brgyan pa nges par sems pas bden pa brgyan pa rtogs pas/ 
263a2(mdo): don rtogs pa brgyan pa/ brtsam pas dam bcas pa brgyan pa/ khyad par du 'gro bas/ lhag pa'i bsam la brgyan pa/ spyod pas brgyan cing chos thams cad la the tsom myed par gyur da pa/ btang snyoms
263a3(mdo): chen pos brgyan cing mthon dman myed pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos brgyan cing / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtsen pa thams cad mngon par shes pa/ bsod nams kyis brgyan cing / lag na rin po
263a4(mdo): che gtong ba mngon par grub pa/ ye shes kyis brgyan cing / secan thas na gyi sems kyi bsam pa la zhugs pa/ blo brgyan cing sems can thams cad dgel ba li za la rtogs par byed la
263a5(mdo): phyag gyis brgyan cing khyig lnga'i yul shin tu rnam par dag pa/ rnakhas brgyam cing sgra dang don thams cad rtogs pa snying po dang ldan pa/ so so yang dag par rig pas brgyan cing // don
263a6(mdo): dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pams yang dag par rig pa myi zad par smonod pa/ gobs kyis brgyan cing de bzhin gshegs pa ma su zas bu rgya rjes su thob pa myi 'jigs pas rgyan
263a7(mdo): na sa 'am cad kyis pam rgyas gyon da nan gyi brgyan cing / ngas sa ma ma makyis brgyan cing ba'i thugamams ca ma chos rdzogs pa pa maman
263b1(mdo): par lung ston pa/ kadams pa dang rjes su bstan pas brgyan cing de byed pa'i chos tshar phyin pa/ rdzu 'phrul gi cho 'phrul gis brgyan cing rdzu 'phrul rnam par dag pas rnam par grol ba thams cad ston pa/ 
263b2(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngom par bstod pas brgyan ci nga / gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la gnas pa// tshogs thams cad kyi yon tan gyis brgyan cad/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos 'dul
263b3(mdo): ba'i rjes su zhugs pa ste/ sha ri'i bu ka pa bkod pa 'di lta bu kun tu sdang ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' nam mtha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs so// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen
263b4(mdo): po nam mkha' mdzod de pal blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kau nam/ dgrangs 'di rab tu yongs su bzung ba dang / phyogs bcu'i
263b5(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'didas/ chos kyi dgas pa dang / bde ba dang / mchog tu dgal ba skyes pa dang / theg pa chen po'i 'di 'ang rab tu yongs bzung ba dang / 
263b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyang yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ba'i gam du 'ong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po rnam mkha'i mdzod de bzhin gshegs
263b7(mdo): rin po che bkod pa gcig mede la gsos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye 'phrag bcu gnyis kyis yongs su bskor te/ mdun tu 'angs nas ldan gcig du mngon du gyur pa'i thu 'phral mngos par 'du gyi byed pa/ 
263b8(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rold pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pas bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas kyi sdang par gyur te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig/ 'byung ba tsas kyis myi mched kyi 'jig rtem gyi khams
264a1(mdo): 'dir phyin nas de bar snang la 'dug ste/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi me tog dang / 'phre ba dang / phye ma dang / spobs dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang // 
264a2(mdo): pa dam ci 'dral ba de 'dral ba'i char rab tu phab pa 'di lta ste/ zla ba dang / sA la rab mdzes dang / dri ma myed pa dang / kun tu rim byed 'od dang / zla ba chen po dang / shinas tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang / 
264a3(mdo): ni ma'i 'od dngag nyi sa rab tu 'bar ba dang / ske shel dang / mnog yengs dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / mdog ma dzes par 'dug pa dang / sA la dang / sa la chen po dang / sbrul rab tu mdzes dang
264a4(mdo): dri ma myed pa dang / kun tu dri ma myed dang / rnam rig 'od dang / kas tu snang dang / nam mkha' snga dang / reg gyu dang / rin chenadakar dang / mdag brgya pa dang / ze la stong ldan dang / mye ngas
264a5(mdo): sel dang / dga' byed dang / lhas bstod dang / klu'i me tog dang / dga' ba kun skyed dang / bsam gtan yan lag dang / dris dga' dang / lus sems tshim byed dang / sngo gsum dri dang // 
264a6(mdo): nad kun bzhi byed dang / nad kunas yang dang / bdag gi gzi brjid kyis brgyan cing dpag tu myed pa'i bsod nams kyis grub pa/ phyogs bcu la byang chub sems dpal reg pa de lta bu'i me tog gis stong gsum gyi
264a7(mdo): grob chen po'i byang gi nyen ki/ Sha la 'di kun tu khebs par byas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khod kyi dkyis thams cad du me tog gis pus lo nug pa tsam drug bar gyur do// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'
264a8(mdo): des sngon ma thos ma mthong pa 'i me tog mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i me tog/ bstan sdug pa 'di dag ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
264b1(mdo): bka' yas lang pa/ skyes bu dam pa byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod de/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams de nas 'dir 'ongs te/ de nam mkha'i dkyil du 'dug nas 'di lta bu/ 
264b2(mdo): me tog kyi rnga ma rab tu bab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po de dag dang ldan gcig pu nam mkha'i dkyil de nas khabs
264b3(mdo): tibacom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos// phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkas
264b4(mdo): pa gcig pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyu ma/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang / bde bar reg/ pa la gnas sam/ zhes spyasnyun gsol zhing / byang chub ses
264b5(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mtha'i mdzod do las stsogs pa// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs nyan 'tshal ba 'di dag
264b6(mdo): ltar chos thams cad la dbang bgyid cing / chos chen po dang ldan nas/ slar ldog par gyur pa'i chos kyi bka' mchid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mag par mdzod cig ces de skad kyang gsung // 
264b7(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpal nam mkha'i mdzod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ki lil+li'i steng gi khar snang la dpag stong phrag bcu tsam kyi/ rin po che lig tugs byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
264b8(mdo): la thal mo sbyar te// phyag 'tshal nas// tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// chos dang don dang yon tan ye shes 'phags pas na/ yongs dag rnam dag snga nas dag cing dri myed
265a1(mdo): gnas nam mtha' 'dra bar myi g.yo rab tu bsnyes// rab zab kun nas spyod yul myin la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba chos kyi sku ni rab phye sku mnyam yang / 1/ gzugs mdzes ldan zhing
265a2(mdo): gzugs 'azang su yang ston par mdzad// sems can rnams la phan pa'i thug rje rab bskyed nas// bsod nams brgya'i mtshas kyi sku yi mchog kyang ston// khyod se ni mying gsung tog myed spa dang
265a3(mdo): tshig kyang myed// tshig gi rab bzhin brag ca'i mtshan nyid gzung du myed// sgra myed rtag myed ye ge myed pa mkhyen nas kyang // byas pa khyon ni snying rje can pas rgyal ba'i tshig kyang gsung // sems cam
265a4(mdo): kun gyi sems dpe sems byung rjes su rig/ khyod ni sems kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid mkhyen// sems kyi rgyu/ kyi rang bzhin ci 'dra rab mkhyen nas kyang // sems dang yid
265a5(mdo): rnams la ni khyed kyi sems mi gnas// 'gro ba rnams/ la khyod gis suspyod pa kun bstan ta// bde kham gsheg sa pa'i sku ni 'gyur la yod ma mchis// gar gi gzugs dang
265a6(mdo): sems dang yos tan ci 'dra bas// mtsham dang spyod lam dag kyang de'i tshul du ston// bde gshegs chos 'di la ni nga yid 'dzin pa myed// khyod na chos la gnas par byed cing 'dzind pa myed/ 
265a7(mdo): sems can mang po kun rtog chos kyi 'dul mkhyen nas// khyod ni bla na myed pa'i chos rnams rtag tu ston// rgyal ba'i yul 'khor 'di kun gyis bltas pa na// gzugs dang mtshan ma
265a8(mdo): za dang skal pa myi mnyam gnas// khyod kyi sku ni myi 'gyur rtog myed mtshan myed de// 'khor rnams ji lta'i sems dang bsam 'do tshim par mdzad// chos 'di thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las skyes
265b1(mdo): pa ste// khyod myed ngo bo nyid myed kun tu rtog las skyes// bde gshegs de 'dra'i chos kyi tshul rnams mkhyen nas su// byang chub myi 'gyur zhi ba bla na byed pa brnyes// mtha' dang de bzhin
265b2(mdo): dbus bcad/ rnam par rtog pa myed// stoba'i pa gsob la rang bzhin gsob ste ya ma mra// khyod kyis de 'dra'i chos nyid rnam dag / mkhyen nas su// 'gro ba rnams la byung pa las dang byed pa
265b3(mdo): ston// chos 'di thams can byed cing sog dpagang zag myed// nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam pas ma mying yang rnam par dag/ sems cam gan du nyer gshegs yang dag bdag byed pa// myi
