265b4(mdo): 'chi 'dus ma byas la sems can mang sa mdzad// bcom nas mthul dang spobs kyis byang chub 'di tshol phyir// khyod kyirabazhes pa bsam yas bye ba phrag brgya pa spyad// srub byed pa'o
265b5(mdo): nan tan mtshan nyid byang chub ste// gang byir byed pa'i don rjes su thob par 'gyungs// chos rnams mnyam pa nyid mi mnyam par bzhag mkhyen pas// rab dpa' bri ba dang tha ma dag/ 
265b6(mdo): kyang mkhyen mnyam par mkhyen// mnyam pa nyid la mnyam nyid dgas zhugs rnam gyi rtog/ de phyir rgyal ba mnyam par bzhag cing myi 'gyur la// phung po khams dang / dbang po ji ltar spya ma bzhin/ 
265b7(mdo): 'jig rten bsum po chu zla 'dra ste 'grob myed// ma sems can rnams ni rmi lam lnga bur dngos myed de// mkhyen pas mi lam bzhin du rtogs nas chos 'di gsum// byang chub mchog rab brda 'i rang bzhin
265b8(mdo): khyod kyi brnyes// de ni thob dang ma thob pa zhes brjod du myed// ji ltar byang chub khyod kyis/ de bzhin 'khor lo yang // tshul dang tshul myin 'jug pa'i mtshan bral rab tu bskor// rgal nas sems cas
266a1(mdo): mang po bsam yas rab 'grol ba// grol nas bcings pa'i na na bcings pa shin tu 'grol// theg chen bla myed 'di la 'gro ba dbugs 'byin cing // res 'byin mnyam pa brnyes pa/ 
266a2(mdo): mya ngan 'das la 'grod// gang na'ang sems can nam yang mya ngan 'das ma mchis// sems can gdod nas rnam dag sems can nyid myi sgrub// sems can sgyu ma'i mtshan du byang chub sangs rgyas nas// / 
266a3(mdo): 'di 'i mtha' rnams sems cam mang pos rtogs par mdzad// nam mkha' la ni gzugs rnams nam yang myi sdang bzhin// de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs ni gzugs nyid mtshungs// chos de gzugs dang gzug
266a4(mdo): myed gzugs kyi mtshan nyid de// gang gis de ltar don rnams yang dag dben rtogs pa// ji tsam rgyal ba'i bsngags pa dag gi dpe ma bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bsngags pa 'di la mthong chag
266a5(mdo): ste// rang gi yon tan rnams kyi 'dren bsngags nam mkha' 'dra gnyis myed bsngags brjod 'di ni rgyal ba'i bsngags pa'o// sangs rgyas 'gro ba sad par mdzad cing dmyigs byed pa// sa
266a6(mdo): myed sems nyid brnyes pa khyod phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar 'dren pa kun gyis myi yi seng ge bsngags// de ltar de bzhin nyid phyir yangabadag yon tan bsngags// sems can thams cad bdag myed mtshan nyid ye shes/ 
266a7(mdo): mnyam// thams cad rtogs nas chos dbyings rjes su rig par bgyi// chos kun 'dod chags bral ba'i mtshan gi tshul shes pa// des ni mnyam pa nyid kyis 'dren pa mchod par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
266a8(mdo): chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras ma thag tu// nam mkhal la 'dug pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa chen po de'ang rnam pa drug du g.yos// bar snga las kyang gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
266b1(mdo): rnams kyis bskal pa grangs myed pa bye ba khrag ga khrag brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa// bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyi
266b2(mdo): tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis kun brjod do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni rmi lam ma'ang mngon par zhen pas dmyigs par lta ba myi 'byung ngo // gang dag tshigs su bcad pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas/ 
266b3(mdo): mos pa dong gang yang thos nas sprub pa de dag mi ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod/ da ltar seng ge 'i sgra spogs pa bzhin du/ de dag kyang seng ge li sgra spogs par 'gyur ro zhes de lta bu'i sgra byung ngo // de nas
266b4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sbas nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'dus pa chen po 'i le'u chos kyi rnam
266b5(mdo): grangs 'di'i mying thos nas// myi mched kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang chos ldang
266b6(mdo): bar bgyi la gang cung zad bstan pa'i slad du 'dim mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis/ chos kyi ni grangs 'di la rang rang gi chos la the tsom du gyur pa pa nges par bstand pa// bcom ldan
266b7(mdo): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la yong su zhus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'i nges pa'i blo la rab tu gnas pa'i de dag gi the tsom thams cad kyang rab tu bsal cing // sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdang bar bgyis pa de la gas/ 
266b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la bskabs phyinaM/ chos rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa'i bkal mchid cung zad cig ba zhu'o// de ci'i srad tu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ni myi chags pa'i ye shes can te/ 
267a1(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lags pa mkhyend pa ye shes la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni snang ba brnyes te/ mun pa thams cad bral pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni
267a2(mdo): don mkhyend pa ste/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni dus mkhyend pa ste// chod las myi 'da' zhing phyed par lung ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni chod mkhyen pa ste// sems can thams cad
267a3(mdo): la so so ci rigs par chos stond pa bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par rol pa ste/ mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par nges pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das na shin tu rnam par gzigs pa'i blo
267a4(mdo): dang ldan pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa phyag mdu 'jug par kun ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni mngon par 'phags pa ste/ spyi gtsug bltar myi mthong / bcom ldan 'das ni zil gyis ma non pa
267a5(mdo): ste/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams na dpa' tho gcig po// bcom ldan 'das ni rang byung ba ste/ slob dpon bye dpar chos thams cad rang gis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa bcom
267a6(mdo): ldan 'das ni 'dren pa ste/ 'dren pa myed pa dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la yang dag pa'i lam ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni sman pa'i rgyal po ste/ thog ma dang tham ma mchis pa'i 'dod pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / kun tu
267a7(mdo): sgrib pa dang / shin tu sgrib pa dang / kun nas lnga bas pasgribs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa rnams dang ma mchis pa/ 'chi'am mchis pa'i gnas kyi las la rab tu 'god pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni stobs dpa drag shul 'chab sa ste/ gnas
267a8(mdo): dang gnas ma yin pa ma khyen pa la mkhas ga de gsum rig pa'i dge pa brnyes pa bcom ldan 'das dkyo lajigs pa chen po brnyes pa ste/ zag pa sad cing mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas te kun nas
267b1(mdo): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma khye nad pa la mkhas pa lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten ki mdun du khyu mchog seng ge li sgra sgrogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa ste/ dus gsum la thogs
267b2(mdo): ba myed pa'i ye shes cad bcom ldan 'das ni sku dpa gsung dang thugs yongs su dag pa ste/ 'khrul pa dang ma mo myi mngal ba/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dparnam pa bkrol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni byams/ 
267b3(mdo): ba chen po la gnas pa ste/ zhe 'das pa myed pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems stobs pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i 'od gzer gis gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po
267b4(mdo): la gnas pa ste/ legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa/ na dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal bas myi skyo ba/ sems can dzaste/ cad la mnyam parapa 'jug pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni
267b5(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa ste/ bsam pa'i ye shes gnyis su myed pa la zhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni bye brag myed pa ste/ nam mkha' lta bur shi nad tu rnam par dag cing sems can thos/ 
267b6(mdo): cad la mnyam par sbyor pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dod pa myed pa ste/ shes rab kyis ngoms pa rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang bral ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen cing tham
267b7(mdo): cad gzigs pa/ spyan lnga'i tshul yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yan tad dang / chos dpa ma shes tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa pa bdag gis rig nas/ chos rab tu brjod pa'i
267b8(mdo): sgo yongs su zhub pa 'tshal te/ gus pa dang bcas shing chos la ga ces sbas su bgyi ba dang ldan pa ste/ nga rgyal ma mchis shipa sems can thams cad chos la spyod pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyis mngon pa bsgrubs pas// chos
268a1(mdo): 'tshal ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhulo// de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpal sems dpal chen po nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces bkal sa lang to// legs so// 
268a2(mdo): legs so skyes bu dam pa ji ltar khyod gang gali klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dris pa rnams lung bstan pa thob pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang mi 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de nyid
268a3(mdo): lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sebs rangs par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur da te/ 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpal ses
268a4(mdo): dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// zhig gi phyir rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs la la zhu ba 'dod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'
268a5(mdo): mdzod kyis/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po yon/ tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras/ pa// gang rnams sems dang sems la sems yid mtshungs// 
268a6(mdo): shin tu bsam sems ye shes mnyam la gnas// sems la sems byed pa pa ni zhugs pa'i tshul// de dag don rgyal la bdag zhu'o// snang ba thob tsob mun pa dri ma byed// yid gnyis can gyi yid gnyis blo gcod pa// / nges byas
268a7(mdo): nam la sa da pa lag bzhag pa// de dag de dag ched du bde bar gshegs la zhu// bdag la bdag khyed shini bathun ma dag yid// sems can don zhugs sems can myed la dag la// sems can bdag myed gnyis las thar myed pa/ 
268a8(mdo): nam tsho nges pa'i chos kyi gtam 'dri yi// cho ga spyod pa brtul zhugs yongs su dag/ bsam pa dag ci sems ni nam mkhal 'dri// spun po lta bur brtan zhing myi g.yo ba// / de dag ched du yon tan mdzad la su// kyi
268b1(mdo): thog btan pa bcad chul kun las bayang // dag sa bdud kyi mang rgyas bconyan pangasarab tu nya mangs myo cod da nas sa cug/ ces byin rgyal zhims bzod pa bcos su
268b2(mdo): dga'// bsam gtan nas yang shes rab mchog tu gyud pa don shes bsam gtam rnam par grol ba'i 'od// rab dag dri myed don tu bdag bu'o// stong pa mtsham pa med cing myi spor kanas// bsam bzhin shi 'tho pa ni skye
268b3(mdo): pa ston// skyes pa byed cing myi gnas 'chi 'pho byed// de dag don du myi'i spyod pa su// nyan thos rang rgyal skye bo gzhan dag gis// rtogs pa padag la zhing zab mo mthong dka' ba// skye bo kun gyi yid rnams skul ba yi/ 
268b4(mdo): chos kyi gta ya bde bar gshegs la lu// legs par byas pa rdzogs pa'i chos la dgal// chos la chos byed 'dzin pa kanyi nas las grol// rtag tu mnyam bzhag ma chog gi yos la dgal// seMs
268b5(mdo): kyang nam mapa' mtshungs pa'i don du mu// gang dag sangs rgyas rigs gan sa chos la dgal// rtag tu sangs rgyas bstod pa kun byed tho// thatha ba la ba la las 'jig rten gsul chu bos// yon tan rgya margo byim 'din
268b6(mdo): lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' gatshas dpal chan pa dag sbyin pa nam mkha' dang / 
268b7(mdo): mtshungs pa rnams lags/ tshul khrims nam ma kha la dang mtshungs pa dang / bzod pa nam mkhal dang mtshungs pa dang / brtson 'grus nam mkhal dang mtshungs pa dang / bsam gtan nam mkhal dang mtshungs pa dang / shes rab
268b8(mdo): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bsod nams nam mkhal dpa mtshungs pa dang / ye shes/ nam mkhal dang mtshungs pa/ rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa/ 
269a1(mdo): dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / katong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang kyi bral ba rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba yilha rjes su dran pa dang / kyi bral ba rnams lags/ mya ngam las
269a2(mdo): 'das pa dang / mnyam kha' thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang spyod de/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang cho ga shes pa rnams lags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod
269a3(mdo): 'dzin pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos ka pa de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs pa ba sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid de'i chos thams cad yongs su 'dzind pa dang / thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas// sems can
269a4(mdo): thams cad yongs su sbyin pa bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos das cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i slad du tshul bzhin du 'barab tu smran pa rnams lags// mngon par shes pa las ma nyams zhing chos zas/ 
269a5(mdo): cad la dbang bgyid pa rnams lags// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni na tu rtogs par dka' ba'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la zhugs pa rnams lags// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug
269a6(mdo): pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa ste/ mthal gnyis su lta ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams lags// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas de bzhin nyid dbyer byed pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags// chos kyi
269a7(mdo): dbyings kyi tshul la rab tu zhugs shing chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba rnams lags// bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing myi byed de/ theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shi kyi g.yo ba rnams lags// @
269a8(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing/ rang gi yul yongs su dag pa rnams lags// gzungs thog pa rtag tu myi brjed par spyod pa rnams lags// spobs pa thogs pa byed cing rgyun myi 'chang la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi/ 
269b1(mdo): kyi byed kyi brlabs kyis byid kyis brlabs pa rnams lags// skye ba dpa' mi 'pho ba dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa rnams lags// bcud bzhi'i lam las yang dag pa pa 'das shing/ bdud dang phyi rgol ba thams cad bcom/ 
269b2(mdo): pa rnams lags// zasod dmas kyi sogs cad byed pa bachags gapas mes can thams cad 'tsho bar gyur ba pa rnams lags// sangs rgyas rnams u pa yang sangs rgyas kyi yadzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa na
269b3(mdo): lags// rgya mtsho la phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la myi chags pa rnams lags// chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / na ma mkhal la rlung mar lta bu li/ 
269b4(mdo): sems dang ldan pa rnams lags// chog dang spyad pa'i tshul shes pa da dang / mun pa dang bral zhing sngar gathob pa rnams lags// kadad ka dribal gyi 'jog ci par byung gi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa rnams lamra
269b5(mdo): myur du theg pa chen po la thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes 'di 'job par 'gyur lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkhal
269b6(mdo): mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod legaso legs so// skyes su dam pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri ba pa sems la legs so// 'di lta ste khyod ni sems can thams cad
269b7(mdo): kyis gsol pa ma btab pa'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob pa/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la go cha bgos pa bkrab pa las 'das pa 'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas la/ rtag tu chos
269b8(mdo): chol khas myi ngoms pa/ ye shes kyi mtshomacha can/ brgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par sems can gyi domal brtson pa/ 'jig rten gi chos brgyad las yang dag
270a1(mdo): bar 'das pa nam mkha' dang / mtshungs pa'i sems kyis thams cad mkhyenang pa'i ye shes pag pa yang dag par sgrub pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi yon tan rnams kyi mthu' rtogs par sla ba ma yin
270a2(mdo): no// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yon tan rnams dang / gzhan dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ba bshad
270a3(mdo): do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsold nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams nam mkhal mdzod// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// rigs kyi bu chos bzhi
270a4(mdo): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang ma chud sa ma yin te bzhi gang zhed 'di lta ste/ bdag rnam par dag pas/ sems can rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can rnam
270a5(mdo): dag pas skyed pa rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa rnamapar dag pas bsngo ba rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / bsngo ba rnam par dag pas byang chub rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa ste/ rigs
270a6(mdo): kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan da/ byang chub sems dpal sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// des rnam par dag pa brgyad kyi sgo nas/ sbyin pa de sbyin te/ brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rang 'dzin pa rnam pa
270a7(mdo): dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ nga yir 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ rgyu rnam par dag par sbyin pa sbyin/ lta ba rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ mtshan ma rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin// tha dad pa
270a8(mdo): rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ rnam khar sbyin pa la myi re ba rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ nam mkhal dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par dag par skyed pa de sbyin te/ rnam kha bdag par brgyad po 'di dag/ 
270b1(mdo): nas ldan pa de zin no// ngas nas pa ma mtha' med pa bzhin dubams papa da #/ sbyin pa phyin/ dzas nganas sa'as rgya mad sgrubs pa byed pa de bzhin du byang chub chu ma na
270b2(mdo): de phyid/ ji ste ngan pa mkhangs gzugs myed pa de bzhis tu gzugs thams cad sa kyi gnas par sbyin pa de sbyis/ ji ltar nas pa' las tshor ba byed pa de bzhin du tshor ba thams cad dang bral bar sbyin pa / 
270b3(mdo): sbyin// ji ltar nam mkha' la 'du shes myed pa de bzhin du 'du shes thams cad kyi mdud pa myed par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' 'dus ma byas pa de bzhin du 'dus byas thams cad myed par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha
270b4(mdo): mtshan nyid rnam par rig pa myed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa myi gnas par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkhal sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la khyab pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab
270b5(mdo): par skyed pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' myi zad pa de bzhin du// da// na mchog gsum gi rigs myi zad par bsngo zhing sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la mun pa myed pa de bzhin du/ nyon mongs
270b6(mdo): pa thams cad kyi mun pa myed par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' rtag par rab tu snang ba de bzhin du sems kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji lta ba dam mkhal sems can thams cad kyi go skabs
270b7(mdo): 'byed pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkhal la nga'i pa myed du sems can thams cad yid la byed pa thams cad dang bral khang sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar sprul pas sprul pa la sbyin
270b8(mdo): bde sbyin pa lta bur rnam par myi rtog cing lhan kyis grub ste/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral zhing / chos thams cad la re ba myed pa de ltar gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir/ sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo rnam par
271a1(mdo): dag par byang chub sems dpa'as sbyin pa de sbyin te/ rigs kyi bu gang de ltar bur skyid pa yongs su gtong ba de ni/ shes rab kyi ye shes kyis ni sems cad thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su 'dor zhibatha pa/ 
271a2(mdo): kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi gtong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de lta bur gtong ba'i sems ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yid do// de nas byang chub sems dpal sems dpal chen po la ga la
271a3(mdo): mar me zhes bya ba 'khor de ga nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtob pa 'di ci 'dra ba las
271a4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de dag rnam par myed pa ste/ rnam da par dag pa sems can gyi rnam pa ste/ sems can rnam par dag pa chos
271a5(mdo): kyi rnam pa ste/ chos rnam yar dag pa ye shes kyi rnam pa ste/ ye shesarnam par dag pa/ shes rab kyi rnam pa ste/ shes rab rnam par dag sems kyi rnam pa ste/ sems kyi rnam par dag pa 'jig rted kyi rnam pa
271a6(mdo): ste/ 'jig rten rnam par dag pa// gzugs myed pa gzugs su ston pa dang phyi ston pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa// mun pa byed cing mun pa rab tu snang bar byed pa mtshan ma thams cad rnam yang bzhin pas mtshan ma byed pa'i lan/ 
271a7(mdo): gyu rad pa/ mthar phyi dad pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa gyi zad pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyend pa'i lung bstan pa thob pa/ mtshams bcad cing byang chub sems dpa'i nges par
271a8(mdo): gyung pa la zhugs pa/ phyir gyi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab cing / dbang grur pa thob pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag pa zhugs// de mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa baspyod pa legs pa spyod pas spyad pa
271b1(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chog shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi spyod yul te/ skyes bu dam pa da dang de dag ni de lta bu'i sbyin pa spyod par byed do// bstan pa'i 'di bshad
271b2(mdo): pa na byang chub sems dpal khri drug stong dam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sbyin pa la bzod pa skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// dag pa'i sems kyis rtag tu sbyin pa
271b3(mdo): sprid// byang chub phyir te rnam sbyin yod myi 'dod// dgal zhing mgu nas rjes su gdung byed do// rab tu grol nas rtag tu sbyin pa sbyin// mkhas pas chos rnapas smra 'drapa shes nas su// lus dang srog la'ang chags par gyi 'gyu
271b4(mdo): zhing // de dag la ni rnams kyang 'dzin pa myed// de ltar de dag/ bsam pa byang chub nges// thams cad btang yang myi dag la myi 'gyuradar zhing // de la zhum pa myed de gong ba myed// de yis nam mkha'
271b5(mdo): mtshungs par chos rnams bsgoms// de bas dka' bar myi 'gyur zhum pa 'ang byed// bdag gi rang bzhin snga nas rnam par dag/ byang chub nam par dag pas sbyin pa sbyin// de ni sems kyi rgyud
271b6(mdo): myi chags par // spros pa myed par sbyin pa rab tu phyin// sems mnyam yid kyang mnyes pas kun tu sbyin pa gtob// rab 'bring lam gsum yang byed par smin// bsam pa yongs dag dri ma myed pa yis// thams cad gto
271b7(mdo): yang rnam par spyad myi 'dod// lus dang chen gyi rtag sgyu ma 'dra// longs spyod kyilam glog bzhin snying po byed// 'jig rten kun la snying rje brtse bskyed nas// 'jig rten chos kyis myi gos sbyin pa sbyin// nyon mongs dag
271b8(mdo): bdag gi nor kun gtong // rgyal ba'i tshig gi gnas su 'gyur snyam ste// bdud rnams kyis kyang bdag la glags kyi rnyed// de ltar brtags na thams cad gtong ba yin// stobs bcus sbyin pa rtsa ba yin zhes gsungs// de la
272a1(mdo): rab tu gnas nas tshul khrims ldan// tshul khrims yon tan gnas nas bsam gtan brnyed// bsam gtam pa chags shes rab rdzogs par byed// sbyin pa dang ni dul pas sems rab tshim// nyon mongs
272a2(mdo): rnams kyang tshig nas phyir myi skye// sbyin pa bdag dang gzhan la phan par gsungs// phan dang bde ba 'dus byas sbyin pas mgu// sbyin gtong nyon mongs spang zhing dge ba'i phyir// des na 'dzi nad pa la ni chags myi 'gyur// pha rol
272a3(mdo): ston spongs phyi ni phyi gtong ste// bdag blo nam dag byang chub phyir gtong ngo // ji lta ji ltar ma zhum sems kyis gtob// de lta des ni byang chub yon tan mdzob// ji lta ji ltar byang chub yon tan mtho pa// de lta de ltar sems can brgya tshim byed// de nas
272a4(mdo): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpal chen po nam mkhal mdzod la bka' stsa la pa// / rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims nam mkhal dang mtshungs
272a5(mdo): ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i lus mnyam pa nyid dang / brag cha lta bu'i sgra mnyam pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems mnyam pa nyid dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i blo mnyam pa nyid
272a6(mdo): de// rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ste/ brgyad ga pa zhes/ 
272a7(mdo): 'di lta ste/ sems rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems dpa myi 'bral ba dang / chad mar gyur pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems byed pa dang / dam bcas pa rnam par dag pa'i phying bslab pa thams cad kyi 'dod
272a8(mdo): ba dang / med la pa yang su dag pa'i phyir skye ba sems cad du myi 'dug pa dang / mngon par 'du myi byed pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir gyi ldog pa dang / mtshan ma yongs su dag pa'i byed/ byang chub du bsngo dpa la/ nyon mongs pa
272b1(mdo): yongs su dag pa'i phyir kun nas gdung ba myed pa dang / byang chub yongs su dag pa'i phyir smon lam yongs su brjed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o// gzhan yang / 
272b2(mdo): tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni ram mkha' dag pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang dag pa'o// nam mkha' dri ma myed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang dri ma myed pa'o// nam mkhal zhi ba ste/ tshul khrims de yang zhi ba'o// dam mkha'
272b3(mdo): phyi mtho ba ste// byams dang byang ma // dpe 'tho ba s+ho// tshul khrims de yang myi dmal pa'o// nam mkhal gzung du byed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang gzung du byed pa'o// dam ma khal gnas myed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang gnas khyed pan/ 
272b4(mdo): nam mal 'a byed pa ma yin te/ tshul khrims de yang byed pa ma yin pa'o // nam mkhal rtag pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang rtag pa'o// nam mkhal gyi zad pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang byi zad pa'o// nam mkhal
272b5(mdo): mtshan ma myed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang mtshan ma myed pa'o// nam mkha' rgyu ba myed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang rgyu ba myed pa'o// nam mkha' spros pa myed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang spros pa myed pa'o// 
272b6(mdo): nam mkha' zag pa byed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang zag pa myed pa'o// nam mkhal 'dus ma byas pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang 'dus ma byas pa'o// nam mkha' myi 'gyur ba ste/ tshul khrims de
272b7(mdo): yang myi 'gyur ba'o// nam lakhal rnam par myi rtog pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang rnam par gyi rtog pa'o// nam mkhal thams cad du song ba ste/ tshul khrims de la ba thams cad du song ba'o// nam mkhal gyi 'od kyi/ 
272b8(mdo): byed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang myi chod kyi byed pa'o// nam mkha' mtshungs par sbyor ba ste/ tshul khrims de yang mtshungs par sbyor ba'o// nam mkhal rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste/ 
273a1(mdo): tshul khrims de yang rang bzhin gis kun das nyon mongs pa can la yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dam mkha' dang 'tshungs pa yin no// de nas
273a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// sems ni tshul khrims dri byed supa zhing gdung ba myed// lus dpasams kyang dpa dag ngag yid thams cad bsdams// mkhas pa rtag tu nang ni
273a3(mdo): tshul khrims rjegs kyi sems// blo 'chang sems la byi gnas byang chub sems la rton// las gang ma byas la bsams de bzhin ma brtags te// de ni dpar sngo ser gyin kha tog gzugs myi gnas// gzugs myed kyi
273a4(mdo): bden myi g.yo'i bden par nam mkhal bzhin// tshul khrims lta ba nga'i gnas myed mkhas pa kun ka bsngags// tshul khrims de ni rab zhi'i byed nyon mongs zhi// zhi gnas lhag mthong dag gi mthar phyind mthar ston
273a5(mdo): gang su bcings las grol ba de dag tshul khrims ten// de bas tshul khrims thar khyed byang chub rtsa ba'i gzhi// gags su sbyangs / kha dgon gnas 'dod nyung chog shes pa// yo byad sbyangs shing bsam gtan
273a6(mdo): dbyed tshogs sems sbyangs pa// tshul khrims de'i gnas nges sems gang thar pa'i rten// de phyir tshul khrims brgya dang pa lam bde thams cad sgrub// g.yo ba rlom sems kun pA la lta ba'i nyon mongs gcod// nam
273a7(mdo): mkha' 'thungs mnyam byams pas khyab cing sapar 'dzid skyod // byang chub phyir nges phyi gtor byang chub kun gyi rtog/ gang mkhas chos shes de 'ang tshul khrims pa rol phyin da// sa/ des ma bus pa'i bya men pa ming // 
273a8(mdo): bam po gnyis pa// / rigs kyi lu la ji ltad na/ byang chub sems dpal bzod pa nam mkha' dang 'tshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 
273b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkhal dang 'chungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang len 'di lta ste/ tshig nam mkha' dang 'tshungs pa'i phyir gage yang slar myi gage ba dang / lus nam mtha' dab 'jungs pa'i phyir brdegs kyang sla
273b2(mdo): myi rdeg pa dang / sems nam mkha' dang 'tshungs pa'i phyir spyos kyang slar myi spro ba dang/ bsam pa nam mkha' dang 'tshungs pa'i phyir khros kyang slar myi khro pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po yang 'di dag dang ldan ma/ byang chub sems dpan
273b3(mdo): bzod pa rnam mkhal dang 'chungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi bzod pa nam mkha' dang 'jungs pa yongs su dag pa 'di brgyad de/ brgyad dag pa zhen 'di ste ste/ nam mkha' la zhe 'gras pa byed
273b4(mdo): de// sems can thams cad la na 'bras bu'i bzod pa yongs su dug pa dang / nam mkha' la rjes su chags pa byed de/ rnyed dang / dbakur sti la rjes su chags pa byed pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / 
273b5(mdo): nam mkhal di mnyam par spyod pa ste/ sems can thams cad mapa sems mnyam pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam ma kha' nim sdud pa nyams pa ste lus dpas mas zad par nyams pa
273b6(mdo): myed pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' la bag la nyal thams cad spangs pa ste / bag lnga nyal byed pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' la ni yid dang dmyigs pa byed pa myed pa ste
273b7(mdo): yid dbang dmyigs pa myed pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ma skyes pa byung ba ste/ ma skyes mi byung ba'i bzod pa can gi bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang/ nam mkha' ni gzugs dang gzugs myed pa thams
273b8(mdo): cad la khyab pa le/ byabs pas khyab pa 'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu brgyad po/ dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa yongs su dag pa nam mkha' dang 'jungs pa'o// rigs kyi bu
274a1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pa mi 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong nyid la bzod kyang lta ba gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa la/ 
274a2(mdo): bzod kyang mtshan la sel ba ma yin pa dang / smon pa myed pa la bzod kyang byang chub tu smos pa myed pa ma yin gdang / mngon par 'du byed byed pa la bzod kyang 'dus byas rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / skye ba myed
274a3(mdo): pa la mazod kyang 'dus la byas kyi mtshan nyid gis ma yid pa dang / 'byung ba byed pa la bzod kyang skye ba dang gangs rnam mam pa dang / sems cad byed pa la bzod kyang dngos po rnams gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / ji sa
274a4(mdo): bzhin bzod kyang 'dus rnam par gcig pa'i phyir ma yin pa skyed/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi'o// des la rtogs pa'i bzod pa'o// bzod pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dag padas
274a5(mdo): la gshe yang bzod do snyam pa de ni nga yid 'dzin pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di ni nam mkha' dang 'jungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// 'di dag gshe ba bzod par bya'o snyam pa de ni ngang 'dzin pa'i bzod
274a6(mdo): pa ste/ nyid ni nam mkha' dpa 'tshungs pa'i bzod ma yin no// 'di dag ni yi ge bsngo da pa'i snyam pa de ni skra dang skad kas bzod pa ste/ de min pa mkhal dang 'tshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// 'di yang stong
274a7(mdo): pa bdag kyang stong pa'o snyam pa de ni yid la byed pa sbyor ba'i bzod pa ste/ de ni nam mkha' dang 'jungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// bdag gis bzod par bya'o// snyam pa de ni rngam par rig pa 'i bzod pa ste/ 
274a8(mdo): de ni nam mkha' dang 'chutshungs pa'i mazod pa ma yin no// 'di lta ste dper/ shibs la chen po rig la yod par la la zhig/ 'ongs te/ shing sa la bcad med la shipas la bcad pa'i lhag pa rnams 'di snyam/ 
274b1(mdo): du 'di dag ni bcad do snyam du myi sem de/ per ga la rjes su chags pa yang myed// khong khro ba yang myed de phyi rtog/ rnam par myi rtog yongs su myi rtog pa de bzhinadag pa bzod pa mi byang chub semasadapa'i bzod/ 
274b2(mdo): pa nam mkha' dpe 'tshungs pa yongs su dag pa'i mchog go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe tshigs bcod pa 'di dag gsungs so// zad pa shes pa bzod pa myi zad bcang/ yid ni yul
274b3(mdo): la a chags shi nad tu bsgoms// phyi napa shind tu rnam par dag myi gnas pa// nam mkhal 'chungs panyam sems mchog bzod pa'o// lus 'di gzugs brnyan bya shing rtsig pa 'dra// sems
274b4(mdo): kyang gzugs myed kyi snang sgyu ma 'dra// chos 'di lta la'i gnas myed rab mkha' 'dra// lus kyang myi 'gyur yid la kho ba myed/ bkur sti byed la dga' dpa'i sdang byed// mtho dang dpa'
274b5(mdo): bar rnam par rtog pa myed// theg pa ga pa 'bras ltar sbyor ba de// / sems can dag pa brtan 'dipe bzod smra yin// / srog myed gang zag bdag myed seMs nA myed// chos 'di thos
274b6(mdo): cad stong par ga bzod cing// rgyu dang rkyend dang byed dang 'gal sbyi byed// de mi bstan 'dir bzod mchog ya bdag nyid/ kha ngan zeng ba'i cho ga thos myi gshe zhi pa// byed pa myed pa la
274b7(mdo): nam mkha'i sprin sku bzhin// bdag rnam bsal yid stong pa'i mchog mthong de// bstanang 'dir sems cad ma sa bzod sA yin// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpal brtsom 'grus
274b8(mdo): nam mkhal dang 'chungs pa yin zhes/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chugase mas dpal sems dpa' chen po bcom 'grus nam mkha' dpa 'tshungs pa yin te/ gzhi gang zhen 'di lta ste
275a1(mdo): dge ba'i pa thams cad la rtsom yang chos thams cad yongs su ma grub pa rab tu shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bya ba mngon par 'du byed kyang / de bzhin gshen
275a2(mdo): pa rnams chos kyi spu mnyam par yang dag par rjes su 'thong gad pa/ sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can rnam par dag pas sems can myi dmyigs pa dang / sangs rgyas rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i
275a3(mdo): chos yongs su 'dzin kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i yang dag pas rjes su gyi mthong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mos dpa' chen po bsngon 'grus nam mkham
275a4(mdo): dang mtshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa 'di brgyad de/ brgyad ka bzhen/ brtson 'grus gang gis lus brgyan pa'i lus de gzugs brnyan lta/ 
275a5(mdo): bur rigs pas myi dmyigs pa rApa/ brtson 'grus gang gis tshig mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshig de ya sa rlab rnam par brtags te/ myi dmyigs pa dang / brtson 'grus/ gang gis sa
275a6(mdo): sems ti nge 'dzi nad gi gnas su 'jog pa'i sems te// seMs kye chos nyid kyis rnam par brtags te/ myi dmyigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag
275a7(mdo): brtson 'grus gang gas pha rol tu phyind pa 'i phyogs thams cad rab tu srud par byed kyang / de gcig nas gcig tu sem khad pa'i chos nyid kyis shin tu brtags te myi dmyigs pa dang / brtsom 'grus gang gis/ 
275a8(mdo): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par smrab kyangs byang chub de/ dngos po'i mtshan nyid du rnam par brtags te/ yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba dang / brtson 'grus gangagis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yo su
275b1(mdo): spong bar byed pa'i zhing de yang nam mkhal dang mtshungs pas rnam par brtags te/ myi dmyigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis thos pa thams cad 'dzidad par byed de yang spa brag ma dang mtshungs pa yang dag par rjes
275b2(mdo): myi mthong gdang / brtson 'grus gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thos cad ral rdzu sna ba de yang chos kyi dbyings dbyed byed pa'i mtshan nyid du rnam par btakra nas mye dmyigs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad pa de dag ni byang chub
275b3(mdo): mes dpal rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa lo// rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis ni byang chug ses dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus te/ gnyis gang zhes/ 'di la ste/ sbyor ba li brtson 'grus dang / yongs su chad
275b4(mdo): brtson 'grus so// de la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ni lus dpa dag/ dang sems rab tu ldan pa'o// yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni len pa myed pa/ 'do pa pa myed pa gnas pa myed pa ste/ nam khyad
275b5(mdo): chub sems dpal lus dngang ge da sems sbyor ba'i brtson la/ grus rtsa banas myi gnas par shin du brtags nas myi dmyigs shing yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni chos kyi dbyings kyi
275b6(mdo): kyi rjesu 'jug pas rjes su 'gro ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nam mkhal dpa mtshungs pa yin no// ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs su myed cing sems can thams cad rab tu
275b7(mdo): rgyu ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de yang chos thas cad la myi gnas shing sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par byed de/ ji ltar na mkhal gzugs thams cad la go// skabs
275b8(mdo): 'byed cing klag pa myed pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi brtson 'grus de yang sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed cipa lha la thams cad dang bral ba'o// ji lta pa na ma mkhal las
276a1(mdo): dang nags tshal dang lo tog skye yang ma kha byed cing gnas myed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi brtsom 'grus de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed kyang 'jig tshogs la
276a2(mdo): ba'i rtsa ga la gnas pa myed do// ji ltar nam mkha' thams cad du/ sor yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus de yang dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rjes su song
276a3(mdo): yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// ji ltar nam ma'al mtshungs pa sgor zhing gzugs tha dad par ston pa de bzhin lu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de yang ses can thas
276a4(mdo): cad dang chos thams cad mtshungs par 'byor zhing spyod patshogs kun tu thond// nam byang chub sems dpalag pa kun tu sprul par byed pa de mnyam pa nyid pas yang dag par rdzo
276a5(mdo): su kyi mthong zhing kapa la mom pa de la parnam par brtags namyi gtsigs te/ da wa na byang chub sems dpa'i brjod/ 'grus nam mjal dang mtshungs pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan
276a6(mdo): 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// bcom 'grus reg gi stobs kyi mthu bskyed nas// lus dang srog la 'o 'phangs par gyi byed cing // bdag nyid chen po byang chub pyad pa/ 
276a7(mdo): da// sems can phan pa 'i don byed lan sems pa'i// sngon gyi med par 'dus byas de srid pa// byang chub yom tan khyor ni de srid 'khom// de dag skyob pa 'gyur ba'ang yod myed de// kyai bya
276a8(mdo): brtson 'grus dag ni rab tu skyed// sems can pasas kyi khyag pa 'grol bapa brtson// sangs rgyas khams kyi lag par mchod pam brtsos// zhing rnams bsam gyi khyab pa zhum par bson// bsamakhris kyi/ 
276b1(mdo): khyab bdud rnams/ 'dul kha brtson// sbyin pa bsam gyis myi khyab gtong bar brtson// tshul khrims bsam kyis myi khyab srung bar brtson// bzod pa'i bsam gyis myi khyab bsgom par brtsom// brtson 'grus bsam
276b2(mdo): gyis myi khyab dge bar bcom// bsam gtan bsam gyis kyi khyab sems par brtson// shes rab bsam kyis myi khyab bsgom par brtson// byams pa bsam gyis myi khyab ba sgom par brtsom// don dang yon tan
276b3(mdo): bsgrub pa rab tu brtson// srog dang lus dang kyang myi langs brtsom par byed// nyon mongs 'thal pa kun las/ rnam par krol// slob pa rnam tha rang bdag myed mngon par brtson// bdag la bdag myed che ba'i
276b4(mdo): bdag nyid brtson// lta bas rnam grol byang chub phyir yang pyod// sgyu ma smyig sgyu'i ngo bo nyid tu brtson// sems myed sems kyang / sems ma yin pa thob// g.yo ba myed pa'i chos rnams ston par/ 
276b5(mdo): bcom// 'gro ba kun tu spyod cing lja grol// bshad cing klog pa la ni rtag tu brtson// chos dang chos myin gnyis las shin tu 'das// sgra dang yi ge 'i ngo bo nyid la brtson// 'gro ba kun tu
276b6(mdo): rnams la mdo sde sngopa rnams su// sangs rgyas yon tan rnams mi mtha' yang kyang / sems can pyod pa rnams la 'ang mtha' byed de// mkhas pa de la rtag tu brtsom 'grus sbyor// sems can
276b7(mdo): spyod mtha' byed la rab tu 'jug/ chos 'di rnams ni skyo ba myed 'gog myed de// mkhas pa de dag sems kyang myi zhum zhing // phyi phyir brtson 'grus chabs chen rab skyed de// 'dir 'dri chos
276b8(mdo): la sems cas slob du 'dzud// rigs kyi bu de la wi skar na byang chub sems dpal bsam gtan nam mkhal dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal bsam gtan
277a1(mdo): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems na pa du yang 'jog la na pa du sems gnas par yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba dang / sems phyi rol
277a2(mdo): gnas kyang zlog la phyi rol du sems rgyu ba yang myi dmyigs pa dang / bdag gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang mnyam pa nyid chu snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sems mnyam pa
277a3(mdo): nyid de yang sems sgyu ma'i chos su mnyam pa nyid du snyoms par 'jug ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal bsam gtan nam mkhal dang mtshungs pa yin no// 
277a4(mdo): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi bsam gtan yo nas su dag pa ni 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan byed kyang phung po la gnas te/ 
277a5(mdo): bsam gtan myi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang khas la gnas te/ bsam gdan myi byed pa dang / bsamagatan byed kyang skye mched la gnas te/ bsam gtam myi
277a6(mdo): byed pa dang bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te/ bas ma gtan gyi byed pa dang / bsam ka nas byed kyang 'dzi ma la la la gnas te/ bsam gtan myi byed pa dang / @
277a7(mdo): gtan byed kyang 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan myi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs kyi khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan myi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang gzug/ 
277a8(mdo): myed pa'i khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan myi byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'o// gzhan yang nges par rtogs pa'i/ 
277b1(mdo): sems ni bsam gtan yongs su dag pa ste/ de la nges par rtogs pa'i sems nyid gang zhem/ gang chos rnams la srid kyi mthong gyi dmal gyi snod kyi spong pa/ 'gyur ba myed pa rnam pa
277b2(mdo): mi rtog pa/ sogs pa myed pa/ 'bri ba byed pa/ 'dzin pa myed pa/ g.yol byed la/ mun pa myed pa/ snang ba myed pa/ rtog pa myed pa/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ 'du shes
277b3(mdo): myed pa/ yid la byed pa myed pa/ gcig pa'ang ma yin/ gnyis pa'ang ma yin/ gnyis pa ma yin pa'ang ma yim/ g.yo ba myed/ rlom sems myed pa/ spros pa myed pa/ 'astsogs
277b4(mdo): pa myes pa pra ba gyed pa/ sgom pa myed pa/ 'jig pa myed pa ste/ gang mtshan ma dang / dmyigs pa thams cad la gyig/ rnas pa'o// gang sems kyi gnas pa de ni sems nges par
277b5(mdo): rtog pa'o// sems nges par rtog pa ni gzugs rnams/ la myi rgyug ste/ myig dang gzugs rnam par shes pa li rig pa rarang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag ya bsam gtan
277b6(mdo): byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni/ swa rnams la gyi rgyug ste/ na ba dang sma na mapar shes pa rig cing / rang gi mtshan nyid rnam pa dag ya bsam gtan byed do// 
277b7(mdo): sems nges par rtog pa ni/ dri la// dri rnams la myi rgyug ste/ snga dang/ drinas byar shes pa rig cing / rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa bsam gtan byed do// 
277b8(mdo): nges par rtog pa ni ronA rnams la myi rgyug ste/ lce dang ro rnams par shes pa'i rig cing / rang gi mtshan nyid rnam pa dag par bsam gtan byed do// seMs nges par rtog pa na rig pa rnaMs la gyi rgyug ste/ 
278a1(mdo): lus dang reg pa dang rnam par shes pa rig ci par bgyi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni chos rnams la myi rgyug ste// yid dag / chos dang rnam par shes pa
278a2(mdo): rag cing rang gyi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtadan byed do// rigs tAMkyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ bskal pas sreg pas nam mkha' myig tshig cing chus 'jig pa na nam mkha' gsher bar myi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ 
278a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis myi tshig cing bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang // ting nge/ 'dzind dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la'ang / 
278a4(mdo): ma chags pa yin no// mnyam par gzhag pa yang yin la/ sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams kyang shin tu 'god do// mnyam par bzhag pa na yang dgal ba myed la/ 
278a5(mdo): langs nas kyang khong khro ba myed pa yin no// 'phags pa'i skye kho rnams la zhi ba nye bar ston kyang 'phags pa'i ma yin pa'i/ skye bo rnams yongasu sbyin par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rab tu
278a6(mdo): 'bar byed do// mnyam par byed ka cing mnyam pa yang yin la/ mya mnyam par spyod pa rnams la tha dad par ston pa yang rab tu ston to// mnyam pa nyid kyis myi mnyam pa yang myi mthong / myi mnyam pas mnyam
278a7(mdo): pa nyid dpa' gal bar yang myi byed do// de ni myi 'gal zhing 'ga' ba myed pa nam mkhal dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyi bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o// shes rab che ba'i bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o// rnam par shes
278a8(mdo): rang kyi gnas pa'i bsas gtan pa zhes bya'o// gang gis thams gtan des/ de ltar mngon par rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lasas gtad dam ma' 'a dadu nangs pa ste/ gyi gnas pa'i bam
278b1(mdo): gtam yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// bsam gtan rnams kyi dbang po yongs su dag/ dran pa rtse gcig yad ni mnyam par bzhag/ gnas nas thas
278b2(mdo): cad la yang myi gnas shing // 'gro ba kun la mnyam nyid snyoms par bzhag/ nang dang phyi rol dag na gnas pa'i// phung po skye mched khams la myi gnas shing // nye bar zhi ba dmyags dbyin pa spyod yul te/ 
278b3(mdo): mkhas pa de dag rtag tu mnyam par bzhag/ mnyam pa nyid kyis rtag tu mnam bzhag pa// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i yid// shanan tu dbyen pa'i sems kyang ston byed cing // mkhas pa khas
278b4(mdo): gtan kun la'ang gyi chags so// 'gro ba rnams kyang yongs su sbyin bya'i phyir// 'chi 'pho skye ba'i che ba nye smon kyang / ka'ad ting po 'dzim las de dag myi nyams ste// de ni sems rtogs dbang
278b5(mdo): gas de 'dra'o// gzugs byed tipe 'dzind kyang khyod yul la/ sems can rnams ni yongs su skyes bya'i phyir// 'dod pa'i 'a su 'ang dgu snang byed de// de dag bdag dang sems can gyi gnas so// 
278b6(mdo): nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa'i pyod yul te// sgyu ma dang yang mtshungs shing smyig sgyu 'dra// rmi lam chu zla sngon gyi mtshan nyid du// chos rnams shes nas rtag tu mnyam par bzhag/ 'phro ba kun gyi sems kyi spyod
278b7(mdo): yul du// 'gro ba rnams la sems dang blo 'jug gcing // sems rgyud la ni bsgribs pa myed pa ste// rang kyi sems kyi rgyud kyang / rab tu shes// bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul mngon shes mkhas pa yis// zhing / 
278b8(mdo): rnams mang po bye bar de 'gro zhing // myi shes nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa'i// rgyal ba bsam gyi khyag la mchod par byed// dbang po rnams ni rtul zhi ngan pa'i yid// zhi gnas pha rol du phyin cing myi
279a1(mdo): rtog pa// de ni 'gro ba rnams la zhi ba'i ying// rtag tu ye shes stobs la mnyam par bzhag/ mnyam pa nyid dang mnyam pa'ang yod myed la// mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba mtshan myed de// mnyam
279a2(mdo): nyid de la gang dag rab gnas pa// de dag rtag tu mnyam pa pa gzhag pa yin// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs// pa yin zhe na// rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi
279a3(mdo): dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab nam mkhal dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' rnam par dag pas sems can thams cad rnam par dag par
279a4(mdo): 'jug pa dang / ye shes rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa/ thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pas/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / gang
279a5(mdo): zag rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / don rnam par dag pas ye ge thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / rab tu rtog/ sa pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub
279a6(mdo): sems dpa' shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs la yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pa ni 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos thams
279a7(mdo): cad yang dag par sprub kyang rtag pa ma lta la myi sbyor ba dang / myi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang bar brtson 'grus rtsom yang chad par lta bar myi srung ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung la la 'jug kyang myi skye
279a8(mdo): ba'i bzod pa dang 'gal khar myi byed pa dang / so sor yang dag par rig par shes par snang par yanganges pa'i chog gis spobs pa la myi chags pa dang / chos kyi sdom bzhi yang ston la/ myi rtag pa dang/ 
279b1(mdo): sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / zhi ba nyid du dngos po yang dag par rjes su yang dag par myi mthong ba dang / las dang bya ba la 'jug pa rab tu ston kyang las myed cing rnam par smin pa las kyang myi
279b2(mdo): g.yo ba dang / spros pa myed pa'i chos shes pa la gnas pa yin kyang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba nges par bstan pa rab tu ston pa dang / chos thams cad kyi sda ba rab tu rnyed pa yin na/ 
279b3(mdo): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byung ba ya sesems can rnams la rab tu spyod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pa'o// 5
279b4(mdo): shes rab ces bya la 'di ni rnam par rtog pa kun nas 'ab pa myed pa'i phyir nye bar zhi ba'i chog na// rang gi mdzan nyi/ dkyis rnam par bdag pa'i phyir 'di ni myi 'gyur ba'i tshig go// 
279b5(mdo): gnas myed pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par myi rtog pa'i tshig go// yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba'i phyir 'di ni ji lta ba'i bzhin go/ tshig go// 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'di ni bden pa'i tshig go// 
279b6(mdo): ma tshungs par myi 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di ni yang dag pa'i tshig go// bcings pa'i yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir 'di ni yid rno ba'i tshig go// 'phags pa'i yon tan gi phyir 'di ni ngoms pa'i tshig go// 
279b7(mdo): shin tu brtags pa'i phyir 'di ni nges par 'byed pa'i tshig go// brjod du myed pa'i phyir 'di ni don ni tshig go// khyad par myed pa'i phyir 'di ni mtshungs pa'i tshig go// myi shigs pa'i phyir 'di ni snying po'i tshig
279b8(mdo): ko// myi gnas pa'i phyir 'di ni ma yos pa'i tshig go// rab tu 'bigs pa 'i phyir 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig go// byed pa byas pa'i phyir 'di ni sgrol ba'i tshig go// rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa'i
280a1(mdo): phyir 'di ni rnam par dag pa'i tshig go// sdu ba myig myigs pa'i phyir 'di ni thun pa myed pa'i tshig go// sgo gtags pa myed pa'i phyir 'di ni gnyis su myed pa'i tshig go// shin tu zad cing byang ba'i phyir
280a2(mdo): 'di ni zad pa'i tshig go// 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir 'di ni myi zad pa'i tshig go// sbyar ba myed pa'i phyir 'di ni 'dus ma byas kyi tshig go// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'di ni naM kha'i tshig go// spobs pa'i// 
280a3(mdo): myed pa'i phyir 'di ni nam mkhala'i tshig go// gnas pa'i gnas kyi phyir 'di ni kun nas gsal khyed gi tshig go// ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir 'di ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshig go// rnam par shes pa dang ye shes
280a4(mdo): su myed pa'i phyir 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig go// gnyen po myed pa'i phyir 'di ni myi rdzi ba'i tshig go// mngon par ma grub pa'i phyir 'di ni lus myed pa'i tshig go// kun tu rtogs pa'i sdug bsngal/ 
280a5(mdo): phyi 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i tshig go// sred pa'i bag la nyal yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir 'di ni kun 'byu ba'i/ spangs pa'i tshig go// rab tu ma byung ba'i phyir 'di ni 'gog pa'i
280a6(mdo): tshig go// gnyis su myed pa'i lam du 'jug pa'i phyir 'di ni bsgom pa'i tshig go// rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas rab tu phye ba'i phyir 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig go// rab tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir 'di ni
280a7(mdo): tshab kyi ste// gang de ga bu'i tshig la 'jug pa'i ye shes ldang ba la gzhan gi dal gyi 'drog pa 'don shes rab ces bya'o// gang des par bstan pa thams cad la nam mapa' dang mtshungs pa bskan pam
280a8(mdo): sas 'ams// rjes su 'grobs tshas su rgyal par gyi ga ngas pa gyi dag pa zhin/ byang dum sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// de nas
280b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshags su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// shes rab lnga dang mun pa nyon mongs gcod// rtag tu bag chags nyon mongs rab khasal cang // rgyu dang rkyen dang byed pa nges par
280b2(mdo): ston// mtha' rnams thams cad yongs su gcod par byed// bdag dang snyems can la yang myi gnas shing // gang zag srog la'ang rtag tu gnas pa myed// dngos dang dngos myed gnyis las thar
280b3(mdo): byed de// shes rab pha rol 'gro bar rab tu bstan// shes rab bdud las rgyal te nyon mongs myed// shes rab chu bo las bsgral rab tu sgrol// shes rab ye shes myed cing rnam par spyod// shes
280b4(mdo): rab thar pa'i bde ba'i mchod kyang stom// shes rab kyis ni bslabs pa'i rtsa ba spyod// phung po khams ni yongs su shes pa'i mtsham// mtshan dang mtshan bzhi mtshungs mtshan grol byed pa/ 
280b5(mdo): shes rab thob pa srid pa gsum na mdzes// yongs su dag phye spyod shes rab ces bya ste// 'jig rten thams cad kyis ni gyi gos 'apyod// spyod pa spyad pa rab tu rtogs par spyod// shes
280b6(mdo): rab dag pa'i myig ni rnam par mdzes// myig lnga dag ni yongs su dag byed cing // dbang po lnga ni rab tu lngab par byed// 'gro garnams ni rab tu gcod par byed// phung po lnga ni zad phyir chos stom
280b7(mdo): to// pha rol tshu rol rtag tu myi gnas shing // chos kyi dbyings gnas gnas la shing tu gnas// bar snga pa dang mi mtshungs mnyam 'dra ba ste// sangs rgyas ye shes rjes su mthun zhing 'phags// rnyed/ 
280b8(mdo): dang ma rnyed gnyi ga'i mtha' las grol// dbugs la rtog pa kun rtog myi rtog pa// gang nas 'phags pa thams cad song ba yi// 'chi ba'i myed pa'i lam du 'jug pa ston// sdug sAl she shid de
281a1(mdo): bzhin sred pa spangs// lam rnams ston cing 'gog pa'ang rab tu 'chad// bden pa shes par shes rab 'di 'jug da ste// des ni sngon gi mtha' yang rab tu bcad// zhing rdas
281a2(mdo): thams cad zhing mtshungs zhing ma yin// chos rnams thams cad chos mtshungs rab tu de ban// sems can thams cad bdag myed/ sems can mtshungs// shes rab blo spyod pas ni 'di shes
281a3(mdo): so// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/ rigs kyi bu/ 
281a4(mdo): byang chub sems kyi sa bon de yang nam mkha' dang mtshungs so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams ji snyed ma dad par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed pa de'ang byang chub kyi sems
281a5(mdo): dang myi 'bral te// dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsegs shing brtsegs rnas pa dedA kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo bar byed cing // de dang / thams cad kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs par tshad myed par rab tu
281a6(mdo): gnas so// de la byang chub sems dpal 'di lta nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir bdag gis bsod nams tshad myed pa mngon par 'du bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad myed/ 
281a7(mdo): par brtsams pas/ tshad myed pa'i don 'phel ba yis te// de la byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad myed pa la brtson par bya'o// rigs kyi bu tshad byed pa bcu po 'di dag ni kang byang chub sos/ 
281a8(mdo): napas ba sod nams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste// bcu gang zhes/ 'di lnga ste/ mtshan dang deb byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pas lus kyi rgyan tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / seM
281b1(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song pa'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pas/ ngag gi rgyan tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su 'jug pas// sems/ 
281b2(mdo): kyi rgyan tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / ye shes dang / spyod lam tshad myed pas/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rgyan rnam pa tshad myed
281b3(mdo): pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas ga zhing yongs su dag pa chad byed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bsod nams dang sems nges par rtog pa dang / spyod pa spyad cad myed pas sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam chad myed
281b4(mdo): pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rgyan bkod pa thams cad dang / myod pa thams cad kyis byang chub kyi snying po la rgyanatshad byed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / gtan pa myed pa'i
281b5(mdo): mchod sbyin yongs su rdzogs pas/ mdzod sku yongs su sbyang dap+sA yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang / bla ma la rim 'gro byed cid 'dud po tshad myed pa dang / nga rgyal bcom pa tshad myed pas dbu/ 
281b6(mdo): 'a tsug gtor spyi gtsug bltar myi mthong ba tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par dbyi ba dang / sgyu dang g.yo myed pa pa 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / mthun par 'dzind pas/ don yod pa rnams par gnon pa mtshan gyen/ 
281b7(mdo): pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu tshad myed pa bcu po de dag ni/ gang byang chub sems dpal bsod nam kyi tshogs kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu nam byang chub yos
281b8(mdo): dpa' sems nam mkha' dang / mtshungs par gyur pa de nam mkha' chad myed pas/ de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyang tshad myed par kun tu gnas te/ de bas na bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs shes bya'o// 
282a1(mdo): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes nam mkhal dang / mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ gang sems can thams cad kyi sems la ye shes des khyab par byed cing // sems can
282a2(mdo): thams cad kyis 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems kyang / 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyang zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i
282a3(mdo): sems kyang desargya pa nya la'i 'anyon mo bral pa dang bsngos pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ka ti mug dang bcas pa'i sems kyang gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta
282a4(mdo): bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyang des nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// des 'dag
282a5(mdo): 'dod chags myed pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma 'das ma g.yos par semasas can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag/ gzhan dag la 'dod chags 'dul ba'i chos 'chad do// de bdag
282a6(mdo): nyid zhe sdang pa'i chos kyi rab bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la 'dod chags 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// bdag nyid zhe sdang myed pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin la
282a7(mdo): ma g.yos pa ba sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la zhe sdang dang 'dul ba'i chos 'chad do// bdag nyid gti mug myed pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can
282a8(mdo): gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la gti mug 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// de bdag nyid nye bar nyon mongs pa myed pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams
282b1(mdo): dang / gang zag gzhan dag la nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// des 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// 'dod
282b2(mdo): chags dang zhe bsdang dang / gti mug dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems can la dman par yang / yang dag par rje su myi mthong / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang kati mug dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa myed
282b3(mdo): pa'i sems la mchog tu yang / yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis su myed pa'i mthal sgo nas chos kyi sa dbyings yong su shes te// chos
282b4(mdo): dbyings gang yin pa de/ 'dod chags kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de zhe sdang kyi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dre/ gti mug gyi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyon mongs
282b5(mdo): pa'i dbyangs so// de bas na chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du'o// zhes bya ste// chos kyi dbyings nig pa yang 'gro ba 'ang myed/ myi 'gro ba'ang myed do// chos thos
282b6(mdo): cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su song ste/ gang zag bdag gi dbyangs shes pa des chos kyi dbyings kyang shes so// de ltar na chos kyang byings dang bdag gi dbyings de dag myi gnyis so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
282b7(mdo): bdag rnam pa dag pas chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par bdag go// de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rnam par dag pa ste/ gapa rnam pa dag pa de rab tu sdang ba'o// gang rab tu spang ba de tha ga ba myed pa'o// 
282b8(mdo): gang blagapa myed pa de la mtshan ma thams cad kyi skabs myed de// gang mtshan ma myed pa de la gnas pa ga pa yang myed de// mi gnas pa ni nam mkha'o// gang de ltar ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro zha ba/ ye shes
283a1(mdo): des chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rje/ 
283a2(mdo): su dran pa gang zhe na/ tshul khrims las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing/ zag pa myed pa'i tshul khrims las kyang myi nyams pa'o// ting nge 'dzin da las/ sangs rgyas rjes su/ dran zhing chos kyi dbyed/ 
283a3(mdo): mnyam pa thams cad las myi 'gyur ba'o// shes rab las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing chos thams cad rgyu ba myed par yang rnam par myi rtog pa'o// rnam par grol ba las/ sangs rgyas rjes
283a4(mdo): su dran zhing sems gnyis pa yang myi gnas pa'o// rnam pa krol pa'i ye shes mthon pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / shes pa thams cad la yang myi chags
283a5(mdo): 'o// stobs las sangs rgyas rjes su dran pazhi dus gsum mtshungs pa'i ye shes las kyang myi g.yos pa'o// myi 'jigs pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing // zag
283a6(mdo): pa thams cad dang ldan cag tu myi gnas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las kyang sangs rgyas rjes su drad zhing / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du'ang rnam par myi tog go// 
283a7(mdo): gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni gang // gzugs las sangs rgyas yang dag kyi mthong la/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas drang ba'i ye zhes kyi rjes su yang 'gro b.lo// de bzhin
283a8(mdo): tsha ba dang / 'du gas dang / 'du byed dang / nas pa gas pa ma ma namasas dan pa zhes kyi thongs/ ngam pa gas pa'i tsham nyid shes pa ma dran pa'i ye shes su sa 'gro ma/ 
283b1(mdo): phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams las sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su myi mthong la/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su yang 'gro ba'o// gang
283b2(mdo): yang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas shes rab che ba'i dran pa de ni yid la byed pa thams cad byed de/ lta ba thams cad kun nas ldang ba myed de// gang de lta bu rnyog pa myed pa'i dran pas dram pa te/ 
283b3(mdo): papar gzhag pa shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni gang spyod lam thams cad du sangs rgyas la mngon par chag/ 
283b4(mdo): bar byed de// 'greng pa dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'od pa dang / smra ba dang / myi sba bar sangs rgyas la mngon par chags par myi byed do// 
283b5(mdo): de la mngon par myi chags pas dran pa'ang dran par myi byed/ myi dran pa 'ang dran par myi byed do// de dran pa yid la myed byed pas// gzugs dang mtshan dang chos thams cad nyid du'ang
283b6(mdo): sangs rgyas rjes su mya madran no// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ste gang la mtshan ma dang dmyigs pa thams cad kun tu spyod pa myed pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la
283b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ chos shes bya ba ni 'dod chags myed pa'o// de la gang chos ci la chags kyang rung // de dag la rjes su dran
283b8(mdo): pa gang yang myed do// chos shes bya ba ni kun gzhi myed pa'o// de la gang chos gang la sbyor ba de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang myed do// chos shes bya ni nye bar zhi pa ste/ gang sems dang yid 'bar
284a1(mdo): par byed pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang myed do// chos shes bya ni klad mtshan ma myed pa ste/ gang mtshan ma rjesu 'brang pa'i rnam par shes pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang myed do// / 
284a2(mdo): chos shes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang la 'dus byas su rab tu bzhag la gnas pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang myed do// kang chos rjes su dran pa ni gang gis 'du byed thams cad skye ba myed par
284a3(mdo): mthong ste/ yang dag pa nyid skyon myed pa la 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rang bzhin gis ma skyes par rig nas/ mya skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo// gang de lta bu'i gnas
284a4(mdo): ni yang dag pa'i chos kyi gnas so// gang gis de ltar mngon par rtogs par de ni chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni slob pa dang / myi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sa
284a5(mdo): dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ mngon par rtogs pa'o// de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa ni 'phags pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba ste/ de la chos gang yang / 
284a6(mdo): kun tu myod babyed do// chos gapa pa kun bya byed pa de ni langs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa'o// gas kyi bu des kyang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i de/ dun rjes surnan pas
284a7(mdo): zhe / dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni 'dus sa byas pa mngon par 'du byed pas rjes su dran par gyi nus so// gang na lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kun du spyod pa byed pa ni mngon par du
284a8(mdo): myi byed pa zhes bya'o// de la 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni gdags pa dang do// sung chub sheg pa sa da pa yo'o// nya sa mad pas yang dag par 'das pa zhe/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i
284b1(mdo): dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o// rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnas pa'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa gang zhe na// gtong ba zhes bya ba ni phung po thams cad 'dor zhing rab tu gtong pa'o// de ci'i
284b2(mdo): phyir zhe na/ des chos gang yang btang ba myed do// 'di ltar de gang gtong ba'i chos gang yang spang bar myi 'gyur te/ 'di la gang chos thams cad myi 'dzin pa de ni gtod pa'i mchog go// gang myi 'dzin pa de ni myi gtod/ 
284b3(mdo): gang myi gtong ba de ni snyems so// gang myi snyems pa de ni dmyigs par myi byed do// gang dmyigs par myed byed pa de la sems rgyu ba myed do// rgya ba myed pa ni sems kyis rnam par rig pa myed pa'o// gapa la chos kyis ni
284b4(mdo): par rig par myed po de ni/ rnam par shes pa myi gnas pa'o// / rnam par shes pa myi gnas pa de ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o// gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba
284b5(mdo): de thos cad mkhyend par bsngos pa ste// gang thams cad mkhyen pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid do// gang mnyam pa nyid la gan sa pa ni rab tu gtong zhing byang chub tu bsngos te rjes su dran yang chos
284b6(mdo): kang yang rje su dran pa byed do// de ni byi zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni chos dang chos ma yin pa gnyis dang ldan pa ma yin te/ kang 'di gnyis su myed pa de la yid la byed pa ci yang myed do// rigs kyi / 
284b7(mdo): de ltar chos shes pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi gan pa pa'i gtong pa rjes su dran pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes
284b8(mdo): su dran pa gang zhe na/ tshul khrims shes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang / zag pa myed pa lon pa myedapalhun gis grub pa/ brtul zhugs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ rnam pa
285a1(mdo): rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// ting de 'dzin gi gnas te/ sems kyi dmyigs pa'i gnas ma yin no// shes rab kyi rtsa bste spros pa'i mtshan nyid la yin no// rnam par grol ba'i rgyu mthun pa ste/ 
285a2(mdo): gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no// mkhas pas rab tu bsngags pa ste// gzugs sda ba ma yin no// nyon mongs pa zhi pa ste so so rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// bde ba thams cad kyi rjes
285a3(mdo): su 'gro zhing gnyen pos bskyed pa ma yin te/ kabade lta bu'i tshul khrims rjes su dran zhing dran pa la rnyog pa myed pa 'i de ni kyi rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims je su dran pa zhes bya'o// 
285a4(mdo): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis rgan pa ba'i lha rjes su dran pa ka ba zhe na/ lha'i ris gnyis rjes/ desu dran par bya ste// gnyis gang zhe na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ras
285a5(mdo): kyi lha dang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dang / dga' ldan gnas na 'khod pa rnams so// de la byang chu ba sems dpa' gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams rjes su dran
285a6(mdo): no// yang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpal dgal ldan gnas nag pa dag 'bod pa de dag ni spyi lol bu bcus rjes su dran pa ste/ bcu gang zhes/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams
285a7(mdo): nad kyi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa spyi bor gyur da pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi nang na gyi nyams pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sa thams cad kyi nang na dbang 'askum pa lis dang / 
285a8(mdo): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi nang na yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / ting po 'dzin kyi nyams pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i nang na don dang / spobs pa rgyun myi chad pa dang / shes pa thams// 
285b1(mdo): cad kyi napan chags pa myed pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang / dbang po thams cad kyi nang na rab 'bring tha ma la 'jug pa shes pa dang / stobs dang kyi 'jigs pa la sna pa'i ye shes rjes su 'gro ba dang
285b2(mdo): spyan thams cad kyi nang na sangs rgyas kyi spyan kun tu gzigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'di dag gi lag 'thil du song ba ltar 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas/ seMs srad
285b3(mdo): cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o zhes spyi bo'i chos rnam pa bcu po la de dag gis rjes su dran no// de'i dran pa de ni ldabs ma 'khrugs khrag la nyal dang / kun nas
285b4(mdo): lda pas ma 'khrugs/ yid la byed pas ma 'khrugs/ spros/ bas ma/ 'khrugs pa ste/ de lta bu'i dran pa chog pa myed dpas// lha rjes su dran pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis
285b5(mdo): gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi yud la ji ltar byang chub sems dpal mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mnyam pa nyid thobs kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i gyod pa yang spyod pa yin
285b6(mdo): zhe na/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba ste/ tshor ba thams cad rgyan bcad pa/ dmyigs pa thams cad lig/ phung po dang khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi
285b7(mdo): nying mtshams sbyor ba myed pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa de mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mnyam pa nyid thob cing sngon gnas bcas pa'i snying rje chen po dang / thabs dang shes rab dang / ye shes kyis ni rnam par
285b8(mdo): rold pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin kyis ni shin tu byin kyis brlabs/ shes rab dang ye shes ni shin tu bsgoms// sngon gyi byin kyis brlabs kyis ni bsam pa yongs su dag pa/ sgyu mas rnam par/ 
286a1(mdo): rol pa 'i rdi pa 'dzinapa la ni gnas te/ nyon mongs pa gang gis 'khor pa rab tu bskyed pa'i 'khor bar 'ching ba de dag rab tu spangs shi ye shes gar gyis mya ngas las 'das pas ston/ 
286a2(mdo): pa de la dbang thob pas/ myi skye ba las skye zhing kyi 'byung la sas 'byung ba se/ mya ngan las 'das pa/ dang mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par zhugs kyang sems can yongs su sbyin pa bya ba yang myi 'chad
286a3(mdo): do// de ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi thugs su chad pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgo ste/ ye shes kyi sgo ga pa la gnas pas byang chub sems dpal mya ngan las 'das pa dang / 
286a4(mdo): pa nyid thob kyang byang chub sems dpa'i pyad pa pyod pa'o// // rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub semam dpalas so/ can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / cho ga shes pa yin zhe
286a5(mdo): na/ rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi gyod pa ni brgyad l+li/ bzhi stong ste/ 'di ni sdom gyi sa kha'i tshig go// gang yang sems/ can thams cad kyi spyod pa tshad myed pa/ bsam gyis myi khyab
286a6(mdo): pa/ brjod du myed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis kyi rig/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyis kyi rig pa/ de la byang chu rgya sems
286a7(mdo): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi phrin gyi brlabs dang / rang gi shes pas sems can thams cad spyod pa 'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes rab tu 'jug we/ pyod pa de'i ngo bo nyid gang mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/ rgya'i mtshan nyid
286a8(mdo): dam/ rkyen kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byed rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ myi 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'dod chags kyi mtshan nyid dam// zhes
286b1(mdo): gis mas sa dang / ti mug ni mtshan nyid dam/ galal mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sems can dmyal pa'i mtshan nyid dam can 'grol gyi gnas kyimatshan nyid dam/ gshin de'i 'dzig rten
286b2(mdo): gi mtshan nyid dam/ lha'i mtshan nyid dam/ myi'i mtshan nyid dam/ nyan thos kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sangs rgyas kyi nges
286b3(mdo): par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ ring ba'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ bar ma'i chu'i mtshan nyid dam/ nye ba'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/ spyod pa de dag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yang dag par chi
286b4(mdo): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ ye shes thams cad la 9/ na mtho ba myed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thas cad kyi myod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 
286b5(mdo): chog shes pa yin mo/ rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgag chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa pa yin zhen/ rigs
286b6(mdo): kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni myi zad pa ste/ semam can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid la rab tu 'jug pa ji snyed pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
286b7(mdo): rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod la gzud pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa 'ang de snyed do// ji ltar sems can gyi spyod pa myi zad cing mtha' myed pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldam 'das rnas kyi
286b8(mdo): chos dkon mchog gi mdzod kyang myi zad cing mtha' myed pa'o// chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ces bya ba ni ka pago 'ug mo de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa nas gang gi nub mo yongs su mya
287a1(mdo): ngan las 'das 'di'i bar byed bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dang / 'chad pa dang / 'chad par 'gyur ba'i de dgra thams mad ni de bzhin no// ma nor ste de bzhin no// gzhan ma yin pa'o// 
287a2(mdo): ci'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya zhe na/ de bzhin nyid zhi ba la yang dag par zhugs pas de'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya'o// ni la phyir na ma nod la de bzhin nyid ces bya zhen/ don dam pa'i bden pa la yang
287a3(mdo): dag par zhugs pa de'i phyir ma nor pa de bzhin zhes bya'o// ni'i phyir na gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya'o zhe na/ de bdag gi ngo bo nyid ma yin pam gzhan du myi 'tshal te// de'i phyir gzhan
287a4(mdo): ma yin pa'o// yang sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos/ dkon mchog gi mdzad do// spyod gsum gi stong rten po'i 'jig rten kau khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams
287a5(mdo): mang du zos pa/ kun dga' bo lta bur gyur da kyang de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du yang yi ge kho nyedu chud par m+b+hi nus so// yang don gcig tu baspen+ma te ji ltar
287a6(mdo): pa bzhin du bstan dpal 'di ltar bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod do// de byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dzin te/ lel y-i ge thams cad myi brjed cing don thams cad kyi nyes/ 
287a7(mdo): parar+ya sems can thams cad la mgu bar byed/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad rab tu mnyes par byed de// btud thams cad pham par byed/ mu stegs can gzhan thams cad tshar gcod/ nyon mongs pa
287a8(mdo): thams cad zhi bar byed cing // de dag la chos dkon mchog rab tu sgrogs pa de ltar 'dzin to// rigs kyi bu de/ snyam na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dkon mchog gi mdzod
287b1(mdo): 'dzin pa yin no// yang rigs kyi bu chos gong gi ngo bo nyid du ngas chos rnams mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de'i ngo bo nyid du byang chub sems dpal sa chos rnams gzung bar bya'o// yang ji ltar bu de bzhin gshegs pas
287b2(mdo): chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas she na// yongs su ma grub pa'i tshul gis sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang / yul las shin tu 'das pa'i tshul gis/ mi las gi ngo bo nyid dang / shin tu skye ba myed dam
287b3(mdo): tshul gis/ smyig skya 'i ngo bo nyid dang / gyi 'pho ba'i tshul gyis myig g.yor gi ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin myed pa'i tshul gyis/ gzugs brtan gyi ngo bo nyid dang / rag las pa'i tshul gyis/ stong pa'i
287b4(mdo): ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par myi rtog pa'i tshul gyis/ mtshan ma myed/ pa'i chu ngo bo nyid dang / sems chags pa myed pa'i tshul gyis dasmon pa myedati pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'dod chags thams cad dang / 
287b5(mdo): bral ba'i tshul gis 'dod chags byed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / mang sa thams cad las kyar sa 'das pa'i tshus gyis/ 'dus ma byas pa'i ngo bo nyid byed/ ltar rigs kyi bu tha snyad du gzhan gyi
287b6(mdo): rnam par rig pa la brten nas// de 'dra ba pangs chos de mngon par rdzogs pam sangs rgyas te/ gang chos de khri ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni tshig kyis brjod par gyi nus so// de la chos rnams 'dzin
287b7(mdo): par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'as/ de ltar bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ste// yi ge dang nges pa'itshig gis kyang sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag
287b8(mdo): gzhan dag la bstand par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nas/ sems can rnam par dag lngas sems can namase yongs su sbyin par byed ce na// rigs
288a1(mdo): kyi bu sems can gi khams ni thog mnas rnam yar dag ste/ de la sems can rnams kyi ma pa'i dngos po byed de/ byang chub sems dpas chos byams cad kyi skye ba yongs su chan pa marig nas/ 
288a2(mdo): sems can gang rnams song su phyin par byed pa/ de las bdag tu sa bar gyi 'grub/ sems can su mam yin/ srog du lta/ bar ma yid/ gang zag tu ga 'jam kyi 'byung // 'ang de 'di nam du sems te
288a3(mdo): sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni phyir mi log ste/ rgyungs pa'i kun nas bkres pa dang / ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / srid pa 'dus pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa kus su rtog ma las sems can zhes brjod do snyam mo// 
288a4(mdo): de la byang chub sems dpa' sa myed pa phyin ci log tu las bya ba/ ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rab tu spangs pa'i phyi sems can rnams rdul chos ston te dngos so gang yang chud kyi sa son to// sems can
288a5(mdo): myed cing sems can dben pas sesems cas rnams yongs su sbyin par byed de/ de wAng byang chub sems dpal thog mnas na oM pa dag pas sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par byed do// rigs kyi bu de/ 
288a6(mdo): la ji gams byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor bas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par smra ba cem/ tshul bzhin bya ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
288a7(mdo): rgyu dang rkyen cing 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'bras bu mngon par 'grub po// sbyin pa'i ni long spyod chen po'i rgyu ste/ de la byang chub sems dpal keng gtong ba'i de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ sbyin pa'i
288a8(mdo): pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshul khrims ni lha dang / mya mi skye ba la rgya ste/ lha dang myir skyes nas/ byang chug sems dpal sems can rnams tshul khrims la rab tu 'dzad de/ tshul/ khrims yang/ 
288b1(mdo): dag khar bzung ste yang thams cad mkhyend par bsngos nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// bzod pa la dang nges pa ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rgyan gyi rgyu ste/ lus dang ngag dpa
288b2(mdo): sems brgyan pas byang chub sems dpal bdag la pas ga dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin te/ phan par 'dod pa bzod pa'i gnas de yang thams cad mkhyen pa ma bsngos nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa
288b3(mdo): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// brtson 'grus ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud pa'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sa brtsom 'grus brtsams nas dge ba'i ab thams cad yang dag par bsgrusdub cing / dge ba'i
288b4(mdo): pa thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa 'i brtson 'grus de yang thams cad mkhyend par bsngos nas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol/ tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bsam gtan ni ses
288b5(mdo): dka' ba dang / cang shes pa'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dga' ba dang / cang shes pas zhi gnas kyi tshogs kun tu skong ste/ gzhi gnas kyi tshogs de yang thams cad
288b6(mdo): mkhyen par bsngos nas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// thos pa ni shes rab chen po'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po mi dmyigs lnga lA gyi dzin da cing
288b7(mdo): dmyigs pa'i byed pa'i thos pa de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol sa phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin du dge ba'i chos thams cad de/ dgel ba'i chos kyi
288b8(mdo): rgyu gang dpag brtsegs pa de dang de 'bras bu yun gis 'grub pas mngon par skye bar 'gyur te// rgyu dang rkyen de ni tshul bzhis yid la byed pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang tshul bzhin zhes bya ba la chos
289a1(mdo): thams cad kyi tshul bzhin ni bdag yin te/ ji ltar bdag la bdag myed pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la bdag myed do// ji ltar bdag stong pa de bzhin du chos rnams stong ngo // ji ltar
289a2(mdo): bdag myed tu gtags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang mying du gtags pa tsam du zad do// de ltar tshul bzhin du yid la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad mnyam par sbyor/ 
289a3(mdo): mo// gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de de ltar tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sprul po// rigs kyi bu/ 
289a4(mdo): de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpal mngon rabar shes pa lha/ ma nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin zhe na// de la rigs kyi bu dge sbyong dam bram ze'i 'jig tshogs la/ lta ba ma bcom
289a5(mdo): pas mngon par shes pa la skyed pa de dag ni mngon par shes nams lam nyams par 'gyur ro// yang byang chub sems da/ ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba las byab ba'i rnam par gyur na pa/ 
289a6(mdo): drug cu cha gnyis yang dag par bcom nas/ lhub pa dang len pa thams cad myed par mngon par shes pa skyed de/ ye shes dang ldan shes rab dang na/ bro dang ldan/ bzod pa dang ldan/ tshul khrims dang ldan/
