289a7(mdo): te/ ting nge 'dzin da la rloms par zhugs shing // lus debs/ sems dben te/ 'di 'dra ba'i ye shes kyis na nye ba bzhi zhing / phyi rol du kyi rgyal/ yul myed pa'i yul cam/ cang shes pa'i sem
289a8(mdo): dang ldan pa/ dka' ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ shin tu brtags pas brtags pa/ rab tu dkar ba'i blo// nyon mongs pas ma 'khrugs pa/ swab ba thob pa/ ye shes rab rib myed pa/ bsod nam pa
289b1(mdo): tshogs bsags pa// se shes kyi tshogs pa chags pa/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs bamags pa/ lhag mthong gi tshogs brtsegs pa/ sbyin pa la brtan pa/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa/ bzod pa'i go myos pa/ brtson
289b2(mdo): 'grus kyi la lang lagos pa/ bsam gtan sa gnas pa// shes rab shin tu bsgoms pa'i blo dpa ldan pa/ byams pas rjes su mthus pa/ si je la rab tu gnas pa/ thabs kyis ma ngos par bsgrubs pa
289b3(mdo): gsul tsam dang ldan pas mngon pa shes pa skyed de/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du mngon pa shes pa de dag gsashin tu 'bangs shi / de mngon par shes pa de dag gis chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin no/ 
289b4(mdo): gzugs thams cad mthob/ sgra thams cad thos// sems can thams can la 'jug cing bskal pa grangs byed pa rje sunan/ da te/ rdzu 'phrul thams cad gis rnam par 'phrul/ zag pa 'ad pa'i
289b5(mdo): bden pa'i rnyed cipa yid kyi rnam par rtog pa ji snyed pa la rnam khang tog la dang / rnam par dpyod pa thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ des chos thams cad la de bzhin du lhun gyis grub pa bgan
289b6(mdo): lo// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sem sa dpa' mngos shes pa las kyi nyams zhing chos thams la dbang byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhum
289b7(mdo): shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu zab mo zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul ni 'di lta ste/ ma rig
289b8(mdo): pa'i rkyen gyikyis 'du byed// 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis mying dang gzugs/ mying dang gzugs kyi rkyen kyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis
290a1(mdo): chos pa tsho ba'i rkyen kyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye la/ skye ba la rkyend kyis gshi dang myang dang smre/ sngags 'dod pa dang / sdug/ bsngal ba dang / 
290a2(mdo): yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug sngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' shig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu ga dang/ rkyen dag pa yin pa
290a3(mdo): de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/ 'di mi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba kun nas 'byung ba'i tshul zhes bya'o// de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'gog pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma yi/ 
290a4(mdo): pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas/ rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas/ mying dang gzugs 'gag/ bying dang gzugs 'gag pas// skye mchen
290a5(mdo): drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags/ reg pa 'gag/ re/ 'gag pas/ tsho pa 'gags pas/ zed pa 'gag/ sred pa/ 'gags pas/ len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas/ srid pa/ 
290a6(mdo): 2ga/ srid pa 'gags pas/ skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas/ shi dang mya ngan dang / sde sngags 'don pa dang / sdug phral ba dang / yid kyi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de lta zhug
290a7(mdo): bsras kyi phul po 'di 'ba' phrin 'gag par 'gyur ro// de ni rigs kyi bu rten ci'i 'brel bar 'byung ba 'gog pa'i tshul zhes bya'o// sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i skyug pa/ rkyen gapa yin pa
290a8(mdo): des byang chub pa shes su lug te/ rin chos kyi rgyas pam pos 'dun pa zhes bya'o/ nga 'a con dang / rang sangs rgyam pa sa cad kyims yin pa 'o// pam gyi na tan ma
290b1(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul lo// rab kyi ye shes dang sangs rgyas kyi byin
290b2(mdo): kyi brlabs kyis byang chub sems dpas kyang de'i mtshan sbyor ba shes so// gzhan yang zab mo zhes bya ba ni 'jig tshogs dang / bdag rnam par dag pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par smralo// de ci'i phyir/ 
290b3(mdo): zhe na/ 'jig tshogs ni kus nas btsal kyang myi dmyigs so// kar myi dmyigs pa de ni zab mo 'o// bdag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma brnyes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag thog ma nas kyang rnam pa
290b4(mdo): dag ste/ ji lum bdag rnam par dag pa de bzhin du chos thams/ nad nas par dag go// de ci'i phyi rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/ dasu/ de la chos gapa yang ma skyes ma bskyed/ ma 'gags// ma 'ag
290b5(mdo): pa ste/ de bas marnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// mum pa khyed pa/ sdang ba myed pa/ kun gzhi myed pa/ rab rib myed pa mdon dam pa/ zab mo gapal myig byed cing myig 'gog pa byed pa na
290b6(mdo): yid kyi bar du byed cing yid 'gog pa myed pa ste de ni yum du bza ba ma yin no// gang yul tu ma yin zhing yul byed pa de ni don dam pa ste/ de 'i phyir zab mo zhes bya'o// de la sems dang yid 'dzind pa myed de/ 
290b7(mdo): rtogs par dka' ba mthong bar dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba/ de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la ye shes gzhan ki/ drang myi 'jog cing // sems can gzhan la yang rab tu ston te// de lta na byang chub
290b8(mdo): dpa'i chos tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gti dad pag dka' ba yin no// 
291a1(mdo): na ma mas 'byung bdi ni rgya / drug sa pa/ bdag byed pa/ shil/ gang rten pa de la mi bdag byed/ sems can byed/ srog byed/ gso babyed/ skyes bu byed/ gang bag kyi
291a2(mdo): shems pa skyem bgyid/ ge bu gyur/ gang zhen pa na mis dag par 'byung ba gang yang byed// gang zhen pa de ni/ daci sa byung ma/ sol bskyed pa/ gong pa mtshan sa gyud pa// nase
291a3(mdo): rgyab byed pa/ ma sgom pa/ spros pa myed pa ste/ dpyi skye ba mchos khon skye/ 'gag pa na chos som 'gas ste/ 'a rjes bdag gas/ sems can nas/ srog gas/ gso ba la
291a4(mdo): skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gam/ gang las phyis sam/ shed bu byed ces bya'o// chos gang dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de dag la ni skye ba mi myed cing bdag po myed do// de'i phyi ma chos thams cad ni/ 
291a5(mdo): mar ba shing dang / rig pa dang / lam dang / myig yongs su zhes byas/ ji ltar gyi rol gi dngos po rnams skye ba na byed par byed pa byed/ 'gag pa na yang 'gag par byed pa myed pa/ de bzhin dun pa
291a6(mdo): chos rnams skye ba na yang skyed par byed pa byed/ 'gag pa na yang 'gag par byed pa byed de// gzhan du na rkyen rnams yod na 'byung gi rkyen ma tshang ma 'gag go snyam du sems te/ de ltar na shes pa la spyod pal
291b1(mdo): mthar lta ba thas cad rab tu spong ngo // de la mthar lta ba gang zhe na// mtha' zhes bya ba ni chad pa dang rtag pa dang / gang de myi skyed cing rnam par myi 'jigs pa ni chad par dang rtag pa dang bral ba ste/ de'i phyir
291b2(mdo): dag pas na mthar lta ba thams cad rnam par dag ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpal rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lal 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa ste/ mthar lta ba thams cad dang bral ba
291b3(mdo): yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji lta b.ran byang chub dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas de bzhin nyid dbyer myed pa shes pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa
291b4(mdo): zhes bya ba sa de bzhin nyid dbyer myed pa de ni phyag rgya ste/ phye ba myed pa/ 'jug pa myed pa/ mngon par zhen pa myed/ dpa/ myi baspyod pa/ bskyod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ lnga dang kyi dang / 
291b5(mdo): lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa li 'jig rten gis bskyod paramyi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe ma/ lA dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten ni phyag rgya des btab pa nyid do// de bzhin
291b6(mdo): gshegs pa'i phyag rgya de ni shin tu gyi skye ba 'i phyag rgya shin tu stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya// shan tu mtshan ma myed pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu smon pa byed pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu 'dus byas pa'i phyag rgya/ 
291b7(mdo): shin tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgya/ shin tu de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgya/ shin tu nam mkha'i phyag rgya ste/ dpems nam mkhal la phyag rgya myi lnga pa ba de bzhin
291b8(mdo): du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya de yang spyan lnga la gyi snang ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi the snyad ji snyed du tha snyad 'dogs pa de thams cad de ni
292a1(mdo): ma la gyi gnas pa de dag sa chos rnam par 'jog par gyi byed/ chos thams ca sa dang su myi byed do// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyal btab masas// de dag de bzhin nyid 'byed par gyi
292a2(mdo): byed do// de la de bzhin nyid tha dad pa gang zhe na/ gang zhe na gang dag tha a dang 'bring dbang ba kyi chos rnams su rnam par rtog pa'o// gang dag chos thams cad la gyi rtog cing rnam par gyi rtog pa de
292a3(mdo): dag ni de bzhin nyid tha dad du kyi byed do// yang ji snyed yang sde brtags she pa/ rnam par btags kyang de bzhin nyid dbye ba kyi nus te/ dperan sems can thams cad ni nam mkhal ma
292a4(mdo): rnam par rgyu sa nam ma'a'i khams ni 'dres par gyi khyed do// de bzhin du sems can thams cad de bzhin nyid la rnamapar rgyu yang de bzhin nyid ni 'dres par myi byed do// gang 'di
292a5(mdo): des bu 'a'i so rnams shes pa'i byang chub sems dpal des bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa yin te/ de bzhin nyid kyang 'dres par gyi byed do// rigs bu la dri lu na/ 
292a6(mdo): mams dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs shi chos kyi byings thams cad la yang dag phral gzhos pa sim na/ chos kyi dbying shes bya ba ni rgyal thams cad dang bras pa'i phyir 'du
292a7(mdo): chags dang bral ba 'i dbyings so// yang dag par bsgrubs pa myed pa 'i phyir la skyes pa la phyir dbyings so// ma byung ba 'i phyir myi 'gog pa 'i dbyings so// 'gro ba myed pa'i phyir gyi 'gro ba'i
292b1(mdo): dbyings so// rgal ba myed pa'i phyir 'o ba myed pa'i dbyings so// 'byung ba byed pa'i phyir gnas myed pa'i dbyings so// dus gsum mnyam pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin gi dbyings so// bzod/ 
292b2(mdo): mA nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag gi dbyings so// don dam pa yin pa'i phyir gang zag myed pa'i dbyings so// gnas myed pa'i phyir rnam par rig pa myed pa'i dbyings so// 'dre ba myed pa'i phyir kun
292b3(mdo): shi myed pa'i dbyings so// nges par gyur pa'i phyir skye ba myed pa'i dbyings so// rang bzhin gis yongs su dag pa 'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings so// gnyen po myed pa'i phyir mya ngas las 'das pa'i dbyings
292b4(mdo): 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad de ltar zhugs pas/ de la byang chub sems dpal de ltar chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa lig bcing sA la dang / 
292b5(mdo): brjod pa dang ston pa de thams cad ni chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol ba nyid do// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs 'di 'dod chags kyi khams dang // chos kyi dbying/ 
292b6(mdo): de dag gnyis su myed par rab tu shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// zhes gyi kham so dang chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 
292b7(mdo): sa thos kyi gyis kyi rang bzhin can no// gti mug gi khams dang chom gyi byings de dag ni gnyis su byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ gti mug nos sa gyu cings kyi rang bzhin ca no// rten mongs pa'i khams dpa/ 
292b8(mdo): song kyi dbyings de dag mi gnyis su byed de// de mi li phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// 'dod pa'i khams dang chos kyi dbyings kyi de dag ni gnyis su byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhem/ 'dod sde
293a1(mdo): khams ri chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin brgyan no// gzugs kyi khams dang chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su myed de/ de ci 'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// gzugs
293a2(mdo): kya byed pa'i 'bras dang chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su byed de// de ci'i phyir nan/ gzugs byed pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// byig gi 'ams dang chos kyi dbyings kyi de dag ni gnyis su myed de/ 
293a3(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// gzugs kyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// 
293a4(mdo): myig gi rnam par zhes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su myed de/ de ci'i phyir len/ byig gi rnam par shes pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// yid kyi bar gi khams dang
293a5(mdo): chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su myed de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su
293a6(mdo): mying de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// phung po'i khams dang chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phung po'i khams dang ni chos kyi
293a7(mdo): dbyangs kyi rang bzhin can no// sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa dang mu dang me dang rlung ni chos kyi dbyings
293a8(mdo): kyi rang bzhin can no// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhin stong dang / spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi sdong dang / chos thams cad kyi bar dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su byed de/ de tsal phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad
293b1(mdo): ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can te/ byang chub sems dpal gang chos mnyam pa nyid 'di la zhugs pa de ni chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir chos thams cad rab tu shes pa'i yin te// rigs kyi/ 
293b2(mdo): bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpal chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpal bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing myi byed de/ theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas/ 
293b3(mdo): shing myi g.yo ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing myi byed pa bcu gnyis kyis ni/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gis myi byed pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta// 
293b4(mdo): ste/ byang chub kyi sems dpal myi phyed pa dang / bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / sbyor ba'i myi byed pa dang / sbyin pa myi/ byed pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / 
293b5(mdo): bsam gtan dang / shes rab myi phyed pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po myi byed pa dang / bsdud pa'i dngosapo myi phyed pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyin par byed pa myi phyed/ 
293b6(mdo): pa dang / sangs rgyas rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa myi byed pa dang / 'khor bas yongs su myi skyob kyi phyed pa dang / dgal ba'i rtsabs kyi ngoms pa kyi byed pa dang / mtshan dang dbye byad bzang po 'i phyir gtan pa
293b7(mdo): myed pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa myi byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos gzung pa'i phyir lus dang srog 'dor ba myi byed pa dang / sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gi phyir dge ba'i chal dang bsngo ba myi phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
293b8(mdo): chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa myi byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di lta bu'ang dag las myi phyed pa de'i tshe/ bsam kha rdo rje ltar sra zhing myi byed pa yin no// 'di// 
294a1(mdo): lnga ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje ni nor bu rin po che thams cad 'bigs kyang bdag nyid ni myi 'bigs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal bsam pa rdo rje lta bas zhing myi phyed pa/ 
294a2(mdo): mapa ngemam pa can thams cad kyi bags nyis dang / nyon mngam la kun nas ldang ba dang / sa bar bye nga pa rnams ses kyang bdag nyid ni mig pa chen po 'di mas myi byed do// rigs kyi bu de ster na
294a3(mdo): chub sems dpal bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing myi phyed de/ theg pa chen po 'di ltar / legs par gnas shing myi g.yo ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na// byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas
294a4(mdo): kyi yul rjes su thob cing / rang gi yul yongs su dag pa phrin zhe na// sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bya ba ni/ yul ma y-i/ na pa yul myed pa/ yul thams cad yongs su dag pa'o// de la/ 
294a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpal ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su dag pas rang gi yul yongs su sbyor ste/ de 'di snyam myig gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi
294a6(mdo): yul ni mu dang yang nye ba ma'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la nir myig gi yul gang yang myed do/ 
294a7(mdo): rna ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye bar 'am ring bar ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul gyi
294a8(mdo): pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni rna ba'i yul gang yang myed do// sna'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye bar 'am ri pa ba ma yin no// 
294b1(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni snga'i yul gang yang myed do// lce'i yul ni sas rgyas kyi yal yin yang sangs rgyas kyi
294b2(mdo): yul ni su dang yang nye la'am ra pi la ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni lce'i yul/ gang yang myed do// lus kyi yun mi sangs rgyas
294b3(mdo): kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang nye bar 'am ring bar ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni lus kyi yul gapas
294b4(mdo): myed do// yid kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ri ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyi
294b5(mdo): te/ dben pa'i yul ni yid kyi yul gang yang myed do// phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams/ dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa la yang
294b6(mdo): de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul dben pa nyid kyis yul thams cad dben par 'jug go// rang kyi zhing yongs su dag par sangs rgyas kyi zhib sa
294b7(mdo): zhugs pa de ni chos gang dag de'i dbang po drug la sdang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad la/ sangs rgyas kyi yul dben par 'jug go// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul chags pa myed cing
294b8(mdo): thogs pa myed pa de bzhin du/ de yul thams cad la yang myi chags kyi thogs ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul la rjes su zhugs shingapa nga gi yul la yongasu
295a1(mdo): dag pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa rtag tu myi brjed par 'apyod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpal gzungs yongs su
295a2(mdo): sbyang bar bya bas gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ de la gzungs yongs su spyod pa byed pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni/ gzungs yongs su spyad pa byed pa ste/ sum bcu
295a3(mdo): gnyis po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos kyi kun dgal la dga' zhing / mos pa dang / chos la gzhol ba dang / chos la bab pa dang / mang du thos
295a4(mdo): pa rnams la sten cing / bsnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa dad pa/ slob dpon dang / mkhan po dang rnams la nga rgyal/ myed cing btsun par gus par byed pa dang // chos yongs su tshol
295a5(mdo): pas mi 'ongs pa dang / rjes su bstan pa rnams la bka' glo bde zhing 'thun par 'dzind pa dang / chos sba ba'ig zag rnams la stond pa tsam du sems shing 'khrul ba myi cho / 
295a6(mdo): kun 'dzin da pa dang 'dzidad pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa la le lo byed pa dang / chos la slob dpon gyi dpe 'khyad myed cing zar zing myed par chos sbyin pa dang / shes rab kyi ba'i gnas
295a7(mdo): thos pa dang / tshul bzhin rgya gi chos la sbyor ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chom la la ldo ba brtags pa'i byib/ ma du thos pa zhun pa byed par byas pa dang / tshangs par gyon pa la gnas pa su
295a8(mdo): byed par byam 'a dang / rtag tu dben pa la sems gzhol ba dang / rjes su dran pa drug rjes su dran pa dang / yang dag pa chags par 'gyur ba drug kyi 'do ba dang / gus par bya ba 'i gnas drug
295b1(mdo): yongs su myi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khrong khro ba myed pa'i sems kyis chos la sbyor ba dang / rten cing 'brel khar 'byung ba dang / myi 'gal ba'i las dang / bya ba la 'dug pa dang / 
295b2(mdo): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum la sems nges par rtog pa la gyi skrag pa dang / 'phags ya pa'i rigs dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun 'dzin pas yongs su yid myi 'chad pa dang / dag par
295b3(mdo): chos yongs su gzung ba la sems bum pa myed pa dang / sems can la lwa ba nas snying rje dang / chos la lta bas lus dang / srog/ 'dod pa dang / ye shes la lta bas rtag tu nga rgyal myed pa
295b4(mdo): dang / sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba la yongs su myi skyong ba ste/ 'di ni gzungs yong su spyong pa byed pa zhe ste/ bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la gzungs gang zhe na/ gang kun
295b5(mdo): bzung ba'i chos rnams myirjed pa dang / ji lngar thos pa'i chos rnams myi brjed pa dang / dran pa rjes su dran pa dang / rtogs par khong du chud pa dang / blo gros 'dod pa dang
295b6(mdo): yi ge myi zad pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang smad la 'jug pa shes pa dang / spobs pa bstan pa thogs pa myed cing/ rkyen gyi 'chad pa dang / nges pa'i don gi mdo sde rtogs pa/ 
295b7(mdo): la 'jug pa shes pa dang / drang ba'i don gi mdo ste rtogs pa la shes pa dang / kun rdzob myi zad pa bstan pa shes pa dang / don dam pa dbyer myed pa'i de kho na ldan pa shes pa dang // 
295b8(mdo): bden pa la 'jug pa nges par shes pa dang / dran pa nye par gzhag pa'i rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i brtson/ 'grus/ myi 'gor ba shes pa dang // rdzu 'phrul
296a1(mdo): ki rkang pas rnam par roya pa shes pa dang dbang po'i rim pa shes pa dang / stobs la gnas pa myi skyo bar shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rtogs pa dang / 
296a2(mdo): mthun par shes pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i gnas shes pa dang / zhi gnas kyis sems gnas pa shes pa dang / lhag mthong gis chos sgrol par shes pa dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol
296a3(mdo): ba'i rjes su 'thun par shes pa dang / so so yang dag pa la rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes bskyed pa shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug la 'jug pa zhes
296a4(mdo): pa dang / bslu ba'i dngos po bzhi so so ci rigs par shes pa/ dang / sgra skad dang / ngag gi lam la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos kyi brda' ston pa shes pa dang / don dbyer myed par shes
296a5(mdo): pa dang / tshig 'bru gyi zad par shes pa dang / sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba shes pa dang / so su rig par chos ston pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa
296a6(mdo): dran pas 'dzin pa shes pa dang / tshig dang yi ge thams cad mtshams sbyar pa'i nges pa'i tshig la 'jug pa shes pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa shes pa
296a7(mdo): dang / rgyu dang bya ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos thams cad la sba ba rab rib myed par snang bar shes pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs zhes bya'o// lus dpangag dang sems dpa'adra bar chos kun tu 'dzin pa ga
296a8(mdo): yin pa de ni mi zad pa ste/ chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad/ rnam par bskyed pa 'di ni gzungs kyi tshul la 'dzag po yin te/ 
296b1(mdo): gzungs kyi thob pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la myi brjed par spyod pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpal gzungs thob pa rtag tu myi brjed par spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la/ 
296b2(mdo): jiltar na byang chule sems dpal spobs pa thogs pa myed cing rgyun myi 'chad la rtag tu sas rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ zhe na/ rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
296b3(mdo): sems dpal rnams kyi spobs pa yin te/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa myur ba dang / spobs pa mgyogs pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa myed pa dang / spobs pa rgyun rgya
296b4(mdo): 'chad pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang / zab mo la spobs pa dang / sna tshogs la spobs pa dang / dalegs par brgyan pa'i spobs pa dang / zhum pa myed pa'i spobs
296b5(mdo): pa dang / 'jigs pa'i byed pa'i spobs pa dang / tshigs su 'acad pa sna tshogs bskrun pa'i nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa mdo dang rtogs pa brjod pa dang / sngon byang ba la spobs pa
296b6(mdo): dang/ myi thul ba'i spobs pa dpo tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa myi zad pa la spobs pa dang / spobs pa shin tu gsal zhing shin tu mdzes pa dang / tshig brtsan zhing gzub ba'i spobs pa'i dang/ chos
296b7(mdo): ston pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs pa dang / lha'i 'khod kyi rgyan ki spobs pa dang / the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten dpa'ajig rten las/ 'das pa'i chos la spobs pa dang // 
296b8(mdo): 'khrul pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / 'khor la byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi spobs pa dang / skye ba dran par mngon shes pa'i spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs
297a1(mdo): kyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu nyi shu rab bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi spobs pa yin no// de dag kyang yongs su sbyang ra bya ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi la 'grub// 
297a2(mdo): sde nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla ma'i ngag myi gcogs pas/ myar ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro// tshur shogacig ces bya ba dang / song zhes bya ba la g.yo byed pas spobs pa ma gyogs pa
297a3(mdo): 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa thams cad la chags pa myed pas / spobs pa logs pa myed par 'gyur ro// de la ma chags par gnas pas spobs pa rgyun myi 'chad par 'gyur ro// 'phra ma'i tshig myed
297a4(mdo): pas shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs par 'gyur ro/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtogs pas zla mo la spobs par 'gyur mo// sbyin pa sna tshogs bstsags pas sna tshogs la spobs par
297a5(mdo): 'gyur ro// chung ma legs par brgyan te rab du byin pas/ legs par brgyan pa'i spobs sde 'gyur ro// sbyin pas tshogs/ byang chub kyi sems las myi nyams pas zhum pa myed pa'i
297a6(mdo): spobs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi phu po legs par kun tu bsrungs pas 'jigs pa myed pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / gdam dang / dril bu sna tshogs byin pas
297a7(mdo): tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs/ bstan pa'i nges pa'i tshig la spobs par 'gyur lo// sbyin pa la dang ldan pa dang / rim 'gro byed pa dang / bsnyen bskur byed pa sngon su 'gro la mdo dang rtogs pa brjod pa
297a8(mdo): dang / sngon 'byung ba la spobs par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal ba dang / dbul ba dang / mgon byed ye la myi brnyas pas kyi thul ba'i spobs par 'gyur lo// gter gyi zad pa sprisbyin ldan
297b1(mdo): ba dang / pha rol chosas sbyor bas tshig rab tu dbye ba myi zad pa la spobs par 'gyur ro// tshig bden pa dang / za ba myed pa dang / ngag rtsub po myed pa li ngag gi las dang / ldan pas spobs pa
297b2(mdo): shin tu gsal zhing mdzes par 'gyur ro// bla ma'i tshig khyad du myi gsod pa dang / gzhan gi tshig myi gcog pas tshig btsun zhing gzung ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro// rang ki yon tan gyi chos
297b3(mdo): smas pas chos bstan dpa 'bras bu yon pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// bdag la myi stong gzhan la myi spod pa dang / 'phags pa'i dngos po yongs su gtong pas lha'i 'khor gi rgyan gyi spobs par
297b4(mdo): 'gyur ro// chos la slob dpon ge khyud myed pa dang / chos ji ltar thos pa'i bzhin du ston pas/ the tsom thos/ cad gcod pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// bstan bcos thos cad/ 
297b5(mdo): shes pa dang / gzhan la myi gnod pa dang / nad pa rnams kyi nad g.yog byed pa dang / sman rab tu sbyin 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thos
297b6(mdo): cad la spobs par 'gyur ro// pha rol la 'khrul ba'i skabs myi tshol ba dang / gzhan dag gi lbub ba kyi gleng ba dang 'phrul pa la myi rtogs pas/ 'khrul pa myed pa'i spobs pa 'gyur ro// 
297b7(mdo): seMs can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par spyod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i las la 'argod la dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang/ 
297b8(mdo): tshigs su bcad pa thams cad don du rtsi gnyi pas 'a kho ma la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dkal ba dang / bte ba rnams kyi spobs par 'gyur ro// bkal lo bde ba dang / des
298a1(mdo): dang / ji skad smras pa bzhis byed pa dang / sems dgal ba dang / gzhan gyi rgyud 'khrug par myi byed pas skye ba dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen
298a2(mdo): po las kyi nyams pa dang / theg pa dman pa myi 'dod pa dang / sems can la snying rtse ba dang / zas cad nas tan la 'gon pas sangs rgyas kyis byin kyis rlabs pra'i spobs par 'gyu ro// 
298a3(mdo): gisems can gzhan la go bar byed pas de 'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// sems can gzhan la nas tan u b+hA ba ston pas de 'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// gzhan kyi sems kyi rgyud
298a4(mdo): par byed pas/ de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// sems can gzhan gi sems dang 'thun par ston pas de la phyiraspobs pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos dang yon tan dang
298a5(mdo): ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni spobs pa thogs pa myed cing / rgyun myi 'chad la rtag/ tu las rgyas kyi byin kyi brlabs kyis byin kyis brlabs pa
298a6(mdo): yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skyo ba dang / rlo rdzi 'pho la dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi mu chos bcu gnyis dang ldanas/ byang chub sems/ 
298a7(mdo): dpal skyes dpa' rgya'apho la dang 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin te/ bram gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di sa pa ste/ sdig pa'i grogs po yongasasu spangs shing / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyan la bsnyen/ 
298a8(mdo): pa dang / lta ba bzhin du yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gan ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yong su dag pa dang / ting de 'dzin du dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ldang pa shes pa dang/ shes
298b1(mdo): rag dang thabs zung du 'brel pa dang / mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa thob dang / ma skyes pa dang ma khyud par so sor togs pa dang / bsas bzhin du skye ba dang / smon lam yongs su rtogs pa
298b2(mdo): dang / sems can la lta ba'i byams pa la sbyor pa dang / snying rje chen po la nges par sems dpal dang / chos la sgyu ma lta bur rtog pa dang / 'chi 'pho myed pa khar 'pho zhing skye ba dang / chos kyi
298b3(mdo): mtshan nyid mi lam gi ngo bo nyid kyi chos la 'jug pa dang / phyin mi log gi chos la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byin kyis brlabs
298b4(mdo): nas skye ste/ 'pho zhing 'byung la skye ba dang / 'pho ba dang 'byung khar yang myi shes pa'o// rigs kyi bu khyab/ chub sems dpalag pa dpagang du skyes nas sems can gyi
298b5(mdo): don byed pa'i skyes pa'i rabs bstan pa tshad myed grangs myed pa'i skyes pa'i rabs de dag thams cad mi rtsa pa gnyis la gnas pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes
298b6(mdo): la gnas pa dang / snying rje chen po'i a pa la gnas pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpal skye ba dang / 'chi ba dang // 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa dang yin no// 
298b7(mdo): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud bzhi 'i lam lam yang dag la pa 'das shing bdudapa dang phyir rgol ba thams cad yang dag por bcom pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
298b8(mdo): de la byang chub sems dpa' chos cad thams cad sgyu ma lta bu shes shing rtogs pas phung po li bdud las yang dag par 'da'o// ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul lo zhen so sor rtog pas nyan
299a1(mdo): mongs pa 'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o// rten cingapa 'brel bapa 'byung pa rtogs pas 'chi bdag gi bdud las yang dag par 'da'o// byang chub kyi sems las myi nyams
299a2(mdo): bas lha'i bya'i bdud las yang dag khar 'da'o// yang des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa yin te/ des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa gang zhe na/ gang dag gis byang chub ses dpal sa
299a3(mdo): bdud kyis glags myi rnyed pa ste/ theg pa dman pa 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / byang chub kyi sems myi srung ba bdud kyi las dang sems tha dpab pa sbyin pa 'dud kyi las dang / skye ba lal
299a4(mdo): gnas pa'i tshul khrims bdud kyi las dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzugs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa dang / 'jigarten bya ba la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus dang / de la chags shing
299a5(mdo): ro myed pa'i bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi chos ngan pa la spo/ pa na bdud kyi las dang / 'khor bas yongs su skyob bdud kyi las dang / dge ba'i bam pa yongs su myi sngo ba bdud kyi las
299a6(mdo): dang / nyon mongs pa la smon pa bdud kyi las dang / ltung ba 'chab pa bdud kyi las dang / byang chub sems dpa' la sda ba bdud kyi las dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba bdud kyi las dang / byams
299a7(mdo): pa rgyun gcod pa bdud kyi las dang / pha rol tu phyind pa rnams yongs su myi/ tshol ba bdud kyi las dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan par gyi 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / chos la slob dpon gyi dpel mkhyud byed
299a8(mdo): pa bdud kyi las dang / za zab dang 'brel par chos ston pa bdud kyi las dang / thabs dang bral khamasems can yongs su sbyin par byed pa bdud kyi las dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po 'do la bdud kyi las dang / 
299b1(mdo): tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la khor khro ba bdud kyi las dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la myi gus pa bdud kyi las dang / nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i rjes su mthun pa bdud kyi las dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg/ 
299b2(mdo): pa can gi rjes su 'jug pa bdud kyi las dang / dus ma yin pa'i sgrub pa 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / snying rje chen po bor nas rigs la rtog pa/ bcud kyi las dang / 'dus byas la smod pa bdud kyi las dang
299b3(mdo): 'dus ma byas la smon pa bdud kyi las dang / sems can gyi ci bya'o/ chog la g.yel la bdud kyi las dang / nga rgyal la gnas shide myi 'dud pa dang / lce gnyis A ba dang / g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang / bces ma la
299b4(mdo): dga' ba dang / myi drang ba dang / rku ba cide brlang ba dang / sdig dpal myi smod pa dang / chos kyi drungs 'byind pa dang / zos pa/ cung zad tsam gyis chog par 'dzind pa dang / chos ma yin pa don
299b5(mdo): tu gnyer ba dang / chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang / sgrib pa dang chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba rnam par myi gnon pa bdud// kyi las dang / sems kyi dri ma myi rtog pa bdud kyi las dang / ka
299b6(mdo): dge la sbyong gi dri ma la gyi mdzes pa bdud kyi las te/ rigs kyi bu ji tsam du myi dge'i chos la 'jug pa dang / dgel ba'i chos 'dor ba la de thams cad ni bdud kyi las so// chos bzhis ni bdud kyi las
299b7(mdo): 'di dag las shin tu 'das te/ bzhig pa zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems ma brjed pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa drug po dag dang dad pa dang / brtson 'grus la gnas pa dang / li bag yod pa dang / 
299b8(mdo): thabs mkhas pa la gnas te sems can yongs su smind par byed pa dang / chos kyi tshul zab mo la gnas te/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind pas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos la sbyor ba'i byang chub
300a1(mdo): sems dpal ni 'dud bzhi la lo las yang dag par 'das shing 'dud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad myed
300a2(mdo): ba bsugs shing sems can thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la byams pas gnas pa yin/ 'byung po rnams la snying rje bar gnas la
300a3(mdo): yin/ bsam gtan rnams la de la mchags par gnas pa yin// slob pa rnams la kha dog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin/ bsod nams dag gis longs spyod kyi zad pa yin/ 
300a4(mdo): bsam pa dag mas la ka na rin po che yin/ mthon dman gyi da myed pas sems sa dang mtshungs pa yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas bsam pa 'byor da pa yin// mchod sbyin thos
300a5(mdo): cad sgrub pas sems grol zhing sgo ba sgribs pa myed pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pas gzungs dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa 'gro
300a6(mdo): pas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa yin no// rdzi wAr phyi rol kyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho khA gyurd pa de bzhin tu/ bdag/ gi na pag 'byung ba che
300a7(mdo): po bzhi po 'di dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi 'asngo bar gyur na cig/ bdag gi dge ba'om pa dang chos shes pa la mkham la gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi 'tshob ma yin pang ma gyur / 
300a8(mdo): ces de la dge ba'i ma kha rnams kyang yongs su ldo ste// de sams byang chub dpal bsod nas pa tshad myed pa 'asags shing / sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyu pa yin so// rigs kyi bu de 'i lam
300b1(mdo): na byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i gnas dang / gnas ma yin/ 
300b2(mdo): pa'i bya ba'i shes pas stobs bcu yong su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyind pa yin/ zag pa zad pa'i bya ba shes pa'i myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyind pa yis/ dus gsum la chags
300b3(mdo): pa myed pa'i ye shes kyi bya ba shes pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya tsham phyin pa pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyad kyis snang ba thob pas spyan lnga yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tsha
300b4(mdo): phyind pa yin/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba thob pas mngon pa shes pa thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshad phyin pa/ yin/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yang dag par bcad pa/ 
300b5(mdo): dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bkang pa tshar/ phyind pa yin// bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad kha stsags pas/ lus dang ngag dpa sems dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan
300b6(mdo): yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tsham phyinas pa yin/ dbang bsrung ba thob pas sa bcu yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ ye shes kyi tshogs pasaHgas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thas cad yongs
300b7(mdo): su ltung bar bya ba ma byin pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ska na byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas rnams ma byu la sa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas choms cas rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi
300b8(mdo): bu de la ji lta na byang chub sems dpal rgyam mo'i phyag rgya li ti pe de 'dzinan thob cing sem ste rnams cad kyi sems dang / pyod gal gyi chags pa yi nan/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu li gr-i na sems can
301a1(mdo): rnams kyi gzugs snang 'di snyed pa de dag thams sa da na pa'i rtsa sgyus chen po la yod de/ de'i phyin rgyam chen po'i rgya'o// de bzhin du semam pa thams cad kyi sems spang sa 'as// 
301a2(mdo): su snang ba'am/ skar snapa 'di snyed pa de dag thams cad rgyam po'i phyag rgya'i tid pa 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi sa la gcin/ la ska bar 'gyur te/ rol phyi nga rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i nyi
301a3(mdo): re 'dzin da ces bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dpems/ rgya mtsho chen po na po gcig pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chul sems dpa' yang chos la rnas par grol ba'i ngor shes pas po gcig pa yin no// 'di la ste// dben na
301a4(mdo): rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las mya yol ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal yang dus dang dus ma yinas pa la so sor rtog bas byang chub kyi snying po'i dus las myi yol lo// 'di lta ste/ 
301a5(mdo): dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni shi 'a li dod pa lhan cig rgya gan so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal yang bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems can thos
301a6(mdo): sa dang lhan cig kyi gnas so// 'di lta ste dper na// rgya mtsho la chen po ni chu thams cad zed pas khri la'am kang ba myed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos thams cad zed pas chos kyi dbying
301a7(mdo): bri la 'am gang pa 'byed do// 'di lta ste/ dper sa/ rgya mtsho chen po ma la tshon tshad myed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal yang shes rab kyis tshad myed do// 'di lta sted paran/ rgya mtsho chen po
301a8(mdo): ni zab cing gting dpag/ dkal ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zab cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dkal ba yin no// 'di lta/ skye dper na// rgya momachen
301b1(mdo): po ni sems can tshad myed pa'i kanas yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal yang sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba tshad pa la gnas myed pa'i gnas yin no// 'di ni rgya mtsho chen po'i phyag rgya'i ting
301b2(mdo): nge 'dzin la 'jug pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sem sun thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la myi chags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub se
301b3(mdo): dpa' chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin zhe na/ chags pa zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la lta ba kun nas ldang ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'al ni lta ba kun nas ldang ba thams cad
301b4(mdo): dang bral bas chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das/ na pa yin no// 'di lnga ste dper na/ rlu mar min mnya'i dkyil la gyi chags pa'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems
301b5(mdo): dpa' chur mar/ lA bu'i sems dang ldan pa yang sems can thams cad la gyi chags so// yang skyes bu dam pa de dag ni khyad pa dang / cho ga'i tshul shes pa yin te de la tshig ni dran pa'o// sun
301b6(mdo): pa ni rnam par myi g.ye pa yin no// de dag ni mun pa dang bral zhing snga ba thol pa yang yin te/ de la sum pa zhes bya ba ni ga chos rnams la myi zhes pa'o// snang ba zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la
301b7(mdo): ye shes thogs pa myed pa ste/ de'i phyir de dag mun pa dang bral zhing sdang ba thob pa zhes bya'o// skyes bu dam pa de dag ni ye shes gzhan gi dril myi 'jog cing rang gis ye shes thob pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhes
301b8(mdo): de dag rang 'byung gi ye shes la mngos par gnas shi sems can gzhan ye shes 'dod par byed pa yin no// gang gi tshe byang chul sems dpal chos gtan la khebs pa 'i ye shes bstan dpa/ 'phe la gzhan
302a1(mdo): gzil kyi 'jog ci par rang gi ye shes thob par gyur pa de'i tshen sngaras du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i / tshogs su lacad
302a2(mdo): 'di dag gsungs so// gang zhig lhag pa kun nas sems dben zhing // mkhas pa bsod nams tshogs ni rab byed la// mtshan ma ldang ba yongs su/ spangs nas su// byang chub phyir bsngos de na
302a3(mdo): zar gyi 'gyur// nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal kun spangs nas// de ni ye shos tshogs rnams tshol bar byed// mnam ma'ali/ mthal yas/ sgo ldan nam mkhal po bo nyid// kun mkhyen da ye shes yongs
302a4(mdo): rdzogs ma byed// rgyal ba'i sras na sangs rgyas rjes dran pa// gzugs dang mtshan gyi chos su sa yin te// na na sems dang yid ni myi rgyub// de ni 'thun par sang+yas rgyas rjes su dram// chos ni 'od
302a5(mdo): chags bral zhing dab lazhin dben ke / zhi zhing rab ba rtag tu na ma myed// kong zhig/ dmyigs pa thams cad bral gyur/ pa// de 'di chos 'di rjes su dran pa yin// 'phags pa'i de/ 
302a6(mdo): btsun shinan tu 'dus ma byas// sto pa mtshan myed sngon las rnam/ bar grol// de la sems myed dran dang / 'jug pa rgya// de ni dge/ 'dun rjes su dran pa yin// phung po yongs
302a7(mdo): su btang ba thams cad gto / nyon mongs dngos po thams cad la zhes par 'dom// snyoms paskyed cing rtog dang nam chog dag/ 'di ni gtong ba legs par 'arjes su dras// tshul khrims zag pa myed
302a8(mdo): ci 'dus ma byas// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis 'jug pa byed// 'byung ba myed cing srid gsum myi gnas pa// sde ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yin// lha gang dag cing dri myed nyon mongs myed// dgal ldan// 
302b1(mdo): gnas pa / dbang bskur thob kyi rad pa// sems can dag pa de dag 'dir 'dran zhing // bdag kyang myur nga byed 'drar 'gyur snyam sems// de bzhin gshegs kyi dam chos 'dzin pa ni// nyon mongs/ dngos po thams cad 'dzin da myi khyed// 
302b2(mdo): chos dang chos myin gnyis las rnam par grol// de 'phred ni rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin yin// rgyal bas byang chub mtshan nyid kar brnyes pa// chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni yongs 'dzinan ci po// gang gis rdul myed mthar ni rab shes pa/ 
302b3(mdo): di sa sangs rgyas kun gyi chos 'dzin yin// bdag ni rab tu dag pa la sems can dag/ chos kus dkal bar mkhas pa lus rtogs pa// de ni ses su dag rang bzhin 'od gsal te// sems can gton gyim rtag tu 'ongs
302b4(mdo): sbyin byed// sems can byams rnams sadungs kyi byed kyi/ den ci zhi sheg par mthong bskyed// 'anor parab tu spang bar yon// de 'drid ni sems can sang po spyong// 'jig rten yul sum ra tu
302b5(mdo): kar ston pan tshan des ni sangs rgyas yul yang rab tu bstanan// sangs rgyas yul ni nam ma'al mtshungs pa ste// de bzhin 'jig rten yul yang rab tu shes// swa skad 'byangs dpa yi ge ma mo sa 'an ni// drag ma 'dra ba de
302b6(mdo): mam zhis// de la pa la sa yod chen 'ag// de gang ba tushes pa gzungs za mo// na ci 'dzin dang 'dzin cing sog pa dang // san sa gnan pa'i dam mas pa/ // dan
302b7(mdo): sa klas / rgyal bkun gyis gsungs pa 'i dun bye cing/ sa par gsungs la byed pa// 
302b8(mdo): kyi gyur// gzungs la das pa'i na tan na/ so// sa ni nas pa kun du gas byed pas// sa kyi gro 'gros bskyod pa'i myod// de ni mdun ma pa gyis / des de
303a1(mdo): kyi char pa 'babs// yon tan 'byung gnas rnams kyi spobs pa ni// thogs byed rgyan chags rgyun chad kyi 'byung bam// mdo sde stod phrag bye ba rag tu 'chad// sems can dbang por sems can
303a2(mdo): 'du shes myed// sangs rgyas mthul yis bskal pa bye stong du// rgyan gyi 'chad par chos ni rab bstond cis// bsam pa ci rtswa bzhin sems can tshim par byed// spobs pa'i tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas yon tan gnas// 
303a3(mdo): chos 'di thams cad nam mkha' 'dra ba zhes// gang gis chos rnams kun gyi tshul shes la// sems can srog dang gang zag myi 'dzind pa// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi dam chos 'dzind// sems can thams cad
303a4(mdo): shin tu mya ngan 'das// de dag de ltar kun tu bskyed pa myed// nasu pa'i bzod 'di dri myed/ 'od gsal ba// de ni bstan// dpa 'di la bag yod yin// phung po yang dag rgya sgyu ma lta bur mthong // 
303a5(mdo): chos dbyings ji 'phred bzhin mkhas rnams shes// dbang po drug ni grong stong 'drar mthong pa// de ni phung po'i bdud las yang dag 'dal// s+pha ni bsechags phu pa po lta bur nyon mongs rnas// 
303a6(mdo): bag yod tshul bzhis rab tu rtog byed cing // chos la myi rtog rnam paraHmyi rtog pa// de ni nyon mongs bdud las yang dag 'dal// gang zhig skye ba rtag tu skye byed shes// 'di lag pa yapa 'pho 'gyed 'gro
303a7(mdo): babyed// chos rnams 'ongs myed spong ba myed shes pa// de ni 'chi bdag bdud kyi dbapa kyi lamo// gang zhig g.yol dang myi g.yo la drom sems kyi byed cing // byang chub gnas kyang byang chub 'du shes byes// bdag
303a8(mdo): dang sems can byed kyang snying je 'jug/ de mi dpung dang bcas pa'i 'dud bdun so// nam shes ye shes gnyis ni mi ma par mthob// 'dus khyas myi gnas 'dus ma byas la sbyis// 'gro ba'i sems na/ 
303b1(mdo): sgyu ma 'dra mthong ba// de ni sems dpa'i rdzib myed pa yin// pha rol tshu rol ga la'ang myi chags la// chos ldan gru me yu dka su sbyor zhing // sems can sgrol ya sems can 'du shes myed// 
303b2(mdo): mnyam pa nyid zhes bya byang chub sems dpal de// srid pa gsum po 'brog dkon 'dra ba dang // stong pa 'gyur ba myed par rab shes shing // lam gyi rim sa gyis rtag tu sems can stsol// de ni ded dpon
303b3(mdo): bdun gyi la su dadu pa// 'dzangs pa de ni tshul dang tshul sbyin ma'as// chos rnams gdod nas stong / pa ra ba cu shes// tshul dang rigs pas mya ngan 'das la 'du// byang chub sems dpal ni 'dren
303b4(mdo): ces bya// sems kyi rgyud ni dazhan dang gzhan du 'gyur// sems/ dan sems la gnas kyang mtshams kyi sbyo/ 'gro ba'i len rgyan de dka' bzhes pa// byang chub sems dpal yongs su
303b5(mdo): 'dren ces bya// nam mkha' ngo bo nyid dang chu zla ltar// chos rnamathams cad dag/ cing rnam dag ces// nyon mongs kun dang / 'dren par myi bye b+ha pa// sems can dag pa de ni ma smad pa// 
303b6(mdo): gang zhig chos gcig gis ni chos rnams kun// smra ma smyig rgyu 'dra bar gzung myed dang // lto 'phye chen po'i srog chags khrag zhig phrag lnga d+han mu wA ka d+hi sa b+h+rUM myed pa yang dag blang rdzogs pa'i drung chum
303b7(mdo): rgyu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpal khri nyis slongon myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// stong gsum gyi sto chen po 'i 'jog nyon mo mas 'di yadzin mi phyag rgya ba gas/ 
303b8(mdo): snang ba chen po'i kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to// sna brgyad stong dag kyang me tog gi cha rab tu 'bebs shing la sil snyan dge kyang dkrol namaH/ 'di zhin ces gang dag bstan pa 'di thos
303b9(mdo): 'arkyen dang rtag pa byed par shes/ deni byang chub snyi por myur da tu 'grem gtams 'debs pa 'astan pa 'di bshad pan// lhadab kyi dpalha mo yind kyim
304a1(mdo): nas mos pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / nan tan byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su dong ba yin no// gang steng / gang du/ sangs rgya bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba li sA
304a2(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad mkhas pa rnams kyis brgyan gyis brgyan pa byas te phyag bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas 'byang bar gyur na chos 'di lta bu 'di ba tu sbyin par 'gyur ro// skyes bu/ 
304a3(mdo): dam pa'i bsam gyis myi byas pa li pa'i chos dang ldan pa/ 'di dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa che du brjod mo// / de nam mtsham ldos 'arjes kyi sa zhus pa lung bu pr-In de mas// byang chul
304a4(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkhal mdzod mngon du mi rangs par mdzad pas mu tig ki pra la 'od dri ma myed cing rnam pa medag pa stong / ka sum yong su ka pa ba rib/ bcom
304a5(mdo): ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gsol nas// com ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad sa rnams kyi ye shes ni tshugs pa myi mngal ba/ bstan pal
304a6(mdo): ni rgyun myi 'chad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la gzigs shing dbang po mchog ma yin pa mkhyend pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di
304a7(mdo): 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam pa de sa 'khor thams cad kyi sems chem par gyur na to// dres pa chen po 'di ya ba rgyas khapa brjod pa mdzad paragyur / rto// phyogs bcu 'i 'jig rten gi kham
304a8(mdo): nas 'dul ba'i byang chub sems dpal 'di dgal yaH/ chos kyi snapa pa chen pos rgyas par mdzad par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sa bdag la a mdze
304b1(mdo): 'byung ba 'i sgo/ bstan pas 'byung ba'i sgo des chos 'byub pa'i sgo tshad myed pa'i mchis pa bstan par bgyi'o// // bam po bzhi pa/ 
304b2(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myu rad par spobs pa zhes bya ba de 'khor de nyid du 'dus
304b3(mdo): ra gyur dkyo 'jug po das/ byang chub sems dpal nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces ma so// rigs kyi bu gang khyom kyi phyi ma nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba de ni nam mkha' khyod rkye
304b4(mdo): mdzod dmo/ sgom pa bzhan du rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ nam mkha' ni ba'i mdzod do// gyur par spobs pas smras pa/ nagus kyi bunam mapo'i ma marjod kyi skye khrag bdag cag gyis/ 
304b5(mdo): kyang sta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsald pa// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mdzod kyi khyad/ par ston/ cig/ de nas byang
304b6(mdo): chub sems dpal nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' myur po par spobs pa la/ 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// rigs kyi khru khyod kyi yid u ga ga mdod kha de kho bros nu mkhal las cha bas po// 
304b7(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpal myur sa par spobs pa 'di snyam hUM sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che ud pa la li dpal gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad a 'akod pa/ zhes bya ba na/ 'od thams 'do rnam par sA pa pa
304b8(mdo): zhes bya ba'i pad ma rgya ni rgyang grags kyi tshad 'anasas khye ba stong phrag yang po 'jam zhipa gzhon pa// kos ka tsa lini di ka lha mi ga na bdo la/ dris ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing khye / kha nog ang po brgya sto/ 
305a1(mdo): dang ldan pa/ mthong sa yid du 'ong zhing chog kyi shes pa khang ma de mthong ba dang / dri bsams pas byang chub sems dpe me dag ting po 'dzin thos par 'gyur ba de bdag gi sem mo snying / 'bor 'dir de 'an
305a2(mdo): nga pad ma'i ra za za shig snyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gyurab pas thobs pas lasams ma lag tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpal nasam mkha' mdzod kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis/ rna na' la ngos las de 'dra ma
305a3(mdo): pad ma 'i cham mngon pa pa ba ste/ de sa 'khor de dag thams cad pad ma de dag gi dri tsho zhing mthong bas dgal ba'i zas shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da la myoms par zhugs so// 'khod de dge thams cad dang de 'dren
305a4(mdo): las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnamatha mdzod la phyag tshal/ nas/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// skyes bu dam pa 'i byin gyi rlabs dang / ye shes kyi stobs ye gas ni legs s+ho// sems can tham
305a5(mdo): cad kyang pa 'di/ 'dra ba'i byin kyi rlabs thob par gyur da cig/ de na khyad/ chub sems dpal rin cen bkod ces bya ba/ 'dus par gyur // te 'dug pa des/ byang chug sems dpal nam mkha' mdzod la
305a6(mdo): 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ni ma'al ga jod las gsor phye'i char po bshig/ byang chub sems dpal rim ces bkod kyis tshig de skad ces sbas pa thag tu/ de'i mdo la nam khal las gsem
305a7(mdo): bye'i char mngom par phab po// de nas yang byang chu byed pa la rin chen bkod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa lan ma mkhal mdzoda.a la 'di skad ces/ smras so// rags kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkhal las rin po che thIH
305a8(mdo): cad kyi char po ba shig/ tshig de skad ces smras ma thaka tu// de'i mod la phyogs brgyan ji tsam rin po ma grangs kyad dpag tu myed pa'i mying tha dad pa kha tog tha dad pa yod pa de dag gi char chen po mngon par
305b1(mdo): bab po// 'di sa sre gser dang / dngul dang / shes dang / bye du s+ya dang / do'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / sdug dang / dpal gyi snying po'i the bcan dang / dri myed dang / rin chem bye m+bu dang / zla ba'i 'od dang

306a1(mdo): zugs byed pa/ gos ral po gyon pa dang / yi dgas rnams bkres shing som khas yongasu su zis laka gcer bu rang gyi zhes log pa/ mchil ma dang / rab zhabs dang / khrag das na gza ma da

307a1(mdo): phob shig/ des tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpal rnams tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi bsngags pa ji snyed brjod pa zhe

308a1(mdo): babs nas/ byang chub sems dpal nam mkhal mdzod kyi mdun ma 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa la na ma ma' ya mA dz+rod kyis bud myed de dag la 'di skad ces/ smras so// sring mo

308b1(mdo): mdzod ces bya ba gang 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams la myi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhig yod kyis/ de la khyed cag phyag/ tshol cig dpagasad pa 'di las thar dpar 'gyur lo zhes sla zhig zos so// de nas de dag/ 
308b2(mdo): thams cad shi khas 'jigs skrag pas sgra skad cig gcig tu// byang chub sems dpal nam mkha' mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad smras so// tshig/ de skad ces sbas ma thag tu skad cig/ de nyid la khar
308b3(mdo): sA pa las khyi lnga brgya babs te/ de ltar lpags nas bshed ma khyi de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed cag gis myi dbul po 'di dag bsad de ci rung // pa cag gi gos dang rgyan rnams khyer la ba cag gi srog
308b4(mdo): chod de myi 'di dag khyer zhig/ de dag chags pas non pa'i phyir bsad par chad pa'i myi lnga brgya po de dag khatapa ste/ sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag lasad do// de na sa myi de bsad pa las bta pa de dag bsad pas
308b5(mdo): 'jigs shing spag pa las dbugs 'byind pa rnyed nas/ byang chub/ sems dpal nam mkha' mdzod ga la ba der rdo ste lpags// nasabacom ldan 'das zha kyi zhabs la yang mgo bos phyag
308b6(mdo): 'chal nas / byang chub sems dpal nam mkha' mdzod la yang thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol d+ha to// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis bkra cag kyi srog dang dbungs 'byidad pa rnyed par bgyis
308b7(mdo): nalang bdag cag chos gang la nan tan du bgyis pas/ bdag la smon pa dang / gzhan la ldan pa la zhugs par gyur po'i rlom bskyen pa 'dag cag ma la dbugs so// byang chu'i las pa pa lan me/ 
308b8(mdo): mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod cag bla na myed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig dang / 'di ltar khyed rnams bdag la phan lha dang / gzhan la ldan par zhugs pa
309a1(mdo): 'gyur ro// de dag la de skad ces smras pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de dag la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis// brgya stong ri ba li ras
309a2(mdo): bcos khu khru ba cig byon te/ grogs po dag ras bcos bu zung 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol cig/ de dag thams cad kyis ras bcos su zung de/ de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par gsol to// 
309a3(mdo): de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis bskald pa bkrab pa las/ 'das pa na// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrubs nas/ myi 'jims pa sbyin pa zhes byal ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
309a4(mdo): 'jig rten du 'byung po zhes lung bstand to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri li bus/ byang chub sems nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang myi skabs myi zad myi dengs pa'i nas
309a5(mdo): mdzod bzhag nas/ ji srid lon// smras pa/ brtsu/ nam mkha' mardo da kyis smras pa// btsun pa sha li'i b+hu'/ snyam du sems// rmi nam mnyal skams pa 'am/ zad pa yod dam dengs par 'gyur
309a6(mdo): ram/ rigs kyi bu de ltar bu ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa sha li'i bu de bzhin du byang chub de ni nam mkho'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de/ de la bdag gyi dgel ba'i wa ga rnams der bsngos pas// de bas na
309a7(mdo): mkha' la mdzod myi rnabs kyi zad myi des/ yang khyod kyis nam mkhal mdzod bzhag nas ji srid yon zhes zer ba ni/ kho bos byang chub sems bskyed nas/ ji srid lon pa de srid do// smras pa// rigs kyi
309a8(mdo): bu khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lan/ smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen to// de nas gnas btan ga yo'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas yod do// bcom ldan
309b1(mdo): 'das byang chub sems dpa' nam mkhal mdzod kyis/ byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka las ladam/ rigs kyi lug/ yid te de lazhin gshegs pas gnas 'di
309b2(mdo): bstan pa na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams myos par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems can rnams rtog pa ma bzhi dad par 'gyu ba ba dag mchis kyis bshad du g.yo lang/ 
309b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa// sha ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ga ga'i klung gi byed ma skyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khams na/ gang ga klung gyi bye ma ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi
309b4(mdo): rdul snyed kyis yongs su gang bar gyur da te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi bskal pa brgyad stong zhing rdul phra mo gracig bzhag pa de lta bur bgrang ba dang // mtshan ma bzhag pas
309b5(mdo): de snyed kyi rdul phra mo thams cad ni zar par 'gyur gyi ji snyed nas byang chub sems dpal nam mdzod kyis ldan myed pa yang dka par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bska la dpa
309b6(mdo): grangs myed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag la zad pa gang yang myed do// sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kaklA ki thad nas byang chub sems dpal nam mkhal mdzod kyis dang pa po khyang chub
309b7(mdo): tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di'i mtshan tsa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal su yod pa// yang shaM ri l-i buM de'i tshe de'i dus na// rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba'i las khad pa la
309b8(mdo): byang chub sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston pa li 'jig rten gi khams su/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su/ ldan pa/ bde la ma gshegs pa
310a1(mdo): 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i la lo sbyar za/ blan myed pa lha dang phyi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das khron la thams cad las shi na tu byung ba rin po che 'i
310a2(mdo): gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byang ste/ yang sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa yod pa de dag ni tshe'i tshed bsal par gnas cad kyang
310a3(mdo): bshad las/ sra la ma yin no// sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni 'jig rten gi khams stong kyi tshad du gyur pa te/ byang chub sems da pa'i dge 'dun ni bgrang kha las 'das pa zhig byung // dal
310a4(mdo): sha ri li bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams de na stong gsum gyi sa pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i zhig byung ste/ rin po che'i mdzod bsam
310a5(mdo): gis myi khyab bo// del bu rdzus te/ skyes pa rab gyi gzi brjid kyis mngon par grug pa sum khri drug spong yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs kyis kyi zhing de na bud myed kyi myo de yang myed do// sha rili bu
310a6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad kyang bsku la pa stong phrag brgya thub bo// de nas rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas par gyi bskal pa bzhi chur bcom ldan 'das de la khwaHma dpa rim 'gro byas te/ nyin ce
310a7(mdo): la 'god la yang ri rab bye ba stor gyi rin po che li phu po zad par gyur na pa de lta bus bsnyen bkur dang rim 'gro byas so// de nas rgyal po de bsod nams kyis brtan pa'i/ bu'i tshogs dang / grong gi myi rnas dang / 
310a8(mdo): 'khor rnams dang bcas te bra na ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// sha ri'i ga/ de'i mede'i rus na/ 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po lha thams ca cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba gzhan zhig
310b1(mdo): yin snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar myi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpal nam mkhal mdzod de'i tshe de'i dus na/ stong gsum gi 'khor lor sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes khya
310b2(mdo): khar gyurd to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha li'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// kyes byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la 'dis/ bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i ko cha bgos te/ bcom ldan 'das
310b3(mdo): de srid nas zhi ba la rab tu zhugs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das de 'dra ba'i spyod pas 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi mthul chen po rnyed par nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal sa lad pa/ sharil bu byang chub se
310b4(mdo): dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis/ gang ga li klung gyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs la rim 'gro dang / sti bstar byas te/ byang chub kyi sems yongs u spangs o// gaM ga li klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub
310b5(mdo): kyi sems yongs su dag pas/ bsam pa yongs su sbyangs te/ kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pas sbyor ba/ yongs su sbyar sa// gang ga'i klu pa gis bye ma snyed kyi sbyor ba yongs
310b6(mdo): su dag pas/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su/ sbyangs/ gang ga'i k+ku ra gi bye ma snyed kyi lhag pa li bsam pa yongs su dag pas/ sbyin pa 'i pha rol du phyind pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang gali klu gyi bye ma snyed kyi
310b7(mdo): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su dag pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du ba phyind pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang ka'i klur gyi bye ma snyed kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa yongs su dag pas/ bzod pa pa
310b8(mdo): rol tu phyind pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su dag pas// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang gali gur gyi bye ma snyed kyi
311a1(mdo): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su dag pas/ bsam gtan gi pha rol du phyind pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su dag pas/ 
311a2(mdo): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang ka'i grub kyi bye ma snyed kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su dag pas/ thabs kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung kyi byem
311a3(mdo): snyed kyi thabs kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su dag pas/ sems can thams cad la khod zho pA'i sems dang / thogs pa myed pa'i 'od zer yongs su sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung kyi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams
311a4(mdo): cad la khor khro ba myed pa'i sems dang thogs pa myed pa'i 'od zerayongs su dag pas/ byams pa chen po yongs su sbyangs pa nas/ snying rje chen po dang / dgal ba chen po dang / btang snyoms
311a5(mdo): chen po dang / na pa shes pa chen po'i mi shes kyi bar tu mas su sbyangs so// de bzhin su lus sangs su dag pa dang / dag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa ste/ 
311a6(mdo): ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems yongs su dag pas/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig yongs su sbyangs so// de bzhin du sbyarang te skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu la gnyis thams cad nas skyes bu chen po'i man+da
311a7(mdo): thams cad yongs su dag pa'i dgel pa 'i ab li bar du des gang ga li klu gi bye ma snyed las/ 'das pa 'i dgel ba'i mapa rnams yongs su dag pas/ nam mkha' mdzod 'di yongs su dag par/ byang chub
311a8(mdo): sems dpa' nam mkhal mdzod 'dis yongs su sbyangs so// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpal na ma m+b+ha kha la mdzod 'dis nam mkha' las byang chub sesems dpa'i spyon pa thams cad ston te/ sha ri'i
311b1(mdo): bu ji ltar nam mkhal la zad pa myed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di'i smon la dang spyod pa thams na/ yongs dag pas/ gang la yang zad pa myed do// de bas na 'di nam mkha' mdzod
311b2(mdo): ces bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpal khri longs spyod pa myi zad pa dang / lag na rin po ched pa/ namra mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam yongs su bskad ba'i bzod
311b3(mdo): pa skyes so// de nas byang chub sems dpal chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mthal mdzod la 'di snyed ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bdag hUM cag gis nam
311b4(mdo): mkha' las chos bslag pa'i mdzod mnyan to// nam mamadzod kyis sbas pa/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu gus padang bcus mar 'dug la nam mkhal 'di la ston/ par
311b5(mdo): 'du shes skyed cig dang / chos mnyan pa thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po dang / 'khom de dag/ thas cad thal mo sbyar nas/ nam malda' la phyag 'tshal
311b6(mdo): 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpal nam mkhal mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis khar snang las tshigs su bcad ma 'di dag byung // nas mkhal 'dra ba'i yid rnams kyi/ 
311b7(mdo): thams cad chos kyi tshul ga pa yin// de la 'jug pa rab bstand kyis// khyed cag mthar da kyis nyan par gyis// nam mkhal la ni me thob byed// dmal ba'ang yod pa ma yin te// kAng gi
311b8(mdo): chos nyid mthod dman byed// de la 'dug pa ga la yod// nam ya ral la ni skye ba myed// 'gog ya dag kyang kyi dmyigs so// ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la// de la rnam par 'jig
312a1(mdo): pa myed// nam mkhal la ni 'bri ba myed// gang ba dag kyang myi dmyigs so// chos rnams yang myed 'bri myed de// nam mkhal dang mi mtshungs mnyam mo// nam mkhal la ni mun pa byed// de ni de'i sa
312a2(mdo): nyon gyi longs// sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// de bas rnams kyang nyon mongs byed/ nyi zla'i ni 'od zer kyis// nam mkhal dgal bar gyi 'gyur te// nam mkhrul 'dra ba'i sems
312a3(mdo): rnams kyang // gang la'ang dgal bar 'gyur ba byed// mabyung thung che gnyis 'bab pas kyang // nam mkha' des ni nyon mos myed// de bzhin sug+sa pa sngal zho kun gyis// rgyal ba'i sras
312a4(mdo): ni nyon skyongs pa/ bdud mi rus kyi char nga yis// nam mkhal la ni dgal 'gyur myed// rnyed dang sti bsdad thams cad kyis// nga/ byang tshul sems dpa' dgal myi byed// bstod pa dang ni rbo/ 
312a5(mdo): pa la// nam mkha' yongs su myi rtog ste// de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal la// byang chub sems dpal brtan myi g.yol// swa dag g.yos par gyur du kyang ni// nam mkha
312a6(mdo): rnam yang gsol ba myed// 'jig rten 'di dag g.yol lo zlog kyang // byang chub sems dpal 'khrug pa skyed// bsrog pa'i bska lda pa 'byung bas// ji ltar nam ma'al
312a7(mdo): myi tshig pa// de bzhin/ nyon mongs thams cad kyis// byang chub semam+b+ha dpal brtan myi gtu pa// skye ba myed kha cing 'dul la' ba myed// ji ltar nam mtha' gnas pa bzhan// 
312a8(mdo): chos rnams 'od myed 'gro ba 'ang myed// chos kyi dbyings la de dag gnas// gzugs su swap+na pa ji snyed pa// nam mkha' la ni thams cad 'byung // chos su sna pa ba ji snyed pa// 
312b1(mdo): rnye ngan chos kyi dbyings sasu 'byung // macan ma myed cing gzugs myed pa/ mnam ma la A yod pa yin te// smre sa sesems rnams rab shes na// nam ma'al dang ni mtshungs mnyam no// 
312b2(mdo): byin tsam pa ninam mkha' ste// de la lnga dog dbyibs kyang byed// sems dang yid dang na mishes kyang // myir gyis yongs su bstanan pa'o// ji lta nam mkha la mthal myed cing // sa
312b3(mdo): cad du yang gzung du myed// de bzhin ye shes mthu chen kyang // nam mkha' dang ni mnyam zhing mtshungs// sems can nam kar 'gro yod kyi// de la 'gro bA'i rjes kyang myed// sems
312b4(mdo): can byang chub phyir myod kyang // de ni spyod pa'i mtshan ma byin/ ji ltar sngon gi mtha'i lus// nam mkhal dang ni mtshungs// 'phrug/ de bzhin phung po'i ngo bo nyid// nam mkha' dpa ni/ 
312b5(mdo): mnyam zhing mtshungs// khams bzhi dag kyang nam mkha' dang / mtshungs shing 'dra bar rab tu gsungs// 'di ltar bya sgeg pa'i bska med pa'atshwag/ nam mkha' dang ni khams 'di mtshu
312b6(mdo): de ltar sems can thams cad kyis// nams kyang yongs su gang gyi nus// de bzhin yul rnams kyis kyang // sems kyi rgyud ni myi ga pa po// tshig chen se me lo sgra dag gis// 'jig rten mgon tshwa/ 
312b7(mdo): gsungs pa 'di// 'jig rten 'das pa'i shes rab ka pa// de dag bstand pa 'di la dzem// ji lta pa nam mkhal rgya che bas// mthal ma dmyings par gyi 'gyur te/ de bzhin / sangs rgyas/ 
312b8(mdo): chos rnams kyang // mthal ma dmyigs par myi 'gyur ro// chos rnams thams cad sangs rgyas chos// gang zhig yang dag nyid shes na// de dag dngos po myi 'jigs cing / dngos po dag
313a1(mdo): la'ang myi gnas so// dngos po dbang dngos myed rnam shes shing // yang dag mtha' la pa gnas pa// dngos po dang ni dngos myed par// lta ba mkhas pas myi 'dzind to// sto pa nyid
313a2(mdo): ni sgra yis khasgrags// sma la stong pa nyid myed de// de ni sma myed brjod pa myed// de phyir stong pa nyid ces bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad kyang ni// stong pa nyid ni brjod du myed// gang de
313a3(mdo): stong zhes bya ba la yang // de'i don mi brjod du myed// sgyu ma smyig sgyu rgya lam dang // myig yor dang ni brag cha da / de las sotshogs pa bshad pa yi ska// 'dren pa rnams ni chos sto nad to// 
313a4(mdo): sems can rnams ni drang ba'i phyir// dpel rnams shin tu kun bstan te// rab tu zhi ba'i chos rnams la// gnyen po rnams nr-i myi dmyaklas so// mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos kun kyang / 
313a5(mdo): mtshan nyid du ni rab tu bstand// mtshan gzhi myed pA dag/ chos kyi dbyings la myi dmyigs so// mtshan gzhi na ma.au/ nye mtshan nyin te/ nomo mkhal mtshan nyid myed pa yin// kang
313a6(mdo): sa tshul 'di rab tu rtogs// de dag byang chub sems dpa' yin// chags pa myed cing bcings pa byed// shind tu chu zad byed pa ste// spos byed smos dang bral ba ste// byang
313a7(mdo): chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// sems can las nri de ma grol// sems can la yang myi gnas shing // sems can rang bzhin ye shes kyis// byang chub sems dpal zhes de bya// sems
313a8(mdo): can rab tu mya ngan 'das// thos nas sdang bar gyi byed de// kang de byang chub rab zhugs la// dpal bo dag gi go cha 'di// sbru ma byed pas sems can dag/ mang du 'asu med nas der ldan
313b1(mdo): kya // de la bsad pa gang yang myed// sems can mtshan nyid de bzhin no// sgyu ma dang ni sems can dang / mya ngan 'das dang / sangs rgyas kun// rnam pa kun gyu rab bzhin gcigs
313b2(mdo): bzhis rab bzhin byed par rtogs// nas dz+walal bzhinas smra dod// kyi bad pa'i mdzod gyur ste// mamam cam thams cad mas byed cing // mdzod na gang mas gyi 'gyur ro// 
313b3(mdo): tshad khyed bsod nams chu bos ni// mdzod 'di rnam par sbyangs pa ste// mdzams yang ma myed pa pa// chos rnams chos nyid lta bar bya// rgyal rten te byang ba ni/ chos
313b4(mdo): rnams thas cad rab shes na// de'i mdzod ni myi zad de// chos kyi mdzod ni 'asam gyi khyab// chos bzhi 'di dag kyi zad par// 'jig rten 'gon pos rab gsungs te// sardzus can nam mkha' byang chub
313b5(mdo): sems// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams so// de ste de dgardzas yin na// de dag / yongs su zad 'gyur gyi// de da/ myed pas myi zad nas// de las de ni gyi zad gsungs// chos
313b6(mdo): ni rab tu skan cig pa/ zad pa'i chos ni kyi zad de// kyi bang de la khang pa byed// de phyir myi zad pa zhes bya// byang chub sems dpal gang zhig gis// chos byas dang/ 'di ni ris gi san// des ni byang chub
313b7(mdo): rnyed kyi dkal// byang chub nyid la yang dag zhugs// // tshig su bcad pa bstand pa 'di byang pan// byang chub sems dpal brgyad stong ni gyi skye ba'i cho sa la bzod pa thob po// rtswa'i yunas mkha
313b8(mdo): dkyil ma 'khod la nyid khri nyis stong ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par 'ardzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpal ltad mo can zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur da te
314a1(mdo): 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bsold to// bcom ldan 'das sgra 'di ka las bya snyam du bdag mo mtshar du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal stsal pa// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
314a2(mdo): dpal na mkhal mdzod la dris shig dang / 'di khyod la lan ldon no// de nas byang chub sems dpal ltad mo can gyis// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sgra 'di g.yas
314a3(mdo): byung snyam du bdag/ ltad mor 'dzind par gyur da to// nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa// rigs kyi bu 'di rdzi snyam du sems// brag cha'i sgra ga/ las byung // smras pa// rigs kyi bu pha rold tu gyi sgra li rnam par rig byed
314a4(mdo): las khrag ma'i lba byung ngo po// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu brag cha la lus sam/ sems sam/ gzugs sam/ kha dog gas/ dbyibs gang yang yod dam// smras pak+Sha rigs kyi bu de ni byed do// sbas pa rigs kyi
314a5(mdo): gu de de bzhin mo// ji ltar brag ma yongs su ma grub kyang spa skad gobar byed pa de bzhin du// nam mkhal yongs su ma grub ste// s+tha rlang med lo brar bye de bapa 'gyur ro// smras pa// rigs kyi bu sa?
314a6(mdo): 'di go bar byed pa su// gang nas dbyangs 'di 'byung / smras pa// ra~M/ sa kyi bu ye shes kyi ma so parnam par rig pa khasam gyis myo u ba ste/ rje bos yid kyi sems pa rdzu/ pa bsams pa de bar ska
314a7(mdo): 'di las 'byung yang sems dpa'agro la yang myed do// de 'di 'ong ba yang myed mod kyi sbal sla bsnyan kyang 'byung po// rigs kyi bu rten ci pa 'brel bar 'byung ba ji tsam du zab pa zhes// gang gyu las 'bras
314a8(mdo): 'byung / yang chu 'bras bu 'grub par gyi 'pho la/ chu byed pa las kyang 'bras bu 'byung ba mo yin no// 'di lta ste/ rgya dang rkyen / 'bras bu mngon par grub pa'i chos 'di gzhig yang g.yo pa myed
314b1(mdo): cing byed pa myed do// gang de lta bu'i 'du shes pa de dag ni bral ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ga pa kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa de nyid de'i rnam par byed pa zhes gsungs so// kun
314b2(mdo): nas nyon mongs pa bsal khas rnam par byang ba ma yin te/ gang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni rnam par byang ba'o// 'di lta ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam pa 'i bum pa zhes bya ba 'a
314b3(mdo): gcig yang brda'i tshig go// don dam pa'i mtha' la kun nas/ nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yang dmyigs su myed do// don dam pa lci mtha' ni mtha' ma yin te/ gapa 'di mtha' ma yin pa// de ni ltar
314b4(mdo): dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o// gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de stong pa nyid kyi mtha'o// gang stong pa nyid kyi mtha' de bdag gi mtha'o// glang bdag gri mtha' de ni chos thams cad kyi mtha'o// tsauts+tshahUM 'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams
314b5(mdo): cad ni re'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi mtha' nye bar zhi ba'i mtha' ste/ gangamatha' de gsum gi sgo myi chags pa de ni chos b+h+yAm saM NadA/ la/ myi chags pa li ye shes steb+da do// / de nas rga nas brta na sha ri'i lus
314b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpal ltad mo can la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kye bu khyod ltad mo can/ zhes mying sus btags pa smras pa// r-ili bu khyod ga paM dpag pha thu chos la 'dud k+Sha dang / glen pa de dang
314b7(mdo): der ltad mor myi 'gyur ram smras/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin du kho bos chos thams cad la 'dug cing // bcom pa de dang der kho bos nam sangs rgyas kyi chos thos cad
314b8(mdo): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur snyam du/ ltad mo dang ldan te de'i phyir kho bos ltad mo can bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa la thams cad la 'o khos ltad mor gyur rad to// sems can thams can kyi
315a1(mdo): sems dang spyod pa la 'jug pa shes pa la kho bo ltad mor gyur da te/ de'i phyir 'o lo ldan/ mo can zhes bya'o// ga la kho bo ltad mor myi 'gyur ba'i ye shes de gang ya myed// 'jug pa
315a2(mdo): dag pa yang myed pas rde'i phyir kho bos ltod mo can zhes bya'o// kang du kho bo ltad mor gyur da pa/ der nyon mongs pa thams cad dpa 'dun kyi sa thams cad kyi skabs mye pa de de'i phyir ma kho mo lhad mo/ 
315a3(mdo): can zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas rtan sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa'i mying 'di nyid las sangs rgyas k+She zhing chos thams cad
315a4(mdo): su brjod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad stond kyang gapa la/ 'ang myi chags te/ chags pa ma mchis bAr sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni ngo mAn+ta ra te// de tshwaste 'khor de nyid du
315a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpalar ni chen dpal zhes bya ba la 'das par gyur da te/ 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa'aM nam mkhal mdzod la'aMd+hi/ skad ces smras so// rigs kyi
315a6(mdo): bu khyod kyis ti pe 'dzin da rab tu bstand pa la brtson te/ gang ci 'dra ba ra ti pe pe 'dzan yongs su sbyar lngar khya ba khaM/ spobs bam gyis shig/ de skad ces s+thAso+o pa dang / byed chub mas
315a7(mdo): dpa' nam mkhal mdzod gis/ byang chub sems dpal rin chen dpal la/ 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi ting mo 'dzin da byang chub kyi rnying po lnga khro das
315a8(mdo): ba myed par 'gro bas bsam pa dag pa zhes bya ba yod do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi ting bre 'dzi dang sems can thams cad la khrod khro ba myed pa'i 'od zom can zhes bya ba yod de/ 
315b1(mdo): de bdag dang gzhan srung ba'i phyir gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma myed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da ni sems can yongs su m+WAr 'gyur ro// rnam par sa pa mdzod ces
315b2(mdo): bya ba'i dza ting nge 'dzin ni dge ba'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel kha 'gyur ro// dge ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da ni rnyog pa myed par 'gyur ro/ mngos par shes 'phags pa zhis bya ba'i te
315b3(mdo): ro 'dzin da ni skye ga tsug pa ltar myi mthong bar 'gyur ro// rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ti pa 'dzin ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur ro// 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de ni g.ya
315b4(mdo): phyogs kyi lam yongs su la rdzogs par 'gyur ro// zlog pa zhes 'ong bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da ni rgyu dang lta ba las rnam par zlog parabya 'gyur ro// dga' byed ces bya thA li ni rje rje dza nad ni chos kyi
315b5(mdo): kun dag la la dgal zhing mos par 'gyur ro// skar ma'i rjeHsu song ba 'i zhes bya ba'i ti pe 'dzin da niN+Din sbyin kar+m+ma yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// mAthu la drag po zhes pa'i
315b6(mdo): teng nge 'dzin da ni sems myi 'jug pa'agyur ro// mtshungs par mnyam pa pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin da ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam byar 'gyur ro// byen \u0f7f 'jug pa zhes bya
315b7(mdo): ba 'i tipe de 'dzin da ni las rnam par smin pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// seng ge'i tog ces bya ba 'i ting pe 'dzin ni 'jigs pa spu zing zhes byed par 'gyur ro// sems kyi tshul zhes bya ba
315b8(mdo): de'adzi na da ni nyon mongs pa'i bad+yad thams cad skrag par 'gyur ro// pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba li ti de 'dzin ni 'jig rten thams car+tha kyis myi gos par 'gyur ro// prad ma dkod pa zhes bya
316a1(mdo): ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa ni chos kyi rgyud du 'gyur ro// 'od bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ti pe 'dzind ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing sdang bar 'gyu ro// bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind ni
316a2(mdo): rjes su chags pa dang 'ong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung zhes bya ba 'i tipa po 'dzind ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zho mchos la sdang bar 'gyur ro// skar mngal ldan zhes bya
316a3(mdo): ting nge 'dzind ni bag chags thams cad 'jom par 'gyu ro// nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mun pa mun nag myed par 'gyur ro// nyi ma 'khyil ba zhes bya ba dz+yo tipa? pe 'dzin de ni semras
316a4(mdo): can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta bar 'gyur lo// yon tan 'byung gnas shes bya ba 'i ti pe po 'atand ni yon tan gyi chos thams cad kyi yongasu 'gro ba ba 'gyur ro/ sred myed kyi bu lta bur zhes
316a5(mdo): bya ba li ting nge 'dzind ni pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro// snying po'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba 'i ti / pe 'dzin da ni rdo rje'i lus myi phyed par 'gyur mo// snying rje dang
316a6(mdo): ldan pa la tI nge 'dzind ni dam bcas pa thams cad nyes 'og tu chud par 'gyur ro// de rje'i dkyil 'khom zhes bya ba la tong re 'dzinan ni mngos par shes pa la sa kyinyam se par 'gyur ro// 
316a7(mdo): rdo rje'i snying po zhes grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni byang chub kyi sdong por 'gyur ro// rdo rjes bu zhes bya ba'i ting pa 'dzin ni chos thams ca rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro// khyod me pa ldan pa pa zhes bya
316a8(mdo): ba li ting nge 'dzin da ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro// sa 'dzind ces bya ba'i ti pade 'dzin ces bya ni chags pa dang zhe sdang myed par 'gyur ro// bdud
316b1(mdo): kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud bzhi las yang dag par 'dal bar 'gyur ro// lus rnaMs par 'jig pa zhes bya ba li d+hA ta pe nge 'dzin da ni gzugs thams cad rnam par
316b2(mdo): 'jig par 'gyur ro/ myi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin da ni sems rtse gcig tu 'gyur ro// rnam pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba 'i ting po 'dzin ni dmyigs pa thams cad yong su dag par 'gyur
316b3(mdo): ro// nyon mongs pa myed pa li zhes bya ba'i ta ngi nge 'dzin ni dmyigs pa thams cad las yang dag par 'dal bar 'gyur lo// 'khor lo dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba li ting nge 'dzin pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su

316b5(mdo): ba'i chos thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par sbyor/ bzhes bya ba'i ti pide 'dzin da ni myi dgel ba'i chos thams/ cad spong bar 'gyur ro// lus kyi rgyan ni ces bya ba'i ting re
